translation_en_yusufali: Joseph responded, “Allah forbid that we should take other than the one with whom we found our property. Otherwise, we would surely be unjust.”

text_simple: فلما استياسوا منه خلصوا نجيا قال كبيرهم الم تعلموا ان اباكم قد اخذ عليكم موثقا من الله ومن قبل ما فرطتم في يوسف فلن ابرح الارض حتى ياذن لي ابي او يحكم الله لي وهو خير الحاكمين
translation_en_yusufali: When they lost all hope in him, they spoke privately. The eldest of them said, “Do you not know that your father had taken a solemn oath by Allah from you, nor how you failed him regarding Joseph before? So I am not leaving this land until my father allows me to, or Allah decides for me. For He is the Best of Judges.

text_simple: ارجعوا الى ابيكم فقولوا يا ابانا ان ابنك سرق وما شهدنا الا بما علمنا وما كنا للغيب حافظين
translation_en_yusufali: Return to your father and say, ‘O our father! Your son committed theft. We testify only to what we know. We could not guard against the unforeseen.

text_simple: واسال القرية التي كنا فيها والعير التي اقبلنا فيها وانا لصادقون
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹the people of˺ the land where we were and the caravan we travelled with. We are certainly telling the truth.’”

text_simple: قال بل سولت لكم انفسكم امرا فصبر جميل عسى الله ان ياتيني بهم جميعا انه هو العليم الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: He cried, “No! Your souls must have tempted you to do something ˹evil˺. So ˹I am left with nothing but˺ beautiful patience! I trust Allah will return them all to me. Surely He ˹alone˺ is the All-Knowing, All-Wise.”

text_simple: وتولى عنهم وقال يا اسفى على يوسف وابيضت عيناه من الحزن فهو كظيم
translation_en_yusufali: He turned away from them, lamenting, “Alas, poor Joseph!” And his eyes turned white out of the grief he suppressed.

text_simple: قالوا تالله تفتا تذكر يوسف حتى تكون حرضا او تكون من الهالكين
translation_en_yusufali: They said, “By Allah! You will not cease to remember Joseph until you lose your health or ˹even˺ your life.”

text_simple: قال انما اشكو بثي وحزني الى الله واعلم من الله ما لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: He replied, “I complain of my anguish and sorrow only to Allah, and I know from Allah what you do not know.

text_simple: يا بني اذهبوا فتحسسوا من يوسف واخيه ولا تياسوا من روح الله انه لا يياس من روح الله الا القوم الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: O  my sons! Go and search ˹diligently˺ for Joseph and his brother. And do not lose hope in the mercy of Allah, for no one loses hope in Allah’s mercy except those with no faith.”

text_simple: فلما دخلوا عليه قالوا يا ايها العزيز مسنا واهلنا الضر وجئنا ببضاعة مزجاة فاوف لنا الكيل وتصدق علينا ان الله يجزي المتصدقين
translation_en_yusufali: When they entered Joseph’s presence, they pleaded, “O Chief Minister! We and our family have been touched with hardship, and we have brought only a few worthless coins, but ˹please˺ give us our supplies in full and be charitable to us. Indeed, Allah rewards the charitable.”

text_simple: قال هل علمتم ما فعلتم بيوسف واخيه اذ انتم جاهلون
translation_en_yusufali: He asked, “Do you remember what you did to Joseph and his brother in your ignorance?”

text_simple: قالوا اانك لانت يوسف قال انا يوسف وهذا اخي قد من الله علينا انه من يتق ويصبر فان الله لا يضيع اجر المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: They replied ˹in shock˺, “Are you really Joseph?” He said, “I am Joseph, and here is my brother ˹Benjamin˺! Allah has truly been gracious to us. Surely whoever is mindful ˹of Allah˺ and patient, then certainly Allah never discounts the reward of the good-doers.”

text_simple: قالوا تالله لقد اثرك الله علينا وان كنا لخاطئين
translation_en_yusufali: They admitted, “By Allah! Allah has truly preferred you over us, and we have surely been sinful.”

text_simple: قال لا تثريب عليكم اليوم يغفر الله لكم وهو ارحم الراحمين
translation_en_yusufali: Joseph said, “There is no blame on you today. May Allah forgive you! He is the Most Merciful of the merciful!

text_simple: اذهبوا بقميصي هذا فالقوه على وجه ابي يات بصيرا واتوني باهلكم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: Go with this shirt of mine and cast it over my father’s face, and he will regain his sight. Then come back to me with your whole family.”

text_simple: ولما فصلت العير قال ابوهم اني لاجد ريح يوسف لولا ان تفندون
translation_en_yusufali: When the caravan departed ˹from Egypt˺, their father said ˹to those around him˺, “You may think I am senile, but I certainly sense the smell of Joseph.”

text_simple: قالوا تالله انك لفي ضلالك القديم
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “By Allah! You are definitely still in your old delusion.”

text_simple: فلما ان جاء البشير القاه على وجهه فارتد بصيرا قال الم اقل لكم اني اعلم من الله ما لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: But when the bearer of the good news arrived, he cast the shirt over Jacob’s face, so he regained his sight. Jacob then said ˹to his children˺, “Did I not tell you that I truly know from Allah what you do not know?”

text_simple: قالوا يا ابانا استغفر لنا ذنوبنا انا كنا خاطئين
translation_en_yusufali: They begged, “O our father! Pray for the forgiveness of our sins. We have certainly been sinful.”

text_simple: قال سوف استغفر لكم ربي انه هو الغفور الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: He said, “I will pray to my Lord for your forgiveness. He ˹alone˺ is indeed the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”

text_simple: فلما دخلوا على يوسف اوى اليه ابويه وقال ادخلوا مصر ان شاء الله امنين
translation_en_yusufali: When they entered Joseph’s presence, he received his parents ˹graciously˺ and said, “Enter Egypt, Allah willing, in security.”

text_simple: ورفع ابويه على العرش وخروا له سجدا وقال يا ابت هذا تاويل رؤياي من قبل قد جعلها ربي حقا وقد احسن بي اذ اخرجني من السجن وجاء بكم من البدو من بعد ان نزغ الشيطان بيني وبين اخوتي ان ربي لطيف لما يشاء انه هو العليم الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Then he raised his parents to the throne, and they all fell down in prostration to Joseph, who then said, “O my dear father! This is the interpretation of my old dream. My Lord has made it come true. He was truly kind to me when He freed me from prison, and brought you all from the desert after Satan had ignited rivalry between me and my siblings. Indeed my Lord is subtle in fulfilling what He wills. Surely He ˹alone˺ is the All-Knowing, All-Wise.”

text_simple: رب قد اتيتني من الملك وعلمتني من تاويل الاحاديث فاطر السماوات والارض انت وليي في الدنيا والاخرة توفني مسلما والحقني بالصالحين
translation_en_yusufali: “My Lord! You have surely granted me authority and taught me the interpretation of dreams. ˹O˺ Originator of the heavens and the earth! You are my Guardian in this world and the Hereafter. Allow me to die as one who submits and join me with the righteous.”

text_simple: ذلك من انباء الغيب نوحيه اليك وما كنت لديهم اذ اجمعوا امرهم وهم يمكرون
translation_en_yusufali: That is from the stories of the unseen which We reveal to you ˹O Prophet˺. You were not present when they ˹all˺ made up their minds, and when they plotted ˹against Joseph˺.

text_simple: وما اكثر الناس ولو حرصت بمؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: And most people will not believe—no matter how keen you are—

text_simple: وما تسالهم عليه من اجر ان هو الا ذكر للعالمين
translation_en_yusufali: even though you are not asking them for a reward for this ˹Quran˺. It is only a reminder to the whole world.

text_simple: وكاين من اية في السماوات والارض يمرون عليها وهم عنها معرضون
translation_en_yusufali: How many signs in the heavens and the earth do they pass by with indifference!

text_simple: وما يؤمن اكثرهم بالله الا وهم مشركون
translation_en_yusufali: And most of them do not believe in Allah without associating others with Him ˹in worship˺.

text_simple: افامنوا ان تاتيهم غاشية من عذاب الله او تاتيهم الساعة بغتة وهم لا يشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: Do they feel secure that an overwhelming torment from Allah will not overtake them, or that the Hour will not take them by surprise when they least expect ˹it˺?

text_simple: قل هذه سبيلي ادعو الى الله على بصيرة انا ومن اتبعني وسبحان الله وما انا من المشركين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “This is my way. I invite to Allah with insight—I and those who follow me. Glory be to Allah, and I am not one of the polytheists.”

text_simple: وما ارسلنا من قبلك الا رجالا نوحي اليهم من اهل القرى افلم يسيروا في الارض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبلهم ولدار الاخرة خير للذين اتقوا افلا تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: We only sent before you ˹O Prophet˺ men inspired by Us from among the people of each society. Have the deniers not travelled through the land to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them? And surely the ˹eternal˺ Home of the Hereafter is far better for those mindful ˹of Allah˺. Will you not then understand?

text_simple: حتى اذا استياس الرسل وظنوا انهم قد كذبوا جاءهم نصرنا فنجي من نشاء ولا يرد باسنا عن القوم المجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: And when the messengers despaired and their people thought the messengers had been denied help, Our help came to them ˹at last˺. We then saved whoever We willed, and Our punishment is never averted from the wicked people.

text_simple: لقد كان في قصصهم عبرة لاولي الالباب ما كان حديثا يفترى ولكن تصديق الذي بين يديه وتفصيل كل شيء وهدى ورحمة لقوم يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: In their stories there is truly a lesson for people of reason. This message cannot be a fabrication, rather ˹it is˺ a confirmation of previous revelation, a detailed explanation of all things, a guide, and a mercy for people of faith.

text_simple: المر تلك ايات الكتاب والذي انزل اليك من ربك الحق ولكن اكثر الناس لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Alif-Lãm-Mĩm-Ra. These are the verses of the Book. What has been revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ from your Lord is the truth, but most people do not believe.

text_simple: الله الذي رفع السماوات بغير عمد ترونها ثم استوى على العرش وسخر الشمس والقمر كل يجري لاجل مسمى يدبر الامر يفصل الايات لعلكم بلقاء ربكم توقنون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who has raised the heavens without pillars—as you can see—then established Himself on the Throne. He has subjected the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. He conducts the whole affair. He makes the signs clear so that you may be certain of the meeting with your Lord.

text_simple: وهو الذي مد الارض وجعل فيها رواسي وانهارا ومن كل الثمرات جعل فيها زوجين اثنين يغشي الليل النهار ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who spread out the earth and placed firm mountains and rivers upon it, and created fruits of every kind in pairs. He covers the day with night. Surely in this are signs for those who reflect.

text_simple: وفي الارض قطع متجاورات وجنات من اعناب وزرع ونخيل صنوان وغير صنوان يسقى بماء واحد ونفضل بعضها على بعض في الاكل ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And on the earth there are ˹different˺ neighbouring tracts, gardens of grapevines, ˹various˺ crops, palm trees—some stemming from the same root, others standing alone. They are all irrigated with the same water, yet We make some taste better than others. Surely in this are signs for those who understand.

text_simple: وان تعجب فعجب قولهم ااذا كنا ترابا اانا لفي خلق جديد اولئك الذين كفروا بربهم واولئك الاغلال في اعناقهم واولئك اصحاب النار هم فيها خالدون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Now,˺ if anything should amaze you ˹O Prophet˺, then it is their question: “When we are reduced to dust, will we really be raised as a new creation?” It is they who have disbelieved in their Lord. It is they who will have shackles around their necks. And it is they who will be the residents of the Fire. They will be there forever.

text_simple: ويستعجلونك بالسيئة قبل الحسنة وقد خلت من قبلهم المثلات وان ربك لذو مغفرة للناس على ظلمهم وان ربك لشديد العقاب
translation_en_yusufali: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ to hasten the torment rather than grace, though there have ˹already˺ been ˹many˺ torments before them. Surely your Lord is full of forgiveness for people, despite their wrongdoing, and your Lord is truly severe in punishment.

text_simple: ويقول الذين كفروا لولا انزل عليه اية من ربه انما انت منذر ولكل قوم هاد
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say, “If only a sign could be sent down to him from his Lord.” You ˹O Prophet˺ are only a warner. And every people had a guide.

text_simple: الله يعلم ما تحمل كل انثى وما تغيض الارحام وما تزداد وكل شيء عنده بمقدار
translation_en_yusufali: Allah knows what every female bears and what increases and decreases in the wombs. And with Him everything is determined with precision.

text_simple: عالم الغيب والشهادة الكبير المتعال
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the seen and the unseen—the All-Great, Most Exalted.

text_simple: سواء منكم من اسر القول ومن جهر به ومن هو مستخف بالليل وسارب بالنهار
translation_en_yusufali: It is the same ˹to Him˺ whether any of you speaks secretly or openly, whether one hides in the darkness of night or goes about in broad daylight.

text_simple: له معقبات من بين يديه ومن خلفه يحفظونه من امر الله ان الله لا يغير ما بقوم حتى يغيروا ما بانفسهم واذا اراد الله بقوم سوءا فلا مرد له وما لهم من دونه من وال
translation_en_yusufali: For each one there are successive angels before and behind, protecting them by Allah’s command. Indeed, Allah would never change a people’s state ˹of favour˺ until they change their own state ˹of faith˺. And if it is Allah’s Will to torment a people, it can never be averted, nor can they find a protector other than Him.

text_simple: هو الذي يريكم البرق خوفا وطمعا وينشئ السحاب الثقال
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who shows you lightning, inspiring ˹you with˺ hope and fear, and produces heavy clouds.

text_simple: ويسبح الرعد بحمده والملائكة من خيفته ويرسل الصواعق فيصيب بها من يشاء وهم يجادلون في الله وهو شديد المحال
translation_en_yusufali: The thunder glorifies His praises, as do the angels in awe of Him. He sends thunderbolts, striking with them whoever He wills. Yet they dispute about Allah. And He is tremendous in might.

text_simple: له دعوة الحق والذين يدعون من دونه لا يستجيبون لهم بشيء الا كباسط كفيه الى الماء ليبلغ فاه وما هو ببالغه وما دعاء الكافرين الا في ضلال
translation_en_yusufali: Calling upon Him ˹alone˺ is the truth. But those ˹idols˺ the pagans invoke besides Him ˹can˺ never respond to them in any way. ˹It is˺ just like someone who stretches out their hands to water, ˹asking it˺ to reach their mouths, but it can never do so. The calls of the disbelievers are only in vain.

text_simple: ولله يسجد من في السماوات والارض طوعا وكرها وظلالهم بالغدو والاصال
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ bow down ˹in submission˺ all those in the heavens and the earth—willingly or unwillingly—as do their shadows, morning and evening.

text_simple: قل من رب السماوات والارض قل الله قل افاتخذتم من دونه اولياء لا يملكون لانفسهم نفعا ولا ضرا قل هل يستوي الاعمى والبصير ام هل تستوي الظلمات والنور ام جعلوا لله شركاء خلقوا كخلقه فتشابه الخلق عليهم قل الله خالق كل شيء وهو الواحد القهار
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Who is the Lord of the heavens and the earth?” Say, “Allah!” Ask ˹them˺, “Why ˹then˺ have you taken besides Him lords who cannot even benefit or protect themselves?” Say, “Can the blind and the sighted be equal? Or can darkness and light be equal?” Or have they associated with Allah partners who ˹supposedly˺ produced a creation like His, leaving them confused between the two creations? Say, “Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the One, the Supreme.”

text_simple: انزل من السماء ماء فسالت اودية بقدرها فاحتمل السيل زبدا رابيا ومما يوقدون عليه في النار ابتغاء حلية او متاع زبد مثله كذلك يضرب الله الحق والباطل فاما الزبد فيذهب جفاء واما ما ينفع الناس فيمكث في الارض كذلك يضرب الله الامثال
translation_en_yusufali: He sends down rain from the sky, causing the valleys to flow, each according to its capacity. The currents then carry along rising foam, similar to the slag produced from metal that people melt in the fire for ornaments or tools. This is how Allah compares truth to falsehood. The ˹worthless˺ residue is then cast away, but what benefits people remains on the earth. This is how Allah sets forth parables.

text_simple: للذين استجابوا لربهم الحسنى والذين لم يستجيبوا له لو ان لهم ما في الارض جميعا ومثله معه لافتدوا به اولئك لهم سوء الحساب وماواهم جهنم وبئس المهاد
translation_en_yusufali: Those who respond to ˹the call of˺ their Lord will have the finest reward. As for those who do not respond to Him, even if they were to possess everything in the world twice over, they would certainly offer it to ransom themselves. They will face strict judgment, and Hell will be their home. What an evil place to rest!

text_simple: افمن يعلم انما انزل اليك من ربك الحق كمن هو اعمى انما يتذكر اولو الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: Can the one who knows that your Lord’s revelation to you ˹O Prophet˺ is the truth be like the one who is blind? None will be mindful ˹of this˺ except people of reason.

text_simple: الذين يوفون بعهد الله ولا ينقضون الميثاق
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who honour Allah’s covenant, never breaking the pledge;

text_simple: والذين يصلون ما امر الله به ان يوصل ويخشون ربهم ويخافون سوء الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: and those who maintain whatever ˹ties˺ Allah has ordered to be maintained, stand in awe of their Lord, and fear strict judgment.

text_simple: والذين صبروا ابتغاء وجه ربهم واقاموا الصلاة وانفقوا مما رزقناهم سرا وعلانية ويدرءون بالحسنة السيئة اولئك لهم عقبى الدار
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹they are˺ those who endure patiently, seeking their Lord’s pleasure, establish prayer, donate from what We have provided for them—secretly and openly—and respond to evil with good. It is they who will have the ultimate abode:

text_simple: جنات عدن يدخلونها ومن صلح من ابائهم وازواجهم وذرياتهم والملائكة يدخلون عليهم من كل باب
translation_en_yusufali: the Gardens of Eternity, which they will enter along with the righteous among their parents, spouses, and descendants. And the angels will enter upon them from every gate, ˹saying,˺

text_simple: سلام عليكم بما صبرتم فنعم عقبى الدار
translation_en_yusufali: “Peace be upon you for your perseverance. How excellent is the ultimate abode!”

text_simple: والذين ينقضون عهد الله من بعد ميثاقه ويقطعون ما امر الله به ان يوصل ويفسدون في الارض اولئك لهم اللعنة ولهم سوء الدار
translation_en_yusufali: And those who violate Allah’s covenant after it has been affirmed, break whatever ˹ties˺ Allah has ordered to be maintained, and spread corruption in the land—it is they who will be condemned and will have the worst abode.

text_simple: الله يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر وفرحوا بالحياة الدنيا وما الحياة الدنيا في الاخرة الا متاع
translation_en_yusufali: Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills. And the disbelievers become prideful of ˹the pleasures of˺ this worldly life. But the life of this world, compared to the Hereafter, is nothing but a fleeting enjoyment.

text_simple: ويقول الذين كفروا لولا انزل عليه اية من ربه قل ان الله يضل من يشاء ويهدي اليه من اناب
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say, “If only a sign could be sent down to him from his Lord.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Indeed, Allah leaves to stray whoever He wills, and guides to Himself whoever turns to Him—

text_simple: الذين امنوا وتطمئن قلوبهم بذكر الله الا بذكر الله تطمئن القلوب
translation_en_yusufali: those who believe and whose hearts find comfort in the remembrance of Allah. Surely in the remembrance of Allah do hearts find comfort.

text_simple: الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات طوبى لهم وحسن ماب
translation_en_yusufali: Those who believe and do good, for them will be bliss and an honourable destination.”

text_simple: كذلك ارسلناك في امة قد خلت من قبلها امم لتتلو عليهم الذي اوحينا اليك وهم يكفرون بالرحمن قل هو ربي لا اله الا هو عليه توكلت واليه متاب
translation_en_yusufali: And so We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ to a community, like ˹We did with˺ earlier communities, so that you may recite to them what We have revealed to you. Yet they deny the Most Compassionate. Say, “He is my Lord! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. In Him I put my trust, and to Him I turn ˹in repentance˺.”

text_simple: ولو ان قرانا سيرت به الجبال او قطعت به الارض او كلم به الموتى بل لله الامر جميعا افلم يياس الذين امنوا ان لو يشاء الله لهدى الناس جميعا ولا يزال الذين كفروا تصيبهم بما صنعوا قارعة او تحل قريبا من دارهم حتى ياتي وعد الله ان الله لا يخلف الميعاد
translation_en_yusufali: If there were a recitation that could cause mountains to move, or the earth to split, or the dead to speak, ˹it would have been this Quran˺. But all matters are by Allah’s Will. Have the believers not yet realized that had Allah willed, He could have guided all of humanity? And disasters will continue to afflict the disbelievers or strike close to their homes for their misdeeds, until Allah’s promise comes to pass. Surely Allah never fails in His promise.

text_simple: ولقد استهزئ برسل من قبلك فامليت للذين كفروا ثم اخذتهم فكيف كان عقاب
translation_en_yusufali: Other messengers had already been ridiculed before you, but I delayed the disbelievers ˹for a while˺ then seized them. And how ˹horrible˺ was My punishment!

text_simple: افمن هو قائم على كل نفس بما كسبت وجعلوا لله شركاء قل سموهم ام تنبئونه بما لا يعلم في الارض ام بظاهر من القول بل زين للذين كفروا مكرهم وصدوا عن السبيل ومن يضلل الله فما له من هاد
translation_en_yusufali: Is ˹there any equal to˺ the Vigilant One Who knows what every soul commits? Yet the pagans have associated others with Allah ˹in worship˺. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Name them! Or do you ˹mean to˺ inform Him of something He does not know on the earth? Or are these ˹gods˺ just empty words?” In fact, the disbelievers’ falsehood has been made so appealing to them that they have been turned away from the Path. And whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

text_simple: لهم عذاب في الحياة الدنيا ولعذاب الاخرة اشق وما لهم من الله من واق
translation_en_yusufali: For them is punishment in this worldly life, but the punishment of the Hereafter is truly far worse. And none can shield them from Allah.

text_simple: مثل الجنة التي وعد المتقون تجري من تحتها الانهار اكلها دائم وظلها تلك عقبى الذين اتقوا وعقبى الكافرين النار
translation_en_yusufali: The description of the Paradise promised to the righteous is that under it rivers flow; eternal is its fruit as well as its shade. That is the ˹ultimate˺ outcome for the righteous. But the outcome for the disbelievers is the Fire!

text_simple: والذين اتيناهم الكتاب يفرحون بما انزل اليك ومن الاحزاب من ينكر بعضه قل انما امرت ان اعبد الله ولا اشرك به اليه ادعو واليه ماب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The believers among˺ those who were given the Scripture rejoice at what has been revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺, while some ˹disbelieving˺ factions deny a portion of it. Say, “I have only been commanded to worship Allah, associating none with Him ˹in worship˺. To Him I invite ˹all˺, and to Him is my return.”

text_simple: وكذلك انزلناه حكما عربيا ولئن اتبعت اهواءهم بعدما جاءك من العلم ما لك من الله من ولي ولا واق
translation_en_yusufali: And so We have revealed it as an authority in Arabic. And if you were to follow their desires after ˹all˺ the knowledge that has come to you, there would be none to protect or shield you from Allah.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا رسلا من قبلك وجعلنا لهم ازواجا وذرية وما كان لرسول ان ياتي باية الا باذن الله لكل اجل كتاب
translation_en_yusufali: We have certainly sent messengers before you ˹O Prophet˺ and blessed them with wives and offspring. It was not for any messenger to bring a sign without Allah’s permission. Every destined matter has a ˹set˺ time.

text_simple: يمحو الله ما يشاء ويثبت وعنده ام الكتاب
translation_en_yusufali: Allah eliminates and confirms what He wills, and with Him is the Master Record.

text_simple: وان ما نرينك بعض الذي نعدهم او نتوفينك فانما عليك البلاغ وعلينا الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: Whether We show you ˹O Prophet˺ some of what We threaten them with, or cause you to die ˹before that˺, your duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺. Judgment is for Us.

text_simple: اولم يروا انا ناتي الارض ننقصها من اطرافها والله يحكم لا معقب لحكمه وهو سريع الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not see that We gradually reduce their land from its borders? Allah decides—none can reverse His decision. And He is swift in reckoning.

text_simple: وقد مكر الذين من قبلهم فلله المكر جميعا يعلم ما تكسب كل نفس وسيعلم الكفار لمن عقبى الدار
translation_en_yusufali: Those ˹disbelievers˺ before them ˹secretly˺ planned, but Allah has the ultimate plan. He knows what every soul commits. And the disbelievers will soon know who will have the ultimate outcome.

text_simple: ويقول الذين كفروا لست مرسلا قل كفى بالله شهيدا بيني وبينكم ومن عنده علم الكتاب
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say, “You ˹Muḥammad˺ are no messenger.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Allah is sufficient as a Witness between me and you, as is whoever has knowledge of the Scripture.”

text_simple: الر كتاب انزلناه اليك لتخرج الناس من الظلمات الى النور باذن ربهم الى صراط العزيز الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: Alif-Lãm-Ra. ˹This is˺ a Book which We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ so that you may lead people out of darkness and into light, by the Will of their Lord, to the Path of the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—

text_simple: الله الذي له ما في السماوات وما في الارض وويل للكافرين من عذاب شديد
translation_en_yusufali: Allah, to Whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And woe to the disbelievers because of a severe torment!

text_simple: الذين يستحبون الحياة الدنيا على الاخرة ويصدون عن سبيل الله ويبغونها عوجا اولئك في ضلال بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ the ones who favour the life of this world over the Hereafter and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, striving to make it ˹appear˺ crooked. It is they who have gone far astray.

text_simple: وما ارسلنا من رسول الا بلسان قومه ليبين لهم فيضل الله من يشاء ويهدي من يشاء وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: We have not sent a messenger except in the language of his people to clarify ˹the message˺ for them. Then Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا موسى باياتنا ان اخرج قومك من الظلمات الى النور وذكرهم بايام الله ان في ذلك لايات لكل صبار شكور
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent Moses with Our signs, ˹ordering him,˺ “Lead your people out of darkness and into light, and remind them of Allah’s days ˹of favour˺.” Surely in this are signs for whoever is steadfast, grateful.

text_simple: واذ قال موسى لقومه اذكروا نعمة الله عليكم اذ انجاكم من ال فرعون يسومونكم سوء العذاب ويذبحون ابناءكم ويستحيون نساءكم وفي ذلكم بلاء من ربكم عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider˺ when Moses said to his people, “Remember Allah’s favour upon you when He rescued you from the people of Pharaoh, who afflicted you with dreadful torment—slaughtering your sons and keeping your women. That was a severe test from your Lord.

text_simple: واذ تاذن ربكم لئن شكرتم لازيدنكم ولئن كفرتم ان عذابي لشديد
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember˺ when your Lord proclaimed, ‘If you are grateful, I will certainly give you more. But if you are ungrateful, surely My punishment is severe.’”

text_simple: وقال موسى ان تكفروا انتم ومن في الارض جميعا فان الله لغني حميد
translation_en_yusufali: Moses added, “If you along with everyone on earth were to be ungrateful, then ˹know that˺ Allah is indeed Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.”

text_simple: الم ياتكم نبا الذين من قبلكم قوم نوح وعاد وثمود والذين من بعدهم لا يعلمهم الا الله جاءتهم رسلهم بالبينات فردوا ايديهم في افواههم وقالوا انا كفرنا بما ارسلتم به وانا لفي شك مما تدعوننا اليه مريب
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not ˹already˺ received the stories of those who were before you: the people of Noah, ’Âd, Thamûd, and those after them? Only Allah knows how many they were. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs, but they put their hands over their mouths and said, “We totally reject what you have been sent with, and we are certainly in alarming doubt about what you are inviting us to.”

text_simple: قالت رسلهم افي الله شك فاطر السماوات والارض يدعوكم ليغفر لكم من ذنوبكم ويؤخركم الى اجل مسمى قالوا ان انتم الا بشر مثلنا تريدون ان تصدونا عما كان يعبد اباؤنا فاتونا بسلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Their messengers asked ˹them˺, “Is there any doubt about Allah, the Originator of the heavens and the earth? He is inviting you in order to forgive your sins, and delay your end until your appointed term.” They argued, “You are no more than humans like us! You ˹only˺ wish to turn us away from what our forefathers worshipped. So bring us some compelling proof.”

text_simple: قالت لهم رسلهم ان نحن الا بشر مثلكم ولكن الله يمن على من يشاء من عباده وما كان لنا ان ناتيكم بسلطان الا باذن الله وعلى الله فليتوكل المؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Their messengers said to them, “We are ˹indeed˺ only humans like you, but Allah favours whoever He chooses of His servants. It is not for us to bring you any proof without Allah’s permission. And in Allah let the believers put their trust.

text_simple: وما لنا الا نتوكل على الله وقد هدانا سبلنا ولنصبرن على ما اذيتمونا وعلى الله فليتوكل المتوكلون
translation_en_yusufali: Why should we not put our trust in Allah, when He has truly guided us to ˹the very best of˺ ways? Indeed, we will patiently endure whatever harm you may cause us. And in Allah let the faithful put their trust.”

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا لرسلهم لنخرجنكم من ارضنا او لتعودن في ملتنا فاوحى اليهم ربهم لنهلكن الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers then threatened their messengers, “We will certainly expel you from our land, unless you return to our faith.” So their Lord revealed to them, “We will surely destroy the wrongdoers

text_simple: ولنسكننكم الارض من بعدهم ذلك لمن خاف مقامي وخاف وعيد
translation_en_yusufali: and make you reside in the land after them. This is for whoever is in awe of standing before Me and fears My warning.”

text_simple: واستفتحوا وخاب كل جبار عنيد
translation_en_yusufali: And both sides called for judgment, so every stubborn tyrant was doomed.

text_simple: من ورائه جهنم ويسقى من ماء صديد
translation_en_yusufali: Awaiting them is Hell, and they will be left to drink oozing pus

text_simple: يتجرعه ولا يكاد يسيغه وياتيه الموت من كل مكان وما هو بميت ومن ورائه عذاب غليظ
translation_en_yusufali: which they will sip with difficulty, and can hardly swallow. Death will overwhelm them from every side, yet they will not ˹be able to˺ die. Awaiting them still is harsher torment.

text_simple: مثل الذين كفروا بربهم اعمالهم كرماد اشتدت به الريح في يوم عاصف لا يقدرون مما كسبوا على شيء ذلك هو الضلال البعيد
translation_en_yusufali: The parable of the deeds of those who disbelieve in their Lord is that of ashes fiercely blown away by wind on a stormy day. They will gain nothing from what they have earned. That is ˹truly˺ the farthest one can stray.

text_simple: الم تر ان الله خلق السماوات والارض بالحق ان يشا يذهبكم ويات بخلق جديد
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen that Allah created the heavens and the earth for a reason? If He wills, He can eliminate you and produce a new creation.

text_simple: وما ذلك على الله بعزيز
translation_en_yusufali: And that is not difficult for Allah ˹at all˺.

text_simple: وبرزوا لله جميعا فقال الضعفاء للذين استكبروا انا كنا لكم تبعا فهل انتم مغنون عنا من عذاب الله من شيء قالوا لو هدانا الله لهديناكم سواء علينا اجزعنا ام صبرنا ما لنا من محيص
translation_en_yusufali: They will all appear before Allah, and the lowly ˹followers˺ will appeal to the arrogant ˹leaders˺, “We were your ˹dedicated˺ followers, so will you ˹then˺ protect us from Allah’s torment in any way?” They will reply, “Had Allah guided us, we would have guided you. ˹Now˺ it is all the same for us whether we suffer patiently or impatiently, there is no escape for us.”

text_simple: وقال الشيطان لما قضي الامر ان الله وعدكم وعد الحق ووعدتكم فاخلفتكم وما كان لي عليكم من سلطان الا ان دعوتكم فاستجبتم لي فلا تلوموني ولوموا انفسكم ما انا بمصرخكم وما انتم بمصرخي اني كفرت بما اشركتمون من قبل ان الظالمين لهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: And Satan will say ˹to his followers˺ after the judgment has been passed, “Indeed, Allah has made you a true promise. I too made you a promise, but I failed you. I did not have any authority over you. I only called you, and you responded to me. So do not blame me; blame yourselves. I cannot save you, nor can you save me. Indeed, I denounce your previous association of me with Allah ˹in loyalty˺. Surely the wrongdoers will suffer a painful punishment.”

text_simple: وادخل الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها باذن ربهم تحيتهم فيها سلام
translation_en_yusufali: Those who believe and do good will be admitted into Gardens, under which rivers flow—to stay there forever by the Will of their Lord—where they will be greeted with “Peace!”

text_simple: الم تر كيف ضرب الله مثلا كلمة طيبة كشجرة طيبة اصلها ثابت وفرعها في السماء
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see how Allah compares a good word to a good tree? Its root is firm and its branches reach the sky

text_simple: تؤتي اكلها كل حين باذن ربها ويضرب الله الامثال للناس لعلهم يتذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹always˺ yielding its fruit in every season by the Will of its Lord. This is how Allah sets forth parables for the people, so perhaps they will be mindful.

text_simple: ومثل كلمة خبيثة كشجرة خبيثة اجتثت من فوق الارض ما لها من قرار
translation_en_yusufali: And the parable of an evil word is that of an evil tree, uprooted from the earth, having no stability.

text_simple: يثبت الله الذين امنوا بالقول الثابت في الحياة الدنيا وفي الاخرة ويضل الله الظالمين ويفعل الله ما يشاء
translation_en_yusufali: Allah makes the believers steadfast with the firm Word ˹of faith˺ in this worldly life and the Hereafter. And Allah leaves the wrongdoers to stray. For Allah does what He wills.

text_simple: الم تر الى الذين بدلوا نعمت الله كفرا واحلوا قومهم دار البوار
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen those ˹disbelievers˺ who meet Allah’s favours with ingratitude and lead their own people to their doom?

text_simple: جهنم يصلونها وبئس القرار
translation_en_yusufali: In Hell they will burn. What an evil place for settlement.

text_simple: وجعلوا لله اندادا ليضلوا عن سبيله قل تمتعوا فان مصيركم الى النار
translation_en_yusufali: They set up equals to Allah to mislead ˹others˺ from His Way. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Enjoy yourselves! Surely your destination is the Fire.”

text_simple: قل لعبادي الذين امنوا يقيموا الصلاة وينفقوا مما رزقناهم سرا وعلانية من قبل ان ياتي يوم لا بيع فيه ولا خلال
translation_en_yusufali: Tell My believing servants to establish prayer and donate from what We have provided for them—openly and secretly—before the arrival of a Day in which there will be no ransom or friendly connections.

text_simple: الله الذي خلق السماوات والارض وانزل من السماء ماء فاخرج به من الثمرات رزقا لكم وسخر لكم الفلك لتجري في البحر بامره وسخر لكم الانهار
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who created the heavens and the earth and sends down rain from the sky, causing fruits to grow as a provision for you. He has subjected the ships for your service, sailing through the sea by His command, and has subjected the rivers for you.

text_simple: وسخر لكم الشمس والقمر دائبين وسخر لكم الليل والنهار
translation_en_yusufali: He has ˹also˺ subjected for you the sun and the moon, both constantly orbiting, and has subjected the day and night for you.

text_simple: واتاكم من كل ما سالتموه وان تعدوا نعمت الله لا تحصوها ان الانسان لظلوم كفار
translation_en_yusufali: And He has granted you all that you asked Him for. If you tried to count Allah’s blessings, you would never be able to number them. Indeed humankind is truly unfair, ˹totally˺ ungrateful.

text_simple: واذ قال ابراهيم رب اجعل هذا البلد امنا واجنبني وبني ان نعبد الاصنام
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when Abraham prayed, “My Lord! Make this city ˹of Mecca˺ secure, and keep me and my children away from the worship of idols.

text_simple: رب انهن اضللن كثيرا من الناس فمن تبعني فانه مني ومن عصاني فانك غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: My Lord! They have caused many people to go astray. So whoever follows me is with me, and whoever disobeys me—then surely You are ˹still˺ All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ربنا اني اسكنت من ذريتي بواد غير ذي زرع عند بيتك المحرم ربنا ليقيموا الصلاة فاجعل افئدة من الناس تهوي اليهم وارزقهم من الثمرات لعلهم يشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! I have settled some of my offspring in a barren valley, near Your Sacred House, our Lord, so that they may establish prayer. So make the hearts of ˹believing˺ people incline towards them and provide them with fruits, so perhaps they will be thankful.

text_simple: ربنا انك تعلم ما نخفي وما نعلن وما يخفى على الله من شيء في الارض ولا في السماء
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! You certainly know what we conceal and what we reveal. Nothing on earth or in heaven is hidden from Allah.

text_simple: الحمد لله الذي وهب لي على الكبر اسماعيل واسحاق ان ربي لسميع الدعاء
translation_en_yusufali: All praise is for Allah who has blessed me with Ishmael and Isaac in my old age. My Lord is indeed the Hearer of ˹all˺ prayers.

text_simple: رب اجعلني مقيم الصلاة ومن ذريتي ربنا وتقبل دعاء
translation_en_yusufali: My Lord! Make me and those ˹believers˺ of my descendants keep up prayer. Our Lord! Accept my prayers.

text_simple: ربنا اغفر لي ولوالدي وللمؤمنين يوم يقوم الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! Forgive me, my parents, and the believers on the Day when the judgment will come to pass.”

text_simple: ولا تحسبن الله غافلا عما يعمل الظالمون انما يؤخرهم ليوم تشخص فيه الابصار
translation_en_yusufali: Do not think ˹O Prophet˺ that Allah is unaware of what the wrongdoers do. He only delays them until a Day when ˹their˺ eyes will stare in horror—

text_simple: مهطعين مقنعي رءوسهم لا يرتد اليهم طرفهم وافئدتهم هواء
translation_en_yusufali: rushing forth, heads raised, never blinking, hearts void.

text_simple: وانذر الناس يوم ياتيهم العذاب فيقول الذين ظلموا ربنا اخرنا الى اجل قريب نجب دعوتك ونتبع الرسل اولم تكونوا اقسمتم من قبل ما لكم من زوال
translation_en_yusufali: And warn the people of the Day when the punishment will overtake ˹the wicked among˺ them, and the wrongdoers will cry, “Our Lord! Delay us for a little while. We will respond to Your call and follow the messengers!” ˹It will be said,˺ “Did you not swear before that you would never be removed ˹to the next life˺?”

text_simple: وسكنتم في مساكن الذين ظلموا انفسهم وتبين لكم كيف فعلنا بهم وضربنا لكم الامثال
translation_en_yusufali: You passed by the ruins of those ˹destroyed peoples˺ who had wronged themselves. It was made clear to you how We dealt with them, and We gave you ˹many˺ examples.

text_simple: وقد مكروا مكرهم وعند الله مكرهم وان كان مكرهم لتزول منه الجبال
translation_en_yusufali: They devised every plot, which was fully known to Allah, but their plotting was not enough to ˹even˺ overpower mountains ˹let alone Allah˺.

text_simple: فلا تحسبن الله مخلف وعده رسله ان الله عزيز ذو انتقام
translation_en_yusufali: So do not think ˹O Prophet˺ that Allah will fail to keep His promise to His messengers. Allah is indeed Almighty, capable of punishment.

text_simple: يوم تبدل الارض غير الارض والسماوات وبرزوا لله الواحد القهار
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Watch for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the earth will be changed into a different earth and the heavens as well, and all will appear before Allah—the One, the Supreme.

text_simple: وترى المجرمين يومئذ مقرنين في الاصفاد
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day you will see the wicked bound together in chains

text_simple: سرابيلهم من قطران وتغشى وجوههم النار
translation_en_yusufali: with garments of tar, and their faces covered with flames.

text_simple: ليجزي الله كل نفس ما كسبت ان الله سريع الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: As such, Allah will reward every soul for what it has committed. Surely Allah is swift in reckoning.

text_simple: هذا بلاغ للناس ولينذروا به وليعلموا انما هو اله واحد وليذكر اولو الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: This ˹Quran˺ is a ˹sufficient˺ message for humanity so that they may take it as a warning and know that there is only One God, and so that people of reason may be mindful.

text_simple: الر تلك ايات الكتاب وقران مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Alif-Lãm-Ra. These are the verses of the Book; the clear Quran.

text_simple: ربما يود الذين كفروا لو كانوا مسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The day will come when˺ the disbelievers will certainly wish they had submitted ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: ذرهم ياكلوا ويتمتعوا ويلههم الامل فسوف يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹So˺ let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by ˹false˺ hope, for they will soon know.

text_simple: وما اهلكنا من قرية الا ولها كتاب معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: We have never destroyed a society without a destined term.

text_simple: ما تسبق من امة اجلها وما يستاخرون
translation_en_yusufali: No people can advance their doom, nor can they delay it.

text_simple: وقالوا يا ايها الذي نزل عليه الذكر انك لمجنون
translation_en_yusufali: They say, “O you to whom the Reminder is revealed! You must be insane!

text_simple: لو ما تاتينا بالملائكة ان كنت من الصادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Why do you not bring us the angels, if what you say is true?”

text_simple: ما ننزل الملائكة الا بالحق وما كانوا اذا منظرين
translation_en_yusufali: We do not send the angels down except for a just cause, and then ˹the end of˺ the disbelievers will not be delayed.

text_simple: انا نحن نزلنا الذكر وانا له لحافظون
translation_en_yusufali: It is certainly We Who have revealed the Reminder, and it is certainly We Who will preserve it.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا من قبلك في شيع الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent messengers before you ˹O Prophet˺ among the groups of early peoples

text_simple: وما ياتيهم من رسول الا كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: but no messenger ever came to them without being mocked.

text_simple: كذلك نسلكه في قلوب المجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: This is how We allow disbelief ˹to steep˺ into the hearts of the wicked.

text_simple: لا يؤمنون به وقد خلت سنة الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: They would not believe in this ˹Quran˺ despite the ˹many˺ examples of those ˹destroyed˺ before.

text_simple: ولو فتحنا عليهم بابا من السماء فظلوا فيه يعرجون
translation_en_yusufali: And even if We opened for them a gate to heaven, through which they continued to ascend

text_simple: لقالوا انما سكرت ابصارنا بل نحن قوم مسحورون
translation_en_yusufali: still they would say, “Our eyes have truly been dazzled! In fact, we must have been bewitched.”

text_simple: ولقد جعلنا في السماء بروجا وزيناها للناظرين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have placed constellations in the sky, and adorned it for all to see.

text_simple: وحفظناها من كل شيطان رجيم
translation_en_yusufali: And We protected it from every accursed devil

text_simple: الا من استرق السمع فاتبعه شهاب مبين
translation_en_yusufali: except the one eavesdropping, who is then pursued by a visible flare.

text_simple: والارض مددناها والقينا فيها رواسي وانبتنا فيها من كل شيء موزون
translation_en_yusufali: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and caused everything to grow there in perfect balance.

text_simple: وجعلنا لكم فيها معايش ومن لستم له برازقين
translation_en_yusufali: And We made in it means of sustenance for you and others, who you do not provide for.

text_simple: وان من شيء الا عندنا خزائنه وما ننزله الا بقدر معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: There is not any means ˹of sustenance˺ whose reserves We do not hold, only bringing it forth in precise measure.

text_simple: وارسلنا الرياح لواقح فانزلنا من السماء ماء فاسقيناكموه وما انتم له بخازنين
translation_en_yusufali: We send fertilizing winds, and bring down rain from the sky for you to drink. It is not you who hold its reserves.

text_simple: وانا لنحن نحيي ونميت ونحن الوارثون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely it is We Who give life and cause death. And We are the ˹Eternal˺ Successor.

text_simple: ولقد علمنا المستقدمين منكم ولقد علمنا المستاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly know those who have gone before you and those who will come after ˹you˺.

text_simple: وان ربك هو يحشرهم انه حكيم عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ will gather them together ˹for judgment˺. He is truly All-Wise, All-Knowing.

text_simple: ولقد خلقنا الانسان من صلصال من حما مسنون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We created man from sounding clay moulded from black mud.

text_simple: والجان خلقناه من قبل من نار السموم
translation_en_yusufali: As for the jinn, We created them earlier from smokeless fire.

text_simple: واذ قال ربك للملائكة اني خالق بشرا من صلصال من حما مسنون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from sounding clay moulded from black mud.

text_simple: فاذا سويته ونفخت فيه من روحي فقعوا له ساجدين
translation_en_yusufali: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own ˹creation˺ breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”

text_simple: فسجد الملائكة كلهم اجمعون
translation_en_yusufali: So the angels prostrated all together—

text_simple: الا ابليس ابى ان يكون مع الساجدين
translation_en_yusufali: but not Iblîs, who refused to prostrate with the others.

text_simple: قال يا ابليس ما لك الا تكون مع الساجدين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What is the matter with you that you did not join others in prostration?”

text_simple: قال لم اكن لاسجد لبشر خلقته من صلصال من حما مسنون
translation_en_yusufali: He replied, “It is not for me to prostrate to a human You created from sounding clay moulded from black mud.”

text_simple: قال فاخرج منها فانك رجيم
translation_en_yusufali: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.

text_simple: وان عليك اللعنة الى يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: And surely upon you is condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”

text_simple: قال رب فانظرني الى يوم يبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”

text_simple: قال فانك من المنظرين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah said, “You will be delayed

text_simple: الى يوم الوقت المعلوم
translation_en_yusufali: until the appointed Day.”

text_simple: قال رب بما اغويتني لازينن لهم في الارض ولاغوينهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: Satan responded, “My Lord! For allowing me to stray I will surely tempt them on earth and mislead them all together

text_simple: الا عبادك منهم المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: except Your chosen servants among them.”

text_simple: قال هذا صراط علي مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: Allah said, “This is the Way, binding on Me:

text_simple: ان عبادي ليس لك عليهم سلطان الا من اتبعك من الغاوين
translation_en_yusufali: you will certainly have no authority over My servants, except the deviant who follow you

text_simple: وان جهنم لموعدهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: and surely Hell is their destined place, all together.

text_simple: لها سبعة ابواب لكل باب منهم جزء مقسوم
translation_en_yusufali: It has seven gates, to each a group of them is designated.”

text_simple: ان المتقين في جنات وعيون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs.

text_simple: ادخلوها بسلام امنين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said to them,˺ “Enter in peace and security.”

text_simple: ونزعنا ما في صدورهم من غل اخوانا على سرر متقابلين
translation_en_yusufali: We will remove whatever bitterness they had in their hearts. In a friendly manner, they will be on thrones, facing one another.

text_simple: لا يمسهم فيها نصب وما هم منها بمخرجين
translation_en_yusufali: No fatigue will touch them there, nor will they ever be asked to leave.

text_simple: نبئ عبادي اني انا الغفور الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Inform My servants ˹O Prophet˺ that I am truly the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful

text_simple: وان عذابي هو العذاب الاليم
translation_en_yusufali: and that My torment is indeed the most painful.

text_simple: ونبئهم عن ضيف ابراهيم
translation_en_yusufali: And inform them ˹O Prophet˺ about Abraham’s guests

text_simple: اذ دخلوا عليه فقالوا سلاما قال انا منكم وجلون
translation_en_yusufali: who entered upon him and greeted ˹him with˺, “Peace!” He ˹later˺ said, “Surely we are afraid of you.”

text_simple: قالوا لا توجل انا نبشرك بغلام عليم
translation_en_yusufali: They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not be afraid! Surely we give you good news of a knowledgeable son.”

text_simple: قال ابشرتموني على ان مسني الكبر فبم تبشرون
translation_en_yusufali: He wondered, “Do you give me good news despite my old age? What unlikely news!”

text_simple: قالوا بشرناك بالحق فلا تكن من القانطين
translation_en_yusufali: They responded, “We give you good news in all truth, so do not be one of those who despair.”

text_simple: قال ومن يقنط من رحمة ربه الا الضالون
translation_en_yusufali: He exclaimed, “Who would despair of the mercy of their Lord except the misguided?”

text_simple: قال فما خطبكم ايها المرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: He ˹then˺ added, “What is your mission, O  messenger-angels?”

text_simple: قالوا انا ارسلنا الى قوم مجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people.

text_simple: الا ال لوط انا لمنجوهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: As for the family of Lot, we will certainly deliver them all

text_simple: الا امراته قدرنا انها لمن الغابرين
translation_en_yusufali: except his wife. We have determined that she will be one of the doomed.”

text_simple: فلما جاء ال لوط المرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: So when the messengers came to the family of Lot

text_simple: قال انكم قوم منكرون
translation_en_yusufali: he said, “You are surely an unfamiliar people!”

text_simple: قالوا بل جئناك بما كانوا فيه يمترون
translation_en_yusufali: They responded, “We have come to you with that ˹torment˺ which they have doubted.

text_simple: واتيناك بالحق وانا لصادقون
translation_en_yusufali: We come to you with the truth, and we are certainly truthful.

text_simple: فاسر باهلك بقطع من الليل واتبع ادبارهم ولا يلتفت منكم احد وامضوا حيث تؤمرون
translation_en_yusufali: So travel with your family in the dark of night, and follow ˹closely˺ behind them. Do not let any of you look back, and go where you are commanded.”

text_simple: وقضينا اليه ذلك الامر ان دابر هؤلاء مقطوع مصبحين
translation_en_yusufali: We revealed to him this decree: “Those ˹sinners˺ will be uprooted in the morning.”

text_simple: وجاء اهل المدينة يستبشرون
translation_en_yusufali: And there came the men of the city, rejoicing.

text_simple: قال ان هؤلاء ضيفي فلا تفضحون
translation_en_yusufali: Lot pleaded, “Indeed, these are my guests, so do not embarrass me.

text_simple: واتقوا الله ولا تخزون
translation_en_yusufali: Fear Allah and do not humiliate me.”

text_simple: قالوا اولم ننهك عن العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: They responded, “Have we not forbidden you from protecting anyone?”

text_simple: قال هؤلاء بناتي ان كنتم فاعلين
translation_en_yusufali: He said, “O my people! Here are my daughters ˹so marry them˺ if you wish to do so.”

text_simple: لعمرك انهم لفي سكرتهم يعمهون
translation_en_yusufali: By your life ˹O Prophet˺, they certainly wandered blindly, intoxicated ˹by lust˺.

text_simple: فاخذتهم الصيحة مشرقين
translation_en_yusufali: So the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them at sunrise.

text_simple: فجعلنا عاليها سافلها وامطرنا عليهم حجارة من سجيل
translation_en_yusufali: And We turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down and rained upon them stones of baked clay.

text_simple: ان في ذلك لايات للمتوسمين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this are signs for those who contemplate.

text_simple: وانها لبسبيل مقيم
translation_en_yusufali: Their ruins still lie along a known route.

text_simple: ان في ذلك لاية للمؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this is a sign for those who believe.

text_simple: وان كان اصحاب الايكة لظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: And the residents of the Forest were truly wrongdoers

text_simple: فانتقمنا منهم وانهما لبامام مبين
translation_en_yusufali: so We inflicted punishment upon them. The ruins of both nations still lie on a well-known road.

text_simple: ولقد كذب اصحاب الحجر المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the residents of the Stone Valley also denied the messengers.

text_simple: واتيناهم اياتنا فكانوا عنها معرضين
translation_en_yusufali: We gave them Our signs, but they turned away from them.

text_simple: وكانوا ينحتون من الجبال بيوتا امنين
translation_en_yusufali: They carved their homes in the mountains, feeling secure.

text_simple: فاخذتهم الصيحة مصبحين
translation_en_yusufali: But the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them in the morning

text_simple: فما اغنى عنهم ما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: and all they achieved was of no help to them.

text_simple: وما خلقنا السماوات والارض وما بينهما الا بالحق وان الساعة لاتية فاصفح الصفح الجميل
translation_en_yusufali: We have not created the heavens and the earth and everything in between except for a purpose. And the Hour is certain to come, so forgive graciously.

text_simple: ان ربك هو الخلاق العليم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely your Lord is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.

text_simple: ولقد اتيناك سبعا من المثاني والقران العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: We have certainly granted you the seven often-repeated verses and the great Quran.

text_simple: لا تمدن عينيك الى ما متعنا به ازواجا منهم ولا تحزن عليهم واخفض جناحك للمؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Do not let your eyes crave the ˹fleeting˺ pleasures We have provided for some of the disbelievers, nor grieve for them. And be gracious to the believers.

text_simple: وقل اني انا النذير المبين
translation_en_yusufali: And say, “I am truly sent with a clear warning”—

text_simple: كما انزلنا على المقتسمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹a warning˺ similar to what We sent to those who divided ˹the Scriptures˺

text_simple: الذين جعلوا القران عضين
translation_en_yusufali: who ˹now˺ accept parts of the Quran, rejecting others.

text_simple: فوربك لنسالنهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: So by your Lord! We will certainly question them all

text_simple: عما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: about what they used to do.

text_simple: فاصدع بما تؤمر واعرض عن المشركين
translation_en_yusufali: So proclaim what you have been commanded, and turn away from the polytheists.

text_simple: انا كفيناك المستهزئين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely We will be sufficient for you against the mockers

text_simple: الذين يجعلون مع الله الها اخر فسوف يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: who set up ˹other˺ gods with Allah. They will soon come to know.

text_simple: ولقد نعلم انك يضيق صدرك بما يقولون
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly know that your heart is truly distressed by what they say.

text_simple: فسبح بحمد ربك وكن من الساجدين
translation_en_yusufali: So glorify the praises of your Lord and be one of those who ˹always˺ pray

text_simple: واعبد ربك حتى ياتيك اليقين
translation_en_yusufali: and worship your Lord until the inevitable comes your way.

text_simple: اتى امر الله فلا تستعجلوه سبحانه وتعالى عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: The command of Allah is at hand, so do not hasten it. Glorified and Exalted is He above what they associate ˹with Him in worship˺!

text_simple: ينزل الملائكة بالروح من امره على من يشاء من عباده ان انذروا انه لا اله الا انا فاتقون
translation_en_yusufali: He sends down the angels with revelation by His command to whoever He wills of His servants, ˹stating:˺ “Warn ˹humanity˺ that there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Me, so be mindful of Me ˹alone˺.”

text_simple: خلق السماوات والارض بالحق تعالى عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: He created the heavens and the earth for a purpose. Exalted is He above what they associate with Him ˹in worship˺!

text_simple: خلق الانسان من نطفة فاذا هو خصيم مبين
translation_en_yusufali: He created humans from a sperm-drop, then—behold!—they openly challenge ˹Him˺.

text_simple: والانعام خلقها لكم فيها دفء ومنافع ومنها تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: And He created the cattle for you as a source of warmth, food, and ˹many other˺ benefits.

text_simple: ولكم فيها جمال حين تريحون وحين تسرحون
translation_en_yusufali: They are also pleasing to you when you bring them home and when you take them out to graze.

text_simple: وتحمل اثقالكم الى بلد لم تكونوا بالغيه الا بشق الانفس ان ربكم لرءوف رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And they carry your loads to ˹distant˺ lands which you could not otherwise reach without great hardship. Surely your Lord is Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.

text_simple: والخيل والبغال والحمير لتركبوها وزينة ويخلق ما لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He also created˺ horses, mules, and donkeys for your transportation and adornment. And He creates what you do not know.

text_simple: وعلى الله قصد السبيل ومنها جائر ولو شاء لهداكم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: It is upon Allah ˹alone˺ to ˹clearly˺ show the Straight Way. Other ways are deviant. Had He willed, He would have easily imposed guidance upon all of you.

text_simple: هو الذي انزل من السماء ماء لكم منه شراب ومنه شجر فيه تسيمون
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who sends down rain from the sky, from which you drink and by which plants grow for your cattle to graze.

text_simple: ينبت لكم به الزرع والزيتون والنخيل والاعناب ومن كل الثمرات ان في ذلك لاية لقوم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: With it He produces for you ˹various˺ crops, olives, palm trees, grapevines, and every type of fruit. Surely in this is a sign for those who reflect.

text_simple: وسخر لكم الليل والنهار والشمس والقمر والنجوم مسخرات بامره ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And He has subjected for your benefit the day and the night, the sun and the moon. And the stars have been subjected by His command. Surely in this are signs for those who understand.

text_simple: وما ذرا لكم في الارض مختلفا الوانه ان في ذلك لاية لقوم يذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹He subjected˺ for you whatever He has created on earth of varying colours. Surely in this is a sign for those who are mindful.

text_simple: وهو الذي سخر البحر لتاكلوا منه لحما طريا وتستخرجوا منه حلية تلبسونها وترى الفلك مواخر فيه ولتبتغوا من فضله ولعلكم تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who has subjected the sea, so from it you may eat tender seafood and extract ornaments to wear. And you see the ships ploughing their way through it, so you may seek His bounty and give thanks ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: والقى في الارض رواسي ان تميد بكم وانهارا وسبلا لعلكم تهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: He has placed into the earth firm mountains, so it does not shake with you, as well as rivers, and pathways so you may find your way.

text_simple: وعلامات وبالنجم هم يهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: Also by landmarks and stars do people find their way.

text_simple: افمن يخلق كمن لا يخلق افلا تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Can the One Who creates be equal to those who do not? Will you not then be mindful?

text_simple: وان تعدوا نعمة الله لا تحصوها ان الله لغفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: If you tried to count Allah’s blessings, you would never be able to number them. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: والله يعلم ما تسرون وما تعلنون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah knows what you conceal and what you reveal.

text_simple: والذين يدعون من دون الله لا يخلقون شيئا وهم يخلقون
translation_en_yusufali: But those ˹idols˺ they invoke besides Allah cannot create anything—they themselves are created.

text_simple: اموات غير احياء وما يشعرون ايان يبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: They are dead, not alive—not even knowing when their followers will be resurrected.

text_simple: الهكم اله واحد فالذين لا يؤمنون بالاخرة قلوبهم منكرة وهم مستكبرون
translation_en_yusufali: Your God is ˹only˺ One God. As for those who do not believe in the Hereafter, their hearts are in denial, and they are too proud.

text_simple: لا جرم ان الله يعلم ما يسرون وما يعلنون انه لا يحب المستكبرين
translation_en_yusufali: Without a doubt, Allah knows what they conceal and what they reveal. He certainly does not like those who are too proud.

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم ماذا انزل ربكم قالوا اساطير الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: And when it is said to them, “What has your Lord revealed?” They say, “Ancient fables!”

text_simple: ليحملوا اوزارهم كاملة يوم القيامة ومن اوزار الذين يضلونهم بغير علم الا ساء ما يزرون
translation_en_yusufali: Let them bear their burdens in full on the Day of Judgment as well as some of the burdens of those they mislead without knowledge. Evil indeed is what they will bear!

text_simple: قد مكر الذين من قبلهم فاتى الله بنيانهم من القواعد فخر عليهم السقف من فوقهم واتاهم العذاب من حيث لا يشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those before them had plotted, but Allah struck at the ˹very˺ foundation of their structure, so the roof collapsed on top of them, and the torment came upon them from where they did not expect.

text_simple: ثم يوم القيامة يخزيهم ويقول اين شركائي الذين كنتم تشاقون فيهم قال الذين اوتوا العلم ان الخزي اليوم والسوء على الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then on the Day of Judgment He will humiliate them and say, “Where are My ˹so-called˺ associate-gods for whose sake you used to oppose ˹the believers˺?” Those gifted with knowledge will say, “Surely disgrace and misery today are upon the disbelievers.”

text_simple: الذين تتوفاهم الملائكة ظالمي انفسهم فالقوا السلم ما كنا نعمل من سوء بلى ان الله عليم بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Those whose souls the angels seize while they wrong themselves will then offer ˹full˺ submission ˹and say falsely,˺ “We did not do any evil.” ˹The angels will say,˺ “No! Surely Allah fully knows what you used to do.

text_simple: فادخلوا ابواب جهنم خالدين فيها فلبئس مثوى المتكبرين
translation_en_yusufali: So enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever. Indeed, what an evil home for the arrogant!”

text_simple: وقيل للذين اتقوا ماذا انزل ربكم قالوا خيرا للذين احسنوا في هذه الدنيا حسنة ولدار الاخرة خير ولنعم دار المتقين
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹when˺ it is said to those mindful ˹of Allah˺, “What has your Lord revealed?” They say, “All the best!” For those who do good in this world, there is goodness. But far better is the ˹eternal˺ Home of the Hereafter. How excellent indeed is the home of the righteous:

text_simple: جنات عدن يدخلونها تجري من تحتها الانهار لهم فيها ما يشاءون كذلك يجزي الله المتقين
translation_en_yusufali: the Gardens of Eternity which they will enter, under which rivers flow. In it they will have whatever they desire. This is how Allah rewards the righteous—

text_simple: الذين تتوفاهم الملائكة طيبين يقولون سلام عليكم ادخلوا الجنة بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: those whose souls the angels take while they are virtuous, saying ˹to them˺, “Peace be upon you! Enter Paradise for what you used to do.”

text_simple: هل ينظرون الا ان تاتيهم الملائكة او ياتي امر ربك كذلك فعل الذين من قبلهم وما ظلمهم الله ولكن كانوا انفسهم يظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Are they only awaiting the coming of the angels or the command of your Lord ˹O Prophet˺? So were those before them. And Allah never wronged them, but it was they who wronged themselves.

text_simple: فاصابهم سيئات ما عملوا وحاق بهم ما كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: Then the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds overtook them, and they were overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

text_simple: وقال الذين اشركوا لو شاء الله ما عبدنا من دونه من شيء نحن ولا اباؤنا ولا حرمنا من دونه من شيء كذلك فعل الذين من قبلهم فهل على الرسل الا البلاغ المبين
translation_en_yusufali: The polytheists argue, “Had Allah willed, neither we nor our forefathers would have worshipped anything other than Him, nor prohibited anything without His command.” So did those before them. Is not the messengers’ duty only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly?

text_simple: ولقد بعثنا في كل امة رسولا ان اعبدوا الله واجتنبوا الطاغوت فمنهم من هدى الله ومنهم من حقت عليه الضلالة فسيروا في الارض فانظروا كيف كان عاقبة المكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: We surely sent a messenger to every community, saying, “Worship Allah and shun false gods.” But some of them were guided by Allah, while others were destined to stray. So travel throughout the land and see the fate of the deniers!

text_simple: ان تحرص على هداهم فان الله لا يهدي من يضل وما لهم من ناصرين
translation_en_yusufali: Even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are keen on their guidance, Allah certainly does not guide those He leaves to stray, and they will have no helpers.

text_simple: واقسموا بالله جهد ايمانهم لا يبعث الله من يموت بلى وعدا عليه حقا ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: They swear by Allah their most solemn oaths that Allah will never raise the dead to life. Yes ˹He will˺! It is a true promise binding on Him, but most people do not know.

text_simple: ليبين لهم الذي يختلفون فيه وليعلم الذين كفروا انهم كانوا كاذبين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He will do that˺ to make clear to them what they disagreed on, and for the disbelievers to know that they were liars.

text_simple: انما قولنا لشيء اذا اردناه ان نقول له كن فيكون
translation_en_yusufali: If We ever will something ˹to exist˺, all We say is: “Be!” And it is!

text_simple: والذين هاجروا في الله من بعد ما ظلموا لنبوئنهم في الدنيا حسنة ولاجر الاخرة اكبر لو كانوا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who emigrated in ˹the cause of˺ Allah after being persecuted, We will surely bless them with a good home in this world. But the reward of the Hereafter is far better, if only they knew.

text_simple: الذين صبروا وعلى ربهم يتوكلون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ they who have patiently endured, and in their Lord they put their trust.

text_simple: وما ارسلنا من قبلك الا رجالا نوحي اليهم فاسالوا اهل الذكر ان كنتم لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: We did not send ˹messengers˺ before you ˹O Prophet˺ except mere men inspired by Us. If you ˹polytheists˺ do not know ˹this already˺, then ask those who have knowledge ˹of the Scriptures˺.

text_simple: بالبينات والزبر وانزلنا اليك الذكر لتبين للناس ما نزل اليهم ولعلهم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹We sent them˺ with clear proofs and divine Books. And We have sent down to you ˹O Prophet˺ the Reminder, so that you may explain to people what has been revealed for them, and perhaps they will reflect.

text_simple: افامن الذين مكروا السيئات ان يخسف الله بهم الارض او ياتيهم العذاب من حيث لا يشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: Do those who devise evil plots feel secure that Allah will not cause the earth to swallow them? Or that the torment will not come upon them in ways they cannot comprehend?

text_simple: او ياخذهم في تقلبهم فما هم بمعجزين
translation_en_yusufali: Or that He will not seize them while they go about ˹their day˺, for then they will have no escape?

text_simple: او ياخذهم على تخوف فان ربكم لرءوف رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Or that He will not destroy them gradually? But your Lord is truly Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.

text_simple: اولم يروا الى ما خلق الله من شيء يتفيا ظلاله عن اليمين والشمائل سجدا لله وهم داخرون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not considered how the shadows of everything Allah has created incline to the right and the left ˹as the sun moves˺, totally submitting to Allah in all humility?

text_simple: ولله يسجد ما في السماوات وما في الارض من دابة والملائكة وهم لا يستكبرون
translation_en_yusufali: And to Allah ˹alone˺ bows down ˹in submission˺ whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth of living creatures, as do the angels—who are not too proud ˹to do so˺.

text_simple: يخافون ربهم من فوقهم ويفعلون ما يؤمرون
translation_en_yusufali: They fear their Lord above them, and do whatever they are commanded.

text_simple: وقال الله لا تتخذوا الهين اثنين انما هو اله واحد فاياي فارهبون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah has said, “Do not take two gods. There is only One God. So be in awe of Me ˹alone˺.”

text_simple: وله ما في السماوات والارض وله الدين واصبا افغير الله تتقون
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth, and to Him ˹alone˺ is the everlasting devotion. Will you then fear any other than Allah?

text_simple: وما بكم من نعمة فمن الله ثم اذا مسكم الضر فاليه تجارون
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever blessings you have are from Allah. Then whenever hardship touches you, to Him ˹alone˺ you cry ˹for help˺.

text_simple: ثم اذا كشف الضر عنكم اذا فريق منكم بربهم يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: Then as soon as He removes the hardship from you, a group of you associates ˹others˺ with their Lord ˹in worship˺

text_simple: ليكفروا بما اتيناهم فتمتعوا فسوف تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: only returning Our favours with ingratitude. So enjoy yourselves, for you will soon know.

text_simple: ويجعلون لما لا يعلمون نصيبا مما رزقناهم تالله لتسالن عما كنتم تفترون
translation_en_yusufali: And they ˹even˺ assign to those ˹idols˺—who know nothing—a share of what We have provided for them. By Allah! You will certainly be questioned about whatever ˹lies˺ you used to fabricate ˹against Allah˺.

text_simple: ويجعلون لله البنات سبحانه ولهم ما يشتهون
translation_en_yusufali: And they attribute ˹angels as˺ daughters to Allah—glory be to Him!—the opposite of what they desire for themselves.

text_simple: واذا بشر احدهم بالانثى ظل وجهه مسودا وهو كظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever one of them is given the good news of a baby girl, his face grows gloomy, as he suppresses his rage.

text_simple: يتوارى من القوم من سوء ما بشر به ايمسكه على هون ام يدسه في التراب الا ساء ما يحكمون
translation_en_yusufali: He hides himself from the people because of the bad news he has received. Should he keep her in disgrace, or bury her ˹alive˺ in the ground? Evil indeed is their judgment!

text_simple: للذين لا يؤمنون بالاخرة مثل السوء ولله المثل الاعلى وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: To those who disbelieve in the Hereafter belong all evil qualities, whereas to Allah belong the finest attributes. And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ولو يؤاخذ الله الناس بظلمهم ما ترك عليها من دابة ولكن يؤخرهم الى اجل مسمى فاذا جاء اجلهم لا يستاخرون ساعة ولا يستقدمون
translation_en_yusufali: If Allah were to punish people ˹immediately˺ for their wrongdoing, He would not have left a single living being on earth. But He delays them for an appointed term. And when their time arrives, they cannot delay it for a moment, nor could they advance it.

text_simple: ويجعلون لله ما يكرهون وتصف السنتهم الكذب ان لهم الحسنى لا جرم ان لهم النار وانهم مفرطون
translation_en_yusufali: They attribute to Allah what they hate ˹for themselves˺, and their tongues utter the lie that they will have the finest reward. Without a doubt, for them is the Fire, where they will be abandoned.

text_simple: تالله لقد ارسلنا الى امم من قبلك فزين لهم الشيطان اعمالهم فهو وليهم اليوم ولهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: By Allah! We have surely sent messengers to communities before you ˹O Prophet˺, but Satan made their misdeeds appealing to them. So he is their patron today, and they will suffer a painful punishment.

text_simple: وما انزلنا عليك الكتاب الا لتبين لهم الذي اختلفوا فيه وهدى ورحمة لقوم يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: We have revealed to you the Book only to clarify for them what they differed about, and as a guide and mercy for those who believe.

text_simple: والله انزل من السماء ماء فاحيا به الارض بعد موتها ان في ذلك لاية لقوم يسمعون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah sends down rain from the sky, giving life to the earth after its death. Surely in this is a sign for those who listen.

text_simple: وان لكم في الانعام لعبرة نسقيكم مما في بطونه من بين فرث ودم لبنا خالصا سائغا للشاربين
translation_en_yusufali: And there is certainly a lesson for you in cattle: We give you to drink of what is in their bellies, from between digested food and blood: pure milk, pleasant to drink.

text_simple: ومن ثمرات النخيل والاعناب تتخذون منه سكرا ورزقا حسنا ان في ذلك لاية لقوم يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And from the fruits of palm trees and grapevines you derive intoxicants as well as wholesome provision. Surely in this is a sign for those who understand.

text_simple: واوحى ربك الى النحل ان اتخذي من الجبال بيوتا ومن الشجر ومما يعرشون
translation_en_yusufali: And your Lord inspired the bees: “Make ˹your˺ homes in the mountains, the trees, and in what people construct

text_simple: ثم كلي من كل الثمرات فاسلكي سبل ربك ذللا يخرج من بطونها شراب مختلف الوانه فيه شفاء للناس ان في ذلك لاية لقوم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: and feed from ˹the flower of˺ any fruit ˹you please˺ and follow the ways your Lord has made easy for you.” From their bellies comes forth liquid of varying colours, in which there is healing for people. Surely in this is a sign for those who reflect.

text_simple: والله خلقكم ثم يتوفاكم ومنكم من يرد الى ارذل العمر لكي لا يعلم بعد علم شيئا ان الله عليم قدير
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has created you, and then causes you to die. And some of you are left to reach the most feeble stage of life so that they may know nothing after having known much. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, Most Capable.

text_simple: والله فضل بعضكم على بعض في الرزق فما الذين فضلوا برادي رزقهم على ما ملكت ايمانهم فهم فيه سواء افبنعمة الله يجحدون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah has favoured some of you over others in provision. But those who have been much favoured would not share their wealth with those ˹bondspeople˺ in their possession, making them their equals. Do they then deny Allah’s favours?

text_simple: والله جعل لكم من انفسكم ازواجا وجعل لكم من ازواجكم بنين وحفدة ورزقكم من الطيبات افبالباطل يؤمنون وبنعمت الله هم يكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah has made for you spouses of your own kind, and given you through your spouses children and grandchildren. And He has granted you good, lawful provisions. Are they then faithful to falsehood and ungrateful for Allah’s favours?

text_simple: ويعبدون من دون الله ما لا يملك لهم رزقا من السماوات والارض شيئا ولا يستطيعون
translation_en_yusufali: Yet they worship besides Allah those ˹idols˺ who do not afford them any provision from the heavens and the earth, nor do they have the power to.

text_simple: فلا تضربوا لله الامثال ان الله يعلم وانتم لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: So do not set up equals to Allah, for Allah certainly knows and you do not know.

text_simple: ضرب الله مثلا عبدا مملوكا لا يقدر على شيء ومن رزقناه منا رزقا حسنا فهو ينفق منه سرا وجهرا هل يستوون الحمد لله بل اكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah sets forth a parable: a slave who lacks all means, compared to a ˹free˺ man to whom We granted a good provision, of which he donates ˹freely,˺ openly and secretly. Are they equal? Praise be to Allah. In fact, most of them do not know.

text_simple: وضرب الله مثلا رجلين احدهما ابكم لا يقدر على شيء وهو كل على مولاه اينما يوجهه لا يات بخير هل يستوي هو ومن يامر بالعدل وهو على صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah sets forth a parable of two men: one of them is dumb, incapable of anything. He is a burden on his master. Wherever he is sent, he brings no good. Can such a person be equal to the one who commands justice and is on the Straight Path?

text_simple: ولله غيب السماوات والارض وما امر الساعة الا كلمح البصر او هو اقرب ان الله على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs ˹the knowledge of˺ the unseen in the heavens and the earth. Bringing about the Hour would only take the blink of an eye, or even less. Surely Allah is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: والله اخرجكم من بطون امهاتكم لا تعلمون شيئا وجعل لكم السمع والابصار والافئدة لعلكم تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah brought you out of the wombs of your mothers while you knew nothing, and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect so perhaps you would be thankful.

text_simple: الم يروا الى الطير مسخرات في جو السماء ما يمسكهن الا الله ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not seen the birds glide in the open sky? None holds them up except Allah. Surely in this are signs for those who believe.

text_simple: والله جعل لكم من بيوتكم سكنا وجعل لكم من جلود الانعام بيوتا تستخفونها يوم ظعنكم ويوم اقامتكم ومن اصوافها واوبارها واشعارها اثاثا ومتاعا الى حين
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah has made your homes a place to rest, and has given you tents from the hide of animals, light to handle when you travel and when you camp. And out of their wool, fur, and hair He has given you furnishings and goods for a while.

text_simple: والله جعل لكم مما خلق ظلالا وجعل لكم من الجبال اكنانا وجعل لكم سرابيل تقيكم الحر وسرابيل تقيكم باسكم كذلك يتم نعمته عليكم لعلكم تسلمون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah has provided you shade out of what He created, and has given you shelter in the mountains. He has also provided you with clothes protecting you from the heat ˹and cold˺, and armour shielding you in battle. This is how He perfects His favour upon you, so perhaps you will ˹fully˺ submit ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: فان تولوا فانما عليك البلاغ المبين
translation_en_yusufali: But if they turn away, then your duty ˹O Prophet˺ is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.

text_simple: يعرفون نعمت الله ثم ينكرونها واكثرهم الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: They are aware of Allah’s favours, but still deny them. And most of them are ˹truly˺ ungrateful.

text_simple: ويوم نبعث من كل امة شهيدا ثم لا يؤذن للذين كفروا ولا هم يستعتبون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider, O  Prophet,˺ the Day We will call ˹a prophet as˺ a witness from every faith-community. Then the disbelievers will neither be allowed to plead nor appease ˹their Lord˺.

text_simple: واذا راى الذين ظلموا العذاب فلا يخفف عنهم ولا هم ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: And when the wrongdoers face the punishment, it will not be lightened for them, nor will they be delayed ˹from it˺.

text_simple: واذا راى الذين اشركوا شركاءهم قالوا ربنا هؤلاء شركاؤنا الذين كنا ندعو من دونك فالقوا اليهم القول انكم لكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: And when the polytheists see their associate-gods, they will say, “Our Lord! These are our associate-gods that we used to invoke besides You.” Their gods will throw a rebuttal at them, ˹saying,˺ “You are definitely liars.”

text_simple: والقوا الى الله يومئذ السلم وضل عنهم ما كانوا يفترون
translation_en_yusufali: They will offer ˹full˺ submission to Allah on that Day, and whatever ˹gods˺ they fabricated will fail them.

text_simple: الذين كفروا وصدوا عن سبيل الله زدناهم عذابا فوق العذاب بما كانوا يفسدون
translation_en_yusufali: For those who disbelieve and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, We will add more punishment to their punishment for all the corruption they spread.

text_simple: ويوم نبعث في كل امة شهيدا عليهم من انفسهم وجئنا بك شهيدا على هؤلاء ونزلنا عليك الكتاب تبيانا لكل شيء وهدى ورحمة وبشرى للمسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider, O  Prophet,˺ the Day We will call against every faith-community a witness of their own. And We will call you to be a witness against these ˹people of yours˺. We have revealed to you the Book as an explanation of all things, a guide, a mercy, and good news for those who ˹fully˺ submit.

text_simple: ان الله يامر بالعدل والاحسان وايتاء ذي القربى وينهى عن الفحشاء والمنكر والبغي يعظكم لعلكم تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah commands justice, grace, as well as courtesy to close relatives. He forbids indecency, wickedness, and aggression. He instructs you so perhaps you will be mindful.

text_simple: واوفوا بعهد الله اذا عاهدتم ولا تنقضوا الايمان بعد توكيدها وقد جعلتم الله عليكم كفيلا ان الله يعلم ما تفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: Honour Allah’s covenant when you make a pledge, and do not break your oaths after confirming them, having made Allah your guarantor. Surely Allah knows all you do.

text_simple: ولا تكونوا كالتي نقضت غزلها من بعد قوة انكاثا تتخذون ايمانكم دخلا بينكم ان تكون امة هي اربى من امة انما يبلوكم الله به وليبينن لكم يوم القيامة ما كنتم فيه تختلفون
translation_en_yusufali: Do not be like the woman who ˹foolishly˺ unravels her yarn after it is firmly spun, by taking your oaths as a means of deceiving one another in favour of a stronger group. Surely Allah tests you through this. And on the Day of Judgment He will certainly make your differences clear to you.

text_simple: ولو شاء الله لجعلكم امة واحدة ولكن يضل من يشاء ويهدي من يشاء ولتسالن عما كنتم تعملون
