translation_en_yusufali: Yet they worship besides Allah that for which He has sent down no authority, and of which they have no knowledge. The wrongdoers will have no helper.

text_simple: واذا تتلى عليهم اياتنا بينات تعرف في وجوه الذين كفروا المنكر يكادون يسطون بالذين يتلون عليهم اياتنا قل افانبئكم بشر من ذلكم النار وعدها الله الذين كفروا وبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever Our clear revelations are recited to them, you ˹O Prophet˺ recognize rage on the faces of the disbelievers, as if they are going to snap at those who recite Our revelations to them. Say, “Shall I inform you of something far more enraging than that? ˹It is˺ the Fire with which Allah has threatened those who disbelieve. What an evil destination!”

text_simple: يا ايها الناس ضرب مثل فاستمعوا له ان الذين تدعون من دون الله لن يخلقوا ذبابا ولو اجتمعوا له وان يسلبهم الذباب شيئا لا يستنقذوه منه ضعف الطالب والمطلوب
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! A lesson is set forth, so listen to it ˹carefully˺: those ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Allah can never create ˹so much as˺ a fly, even if they ˹all˺ were to come together for that. And if a fly were to snatch anything away from them, they cannot ˹even˺ retrieve it from the fly. How powerless are those who invoke and those invoked!

text_simple: ما قدروا الله حق قدره ان الله لقوي عزيز
translation_en_yusufali: They have not shown Allah the reverence He deserves. Surely Allah is All-Powerful, Almighty.

text_simple: الله يصطفي من الملائكة رسلا ومن الناس ان الله سميع بصير
translation_en_yusufali: Allah selects messengers from both angels and people, for Allah is truly All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

text_simple: يعلم ما بين ايديهم وما خلفهم والى الله ترجع الامور
translation_en_yusufali: He knows what is ahead of them and what is behind them. And to Allah ˹all˺ matters will be returned ˹for judgment˺.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اركعوا واسجدوا واعبدوا ربكم وافعلوا الخير لعلكم تفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Bow down, prostrate yourselves, worship your Lord, and do ˹what is˺ good so that you may be successful.

text_simple: وجاهدوا في الله حق جهاده هو اجتباكم وما جعل عليكم في الدين من حرج ملة ابيكم ابراهيم هو سماكم المسلمين من قبل وفي هذا ليكون الرسول شهيدا عليكم وتكونوا شهداء على الناس فاقيموا الصلاة واتوا الزكاة واعتصموا بالله هو مولاكم فنعم المولى ونعم النصير
translation_en_yusufali: Strive for ˹the cause of˺ Allah in the way He deserves, for ˹it is˺ He ˹Who˺ has chosen you, and laid upon you no hardship in the religion—the way of your forefather Abraham. ˹It is Allah˺ Who named you ‘the ones who submit’ ˹in the˺ earlier ˹Scriptures˺ and in this ˹Quran˺, so that the Messenger may be a witness over you, and that you may be witnesses over humanity. So establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and hold fast to Allah. He ˹alone˺ is your Guardian. What an excellent Guardian, and what an excellent Helper!

text_simple: قد افلح المؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Successful indeed are the believers:

text_simple: الذين هم في صلاتهم خاشعون
translation_en_yusufali: those who humble themselves in prayer;

text_simple: والذين هم عن اللغو معرضون
translation_en_yusufali: those who avoid idle talk;

text_simple: والذين هم للزكاة فاعلون
translation_en_yusufali: those who pay alms-tax;

text_simple: والذين هم لفروجهم حافظون
translation_en_yusufali: those who guard their chastity

text_simple: الا على ازواجهم او ما ملكت ايمانهم فانهم غير ملومين
translation_en_yusufali: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, for then they are free from blame

text_simple: فمن ابتغى وراء ذلك فاولئك هم العادون
translation_en_yusufali: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors;

text_simple: والذين هم لاماناتهم وعهدهم راعون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹the believers are also˺ those who are true to their trusts and covenants;

text_simple: والذين هم على صلواتهم يحافظون
translation_en_yusufali: and those who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers.

text_simple: اولئك هم الوارثون
translation_en_yusufali: These are the ones who will be awarded

text_simple: الذين يرثون الفردوس هم فيها خالدون
translation_en_yusufali: Paradise as their own. They will be there forever.

text_simple: ولقد خلقنا الانسان من سلالة من طين
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We created humankind from an extract of clay

text_simple: ثم جعلناه نطفة في قرار مكين
translation_en_yusufali: then placed each ˹human˺ as a sperm-drop in a secure place

text_simple: ثم خلقنا النطفة علقة فخلقنا العلقة مضغة فخلقنا المضغة عظاما فكسونا العظام لحما ثم انشاناه خلقا اخر فتبارك الله احسن الخالقين
translation_en_yusufali: then We developed the drop into a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then developed the clot into a lump ˹of flesh˺, then developed the lump into bones, then clothed the bones with flesh, then We brought it into being as a new creation. So Blessed is Allah, the Best of Creators.

text_simple: ثم انكم بعد ذلك لميتون
translation_en_yusufali: After that you will surely die

text_simple: ثم انكم يوم القيامة تبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: then on the Day of Judgment you will be resurrected.

text_simple: ولقد خلقنا فوقكم سبع طرائق وما كنا عن الخلق غافلين
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We created above you seven levels ˹of heaven˺. We are never unmindful of ˹Our˺ creation.

text_simple: وانزلنا من السماء ماء بقدر فاسكناه في الارض وانا على ذهاب به لقادرون
translation_en_yusufali: We send down rain from the sky in perfect measure, causing it to soak into the earth. And We are surely able to take it away.

text_simple: فانشانا لكم به جنات من نخيل واعناب لكم فيها فواكه كثيرة ومنها تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: With it We produce for you gardens of palm trees and grapevines, in which there are abundant fruits, and from which you may eat

text_simple: وشجرة تخرج من طور سيناء تنبت بالدهن وصبغ للاكلين
translation_en_yusufali: as well as ˹olive˺ trees which grow at Mount Sinai, providing oil and a condiment to eat.

text_simple: وان لكم في الانعام لعبرة نسقيكم مما في بطونها ولكم فيها منافع كثيرة ومنها تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: And there is certainly a lesson for you in cattle, from whose bellies We give you ˹milk˺ to drink, and in them are many other benefits for you, and from them you may eat.

text_simple: وعليها وعلى الفلك تحملون
translation_en_yusufali: And you are carried upon ˹some of˺ them and upon ships.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا نوحا الى قومه فقال يا قوم اعبدوا الله ما لكم من اله غيره افلا تتقون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people. He declared, “O my people! Worship Allah ˹alone˺. You have no god other than Him. Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”

text_simple: فقال الملا الذين كفروا من قومه ما هذا الا بشر مثلكم يريد ان يتفضل عليكم ولو شاء الله لانزل ملائكة ما سمعنا بهذا في ابائنا الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: But the disbelieving chiefs of his people said ˹to the masses˺, “This is only a human like you, who wants to be superior to you. Had Allah willed, He could have easily sent down angels ˹instead˺. We have never heard of this in ˹the history of˺ our forefathers.

text_simple: ان هو الا رجل به جنة فتربصوا به حتى حين
translation_en_yusufali: He is simply insane, so bear with him for a while.”

text_simple: قال رب انصرني بما كذبون
translation_en_yusufali: Noah prayed, “My Lord! Help me, because they have denied ˹me˺.”

text_simple: فاوحينا اليه ان اصنع الفلك باعيننا ووحينا فاذا جاء امرنا وفار التنور فاسلك فيها من كل زوجين اثنين واهلك الا من سبق عليه القول منهم ولا تخاطبني في الذين ظلموا انهم مغرقون
translation_en_yusufali: So We inspired him: “Build the Ark under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes and directions. Then when Our command comes and the oven bursts ˹with water˺, take on board a pair from every species along with your family—except those against whom the decree ˹to drown˺ has already been passed. And do not plead with Me for those who have done wrong, for they will surely be drowned.”

text_simple: فاذا استويت انت ومن معك على الفلك فقل الحمد لله الذي نجانا من القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Then when you and those with you have settled in the Ark, say, “All praise is for Allah, Who saved us from the wrongdoing people.”

text_simple: وقل رب انزلني منزلا مباركا وانت خير المنزلين
translation_en_yusufali: And pray, “My Lord! Allow me a blessed landing, for You are the best accommodator.”

text_simple: ان في ذلك لايات وان كنا لمبتلين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this are lessons. And We ˹always˺ put ˹people˺ to the test.

text_simple: ثم انشانا من بعدهم قرنا اخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then We raised another generation after them

text_simple: فارسلنا فيهم رسولا منهم ان اعبدوا الله ما لكم من اله غيره افلا تتقون
translation_en_yusufali: and sent to them a messenger from among themselves, ˹declaring,˺ “Worship Allah ˹alone˺. You have no god other than Him. Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”

text_simple: وقال الملا من قومه الذين كفروا وكذبوا بلقاء الاخرة واترفناهم في الحياة الدنيا ما هذا الا بشر مثلكم ياكل مما تاكلون منه ويشرب مما تشربون
translation_en_yusufali: But the chiefs of his people—who disbelieved, denied the meeting ˹with Allah˺ in the Hereafter, and were spoiled by the worldly luxuries We had provided for them—said ˹to the masses˺, “This is only a human like you. He eats what you eat, and drinks what you drink.

text_simple: ولئن اطعتم بشرا مثلكم انكم اذا لخاسرون
translation_en_yusufali: And if you ˹ever˺ obey a human like yourselves, then you would certainly be losers.

text_simple: ايعدكم انكم اذا متم وكنتم ترابا وعظاما انكم مخرجون
translation_en_yusufali: Does he promise you that once you are dead and reduced to dust and bones, you will be brought forth ˹alive˺?

text_simple: هيهات هيهات لما توعدون
translation_en_yusufali: Impossible, simply impossible is what you are promised!

text_simple: ان هي الا حياتنا الدنيا نموت ونحيا وما نحن بمبعوثين
translation_en_yusufali: There is nothing beyond our worldly life. We die, others are born, and none will be resurrected.

text_simple: ان هو الا رجل افترى على الله كذبا وما نحن له بمؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: He is no more than a man who has fabricated a lie about Allah, and we will never believe in him.”

text_simple: قال رب انصرني بما كذبون
translation_en_yusufali: The messenger prayed, “My Lord! Help me, because they have denied ˹me˺.”

text_simple: قال عما قليل ليصبحن نادمين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah responded, “Soon they will be truly regretful.”

text_simple: فاخذتهم الصيحة بالحق فجعلناهم غثاء فبعدا للقوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Then the ˹mighty˺ blast overtook them with justice, and We reduced them to rubble. So away with the wrongdoing people!

text_simple: ثم انشانا من بعدهم قرونا اخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then We raised other generations after them.

text_simple: ما تسبق من امة اجلها وما يستاخرون
translation_en_yusufali: No people can advance their doom, nor can they delay it.

text_simple: ثم ارسلنا رسلنا تترى كل ما جاء امة رسولها كذبوه فاتبعنا بعضهم بعضا وجعلناهم احاديث فبعدا لقوم لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Then We sent Our messengers in succession: whenever a messenger came to his people, they denied him. So We destroyed them, one after the other, reducing them to ˹cautionary˺ tales. So away with the people who refuse to believe!

text_simple: ثم ارسلنا موسى واخاه هارون باياتنا وسلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Then We sent Moses and his brother Aaron with Our signs and compelling proof

text_simple: الى فرعون وملئه فاستكبروا وكانوا قوما عالين
translation_en_yusufali: to Pharaoh and his chiefs, but they behaved arrogantly and were a tyrannical people.

text_simple: فقالوا انؤمن لبشرين مثلنا وقومهما لنا عابدون
translation_en_yusufali: They argued, “Will we believe in two humans, like ourselves, whose people are slaves to us?”

text_simple: فكذبوهما فكانوا من المهلكين
translation_en_yusufali: So they rejected them both, and ˹so˺ were among those destroyed.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا موسى الكتاب لعلهم يهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so perhaps his people would be ˹rightly˺ guided.

text_simple: وجعلنا ابن مريم وامه اية واويناهما الى ربوة ذات قرار ومعين
translation_en_yusufali: And We made the son of Mary and his mother a sign, and gave them refuge on high ground—a ˹suitable˺ place for rest with flowing water.

text_simple: يا ايها الرسل كلوا من الطيبات واعملوا صالحا اني بما تعملون عليم
translation_en_yusufali: O messengers! Eat from what is good and lawful, and act righteously. Indeed, I fully know what you do.

text_simple: وان هذه امتكم امة واحدة وانا ربكم فاتقون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this religion of yours is ˹only˺ one, and I am your Lord, so fear Me ˹alone˺.

text_simple: فتقطعوا امرهم بينهم زبرا كل حزب بما لديهم فرحون
translation_en_yusufali: Yet the people have divided it into different sects, each rejoicing in what they have.

text_simple: فذرهم في غمرتهم حتى حين
translation_en_yusufali: So leave them ˹O Prophet˺ in their heedlessness for a while.

text_simple: ايحسبون انما نمدهم به من مال وبنين
translation_en_yusufali: Do they think, since We provide them with wealth and children

text_simple: نسارع لهم في الخيرات بل لا يشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: that We hasten to ˹honour˺ them ˹with˺ all kinds of good? No! They are not aware.

text_simple: ان الذين هم من خشية ربهم مشفقون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who tremble in awe of their Lord

text_simple: والذين هم بايات ربهم يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: and who believe in the revelations of their Lord

text_simple: والذين هم بربهم لا يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: and who associate none with their Lord

text_simple: والذين يؤتون ما اتوا وقلوبهم وجلة انهم الى ربهم راجعون
translation_en_yusufali: and who do whatever ˹good˺ they do with their hearts fearful, ˹knowing˺ that they will return to their Lord—

text_simple: اولئك يسارعون في الخيرات وهم لها سابقون
translation_en_yusufali: it is they who race to do good deeds, always taking the lead.

text_simple: ولا نكلف نفسا الا وسعها ولدينا كتاب ينطق بالحق وهم لا يظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: We never require of any soul more than what it can afford. And with Us is a record which speaks the truth. None will be wronged.

text_simple: بل قلوبهم في غمرة من هذا ولهم اعمال من دون ذلك هم لها عاملون
translation_en_yusufali: But the hearts of those ˹who disbelieve˺ are oblivious to ˹all of˺ this, and they have other ˹evil˺ deeds, opposite to this, in which they are engrossed.

text_simple: حتى اذا اخذنا مترفيهم بالعذاب اذا هم يجارون
translation_en_yusufali: But as soon as We seize their elite with torment, they start to cry for help.

text_simple: لا تجاروا اليوم انكم منا لا تنصرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “Do not cry for help today. Surely you will never be saved from Us.

text_simple: قد كانت اياتي تتلى عليكم فكنتم على اعقابكم تنكصون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, My revelations were recited to you, but you used to back away ˹in disgust˺

text_simple: مستكبرين به سامرا تهجرون
translation_en_yusufali: boasting of the Sacred House, and babbling ˹nonsense about the Quran˺ by night.”

text_simple: افلم يدبروا القول ام جاءهم ما لم يات اباءهم الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: Is it because they have never contemplated the Word ˹of Allah˺? Or ˹because˺ there has come to them something that did not come to their forefathers?

text_simple: ام لم يعرفوا رسولهم فهم له منكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹because˺ they failed to recognize their Messenger, and so they denied him?

text_simple: ام يقولون به جنة بل جاءهم بالحق واكثرهم للحق كارهون
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹because˺ they say, “He is insane?” In fact, he has come to them with the truth, but most of them are resentful of the truth.

text_simple: ولو اتبع الحق اهواءهم لفسدت السماوات والارض ومن فيهن بل اتيناهم بذكرهم فهم عن ذكرهم معرضون
translation_en_yusufali: Had the truth followed their desires, the heavens, the earth, and all those in them would have certainly been corrupted. In fact, We have brought them ˹the means to˺ their glory, but they turn away from it.

text_simple: ام تسالهم خرجا فخراج ربك خير وهو خير الرازقين
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹is it because˺ you ˹O Prophet˺ are asking them for tribute? But the reward of your Lord is best, for He is the Best Provider.

text_simple: وانك لتدعوهم الى صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: And surely you are calling them to the Straight Path

text_simple: وان الذين لا يؤمنون بالاخرة عن الصراط لناكبون
translation_en_yusufali: but those who disbelieve in the Hereafter are certainly deviating from that Path.

text_simple: ولو رحمناهم وكشفنا ما بهم من ضر للجوا في طغيانهم يعمهون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Even˺ if We had mercy on them and removed their affliction, they would still persist in their transgression, wandering blindly.

text_simple: ولقد اخذناهم بالعذاب فما استكانوا لربهم وما يتضرعون
translation_en_yusufali: And We have already seized them with torment, but they never humbled themselves to their Lord, nor did they ˹submissively˺ appeal ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: حتى اذا فتحنا عليهم بابا ذا عذاب شديد اذا هم فيه مبلسون
translation_en_yusufali: But as soon as We open for them a gate of severe punishment, they will be utterly desperate.

text_simple: وهو الذي انشا لكم السمع والابصار والافئدة قليلا ما تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who created for you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.

text_simple: وهو الذي ذراكم في الارض واليه تحشرون
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺ over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.

text_simple: وهو الذي يحيي ويميت وله اختلاف الليل والنهار افلا تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death, and to Him belongs the alternation of the day and night. Will you not then understand?

text_simple: بل قالوا مثل ما قال الاولون
translation_en_yusufali: But they ˹just˺ say what their predecessors said.

text_simple: قالوا ااذا متنا وكنا ترابا وعظاما اانا لمبعوثون
translation_en_yusufali: They said, “Once we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

text_simple: لقد وعدنا نحن واباؤنا هذا من قبل ان هذا الا اساطير الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: We have already been promised this, as well as our forefathers earlier. This is nothing but ancient fables!”

text_simple: قل لمن الارض ومن فيها ان كنتم تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “To whom belong the earth and all those on it, if you ˹really˺ know?”

text_simple: سيقولون لله قل افلا تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: They will reply, “To Allah!” Say, “Why are you not then mindful?”

text_simple: قل من رب السماوات السبع ورب العرش العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹And˺ ask ˹them˺, “Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the Mighty Throne?”

text_simple: سيقولون لله قل افلا تتقون
translation_en_yusufali: They will reply, “Allah.” Say, “Will you not then fear ˹Him˺?”

text_simple: قل من بيده ملكوت كل شيء وهو يجير ولا يجار عليه ان كنتم تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them also,˺ “In Whose Hands is the authority over all things, protecting ˹all˺ while none can protect against Him, if you ˹really˺ know?”

text_simple: سيقولون لله قل فانى تسحرون
translation_en_yusufali: They will reply, “Allah.” Say, “How are you then so deluded?”

text_simple: بل اتيناهم بالحق وانهم لكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, We have brought them the truth, and they are certainly liars.

text_simple: ما اتخذ الله من ولد وما كان معه من اله اذا لذهب كل اله بما خلق ولعلا بعضهم على بعض سبحان الله عما يصفون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has never had ˹any˺ offspring, nor is there any god besides Him. Otherwise, each god would have taken away what he created, and they would have tried to dominate one another. Glorified is Allah above what they claim!

text_simple: عالم الغيب والشهادة فتعالى عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the seen and unseen. Exalted is He above what they associate ˹with Him˺.

text_simple: قل رب اما تريني ما يوعدون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “My Lord! Should You show me what they are threatened with

text_simple: رب فلا تجعلني في القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: then, my Lord, do not count me among the wrongdoing people.”

text_simple: وانا على ان نريك ما نعدهم لقادرون
translation_en_yusufali: We are indeed able to show you what We have threatened them with.

text_simple: ادفع بالتي هي احسن السيئة نحن اعلم بما يصفون
translation_en_yusufali: Respond to evil with what is best. We know well what they claim.

text_simple: وقل رب اعوذ بك من همزات الشياطين
translation_en_yusufali: And say, “My Lord! I seek refuge in You from the temptations of the devils.

text_simple: واعوذ بك رب ان يحضرون
translation_en_yusufali: And I seek refuge in You, my Lord, that they ˹even˺ come near me.”

text_simple: حتى اذا جاء احدهم الموت قال رب ارجعون
translation_en_yusufali: When death approaches any of them, they cry, “My Lord! Let me go back

text_simple: لعلي اعمل صالحا فيما تركت كلا انها كلمة هو قائلها ومن ورائهم برزخ الى يوم يبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: so I may do good in what I left behind.” Never! It is only a ˹useless˺ appeal they make. And there is a barrier behind them until the Day they are resurrected.

text_simple: فاذا نفخ في الصور فلا انساب بينهم يومئذ ولا يتساءلون
translation_en_yusufali: Then, when the Trumpet will be blown, there will be no kinship between them on that Day, nor will they ˹even care to˺ ask about one another.

text_simple: فمن ثقلت موازينه فاولئك هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: As for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺, it is they who will be successful.

text_simple: ومن خفت موازينه فاولئك الذين خسروا انفسهم في جهنم خالدون
translation_en_yusufali: But those whose scale is light, they will have doomed themselves, staying in Hell forever.

text_simple: تلفح وجوههم النار وهم فيها كالحون
translation_en_yusufali: The Fire will burn their faces, leaving them deformed.

text_simple: الم تكن اياتي تتلى عليكم فكنتم بها تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said,˺ “Were My revelations not recited to you, but you used to deny them?”

text_simple: قالوا ربنا غلبت علينا شقوتنا وكنا قوما ضالين
translation_en_yusufali: They will cry, “Our Lord! Our ill-fate took hold of us, so we became a misguided people.

text_simple: ربنا اخرجنا منها فان عدنا فانا ظالمون
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! Take us out of this ˹Fire˺. Then if we ever return ˹to denial˺, we will truly be wrongdoers.”

text_simple: قال اخسئوا فيها ولا تكلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah will respond, “Be despised in there! Do not ˹ever˺ plead with Me ˹again˺!

text_simple: انه كان فريق من عبادي يقولون ربنا امنا فاغفر لنا وارحمنا وانت خير الراحمين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, there was a group of My servants who used to pray, ‘Our Lord! We have believed, so forgive us and have mercy on us, for You are the best of those who show mercy,’

text_simple: فاتخذتموهم سخريا حتى انسوكم ذكري وكنتم منهم تضحكون
translation_en_yusufali: but you were ˹so busy˺ making fun of them that it made you forget My remembrance. And you used to laugh at them.

text_simple: اني جزيتهم اليوم بما صبروا انهم هم الفائزون
translation_en_yusufali: Today I have indeed rewarded them for their perseverance: they are certainly the triumphant.”

text_simple: قال كم لبثتم في الارض عدد سنين
translation_en_yusufali: He will ask ˹them˺, “How many years did you remain on earth?”

text_simple: قالوا لبثنا يوما او بعض يوم فاسال العادين
translation_en_yusufali: They will reply, “We remained ˹only˺ a day or part of a day. But ask those who kept count.”

text_simple: قال ان لبثتم الا قليلا لو انكم كنتم تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: He will say, “You only remained for a little while, if only you knew.

text_simple: افحسبتم انما خلقناكم عبثا وانكم الينا لا ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Did you then think that We had created you without purpose, and that you would never be returned to Us?”

text_simple: فتعالى الله الملك الحق لا اله الا هو رب العرش الكريم
translation_en_yusufali: Exalted is Allah, the True King! There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, the Lord of the Honourable Throne.

text_simple: ومن يدع مع الله الها اخر لا برهان له به فانما حسابه عند ربه انه لا يفلح الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever invokes, besides Allah, another god—for which they can have no proof—they will surely find their penalty with their Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will never succeed.

text_simple: وقل رب اغفر وارحم وانت خير الراحمين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “My Lord! Forgive and have mercy, for You are the best of those who show mercy.”

text_simple: سورة انزلناها وفرضناها وانزلنا فيها ايات بينات لعلكم تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ a sûrah which We have revealed and made ˹its rulings˺ obligatory, and revealed in it clear commandments so that you may be mindful.

text_simple: الزانية والزاني فاجلدوا كل واحد منهما مائة جلدة ولا تاخذكم بهما رافة في دين الله ان كنتم تؤمنون بالله واليوم الاخر وليشهد عذابهما طائفة من المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: As for female and male fornicators, give each of them one hundred lashes, and do not let pity for them make you lenient in ˹enforcing˺ the law of Allah, if you ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and the Last Day. And let a number of believers witness their punishment.

text_simple: الزاني لا ينكح الا زانية او مشركة والزانية لا ينكحها الا زان او مشرك وحرم ذلك على المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: A male fornicator would only marry a female fornicator or idolatress. And a female fornicator would only be married to a fornicator or idolater. This is ˹all˺ forbidden to the believers.

text_simple: والذين يرمون المحصنات ثم لم ياتوا باربعة شهداء فاجلدوهم ثمانين جلدة ولا تقبلوا لهم شهادة ابدا واولئك هم الفاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: Those who accuse chaste women ˹of adultery˺ and fail to produce four witnesses, give them eighty lashes ˹each˺. And do not ever accept any testimony from them—for they are indeed the rebellious—

text_simple: الا الذين تابوا من بعد ذلك واصلحوا فان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: except those who repent afterwards and mend their ways, then surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: والذين يرمون ازواجهم ولم يكن لهم شهداء الا انفسهم فشهادة احدهم اربع شهادات بالله انه لمن الصادقين
translation_en_yusufali: And those who accuse their wives ˹of adultery˺ but have no witness except themselves, the accuser must testify, swearing four times by Allah that he is telling the truth

text_simple: والخامسة ان لعنت الله عليه ان كان من الكاذبين
translation_en_yusufali: and a fifth oath that Allah may condemn him if he is lying.

text_simple: ويدرا عنها العذاب ان تشهد اربع شهادات بالله انه لمن الكاذبين
translation_en_yusufali: For her to be spared the punishment, she must swear four times by Allah that he is telling a lie

text_simple: والخامسة ان غضب الله عليها ان كان من الصادقين
translation_en_yusufali: and a fifth oath that Allah may be displeased with her if he is telling the truth.

text_simple: ولولا فضل الله عليكم ورحمته وان الله تواب حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹You would have suffered,˺ had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you, and had Allah not been Accepting of Repentance, All-Wise.

text_simple: ان الذين جاءوا بالافك عصبة منكم لا تحسبوه شرا لكم بل هو خير لكم لكل امرئ منهم ما اكتسب من الاثم والذي تولى كبره منهم له عذاب عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who came up with that ˹outrageous˺ slander are a group of you. Do not think this is bad for you. Rather, it is good for you. They will be punished, each according to their share of the sin. As for their mastermind, he will suffer a tremendous punishment.

text_simple: لولا اذ سمعتموه ظن المؤمنون والمؤمنات بانفسهم خيرا وقالوا هذا افك مبين
translation_en_yusufali: If only the believing men and women had thought well of one another, when you heard this ˹rumour˺, and said, “This is clearly ˹an outrageous˺ slander!”

text_simple: لولا جاءوا عليه باربعة شهداء فاذ لم ياتوا بالشهداء فاولئك عند الله هم الكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: Why did they not produce four witnesses? Now, since they have failed to produce witnesses, they are ˹truly˺ liars in the sight of Allah.

text_simple: ولولا فضل الله عليكم ورحمته في الدنيا والاخرة لمسكم في ما افضتم فيه عذاب عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you in this world and the Hereafter, you would have certainly been touched with a tremendous punishment for what you plunged into—

text_simple: اذ تلقونه بالسنتكم وتقولون بافواهكم ما ليس لكم به علم وتحسبونه هينا وهو عند الله عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: when you passed it from one tongue to the other, and said with your mouths what you had no knowledge of, taking it lightly while it is ˹extremely˺ serious in the sight of Allah.

text_simple: ولولا اذ سمعتموه قلتم ما يكون لنا ان نتكلم بهذا سبحانك هذا بهتان عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: If only you had said upon hearing it, “How can we speak about such a thing! Glory be to You ˹O Lord˺! This is a heinous slander!”

text_simple: يعظكم الله ان تعودوا لمثله ابدا ان كنتم مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah forbids you from ever doing something like this again, if you are ˹true˺ believers.

text_simple: ويبين الله لكم الايات والله عليم حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah makes ˹His˺ commandments clear to you, for Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: ان الذين يحبون ان تشيع الفاحشة في الذين امنوا لهم عذاب اليم في الدنيا والاخرة والله يعلم وانتم لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who love to see indecency spread among the believers will suffer a painful punishment in this life and the Hereafter. Allah knows and you do not know.

text_simple: ولولا فضل الله عليكم ورحمته وان الله رءوف رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹You would have suffered,˺ had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you, and had Allah not been Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تتبعوا خطوات الشيطان ومن يتبع خطوات الشيطان فانه يامر بالفحشاء والمنكر ولولا فضل الله عليكم ورحمته ما زكى منكم من احد ابدا ولكن الله يزكي من يشاء والله سميع عليم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not follow the footsteps of Satan. Whoever follows Satan’s footsteps, then ˹let them know that˺ he surely bids ˹all to˺ immorality and wickedness. Had it not been for Allah’s grace and mercy upon you, none of you would have ever been purified. But Allah purifies whoever He wills. And Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

text_simple: ولا ياتل اولو الفضل منكم والسعة ان يؤتوا اولي القربى والمساكين والمهاجرين في سبيل الله وليعفوا وليصفحوا الا تحبون ان يغفر الله لكم والله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Do not let the people of virtue and affluence among you swear to suspend donations to their relatives, the needy, and the emigrants in the cause of Allah. Let them pardon and forgive. Do you not love to be forgiven by Allah? And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ان الذين يرمون المحصنات الغافلات المؤمنات لعنوا في الدنيا والاخرة ولهم عذاب عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who accuse chaste, unsuspecting, believing women are cursed in this life and the Hereafter. And they will suffer a tremendous punishment

text_simple: يوم تشهد عليهم السنتهم وايديهم وارجلهم بما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: on the Day their tongues, hands, and feet will testify against them for what they used to do.

text_simple: يومئذ يوفيهم الله دينهم الحق ويعلمون ان الله هو الحق المبين
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day, Allah will give them their just penalty in full, and they will ˹come to˺ know that Allah ˹alone˺ is the Ultimate Truth.

text_simple: الخبيثات للخبيثين والخبيثون للخبيثات والطيبات للطيبين والطيبون للطيبات اولئك مبرءون مما يقولون لهم مغفرة ورزق كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Wicked women are for wicked men, and wicked men are for wicked women. And virtuous women are for virtuous men, and virtuous men are for virtuous women. The virtuous are innocent of what the wicked say. They will have forgiveness and an honourable provision.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تدخلوا بيوتا غير بيوتكم حتى تستانسوا وتسلموا على اهلها ذلكم خير لكم لعلكم تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not enter any house other than your own until you have asked for permission and greeted its occupants. This is best for you, so perhaps you will be mindful.

text_simple: فان لم تجدوا فيها احدا فلا تدخلوها حتى يؤذن لكم وان قيل لكم ارجعوا فارجعوا هو ازكى لكم والله بما تعملون عليم
translation_en_yusufali: If you find no one at home, do not enter it until you have been given permission. And if you are asked to leave, then leave. That is purer for you. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of what you do.

text_simple: ليس عليكم جناح ان تدخلوا بيوتا غير مسكونة فيها متاع لكم والله يعلم ما تبدون وما تكتمون
translation_en_yusufali: There is no blame on you if you enter public places where there is something of benefit for you. And Allah knows what you reveal and what you conceal.

text_simple: قل للمؤمنين يغضوا من ابصارهم ويحفظوا فروجهم ذلك ازكى لهم ان الله خبير بما يصنعون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹O Prophet!˺ Tell the believing men to lower their gaze and guard their chastity. That is purer for them. Surely Allah is All-Aware of what they do.

text_simple: وقل للمؤمنات يغضضن من ابصارهن ويحفظن فروجهن ولا يبدين زينتهن الا ما ظهر منها وليضربن بخمرهن على جيوبهن ولا يبدين زينتهن الا لبعولتهن او ابائهن او اباء بعولتهن او ابنائهن او ابناء بعولتهن او اخوانهن او بني اخوانهن او بني اخواتهن او نسائهن او ما ملكت ايمانهن او التابعين غير اولي الاربة من الرجال او الطفل الذين لم يظهروا على عورات النساء ولا يضربن بارجلهن ليعلم ما يخفين من زينتهن وتوبوا الى الله جميعا ايه المؤمنون لعلكم تفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: And tell the believing women to lower their gaze and guard their chastity, and not to reveal their adornments except what normally appears. Let them draw their veils over their chests, and not reveal their ˹hidden˺ adornments except to their husbands, their fathers, their fathers-in-law, their sons, their stepsons, their brothers, their brothers’ sons or sisters’ sons, their fellow women, those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, male attendants with no desire, or children who are still unaware of women’s nakedness. Let them not stomp their feet, drawing attention to their hidden adornments. Turn to Allah in repentance all together, O  believers, so that you may be successful.

text_simple: وانكحوا الايامى منكم والصالحين من عبادكم وامائكم ان يكونوا فقراء يغنهم الله من فضله والله واسع عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Marry off the ˹free˺ singles among you, as well as the righteous of your bondmen and bondwomen. If they are poor, Allah will enrich them out of His bounty. For Allah is All-Bountiful, All-Knowing.

text_simple: وليستعفف الذين لا يجدون نكاحا حتى يغنيهم الله من فضله والذين يبتغون الكتاب مما ملكت ايمانكم فكاتبوهم ان علمتم فيهم خيرا واتوهم من مال الله الذي اتاكم ولا تكرهوا فتياتكم على البغاء ان اردن تحصنا لتبتغوا عرض الحياة الدنيا ومن يكرههن فان الله من بعد اكراههن غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And let those who do not have the means to marry keep themselves chaste until Allah enriches them out of His bounty. And if any of those ˹bondspeople˺ in your possession desires a deed of emancipation, make it possible for them, if you find goodness in them. And give them some of Allah’s wealth which He has granted you. Do not force your ˹slave˺ girls into prostitution for your own worldly gains while they wish to remain chaste. And if someone coerces them, then after such a coercion Allah is certainly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful ˹to them˺.

text_simple: ولقد انزلنا اليكم ايات مبينات ومثلا من الذين خلوا من قبلكم وموعظة للمتقين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have sent down to you clear revelations, along with examples of those who had gone before you, and a lesson to the God-fearing.

text_simple: الله نور السماوات والارض مثل نوره كمشكاة فيها مصباح المصباح في زجاجة الزجاجة كانها كوكب دري يوقد من شجرة مباركة زيتونة لا شرقية ولا غربية يكاد زيتها يضيء ولو لم تمسسه نار نور على نور يهدي الله لنوره من يشاء ويضرب الله الامثال للناس والله بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Allah is the Light of the heavens and the earth. His light is like a niche in which there is a lamp, the lamp is in a crystal, the crystal is like a shining star, lit from ˹the oil of˺ a blessed olive tree, ˹located˺ neither to the east nor the west, whose oil would almost glow, even without being touched by fire. Light upon light! Allah guides whoever He wills to His light. And Allah sets forth parables for humanity. For Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: في بيوت اذن الله ان ترفع ويذكر فيها اسمه يسبح له فيها بالغدو والاصال
translation_en_yusufali: ˹That light shines˺ through houses ˹of worship˺ which Allah has ordered to be raised, and where His Name is mentioned. He is glorified there morning and evening

text_simple: رجال لا تلهيهم تجارة ولا بيع عن ذكر الله واقام الصلاة وايتاء الزكاة يخافون يوما تتقلب فيه القلوب والابصار
translation_en_yusufali: by men who are not distracted—either by buying or selling—from Allah’s remembrance, or performing prayer, or paying alms-tax. They fear a Day when hearts and eyes will tremble

text_simple: ليجزيهم الله احسن ما عملوا ويزيدهم من فضله والله يرزق من يشاء بغير حساب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹hoping˺ that Allah may reward them according to the best of their deeds, and increase them out of His grace. And Allah provides for whoever He wills without limit.

text_simple: والذين كفروا اعمالهم كسراب بقيعة يحسبه الظمان ماء حتى اذا جاءه لم يجده شيئا ووجد الله عنده فوفاه حسابه والله سريع الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: As for the disbelievers, their deeds are like a mirage in a desert, which the thirsty perceive as water, but when they approach it, they find it to be nothing. Instead, they find Allah there ˹in the Hereafter, ready˺ to settle their account. And Allah is swift in reckoning.

text_simple: او كظلمات في بحر لجي يغشاه موج من فوقه موج من فوقه سحاب ظلمات بعضها فوق بعض اذا اخرج يده لم يكد يراها ومن لم يجعل الله له نورا فما له من نور
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹their deeds are˺ like the darkness in a deep sea, covered by waves upon waves, topped by ˹dark˺ clouds. Darkness upon darkness! If one stretches out their hand, they can hardly see it. And whoever Allah does not bless with light will have no light!

text_simple: الم تر ان الله يسبح له من في السماوات والارض والطير صافات كل قد علم صلاته وتسبيحه والله عليم بما يفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that Allah is glorified by all those in the heavens and the earth, even the birds as they soar? Each ˹instinctively˺ knows their manner of prayer and glorification. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all they do.

text_simple: ولله ملك السماوات والارض والى الله المصير
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And to Allah is the final return.

text_simple: الم تر ان الله يزجي سحابا ثم يؤلف بينه ثم يجعله ركاما فترى الودق يخرج من خلاله وينزل من السماء من جبال فيها من برد فيصيب به من يشاء ويصرفه عن من يشاء يكاد سنا برقه يذهب بالابصار
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that Allah gently drives the clouds, then joins them together, piling them up into masses, from which you see raindrops come forth? And He sends down from the sky mountains ˹of clouds˺ loaded with hail, pouring it on whoever He wills and averting it from whoever He wills. The flash of the clouds’ lightning nearly takes away eyesight.

text_simple: يقلب الله الليل والنهار ان في ذلك لعبرة لاولي الابصار
translation_en_yusufali: Allah alternates the day and night. Surely in this is a lesson for people of insight.

text_simple: والله خلق كل دابة من ماء فمنهم من يمشي على بطنه ومنهم من يمشي على رجلين ومنهم من يمشي على اربع يخلق الله ما يشاء ان الله على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah has created from water every living creature. Some of them crawl on their bellies, some walk on two legs, and some walk on four. Allah creates whatever He wills. Surely Allah is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: لقد انزلنا ايات مبينات والله يهدي من يشاء الى صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: We have indeed sent down revelations clarifying ˹the truth˺. But Allah ˹only˺ guides whoever He wills to the Straight Path.

text_simple: ويقولون امنا بالله وبالرسول واطعنا ثم يتولى فريق منهم من بعد ذلك وما اولئك بالمؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: And the hypocrites say, “We believe in Allah and the Messenger, and we obey.” Then a group of them turns away soon after that. These are not ˹true˺ believers.

text_simple: واذا دعوا الى الله ورسوله ليحكم بينهم اذا فريق منهم معرضون
translation_en_yusufali: And as soon as they are called to Allah and His Messenger so he may judge between them, a group of them turns away.

text_simple: وان يكن لهم الحق ياتوا اليه مذعنين
translation_en_yusufali: But if the truth is in their favour, they come to him, fully submitting.

text_simple: افي قلوبهم مرض ام ارتابوا ام يخافون ان يحيف الله عليهم ورسوله بل اولئك هم الظالمون
translation_en_yusufali: Is there a sickness in their hearts? Or are they in doubt? Or do they fear that Allah and His Messenger will be unjust to them? In fact, it is they who are the ˹true˺ wrongdoers.

text_simple: انما كان قول المؤمنين اذا دعوا الى الله ورسوله ليحكم بينهم ان يقولوا سمعنا واطعنا واولئك هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: The only response of the ˹true˺ believers, when they are called to Allah and His Messenger so he may judge between them, is to say, “We hear and obey.” It is they who will ˹truly˺ succeed.

text_simple: ومن يطع الله ورسوله ويخش الله ويتقه فاولئك هم الفائزون
translation_en_yusufali: For whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger, and fears Allah and is mindful of Him, then it is they who will ˹truly˺ triumph.

text_simple: واقسموا بالله جهد ايمانهم لئن امرتهم ليخرجن قل لا تقسموا طاعة معروفة ان الله خبير بما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: They swear by Allah their most solemn oaths that if you ˹O Prophet˺ were to command them, they would certainly march forth ˹in Allah’s cause˺. Say, “˹You˺ do not ˹have to˺ swear; your obedience is well known!” Surely Allah is All-Aware of what you do.”

text_simple: قل اطيعوا الله واطيعوا الرسول فان تولوا فانما عليه ما حمل وعليكم ما حملتم وان تطيعوه تهتدوا وما على الرسول الا البلاغ المبين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Obey Allah and obey the Messenger. But if you turn away, then he is only responsible for his duty and you are responsible for yours. And if you obey him, you will be ˹rightly˺ guided. The Messenger’s duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.”

text_simple: وعد الله الذين امنوا منكم وعملوا الصالحات ليستخلفنهم في الارض كما استخلف الذين من قبلهم وليمكنن لهم دينهم الذي ارتضى لهم وليبدلنهم من بعد خوفهم امنا يعبدونني لا يشركون بي شيئا ومن كفر بعد ذلك فاولئك هم الفاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has promised those of you who believe and do good that He will certainly make them successors in the land, as He did with those before them; and will surely establish for them their faith which He has chosen for them; and will indeed change their fear into security—˹provided that˺ they worship Me, associating nothing with Me. But whoever disbelieves after this ˹promise˺, it is they who will be the rebellious.

text_simple: واقيموا الصلاة واتوا الزكاة واطيعوا الرسول لعلكم ترحمون
translation_en_yusufali: Moreover, establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and obey the Messenger, so you may be shown mercy.

text_simple: لا تحسبن الذين كفروا معجزين في الارض وماواهم النار ولبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: Do not think ˹O Prophet˺ that the disbelievers can escape in the land. The Fire will be their home. Indeed, what an evil destination!

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا ليستاذنكم الذين ملكت ايمانكم والذين لم يبلغوا الحلم منكم ثلاث مرات من قبل صلاة الفجر وحين تضعون ثيابكم من الظهيرة ومن بعد صلاة العشاء ثلاث عورات لكم ليس عليكم ولا عليهم جناح بعدهن طوافون عليكم بعضكم على بعض كذلك يبين الله لكم الايات والله عليم حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Let those ˹bondspeople˺ in your possession and those of you who are still under age ask for your permission ˹to come in˺ at three times: before dawn prayer, when you take off your ˹outer˺ clothes at noon, and after the late evening prayer. ˹These are˺ three times of privacy for you. Other than these times, there is no blame on you or them to move freely, attending to one another. This is how Allah makes the revelations clear to you, for Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: واذا بلغ الاطفال منكم الحلم فليستاذنوا كما استاذن الذين من قبلهم كذلك يبين الله لكم اياته والله عليم حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: And when your children reach the age of puberty, let them seek permission ˹to come in˺, as their seniors do. This is how Allah makes His revelations clear to you, for Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: والقواعد من النساء اللاتي لا يرجون نكاحا فليس عليهن جناح ان يضعن ثيابهن غير متبرجات بزينة وان يستعففن خير لهن والله سميع عليم
translation_en_yusufali: As for elderly women past the age of marriage, there is no blame on them if they take off their ˹outer˺ garments, without revealing their adornments. But it is better for them if they avoid this ˹altogether˺. And Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

text_simple: ليس على الاعمى حرج ولا على الاعرج حرج ولا على المريض حرج ولا على انفسكم ان تاكلوا من بيوتكم او بيوت ابائكم او بيوت امهاتكم او بيوت اخوانكم او بيوت اخواتكم او بيوت اعمامكم او بيوت عماتكم او بيوت اخوالكم او بيوت خالاتكم او ما ملكتم مفاتحه او صديقكم ليس عليكم جناح ان تاكلوا جميعا او اشتاتا فاذا دخلتم بيوتا فسلموا على انفسكم تحية من عند الله مباركة طيبة كذلك يبين الله لكم الايات لعلكم تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: There is no restriction on the blind, or the disabled, or the sick. Nor on yourselves if you eat from your homes, or the homes of your fathers, or your mothers, or your brothers, or your sisters, or your paternal uncles, or your paternal aunts, or your maternal uncles, or your maternal aunts, or from the homes in your trust, or ˹the homes of˺ your friends. There is no blame on you eating together or separately. However, when you enter houses, greet one another with a greeting ˹of peace˺ from Allah, blessed and good. This is how Allah makes His revelations clear to you, so perhaps you will understand.

text_simple: انما المؤمنون الذين امنوا بالله ورسوله واذا كانوا معه على امر جامع لم يذهبوا حتى يستاذنوه ان الذين يستاذنونك اولئك الذين يؤمنون بالله ورسوله فاذا استاذنوك لبعض شانهم فاذن لمن شئت منهم واستغفر لهم الله ان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: The ˹true˺ believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger, and when they are with him on a public matter, they do not leave without his permission. Indeed, those who ask your permission ˹O Prophet˺ are the ones who ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and His Messenger. So when they ask your permission for a private matter, grant permission to whoever you wish and ask Allah’s forgiveness for them. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: لا تجعلوا دعاء الرسول بينكم كدعاء بعضكم بعضا قد يعلم الله الذين يتسللون منكم لواذا فليحذر الذين يخالفون عن امره ان تصيبهم فتنة او يصيبهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Do not treat the Messenger’s summons to you ˹as lightly˺ as your summons to one another. Allah certainly knows those of you who slip away, hiding behind others. So let those who disobey his orders beware, for an affliction may befall them, or a painful torment may overtake them.

text_simple: الا ان لله ما في السماوات والارض قد يعلم ما انتم عليه ويوم يرجعون اليه فينبئهم بما عملوا والله بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely to Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. He knows well what you stand for. And ˹on˺ the Day all will be returned to Him, He will inform them of what they did. For Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: تبارك الذي نزل الفرقان على عبده ليكون للعالمين نذيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Blessed is the One Who sent down the Standard to His servant, so that he may be a warner to the whole world.

text_simple: الذي له ملك السماوات والارض ولم يتخذ ولدا ولم يكن له شريك في الملك وخلق كل شيء فقدره تقديرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Allah is˺ the One to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth, Who has never had ˹any˺ offspring, nor does He have a partner in ˹governing˺ the kingdom. He has created everything, ordaining it precisely.

text_simple: واتخذوا من دونه الهة لا يخلقون شيئا وهم يخلقون ولا يملكون لانفسهم ضرا ولا نفعا ولا يملكون موتا ولا حياة ولا نشورا
translation_en_yusufali: Yet they have taken besides Him gods who cannot create anything but are themselves created. Nor can they protect or benefit themselves. Nor can they control life, death, or resurrection.

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا ان هذا الا افك افتراه واعانه عليه قوم اخرون فقد جاءوا ظلما وزورا
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but a fabrication which he made up with the help of others.” Their claim is totally unjustified and untrue!

text_simple: وقالوا اساطير الاولين اكتتبها فهي تملى عليه بكرة واصيلا
translation_en_yusufali: And they say, “˹These revelations are only˺ ancient fables which he has had written down, and they are rehearsed to him morning and evening.”

text_simple: قل انزله الذي يعلم السر في السماوات والارض انه كان غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “This ˹Quran˺ has been revealed by the One Who knows the secrets of the heavens and the earth. Surely He is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”

text_simple: وقالوا مال هذا الرسول ياكل الطعام ويمشي في الاسواق لولا انزل اليه ملك فيكون معه نذيرا
translation_en_yusufali: And they say ˹mockingly˺, “What kind of messenger is this who eats food and goes about in market-places ˹for a living˺? If only an angel had been sent down with him to be his co-warner

text_simple: او يلقى اليه كنز او تكون له جنة ياكل منها وقال الظالمون ان تتبعون الا رجلا مسحورا
translation_en_yusufali: or a treasure had been cast down to him, or he had had a garden from which he may eat!” And the wrongdoers say ˹to the believers˺, “You are only following a bewitched man.”

text_simple: انظر كيف ضربوا لك الامثال فضلوا فلا يستطيعون سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: See ˹O Prophet˺ how they call you names! So they have gone so ˹far˺ astray that they cannot find the ˹Right˺ Way.

text_simple: تبارك الذي ان شاء جعل لك خيرا من ذلك جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار ويجعل لك قصورا
translation_en_yusufali: Blessed is the One Who—if He wills—can give you far better than ˹all˺ that: gardens under which rivers flow, and palaces as well.

text_simple: بل كذبوا بالساعة واعتدنا لمن كذب بالساعة سعيرا
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, they deny the Hour. And for the deniers of the Hour, We have prepared a blazing Fire.

text_simple: اذا راتهم من مكان بعيد سمعوا لها تغيظا وزفيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Once it sees them from a distance, they will hear it fuming and growling.

text_simple: واذا القوا منها مكانا ضيقا مقرنين دعوا هنالك ثبورا
translation_en_yusufali: And when they are tossed into a narrow place inside ˹Hell˺, chained together, then and there they will cry out for ˹instant˺ destruction.

text_simple: لا تدعوا اليوم ثبورا واحدا وادعوا ثبورا كثيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “Do not cry only once for destruction, but cry many times over!”

text_simple: قل اذلك خير ام جنة الخلد التي وعد المتقون كانت لهم جزاء ومصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Is this better or the Garden of Eternity which the righteous have been promised, as a reward and ˹an ultimate˺ destination?

text_simple: لهم فيها ما يشاءون خالدين كان على ربك وعدا مسئولا
translation_en_yusufali: There they will have whatever they wish for, forever. That is a promise ˹to be sought after˺, binding on your Lord.”

text_simple: ويوم يحشرهم وما يعبدون من دون الله فيقول اانتم اضللتم عبادي هؤلاء ام هم ضلوا السبيل
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Watch for˺ the Day He will gather them along with what they used to worship besides Allah, and ask ˹the objects of worship˺, “Was it you who misled these servants of Mine, or did they stray from the Way ˹on their own˺?”

text_simple: قالوا سبحانك ما كان ينبغي لنا ان نتخذ من دونك من اولياء ولكن متعتهم واباءهم حتى نسوا الذكر وكانوا قوما بورا
translation_en_yusufali: They will say, “Glory be to You! It was not right for ˹others like˺ us to take any lords besides You, but You allowed enjoyment for them and their forefathers ˹for so long˺ that they forgot ˹Your˺ remembrance and became a doomed people.”

text_simple: فقد كذبوكم بما تقولون فما تستطيعون صرفا ولا نصرا ومن يظلم منكم نذقه عذابا كبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The doomed will be told˺, “Your gods have clearly denied your claims. So now you can neither ward off ˹the punishment˺ nor get any help.” And whoever of you does wrong, We will make them taste a horrible punishment.

text_simple: وما ارسلنا قبلك من المرسلين الا انهم لياكلون الطعام ويمشون في الاسواق وجعلنا بعضكم لبعض فتنة اتصبرون وكان ربك بصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: We never sent any messenger before you ˹O Prophet˺, who did not eat food and go about in market-places. We have made some of you a trial for others. Will you ˹not then˺ be patient? And your Lord is All-Seeing.

text_simple: وقال الذين لا يرجون لقاءنا لولا انزل علينا الملائكة او نرى ربنا لقد استكبروا في انفسهم وعتوا عتوا كبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Those who do not expect to meet Us say, “If only the angels were sent down to us, or we could see our Lord!” They have certainly been carried away by their arrogance and have entirely exceeded all limits.

text_simple: يوم يرون الملائكة لا بشرى يومئذ للمجرمين ويقولون حجرا محجورا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ on the Day they will see the angels, there will be no good news for the wicked, who will cry, “Keep away! Away ˹from us˺!”

text_simple: وقدمنا الى ما عملوا من عمل فجعلناه هباء منثورا
translation_en_yusufali: Then We will turn to whatever ˹good˺ deeds they did, reducing them to scattered dust.

text_simple: اصحاب الجنة يومئذ خير مستقرا واحسن مقيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ on that Day the residents of Paradise will have the best settlement and the finest place to rest.

text_simple: ويوم تشقق السماء بالغمام ونزل الملائكة تنزيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Watch for˺ the Day the heavens will burst with clouds, and the angels will be sent down in successive ranks.

text_simple: الملك يومئذ الحق للرحمن وكان يوما على الكافرين عسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: True authority on that Day will belong ˹only˺ to the Most Compassionate. And it will be a hard day for the disbelievers.

text_simple: ويوم يعض الظالم على يديه يقول يا ليتني اتخذت مع الرسول سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹beware of˺ the Day the wrongdoer will bite his nails ˹in regret˺ and say, “Oh! I wish I had followed the Way along with the Messenger!

text_simple: يا ويلتى ليتني لم اتخذ فلانا خليلا
translation_en_yusufali: Woe to me! I wish I had never taken so-and-so as a close friend.

text_simple: لقد اضلني عن الذكر بعد اذ جاءني وكان الشيطان للانسان خذولا
translation_en_yusufali: It was he who truly made me stray from the Reminder after it had reached me.” And Satan has always betrayed humanity.

text_simple: وقال الرسول يا رب ان قومي اتخذوا هذا القران مهجورا
translation_en_yusufali: The Messenger has cried, “O my Lord! My people have indeed received this Quran with neglect.”

text_simple: وكذلك جعلنا لكل نبي عدوا من المجرمين وكفى بربك هاديا ونصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Similarly, We made enemies for every prophet from among the wicked, but sufficient is your Lord as a Guide and Helper.

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا لولا نزل عليه القران جملة واحدة كذلك لنثبت به فؤادك ورتلناه ترتيلا
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say, “If only the Quran had been sent down to him all at once!” ˹We have sent it˺ as such ˹in stages˺ so We may reassure your heart with it. And We have revealed it at a deliberate pace.

text_simple: ولا ياتونك بمثل الا جئناك بالحق واحسن تفسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever they bring you an argument, We come to you with the right refutation and the best explanation.

text_simple: الذين يحشرون على وجوههم الى جهنم اولئك شر مكانا واضل سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Those who will be dragged into Hell on their faces will be in the worst place, and are ˹now˺ farthest from the ˹Right˺ Way.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا موسى الكتاب وجعلنا معه اخاه هارون وزيرا
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly gave Moses the Book and appointed his brother Aaron as his helper.

text_simple: فقلنا اذهبا الى القوم الذين كذبوا باياتنا فدمرناهم تدميرا
translation_en_yusufali: We had ordered ˹them˺, “Go to the people who would deny Our signs.” Then We annihilated the deniers entirely.

text_simple: وقوم نوح لما كذبوا الرسل اغرقناهم وجعلناهم للناس اية واعتدنا للظالمين عذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: And when the people of Noah rejected the messengers, We drowned them, making them an example to humanity. And We have prepared a painful punishment for the wrongdoers.

text_simple: وعادا وثمود واصحاب الرس وقرونا بين ذلك كثيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Also ˹We destroyed˺ ’Ȃd, Thamûd, and the people of the Water-pit, as well as many peoples in between.

text_simple: وكلا ضربنا له الامثال وكلا تبرنا تتبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: For each We set forth ˹various˺ lessons, and We ultimately destroyed each.

text_simple: ولقد اتوا على القرية التي امطرت مطر السوء افلم يكونوا يرونها بل كانوا لا يرجون نشورا
translation_en_yusufali: They have certainly passed by the city ˹of Sodom˺, which had been showered with a dreadful rain ˹of stones˺. Have they not seen its ruins? But they do not expect to be resurrected.

text_simple: واذا راوك ان يتخذونك الا هزوا اهذا الذي بعث الله رسولا
translation_en_yusufali: When they see you ˹O Prophet˺, they only make fun of you, ˹saying,˺ “Is this the one that Allah has sent as a messenger?

text_simple: ان كاد ليضلنا عن الهتنا لولا ان صبرنا عليها وسوف يعلمون حين يرون العذاب من اضل سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: He would have almost tricked us away from our gods, had we not been so devoted to them.” ˹But˺ soon they will know, when they face the punishment, who is far astray from the ˹Right˺ Way.

text_simple: ارايت من اتخذ الهه هواه افانت تكون عليه وكيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Have you seen ˹O Prophet˺ the one who has taken their own desires as their god? Will you then be a keeper over them?

text_simple: ام تحسب ان اكثرهم يسمعون او يعقلون ان هم الا كالانعام بل هم اضل سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Or do you think that most of them listen or understand? They are only like cattle—no, more than that, they are astray from the ˹Right˺ Way!

text_simple: الم تر الى ربك كيف مد الظل ولو شاء لجعله ساكنا ثم جعلنا الشمس عليه دليلا
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen how your Lord extends the shade—He could have simply made it ˹remain˺ still if He so willed—then We make the sun its guide

text_simple: ثم قبضناه الينا قبضا يسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: causing the shade to retreat gradually?

text_simple: وهو الذي جعل لكم الليل لباسا والنوم سباتا وجعل النهار نشورا
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who has made the night for you as a cover, and ˹made˺ sleep for resting, and the day for rising.

text_simple: وهو الذي ارسل الرياح بشرا بين يدي رحمته وانزلنا من السماء ماء طهورا
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who sends the winds ushering in His mercy, and We send down pure rain from the sky

text_simple: لنحيي به بلدة ميتا ونسقيه مما خلقنا انعاما واناسي كثيرا
translation_en_yusufali: giving life to a lifeless land, and providing water for countless animals and humans of Our Own creation.

text_simple: ولقد صرفناه بينهم ليذكروا فابى اكثر الناس الا كفورا
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly disperse it among them so they may be mindful, but most people persist in ungratefulness.

text_simple: ولو شئنا لبعثنا في كل قرية نذيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Had We willed, We could have easily sent a warner to every society.

text_simple: فلا تطع الكافرين وجاهدهم به جهادا كبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: So do not yield to the disbelievers, but strive diligently against them with this ˹Quran˺.

text_simple: وهو الذي مرج البحرين هذا عذب فرات وهذا ملح اجاج وجعل بينهما برزخا وحجرا محجورا
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who merges the two bodies of water: one fresh and palatable and the other salty and bitter, placing between them a barrier they cannot cross.

text_simple: وهو الذي خلق من الماء بشرا فجعله نسبا وصهرا وكان ربك قديرا
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who creates human beings from a ˹humble˺ liquid, then establishes for them bonds of kinship and marriage. For your Lord is Most Capable.

text_simple: ويعبدون من دون الله ما لا ينفعهم ولا يضرهم وكان الكافر على ربه ظهيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Yet they worship besides Allah what can neither benefit nor harm them. And the disbeliever always collaborates against their Lord.

text_simple: وما ارسلناك الا مبشرا ونذيرا
translation_en_yusufali: And We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ only as a deliverer of good news and a warner.

text_simple: قل ما اسالكم عليه من اجر الا من شاء ان يتخذ الى ربه سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹message˺, but whoever wishes, let them pursue the Way to their Lord.”

text_simple: وتوكل على الحي الذي لا يموت وسبح بحمده وكفى به بذنوب عباده خبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Put your trust in the Ever-Living, Who never dies, and glorify His praises. Sufficient is He as All-Aware of the sins of His servants.

text_simple: الذي خلق السماوات والارض وما بينهما في ستة ايام ثم استوى على العرش الرحمن فاسال به خبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ the One Who created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, then established Himself on the Throne. ˹He is˺ the Most Compassionate! Ask ˹none other than˺ the All-Knowledgeable about Himself.

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم اسجدوا للرحمن قالوا وما الرحمن انسجد لما تامرنا وزادهم نفورا
translation_en_yusufali: When it is said to them, “Prostrate to the Most Compassionate,” they ask ˹in disgust˺, “What is ‘the Most Compassionate’? Will we prostrate to whatever you order us to?” And it only drives them farther away.

text_simple: تبارك الذي جعل في السماء بروجا وجعل فيها سراجا وقمرا منيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Blessed is the One Who has placed constellations in the sky, as well as a ˹radiant˺ lamp and a luminous moon.

text_simple: وهو الذي جعل الليل والنهار خلفة لمن اراد ان يذكر او اراد شكورا
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who causes the day and the night to alternate, ˹as a sign˺ for whoever desires to be mindful or to be grateful.

text_simple: وعباد الرحمن الذين يمشون على الارض هونا واذا خاطبهم الجاهلون قالوا سلاما
translation_en_yusufali: The ˹true˺ servants of the Most Compassionate are those who walk on the earth humbly, and when the foolish address them ˹improperly˺, they only respond with peace.

text_simple: والذين يبيتون لربهم سجدا وقياما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who spend ˹a good portion of˺ the night, prostrating themselves and standing before their Lord.

text_simple: والذين يقولون ربنا اصرف عنا عذاب جهنم ان عذابها كان غراما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who pray, “Our Lord! Keep the punishment of Hell away from us, for its punishment is indeed unrelenting.

text_simple: انها ساءت مستقرا ومقاما
translation_en_yusufali: It is certainly an evil place to settle and reside.”

text_simple: والذين اذا انفقوا لم يسرفوا ولم يقتروا وكان بين ذلك قواما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who spend neither wastefully nor stingily, but moderately in between.

text_simple: والذين لا يدعون مع الله الها اخر ولا يقتلون النفس التي حرم الله الا بالحق ولا يزنون ومن يفعل ذلك يلق اثاما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who do not invoke any other god besides Allah, nor take a ˹human˺ life—made sacred by Allah—except with ˹legal˺ right, nor commit fornication. And whoever does ˹any of˺ this will face the penalty.

text_simple: يضاعف له العذاب يوم القيامة ويخلد فيه مهانا
translation_en_yusufali: Their punishment will be multiplied on the Day of Judgment, and they will remain in it forever, in disgrace.

text_simple: الا من تاب وامن وعمل عملا صالحا فاولئك يبدل الله سيئاتهم حسنات وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who repent, believe, and do good deeds, they are the ones whose evil deeds Allah will change into good deeds. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ومن تاب وعمل صالحا فانه يتوب الى الله متابا
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever repents and does good has truly turned to Allah properly.

text_simple: والذين لا يشهدون الزور واذا مروا باللغو مروا كراما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who do not bear false witness, and when they come across falsehood, they pass ˹it˺ by with dignity.

text_simple: والذين اذا ذكروا بايات ربهم لم يخروا عليها صما وعميانا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who, when reminded of the revelation of their Lord, do not turn a blind eye or a deaf ear to it.

text_simple: والذين يقولون ربنا هب لنا من ازواجنا وذرياتنا قرة اعين واجعلنا للمتقين اماما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ those who pray, “Our Lord! Bless us with ˹pious˺ spouses and offspring who will be the joy of our hearts, and make us models for the righteous.”

text_simple: اولئك يجزون الغرفة بما صبروا ويلقون فيها تحية وسلاما
translation_en_yusufali: It is they who will be rewarded with ˹elevated˺ mansions ˹in Paradise˺ for their perseverance, and will be received with salutations and ˹greetings of˺ peace

text_simple: خالدين فيها حسنت مستقرا ومقاما
translation_en_yusufali: staying there forever. What an excellent place to settle and reside!

text_simple: قل ما يعبا بكم ربي لولا دعاؤكم فقد كذبتم فسوف يكون لزاما
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You ˹all˺ would not ˹even˺ matter to my Lord were it not for your faith ˹in Him˺. But now you ˹disbelievers˺ have denied ˹the truth˺, so the torment is bound to come.”

text_simple: طسم
translation_en_yusufali: Ṭâ-Sĩn-Mĩm.

text_simple: تلك ايات الكتاب المبين
translation_en_yusufali: These are the verses of the clear Book.

text_simple: لعلك باخع نفسك الا يكونوا مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Perhaps you ˹O Prophet˺ will grieve yourself to death over their disbelief.

text_simple: ان نشا ننزل عليهم من السماء اية فظلت اعناقهم لها خاضعين
translation_en_yusufali: If We willed, We could send down upon them a ˹compelling˺ sign from the heavens, leaving their necks bent in ˹utter˺ submission to it.

text_simple: وما ياتيهم من ذكر من الرحمن محدث الا كانوا عنه معرضين
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever new reminder comes to them from the Most Compassionate, they always turn away from it.

text_simple: فقد كذبوا فسياتيهم انباء ما كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: They have certainly denied ˹the truth˺, so they will soon face the consequences of their ridicule.

text_simple: اولم يروا الى الارض كم انبتنا فيها من كل زوج كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Have they failed to look at the earth, ˹to see˺ how many types of fine plants We have caused to grow in it?

text_simple: ان في ذلك لاية وما كان اكثرهم مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

text_simple: وان ربك لهو العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

text_simple: واذ نادى ربك موسى ان ائت القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when your Lord called out to Moses, “Go to the wrongdoing people—

text_simple: قوم فرعون الا يتقون
translation_en_yusufali: the people of Pharaoh. Will they not fear ˹Allah˺?”

text_simple: قال رب اني اخاف ان يكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: He replied, “My Lord! I fear that they will reject me.

text_simple: ويضيق صدري ولا ينطلق لساني فارسل الى هارون
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹so˺ my heart will be broken and my tongue will be tied. So send Aaron along ˹as a messenger˺.

text_simple: ولهم علي ذنب فاخاف ان يقتلون
translation_en_yusufali: Also, they have a charge against me, so I fear they may kill me.”

text_simple: قال كلا فاذهبا باياتنا انا معكم مستمعون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah responded, “Certainly not! So go, both of you, with Our signs. We will be with you, listening.

text_simple: فاتيا فرعون فقولا انا رسول رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Go to Pharaoh and say, ‘We are messengers from the Lord of all worlds

text_simple: ان ارسل معنا بني اسرائيل
translation_en_yusufali: ˹commanded to say:˺ ‘Let the Children of Israel go with us.’’”

text_simple: قال الم نربك فينا وليدا ولبثت فينا من عمرك سنين
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh protested, “Did we not raise you among us as a child, and you stayed several years of your life in our care?

text_simple: وفعلت فعلتك التي فعلت وانت من الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then you did what you did, being ˹utterly˺ ungrateful!”

text_simple: قال فعلتها اذا وانا من الضالين
translation_en_yusufali: Moses replied, “I did it then, lacking guidance.

text_simple: ففررت منكم لما خفتكم فوهب لي ربي حكما وجعلني من المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: So I fled from you when I feared you. Then my Lord granted me wisdom and made me one of the messengers.

text_simple: وتلك نعمة تمنها علي ان عبدت بني اسرائيل
translation_en_yusufali: How can that be a ‘favour,’ of which you remind me, when ˹it was only because˺ you ˹have˺ enslaved the Children of Israel?”

text_simple: قال فرعون وما رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh asked, “And what is ‘the Lord of all worlds’?”

text_simple: قال رب السماوات والارض وما بينهما ان كنتم موقنين
translation_en_yusufali: Moses replied, “˹He is˺ the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, if only you had sure faith.”

text_simple: قال لمن حوله الا تستمعون
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh said to those around him, “Did you hear ˹what he said˺?”

text_simple: قال ربكم ورب ابائكم الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: Moses added, “˹He is˺ your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers.”

text_simple: قال ان رسولكم الذي ارسل اليكم لمجنون
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh said ˹mockingly˺, “Your messenger, who has been sent to you, must be insane.”

text_simple: قال رب المشرق والمغرب وما بينهما ان كنتم تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Moses responded: “˹He is˺ the Lord of the east and west, and everything in between, if only you had any sense.”

text_simple: قال لئن اتخذت الها غيري لاجعلنك من المسجونين
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh threatened, “If you take any other god besides me, I will certainly have you imprisoned.”

text_simple: قال اولو جئتك بشيء مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Moses responded, “Even if I bring you a clear proof?”

text_simple: قال فات به ان كنت من الصادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh demanded, “Bring it then, if what you say is true.”

text_simple: فالقى عصاه فاذا هي ثعبان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: So he threw down his staff and—behold!—it became a real snake.

text_simple: ونزع يده فاذا هي بيضاء للناظرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then he drew his hand ˹out of his collar˺ and it was ˹shining˺ white for all to see.

text_simple: قال للملا حوله ان هذا لساحر عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh said to the chiefs around him, “He is indeed a skilled magician

text_simple: يريد ان يخرجكم من ارضكم بسحره فماذا تامرون
translation_en_yusufali: who seeks to drive you from your land by his magic. So what do you propose?”

text_simple: قالوا ارجه واخاه وابعث في المدائن حاشرين
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “Let him and his brother wait and dispatch mobilizers to all cities

text_simple: ياتوك بكل سحار عليم
translation_en_yusufali: to bring you every skilled magician.”

text_simple: فجمع السحرة لميقات يوم معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: So the magicians were assembled at the set time on the appointed day.

text_simple: وقيل للناس هل انتم مجتمعون
translation_en_yusufali: And the people were asked, “Will you join the gathering

text_simple: لعلنا نتبع السحرة ان كانوا هم الغالبين
translation_en_yusufali: so that we may follow the magicians if they prevail?”

text_simple: فلما جاء السحرة قالوا لفرعون ائن لنا لاجرا ان كنا نحن الغالبين
translation_en_yusufali: When the magicians came, they asked Pharaoh, “Shall we have a ˹suitable˺ reward if we prevail?”

text_simple: قال نعم وانكم اذا لمن المقربين
translation_en_yusufali: He replied, “Yes, and you will then certainly be among those closest to me.”

text_simple: قال لهم موسى القوا ما انتم ملقون
translation_en_yusufali: Moses said to them, “Cast whatever you wish to cast.”

text_simple: فالقوا حبالهم وعصيهم وقالوا بعزة فرعون انا لنحن الغالبون
translation_en_yusufali: So they cast down their ropes and staffs, saying, “By Pharaoh’s might, it is we who will surely prevail.”

text_simple: فالقى موسى عصاه فاذا هي تلقف ما يافكون
translation_en_yusufali: Then Moses threw down his staff, and—behold!—it devoured the objects of their illusion!

text_simple: فالقي السحرة ساجدين
translation_en_yusufali: So the magicians fell down, prostrating.

text_simple: قالوا امنا برب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: They declared, “We ˹now˺ believe in the Lord of all worlds—

text_simple: رب موسى وهارون
translation_en_yusufali: the Lord of Moses and Aaron.”

text_simple: قال امنتم له قبل ان اذن لكم انه لكبيركم الذي علمكم السحر فلسوف تعلمون لاقطعن ايديكم وارجلكم من خلاف ولاصلبنكم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh threatened, “How dare you believe in him before I give you permission? He must be your master who taught you magic, but soon you will see. I will certainly cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides, then crucify you all.”

text_simple: قالوا لا ضير انا الى ربنا منقلبون
translation_en_yusufali: They responded, “˹That would be˺ no harm! Surely to our Lord we will ˹all˺ return.

text_simple: انا نطمع ان يغفر لنا ربنا خطايانا ان كنا اول المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: We really hope that our Lord will forgive our sins, as we are the first to believe.”

text_simple: واوحينا الى موسى ان اسر بعبادي انكم متبعون
translation_en_yusufali: And We inspired Moses, ˹saying,˺ “Leave with My servants at night, for you will surely be pursued.”

text_simple: فارسل فرعون في المدائن حاشرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then Pharaoh sent mobilizers to all cities

text_simple: ان هؤلاء لشرذمة قليلون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹and said,˺ “These ˹outcasts˺ are just a handful of people

text_simple: وانهم لنا لغائظون
translation_en_yusufali: who have really enraged us

text_simple: وانا لجميع حاذرون
translation_en_yusufali: but we are all on the alert.”

text_simple: فاخرجناهم من جنات وعيون
translation_en_yusufali: So We lured the tyrants out of ˹their˺ gardens, springs

text_simple: وكنوز ومقام كريم
translation_en_yusufali: treasures, and splendid residences.

text_simple: كذلك واورثناها بني اسرائيل
translation_en_yusufali: So it was. And We awarded it ˹all˺ to the Children of Israel.

text_simple: فاتبعوهم مشرقين
translation_en_yusufali: And so they pursued them at sunrise.

text_simple: فلما تراءى الجمعان قال اصحاب موسى انا لمدركون
translation_en_yusufali: When the two groups came face to face, the companions of Moses cried out, “We are overtaken for sure.”

text_simple: قال كلا ان معي ربي سيهدين
translation_en_yusufali: Moses reassured ˹them˺, “Absolutely not! My Lord is certainly with me—He will guide me.”

text_simple: فاوحينا الى موسى ان اضرب بعصاك البحر فانفلق فكان كل فرق كالطود العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: So We inspired Moses: “Strike the sea with your staff,” and the sea was split, each part was like a huge mountain.

text_simple: وازلفنا ثم الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: We drew the pursuers to that place

text_simple: وانجينا موسى ومن معه اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: and delivered Moses and those with him all together.

text_simple: ثم اغرقنا الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then We drowned the others.

text_simple: ان في ذلك لاية وما كان اكثرهم مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

text_simple: وان ربك لهو العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

text_simple: واتل عليهم نبا ابراهيم
translation_en_yusufali: Relate to them ˹O Prophet˺ the story of Abraham

text_simple: اذ قال لابيه وقومه ما تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: when he questioned his father and his people, “What is that you worship ˹besides Allah˺?”

text_simple: قالوا نعبد اصناما فنظل لها عاكفين
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “We worship idols, to which we are fully devoted.”

text_simple: قال هل يسمعونكم اذ تدعون
translation_en_yusufali: Abraham asked, “Can they hear you when you call upon them?

text_simple: او ينفعونكم او يضرون
translation_en_yusufali: Or can they benefit or harm you?”

text_simple: قالوا بل وجدنا اباءنا كذلك يفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “No! But we found our forefathers doing the same.”

text_simple: قال افرايتم ما كنتم تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: Abraham responded, “Have you ˹really˺ considered what you have been worshipping—

text_simple: انتم واباؤكم الاقدمون
translation_en_yusufali: you and your ancestors?

text_simple: فانهم عدو لي الا رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: They are ˹all˺ enemies to me, except the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: الذي خلقني فهو يهدين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ the One Who created me, and He ˹alone˺ guides me.

text_simple: والذي هو يطعمني ويسقين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ the One Who provides me with food and drink.

text_simple: واذا مرضت فهو يشفين
translation_en_yusufali: And He ˹alone˺ heals me when I am sick.

text_simple: والذي يميتني ثم يحيين
translation_en_yusufali: And He ˹is the One Who˺ will cause me to die, and then bring me back to life.

text_simple: والذي اطمع ان يغفر لي خطيئتي يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: And He is ˹the One˺ Who, I hope, will forgive my flaws on Judgment Day.”

text_simple: رب هب لي حكما والحقني بالصالحين
translation_en_yusufali: “My Lord! Grant me wisdom, and join me with the righteous.

text_simple: واجعل لي لسان صدق في الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Bless me with honourable mention among later generations.

text_simple: واجعلني من ورثة جنة النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Make me one of those awarded the Garden of Bliss.

text_simple: واغفر لابي انه كان من الضالين
translation_en_yusufali: Forgive my father, for he is certainly one of the misguided.

text_simple: ولا تخزني يوم يبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: And do not disgrace me on the Day all will be resurrected—

text_simple: يوم لا ينفع مال ولا بنون
translation_en_yusufali: the Day when neither wealth nor children will be of any benefit.

text_simple: الا من اتى الله بقلب سليم
translation_en_yusufali: Only those who come before Allah with a pure heart ˹will be saved˺.”

text_simple: وازلفت الجنة للمتقين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹On that Day˺ Paradise will be brought near to the God-fearing

text_simple: وبرزت الجحيم للغاوين
translation_en_yusufali: and the Hellfire will be displayed to the deviant.

text_simple: وقيل لهم اين ما كنتم تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: And it will be said to them, “Where are those you used to worship

text_simple: من دون الله هل ينصرونكم او ينتصرون
translation_en_yusufali: besides Allah? Can they help you or even help themselves?”

text_simple: فكبكبوا فيها هم والغاوون
translation_en_yusufali: Then the idols will be hurled headlong into Hell, along with the deviant

text_simple: وجنود ابليس اجمعون
translation_en_yusufali: and the soldiers of Iblîs, all together.

text_simple: قالوا وهم فيها يختصمون
translation_en_yusufali: There the deviant will cry while disputing with their idols

text_simple: تالله ان كنا لفي ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: “By Allah! We were clearly mistaken

text_simple: اذ نسويكم برب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: when we made you equal to the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: وما اضلنا الا المجرمون
translation_en_yusufali: And none led us astray other than the wicked.

text_simple: فما لنا من شافعين
translation_en_yusufali: Now we have none to intercede for us

text_simple: ولا صديق حميم
translation_en_yusufali: nor a close friend.

text_simple: فلو ان لنا كرة فنكون من المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: If only we could have a second chance, then we would be believers.”

text_simple: ان في ذلك لاية وما كان اكثرهم مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this is a sign. Yet most of them would not believe.

text_simple: وان ربك لهو العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And your Lord is certainly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

text_simple: كذبت قوم نوح المرسلين
