text_simple: يا عبادي الذين امنوا ان ارضي واسعة فاياي فاعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: O My believing servants! My earth is truly spacious, so worship Me ˹alone˺.

text_simple: كل نفس ذائقة الموت ثم الينا ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Every soul will taste death, then to Us you will ˹all˺ be returned.

text_simple: والذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لنبوئنهم من الجنة غرفا تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها نعم اجر العاملين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹As for˺ those who believe and do good, We will certainly house them in ˹elevated˺ mansions in Paradise, under which rivers flow, to stay there forever. How excellent is the reward for those who work ˹righteousness!˺—

text_simple: الذين صبروا وعلى ربهم يتوكلون
translation_en_yusufali: those who patiently endure, and put their trust in their Lord!

text_simple: وكاين من دابة لا تحمل رزقها الله يرزقها واياكم وهو السميع العليم
translation_en_yusufali: How many are the creatures that cannot secure their provisions! ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ provides for them and you ˹as well˺. He is indeed the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

text_simple: ولئن سالتهم من خلق السماوات والارض وسخر الشمس والقمر ليقولن الله فانى يؤفكون
translation_en_yusufali: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth and subjected the sun and the moon ˹for your benefit˺, they will certainly say, “Allah!” How can they then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

text_simple: الله يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء من عباده ويقدر له ان الله بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills of His servants. Surely Allah has ˹full˺ knowledge of everything.

text_simple: ولئن سالتهم من نزل من السماء ماء فاحيا به الارض من بعد موتها ليقولن الله قل الحمد لله بل اكثرهم لا يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And if you ask them who sends down rain from the sky, giving life to the earth after its death, they will surely say, “Allah!” Say, “Praise be to Allah!” In fact, most of them do not understand.

text_simple: وما هذه الحياة الدنيا الا لهو ولعب وان الدار الاخرة لهي الحيوان لو كانوا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: This worldly life is no more than play and amusement. But the Hereafter is indeed the real life, if only they knew.

text_simple: فاذا ركبوا في الفلك دعوا الله مخلصين له الدين فلما نجاهم الى البر اذا هم يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: If they happen to be aboard a ship ˹caught in a storm˺, they cry out to Allah ˹alone˺ in sincere devotion. But as soon as He delivers them ˹safely˺ to shore, they associate ˹others with Him once again˺.

text_simple: ليكفروا بما اتيناهم وليتمتعوا فسوف يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: So let them be ungrateful for all We have given them, and ˹let them˺ enjoy themselves ˹for now˺! For they will soon know.

text_simple: اولم يروا انا جعلنا حرما امنا ويتخطف الناس من حولهم افبالباطل يؤمنون وبنعمة الله يكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not seen how We have made ˹Mecca˺ a safe haven, whereas people ˹all˺ around them are snatched away? How can they then believe in falsehood and deny Allah’s favours?

text_simple: ومن اظلم ممن افترى على الله كذبا او كذب بالحق لما جاءه اليس في جهنم مثوى للكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: And who does more wrong than those who fabricate lies against Allah or reject the truth after it has reached them? Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the disbelievers?

text_simple: والذين جاهدوا فينا لنهدينهم سبلنا وان الله لمع المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who struggle in Our cause, We will surely guide them along Our Way. And Allah is certainly with the good-doers.

text_simple: الم
translation_en_yusufali: Alif-Lãm-Mĩm.

text_simple: غلبت الروم
translation_en_yusufali: The Romans have been defeated

text_simple: في ادنى الارض وهم من بعد غلبهم سيغلبون
translation_en_yusufali: in a nearby land. Yet following their defeat, they will triumph

text_simple: في بضع سنين لله الامر من قبل ومن بعد ويومئذ يفرح المؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: within three to nine years. The ˹whole˺ matter rests with Allah before and after ˹victory˺. And on that day the believers will rejoice

text_simple: بنصر الله ينصر من يشاء وهو العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: at the victory willed by Allah. He gives victory to whoever He wills. For He is the Almighty, Most Merciful.

text_simple: وعد الله لا يخلف الله وعده ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ the promise of Allah. ˹And˺ Allah never fails in His promise. But most people do not know.

text_simple: يعلمون ظاهرا من الحياة الدنيا وهم عن الاخرة هم غافلون
translation_en_yusufali: They ˹only˺ know the worldly affairs of this life, but are ˹totally˺ oblivious to the Hereafter.

text_simple: اولم يتفكروا في انفسهم ما خلق الله السماوات والارض وما بينهما الا بالحق واجل مسمى وان كثيرا من الناس بلقاء ربهم لكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not reflected upon their own being? Allah only created the heavens and the earth and everything in between for a purpose and an appointed term. Yet most people are truly in denial of the meeting with their Lord!

text_simple: اولم يسيروا في الارض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبلهم كانوا اشد منهم قوة واثاروا الارض وعمروها اكثر مما عمروها وجاءتهم رسلهم بالبينات فما كان الله ليظلمهم ولكن كانوا انفسهم يظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them? They were far superior in might; they cultivated the land and developed it more than these ˹Meccans˺ ever have. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs. Allah would have never wronged them, but it was they who wronged themselves.

text_simple: ثم كان عاقبة الذين اساءوا السواى ان كذبوا بايات الله وكانوا بها يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: Then most evil was the end of the evildoers for denying and mocking the signs of Allah.

text_simple: الله يبدا الخلق ثم يعيده ثم اليه ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who originates the creation, and will resurrect it. And then to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.

text_simple: ويوم تقوم الساعة يبلس المجرمون
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day the Hour will arrive, the wicked will be dumbstruck.

text_simple: ولم يكن لهم من شركائهم شفعاء وكانوا بشركائهم كافرين
translation_en_yusufali: There will be no intercessors for them from among their associate-gods, and they will ˹totally˺ deny their associate-gods.

text_simple: ويوم تقوم الساعة يومئذ يتفرقون
translation_en_yusufali: And on the Day the Hour will arrive, the people will then be split ˹into two groups˺.

text_simple: فاما الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات فهم في روضة يحبرون
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who believed and did good, they will be rejoicing in a Garden.

text_simple: واما الذين كفروا وكذبوا باياتنا ولقاء الاخرة فاولئك في العذاب محضرون
translation_en_yusufali: And as for those who disbelieved, and denied Our signs and the meeting ˹with Allah˺ in the Hereafter, they will be confined in punishment.

text_simple: فسبحان الله حين تمسون وحين تصبحون
translation_en_yusufali: So glorify Allah in the evening and in the morning—

text_simple: وله الحمد في السماوات والارض وعشيا وحين تظهرون
translation_en_yusufali: all praise is for Him in the heavens and the earth—as well as in the afternoon, and at noon.

text_simple: يخرج الحي من الميت ويخرج الميت من الحي ويحيي الارض بعد موتها وكذلك تخرجون
translation_en_yusufali: He brings forth the living from the dead and the dead from the living. And He gives life to the earth after its death. And so will you be brought forth ˹from the grave˺.

text_simple: ومن اياته ان خلقكم من تراب ثم اذا انتم بشر تنتشرون
translation_en_yusufali: One of His signs is that He created you from dust, then—behold!—you are human beings spreading over ˹the earth˺.

text_simple: ومن اياته ان خلق لكم من انفسكم ازواجا لتسكنوا اليها وجعل بينكم مودة ورحمة ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And one of His signs is that He created for you spouses from among yourselves so that you may find comfort in them. And He has placed between you compassion and mercy. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

text_simple: ومن اياته خلق السماوات والارض واختلاف السنتكم والوانكم ان في ذلك لايات للعالمين
translation_en_yusufali: And one of His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and the diversity of your languages and colours. Surely in this are signs for those of ˹sound˺ knowledge.

text_simple: ومن اياته منامكم بالليل والنهار وابتغاؤكم من فضله ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يسمعون
translation_en_yusufali: And one of His signs is your sleep by night and by day ˹for rest˺ as well as your seeking His bounty ˹in both˺. Surely in this are signs for people who listen.

text_simple: ومن اياته يريكم البرق خوفا وطمعا وينزل من السماء ماء فيحيي به الارض بعد موتها ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And one of His signs is that He shows you lightning, inspiring ˹you with˺ hope and fear. And He sends down rain from the sky, reviving the earth after its death. Surely in this are signs for people who understand.

text_simple: ومن اياته ان تقوم السماء والارض بامره ثم اذا دعاكم دعوة من الارض اذا انتم تخرجون
translation_en_yusufali: And one of His signs is that the heavens and the earth persist by His command. Then when He calls you out of the earth just once, you will instantly come forth.

text_simple: وله من في السماوات والارض كل له قانتون
translation_en_yusufali: And to Him belong all those in the heavens and the earth—all are subject to His Will.

text_simple: وهو الذي يبدا الخلق ثم يعيده وهو اهون عليه وله المثل الاعلى في السماوات والارض وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who originates the creation then will resurrect it—which is even easier for Him. To Him belong the finest attributes in the heavens and the earth. And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ضرب لكم مثلا من انفسكم هل لكم من ما ملكت ايمانكم من شركاء في ما رزقناكم فانتم فيه سواء تخافونهم كخيفتكم انفسكم كذلك نفصل الايات لقوم يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: He sets forth for you an example ˹drawn˺ from your own lives: would you allow some of those ˹bondspeople˺ in your possession to be your equal partners in whatever ˹wealth˺ We have provided you, keeping them in mind as you are mindful of your peers? This is how We make the signs clear for people who understand.

text_simple: بل اتبع الذين ظلموا اهواءهم بغير علم فمن يهدي من اضل الله وما لهم من ناصرين
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, the wrongdoers merely follow their desires with no knowledge. Who then can guide those Allah has left to stray? They will have no helpers.

text_simple: فاقم وجهك للدين حنيفا فطرت الله التي فطر الناس عليها لا تبديل لخلق الله ذلك الدين القيم ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: So be steadfast in faith in all uprightness ˹O Prophet˺—the natural Way of Allah which He has instilled in ˹all˺ people. Let there be no change in this creation of Allah. That is the Straight Way, but most people do not know.

text_simple: منيبين اليه واتقوه واقيموا الصلاة ولا تكونوا من المشركين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹O believers!˺ Always turn to Him ˹in repentance˺, be mindful of Him, and establish prayers. And do not be polytheists—

text_simple: من الذين فرقوا دينهم وكانوا شيعا كل حزب بما لديهم فرحون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹like˺ those who have divided their faith and split into sects, each rejoicing in what they have.

text_simple: واذا مس الناس ضر دعوا ربهم منيبين اليه ثم اذا اذاقهم منه رحمة اذا فريق منهم بربهم يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: When people are touched with hardship, they cry out to their Lord, turning to Him ˹alone˺. But as soon as He gives them a taste of His mercy, a group of them associates ˹others˺ with their Lord ˹in worship˺

text_simple: ليكفروا بما اتيناهم فتمتعوا فسوف تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: becoming ungrateful for whatever ˹favours˺ We have given them. So enjoy yourselves, for soon you will know.

text_simple: ام انزلنا عليهم سلطانا فهو يتكلم بما كانوا به يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: Or have We sent down to them an authority which attests to what they associate ˹with Him˺?

text_simple: واذا اذقنا الناس رحمة فرحوا بها وان تصبهم سيئة بما قدمت ايديهم اذا هم يقنطون
translation_en_yusufali: If We give people a taste of mercy, they become prideful ˹because˺ of it. But if they are afflicted with an evil for what their hands have done, they instantly fall into despair.

text_simple: اولم يروا ان الله يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not seen that Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills? Surely in this are signs for people who believe.

text_simple: فات ذا القربى حقه والمسكين وابن السبيل ذلك خير للذين يريدون وجه الله واولئك هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: So give your close relatives their due, as well as the poor and the ˹needy˺ traveller. That is best for those who seek the pleasure of Allah, and it is they who will be successful.

text_simple: وما اتيتم من ربا ليربو في اموال الناس فلا يربو عند الله وما اتيتم من زكاة تريدون وجه الله فاولئك هم المضعفون
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever loans you give, ˹only˺ seeking interest at the expense of people’s wealth will not increase with Allah. But whatever charity you give, ˹only˺ seeking the pleasure of Allah—it is they whose reward will be multiplied.

text_simple: الله الذي خلقكم ثم رزقكم ثم يميتكم ثم يحييكم هل من شركائكم من يفعل من ذلكم من شيء سبحانه وتعالى عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who created you, then gives you provisions, then will cause you to die, and then will bring you back to life. Can any of your associate-gods do any of this? Glorified and Exalted is He above what they associate with Him ˹in worship˺!

text_simple: ظهر الفساد في البر والبحر بما كسبت ايدي الناس ليذيقهم بعض الذي عملوا لعلهم يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Corruption has spread on land and sea as a result of what people’s hands have done, so that Allah may cause them to taste ˹the consequences of˺ some of their deeds and perhaps they might return ˹to the Right Path˺.

text_simple: قل سيروا في الارض فانظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبل كان اكثرهم مشركين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Travel throughout the land and see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before ˹you˺—most of them were polytheists.”

text_simple: فاقم وجهك للدين القيم من قبل ان ياتي يوم لا مرد له من الله يومئذ يصدعون
translation_en_yusufali: So be steadfast in the Upright Faith ˹O Prophet˺, before the coming of a Day from Allah that cannot be averted. On that Day the people will be divided:

text_simple: من كفر فعليه كفره ومن عمل صالحا فلانفسهم يمهدون
translation_en_yusufali: those who disbelieved will bear ˹the burden of˺ their own disbelief; and those who did good will have prepared for themselves ˹eternal homes˺

text_simple: ليجزي الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات من فضله انه لا يحب الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: so that He may ˹generously˺ reward those who believe and do good, out of His grace. He truly does not like the disbelievers.

text_simple: ومن اياته ان يرسل الرياح مبشرات وليذيقكم من رحمته ولتجري الفلك بامره ولتبتغوا من فضله ولعلكم تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And one of His signs is that He sends the winds, ushering in good news ˹of rain˺ so that He may give you a taste of His mercy, and that ships may sail by His command, and that you may seek His bounty, and perhaps you will be grateful.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا من قبلك رسلا الى قومهم فجاءوهم بالبينات فانتقمنا من الذين اجرموا وكان حقا علينا نصر المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent before you ˹O Prophet˺ messengers, each to their own people, and they came to them with clear proofs. Then We inflicted punishment upon those who persisted in wickedness. For it is Our duty to help the believers.

text_simple: الله الذي يرسل الرياح فتثير سحابا فيبسطه في السماء كيف يشاء ويجعله كسفا فترى الودق يخرج من خلاله فاذا اصاب به من يشاء من عباده اذا هم يستبشرون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who sends the winds, which then stir up ˹vapour, forming˺ clouds, which He then spreads out in the sky or piles up into masses as He wills, from which you see rain come forth. Then as soon as He causes it to fall on whoever He wills of His servants, they rejoice

text_simple: وان كانوا من قبل ان ينزل عليهم من قبله لمبلسين
translation_en_yusufali: although they had utterly lost hope just before it was sent down to them.

text_simple: فانظر الى اثار رحمت الله كيف يحيي الارض بعد موتها ان ذلك لمحيي الموتى وهو على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: See then the impact of Allah’s mercy: how He gives life to the earth after its death! Surely That ˹same God˺ can raise the dead. For He is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: ولئن ارسلنا ريحا فراوه مصفرا لظلوا من بعده يكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: Then if We send a ˹harsh˺ wind which they see withering ˹their˺ crops, they will definitely deny ˹old favours˺ right after.

text_simple: فانك لا تسمع الموتى ولا تسمع الصم الدعاء اذا ولوا مدبرين
translation_en_yusufali: So you ˹O Prophet˺ certainly cannot make the dead hear ˹the truth˺. Nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs and walk away.

text_simple: وما انت بهاد العمي عن ضلالتهم ان تسمع الا من يؤمن باياتنا فهم مسلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Nor can you lead the blind out of their misguidance. You can make none hear ˹the truth˺ except those who believe in Our revelations, ˹fully˺ submitting ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: الله الذي خلقكم من ضعف ثم جعل من بعد ضعف قوة ثم جعل من بعد قوة ضعفا وشيبة يخلق ما يشاء وهو العليم القدير
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who created you in a state of weakness, then developed ˹your˺ weakness into strength, then developed ˹your˺ strength into weakness and old age. He creates whatever He wills. For He is the All-Knowing, Most Capable.

text_simple: ويوم تقوم الساعة يقسم المجرمون ما لبثوا غير ساعة كذلك كانوا يؤفكون
translation_en_yusufali: And on the Day the Hour will arrive, the wicked will swear that they did not stay ˹in this world˺ more than an hour. In this way they were always deluded ˹in the world˺.

text_simple: وقال الذين اوتوا العلم والايمان لقد لبثتم في كتاب الله الى يوم البعث فهذا يوم البعث ولكنكم كنتم لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: But those gifted with knowledge and faith will say ˹to them˺, “You did actually stay—as destined by Allah—until the Day of Resurrection. So here is the Day of Resurrection ˹which you denied˺! But you did not know ˹it was true˺.”

text_simple: فيومئذ لا ينفع الذين ظلموا معذرتهم ولا هم يستعتبون
translation_en_yusufali: So on that Day the wrongdoers’ excuses will not benefit them, nor will they be allowed to appease ˹their Lord˺.

text_simple: ولقد ضربنا للناس في هذا القران من كل مثل ولئن جئتهم باية ليقولن الذين كفروا ان انتم الا مبطلون
translation_en_yusufali: We have certainly set forth every ˹kind of˺ lesson for people in this Quran. And no matter what sign you bring to them ˹O Prophet˺, the disbelievers will definitely say ˹to the believers˺, “You are only a people of falsehood.”

text_simple: كذلك يطبع الله على قلوب الذين لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: This is how Allah seals the hearts of those unwilling to know ˹the truth˺.

text_simple: فاصبر ان وعد الله حق ولا يستخفنك الذين لا يوقنون
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient, for the promise of Allah certainly is true. And do not be disturbed by those who have no sure faith.

text_simple: الم
translation_en_yusufali: Alif-Lãm-Mĩm.

text_simple: تلك ايات الكتاب الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: These are the verses of the Book, rich in wisdom.

text_simple: هدى ورحمة للمحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ a guide and mercy for the good-doers—

text_simple: الذين يقيمون الصلاة ويؤتون الزكاة وهم بالاخرة هم يوقنون
translation_en_yusufali: those who establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and have sure faith in the Hereafter.

text_simple: اولئك على هدى من ربهم واولئك هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: It is they who are ˹truly˺ guided by their Lord, and it is they who will be successful.

text_simple: ومن الناس من يشتري لهو الحديث ليضل عن سبيل الله بغير علم ويتخذها هزوا اولئك لهم عذاب مهين
translation_en_yusufali: But there are some who employ theatrics, only to lead others away from Allah’s Way—without any knowledge—and to make a mockery of it. They will suffer a humiliating punishment.

text_simple: واذا تتلى عليه اياتنا ولى مستكبرا كان لم يسمعها كان في اذنيه وقرا فبشره بعذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they turn away in arrogance as if they did not hear them, as if there is deafness in their ears. So give them good news ˹O Prophet˺ of a painful punishment.

text_simple: ان الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم جنات النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who believe and do good will have the Gardens of Bliss

text_simple: خالدين فيها وعد الله حقا وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: staying there forever. Allah’s promise is true. And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: خلق السماوات بغير عمد ترونها والقى في الارض رواسي ان تميد بكم وبث فيها من كل دابة وانزلنا من السماء ماء فانبتنا فيها من كل زوج كريم
translation_en_yusufali: He created the heavens without pillars—as you can see—and placed firm mountains upon the earth so it does not shake with you, and scattered throughout it all types of creatures. And We send down rain from the sky, causing every type of fine plant to grow on earth.

text_simple: هذا خلق الله فاروني ماذا خلق الذين من دونه بل الظالمون في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: This is Allah’s creation. Now show Me what those ˹gods˺ other than Him have created. In fact, the wrongdoers are clearly astray.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا لقمان الحكمة ان اشكر لله ومن يشكر فانما يشكر لنفسه ومن كفر فان الله غني حميد
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We blessed Luqmân with wisdom, ˹saying˺, “Be grateful to Allah, for whoever is grateful, it is only for their own good. And whoever is ungrateful, then surely Allah is Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.”

text_simple: واذ قال لقمان لابنه وهو يعظه يا بني لا تشرك بالله ان الشرك لظلم عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember˺ when Luqmân said to his son, while advising him, “O my dear son! Never associate ˹anything˺ with Allah ˹in worship˺, for associating ˹others with Him˺ is truly the worst of all wrongs.”

text_simple: ووصينا الانسان بوالديه حملته امه وهنا على وهن وفصاله في عامين ان اشكر لي ولوالديك الي المصير
translation_en_yusufali: And We have commanded people to ˹honour˺ their parents. Their mothers bore them through hardship upon hardship, and their weaning takes two years. So be grateful to Me and your parents. To Me is the final return.

text_simple: وان جاهداك على ان تشرك بي ما ليس لك به علم فلا تطعهما وصاحبهما في الدنيا معروفا واتبع سبيل من اناب الي ثم الي مرجعكم فانبئكم بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: But if they pressure you to associate with Me what you have no knowledge of, do not obey them. Still keep their company in this world courteously, and follow the way of those who turn to Me ˹in devotion˺. Then to Me you will ˹all˺ return, and then I will inform you of what you used to do.

text_simple: يا بني انها ان تك مثقال حبة من خردل فتكن في صخرة او في السماوات او في الارض يات بها الله ان الله لطيف خبير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Luqmân  added,˺ “O my dear son! ˹Even˺ if a deed were the weight of a mustard seed—be it ˹hidden˺ in a rock or in the heavens or the earth—Allah will bring it forth. Surely Allah is Most Subtle, All-Aware.

text_simple: يا بني اقم الصلاة وامر بالمعروف وانه عن المنكر واصبر على ما اصابك ان ذلك من عزم الامور
translation_en_yusufali: “O my dear son! Establish prayer, encourage what is good and forbid what is evil, and endure patiently whatever befalls you. Surely this is a resolve to aspire to.

text_simple: ولا تصعر خدك للناس ولا تمش في الارض مرحا ان الله لا يحب كل مختال فخور
translation_en_yusufali: “And do not turn your nose up to people, nor walk pridefully upon the earth. Surely Allah does not like whoever is arrogant, boastful.

text_simple: واقصد في مشيك واغضض من صوتك ان انكر الاصوات لصوت الحمير
translation_en_yusufali: Be moderate in your pace. And lower your voice, for the ugliest of all voices is certainly the braying of donkeys.”

text_simple: الم تروا ان الله سخر لكم ما في السماوات وما في الارض واسبغ عليكم نعمه ظاهرة وباطنة ومن الناس من يجادل في الله بغير علم ولا هدى ولا كتاب منير
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen that Allah has subjected for you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth, and has lavished His favours upon you, both seen and unseen? ˹Still˺ there are some who dispute about Allah without knowledge, or guidance, or an enlightening scripture.

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم اتبعوا ما انزل الله قالوا بل نتبع ما وجدنا عليه اباءنا اولو كان الشيطان يدعوهم الى عذاب السعير
translation_en_yusufali: When it is said to them, “Follow what Allah has revealed,” they reply, “No! We ˹only˺ follow what we found our forefathers practicing.” ˹Would they still do so˺ even if Satan is inviting them to the torment of the Blaze?

text_simple: ومن يسلم وجهه الى الله وهو محسن فقد استمسك بالعروة الوثقى والى الله عاقبة الامور
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever fully submits themselves to Allah and is a good-doer, they have certainly grasped the firmest hand-hold. And with Allah rests the outcome of ˹all˺ affairs.

text_simple: ومن كفر فلا يحزنك كفره الينا مرجعهم فننبئهم بما عملوا ان الله عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: But whoever disbelieves, do not let their disbelief grieve you ˹O Prophet˺. To Us is their return, and We will inform them of all they did. Surely Allah knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: نمتعهم قليلا ثم نضطرهم الى عذاب غليظ
translation_en_yusufali: We allow them enjoyment for a little while, then ˹in time˺ We will force them into a harsh torment.

text_simple: ولئن سالتهم من خلق السماوات والارض ليقولن الله قل الحمد لله بل اكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: And if you ask them who created the heavens and the earth, they will definitely say, “Allah!” Say, “Praise be to Allah!” In fact, most of them do not know.

text_simple: لله ما في السماوات والارض ان الله هو الغني الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah belongs whatever is in the heavens and the earth. Allah is truly the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

text_simple: ولو انما في الارض من شجرة اقلام والبحر يمده من بعده سبعة ابحر ما نفدت كلمات الله ان الله عزيز حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: If all the trees on earth were pens and the ocean ˹were ink˺, refilled by seven other oceans, the Words of Allah would not be exhausted. Surely Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ما خلقكم ولا بعثكم الا كنفس واحدة ان الله سميع بصير
translation_en_yusufali: The creation and resurrection of you ˹all˺ is as simple ˹for Him˺ as that of a single soul. Surely Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

text_simple: الم تر ان الله يولج الليل في النهار ويولج النهار في الليل وسخر الشمس والقمر كل يجري الى اجل مسمى وان الله بما تعملون خبير
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that Allah causes the night to merge into the day and the day into the night, and has subjected the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term, and that Allah is All-Aware of what you do?

text_simple: ذلك بان الله هو الحق وان ما يدعون من دونه الباطل وان الله هو العلي الكبير
translation_en_yusufali: That is because Allah ˹alone˺ is the Truth and what they invoke besides Him is falsehood, and ˹because˺ Allah ˹alone˺ is the Most High, All-Great.

text_simple: الم تر ان الفلك تجري في البحر بنعمت الله ليريكم من اياته ان في ذلك لايات لكل صبار شكور
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that the ships sail ˹smoothly˺ through the sea by the grace of Allah so that He may show you some of His signs? Surely in this are signs for whoever is steadfast, grateful.

text_simple: واذا غشيهم موج كالظلل دعوا الله مخلصين له الدين فلما نجاهم الى البر فمنهم مقتصد وما يجحد باياتنا الا كل ختار كفور
translation_en_yusufali: And as soon as they are overwhelmed by waves like mountains, they cry out to Allah ˹alone˺ in sincere devotion. But when He delivers them ˹safely˺ to shore, only some become relatively grateful. And none rejects Our signs except whoever is deceitful, ungrateful.

text_simple: يا ايها الناس اتقوا ربكم واخشوا يوما لا يجزي والد عن ولده ولا مولود هو جاز عن والده شيئا ان وعد الله حق فلا تغرنكم الحياة الدنيا ولا يغرنكم بالله الغرور
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! Be mindful of your Lord, and beware of a Day when no parent will be of any benefit to their child, nor will a child be of any benefit to their parent. Surely Allah’s promise is true. So do not let the life of this world deceive you, nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.

text_simple: ان الله عنده علم الساعة وينزل الغيث ويعلم ما في الارحام وما تدري نفس ماذا تكسب غدا وما تدري نفس باي ارض تموت ان الله عليم خبير
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ has the knowledge of the Hour. He sends down the rain, and knows what is in the wombs. No soul knows what it will earn for tomorrow, and no soul knows in what land it will die. Surely Allah is All-Knowing, All-Aware.

text_simple: الم
translation_en_yusufali: Alif-Lãm-Mĩm.

text_simple: تنزيل الكتاب لا ريب فيه من رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: The revelation of this Book is—beyond doubt—from the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: ام يقولون افتراه بل هو الحق من ربك لتنذر قوما ما اتاهم من نذير من قبلك لعلهم يهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they say, “He has fabricated it!”? No! It is the truth from your Lord in order for you to warn a people to whom no warner has come before you, so they may be ˹rightly˺ guided.

text_simple: الله الذي خلق السماوات والارض وما بينهما في ستة ايام ثم استوى على العرش ما لكم من دونه من ولي ولا شفيع افلا تتذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who has created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, then established Himself on the Throne. You have no protector or intercessor besides Him. Will you not then be mindful?

text_simple: يدبر الامر من السماء الى الارض ثم يعرج اليه في يوم كان مقداره الف سنة مما تعدون
translation_en_yusufali: He conducts every affair from the heavens to the earth, then it all ascends to Him on a Day whose length is a thousand years by your counting.

text_simple: ذلك عالم الغيب والشهادة العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: That is the Knower of the seen and unseen—the Almighty, Most Merciful

text_simple: الذي احسن كل شيء خلقه وبدا خلق الانسان من طين
translation_en_yusufali: Who has perfected everything He created. And He originated the creation of humankind from clay.

text_simple: ثم جعل نسله من سلالة من ماء مهين
translation_en_yusufali: Then He made his descendants from an extract of a humble fluid

text_simple: ثم سواه ونفخ فيه من روحه وجعل لكم السمع والابصار والافئدة قليلا ما تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: then He fashioned them and had a spirit of His Own ˹creation˺ breathed into them. And He gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.

text_simple: وقالوا ااذا ضللنا في الارض اانا لفي خلق جديد بل هم بلقاء ربهم كافرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “When we are disintegrated into the earth, will we really be raised as a new creation?” In fact, they are in denial of the meeting with their Lord.

text_simple: قل يتوفاكم ملك الموت الذي وكل بكم ثم الى ربكم ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Your soul will be taken by the Angel of Death, who is in charge of you. Then to your Lord you will ˹all˺ be returned.”

text_simple: ولو ترى اذ المجرمون ناكسو رءوسهم عند ربهم ربنا ابصرنا وسمعنا فارجعنا نعمل صالحا انا موقنون
translation_en_yusufali: If only you could see the wicked hanging their heads ˹in shame˺ before their Lord, ˹crying:˺ “Our Lord! We have now seen and heard, so send us back and we will do good. We truly have sure faith ˹now˺!”

text_simple: ولو شئنا لاتينا كل نفس هداها ولكن حق القول مني لاملان جهنم من الجنة والناس اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: Had We willed, We could have easily imposed guidance on every soul. But My Word will come to pass: I will surely fill up Hell with jinn and humans all together.

text_simple: فذوقوا بما نسيتم لقاء يومكم هذا انا نسيناكم وذوقوا عذاب الخلد بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: So taste ˹the punishment˺ for neglecting the meeting of this Day of yours. We ˹too˺ will certainly neglect you. And taste the torment of eternity for what you used to do!

text_simple: انما يؤمن باياتنا الذين اذا ذكروا بها خروا سجدا وسبحوا بحمد ربهم وهم لا يستكبرون
translation_en_yusufali: The only ˹true˺ believers in Our revelation are those who—when it is recited to them—fall into prostration and glorify the praises of their Lord and are not too proud.

text_simple: تتجافى جنوبهم عن المضاجع يدعون ربهم خوفا وطمعا ومما رزقناهم ينفقون
translation_en_yusufali: They abandon their beds, invoking their Lord with hope and fear, and donate from what We have provided for them.

text_simple: فلا تعلم نفس ما اخفي لهم من قرة اعين جزاء بما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: No soul can imagine what delights are kept in store for them as a reward for what they used to do.

text_simple: افمن كان مؤمنا كمن كان فاسقا لا يستوون
translation_en_yusufali: Is the one who is a believer equal ˹before Allah˺ to the one who is rebellious? They are not equal!

text_simple: اما الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات فلهم جنات الماوى نزلا بما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who believe and do good, they will have the Gardens of ˹Eternal˺ Residence—as an accommodation for what they used to do.

text_simple: واما الذين فسقوا فماواهم النار كلما ارادوا ان يخرجوا منها اعيدوا فيها وقيل لهم ذوقوا عذاب النار الذي كنتم به تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: But as for those who are rebellious, the Fire will be their home. Whenever they try to escape from it, they will be forced back into it, and will be told, “Taste the Fire’s torment, which you used to deny.”

text_simple: ولنذيقنهم من العذاب الادنى دون العذاب الاكبر لعلهم يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: We will certainly make them taste some of the minor torment ˹in this life˺ before the major torment ˹of the Hereafter˺, so perhaps they will return ˹to the Right Path˺.

text_simple: ومن اظلم ممن ذكر بايات ربه ثم اعرض عنها انا من المجرمين منتقمون
translation_en_yusufali: And who does more wrong than the one who is reminded of Allah’s revelations then turns away from them? We will surely inflict punishment upon the wicked.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا موسى الكتاب فلا تكن في مرية من لقائه وجعلناه هدى لبني اسرائيل
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We gave the Scripture to Moses—so let there be no doubt ˹O Prophet˺ that you ˹too˺ are receiving revelations—and We made it a guide for the Children of Israel.

text_simple: وجعلنا منهم ائمة يهدون بامرنا لما صبروا وكانوا باياتنا يوقنون
translation_en_yusufali: We raised from among them leaders, guiding by Our command, when they patiently endured and firmly believed in Our signs.

text_simple: ان ربك هو يفصل بينهم يوم القيامة فيما كانوا فيه يختلفون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, your Lord will decide between them on the Day of Judgment regarding their differences.

text_simple: اولم يهد لهم كم اهلكنا من قبلهم من القرون يمشون في مساكنهم ان في ذلك لايات افلا يسمعون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it not yet clear to them how many peoples We destroyed before them, whose ruins they still pass by? Surely in this are signs. Will they not then listen?

text_simple: اولم يروا انا نسوق الماء الى الارض الجرز فنخرج به زرعا تاكل منه انعامهم وانفسهم افلا يبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not see how We drive rain to parched land, producing ˹various˺ crops from which they and their cattle eat? Will they not then see?

text_simple: ويقولون متى هذا الفتح ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: They ask ˹mockingly˺, “When is this ˹Day of final˺ Decision, if what you say is true?”

text_simple: قل يوم الفتح لا ينفع الذين كفروا ايمانهم ولا هم ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “On the Day of Decision it will not benefit the disbelievers to believe then, nor will they be delayed ˹from punishment˺.”

text_simple: فاعرض عنهم وانتظر انهم منتظرون
translation_en_yusufali: So turn away from them, and wait! They too are waiting.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي اتق الله ولا تطع الكافرين والمنافقين ان الله كان عليما حكيما
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! ˹Always˺ be mindful of Allah, and do not yield to the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: واتبع ما يوحى اليك من ربك ان الله كان بما تعملون خبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Follow what is revealed to you from your Lord. Surely Allah is All-Aware of what you ˹all˺ do.

text_simple: وتوكل على الله وكفى بالله وكيلا
translation_en_yusufali: And put your trust in Allah, for Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

text_simple: ما جعل الله لرجل من قلبين في جوفه وما جعل ازواجكم اللائي تظاهرون منهن امهاتكم وما جعل ادعياءكم ابناءكم ذلكم قولكم بافواهكم والله يقول الحق وهو يهدي السبيل
translation_en_yusufali: Allah does not place two hearts in any person’s chest. Nor does He regard your wives as ˹unlawful for you like˺ your real mothers, ˹even˺ if you say they are. Nor does He regard your adopted children as your real children. These are only your baseless assertions. But Allah declares the truth, and He ˹alone˺ guides to the ˹Right˺ Way.

text_simple: ادعوهم لابائهم هو اقسط عند الله فان لم تعلموا اباءهم فاخوانكم في الدين ومواليكم وليس عليكم جناح فيما اخطاتم به ولكن ما تعمدت قلوبكم وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: Let your adopted children keep their family names. That is more just in the sight of Allah. But if you do not know their fathers, then they are ˹simply˺ your fellow believers and close associates. There is no blame on you for what you do by mistake, but ˹only˺ for what you do intentionally. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: النبي اولى بالمؤمنين من انفسهم وازواجه امهاتهم واولو الارحام بعضهم اولى ببعض في كتاب الله من المؤمنين والمهاجرين الا ان تفعلوا الى اوليائكم معروفا كان ذلك في الكتاب مسطورا
translation_en_yusufali: The Prophet has a stronger affinity to the believers than they do themselves. And his wives are their mothers. As ordained by Allah, blood relatives are more entitled ˹to inheritance˺ than ˹other˺ believers and immigrants, unless you ˹want to˺ show kindness to your ˹close˺ associates ˹through bequest˺. This is decreed in the Record.

text_simple: واذ اخذنا من النبيين ميثاقهم ومنك ومن نوح وابراهيم وموسى وعيسى ابن مريم واخذنا منهم ميثاقا غليظا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember˺ when We took a covenant from the prophets, as well as from you ˹O Prophet˺, and from Noah, Abraham, Moses, and Jesus, son of Mary. We did take a solemn covenant from ˹all of˺ them

text_simple: ليسال الصادقين عن صدقهم واعد للكافرين عذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: so that He may question these men of truth about their ˹delivery of the˺ truth. And He has prepared a painful punishment for the disbelievers.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذكروا نعمة الله عليكم اذ جاءتكم جنود فارسلنا عليهم ريحا وجنودا لم تروها وكان الله بما تعملون بصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Remember Allah’s favour upon you when ˹enemy˺ forces came to ˹besiege˺ you ˹in Medina˺, so We sent against them a ˹bitter˺ wind and forces you could not see. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

text_simple: اذ جاءوكم من فوقكم ومن اسفل منكم واذ زاغت الابصار وبلغت القلوب الحناجر وتظنون بالله الظنونا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when they came at you from east and west, when your eyes grew wild ˹in horror˺ and your hearts jumped into your throats, and you entertained ˹conflicting˺ thoughts about Allah.

text_simple: هنالك ابتلي المؤمنون وزلزلوا زلزالا شديدا
translation_en_yusufali: Then and there the believers were put to the test, and were violently shaken.

text_simple: واذ يقول المنافقون والذين في قلوبهم مرض ما وعدنا الله ورسوله الا غرورا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember˺ when the hypocrites and those with sickness in their hearts said, “Allah and His Messenger have promised us nothing but delusion!”

text_simple: واذ قالت طائفة منهم يا اهل يثرب لا مقام لكم فارجعوا ويستاذن فريق منهم النبي يقولون ان بيوتنا عورة وما هي بعورة ان يريدون الا فرارا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember˺ when a group of them said, “O people of Yathrib! There is no point in you staying ˹here˺, so retreat!” Another group of them asked the Prophet’s permission ˹to leave˺, saying, “Our homes are vulnerable,” while ˹in fact˺ they were not vulnerable. They only wished to flee.

text_simple: ولو دخلت عليهم من اقطارها ثم سئلوا الفتنة لاتوها وما تلبثوا بها الا يسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Had their city been sacked from all sides and they had been asked to abandon faith, they would have done so with little hesitation.

text_simple: ولقد كانوا عاهدوا الله من قبل لا يولون الادبار وكان عهد الله مسئولا
translation_en_yusufali: They had already pledged to Allah earlier never to turn their backs ˹in retreat˺. And a pledge to Allah must be answered for.

text_simple: قل لن ينفعكم الفرار ان فررتم من الموت او القتل واذا لا تمتعون الا قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Fleeing will not benefit you if you ˹try to˺ escape a natural or violent death. ˹If it is not your time,˺ you will only be allowed enjoyment for a little while.”

text_simple: قل من ذا الذي يعصمكم من الله ان اراد بكم سوءا او اراد بكم رحمة ولا يجدون لهم من دون الله وليا ولا نصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Who can put you out of Allah’s reach if He intends to harm you or show you mercy?” They can never find any protector or helper besides Allah.

text_simple: قد يعلم الله المعوقين منكم والقائلين لاخوانهم هلم الينا ولا ياتون الباس الا قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: Allah knows well those among you who discourage ˹others from fighting˺, saying ˹secretly˺ to their brothers, “Stay with us,” and who themselves hardly take part in fighting.

text_simple: اشحة عليكم فاذا جاء الخوف رايتهم ينظرون اليك تدور اعينهم كالذي يغشى عليه من الموت فاذا ذهب الخوف سلقوكم بالسنة حداد اشحة على الخير اولئك لم يؤمنوا فاحبط الله اعمالهم وكان ذلك على الله يسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ totally unwilling to assist you. When danger comes, you see them staring at you with their eyes rolling like someone in the throes of death. But once the danger is over, they slash you with razor-sharp tongues, ravenous for ˹worldly˺ gains. Such people have not ˹truly˺ believed, so Allah has rendered their deeds void. And that is easy for Allah.

text_simple: يحسبون الاحزاب لم يذهبوا وان يات الاحزاب يودوا لو انهم بادون في الاعراب يسالون عن انبائكم ولو كانوا فيكم ما قاتلوا الا قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: They ˹still˺ think that the enemy alliance has not ˹yet˺ withdrawn. And if the allies were to come ˹again˺, the hypocrites would wish to be away in the desert among nomadic Arabs, ˹only˺ asking for news about you ˹believers˺. And if the hypocrites were in your midst, they would hardly take part in the fight.

text_simple: لقد كان لكم في رسول الله اسوة حسنة لمن كان يرجو الله واليوم الاخر وذكر الله كثيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, in the Messenger of Allah you have an excellent example for whoever has hope in Allah and the Last Day, and remembers Allah often.

text_simple: ولما راى المؤمنون الاحزاب قالوا هذا ما وعدنا الله ورسوله وصدق الله ورسوله وما زادهم الا ايمانا وتسليما
translation_en_yusufali: When the believers saw the enemy alliance, they said, “This is what Allah and His Messenger had promised us. The promise of Allah and His Messenger has come true.” And this only increased them in faith and submission.

text_simple: من المؤمنين رجال صدقوا ما عاهدوا الله عليه فمنهم من قضى نحبه ومنهم من ينتظر وما بدلوا تبديلا
translation_en_yusufali: Among the believers are men who have proven true to what they pledged to Allah. Some of them have fulfilled their pledge ˹with their lives˺, others are waiting ˹their turn˺. They have never changed ˹their commitment˺ in the least.

text_simple: ليجزي الله الصادقين بصدقهم ويعذب المنافقين ان شاء او يتوب عليهم ان الله كان غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It all happened˺ so Allah may reward the faithful for their faithfulness, and punish the hypocrites if He wills or turn to them ˹in mercy˺. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ورد الله الذين كفروا بغيظهم لم ينالوا خيرا وكفى الله المؤمنين القتال وكان الله قويا عزيزا
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah drove back the disbelievers in their rage, totally empty-handed. And Allah spared the believers from fighting. For Allah is All-Powerful, Almighty.

text_simple: وانزل الذين ظاهروهم من اهل الكتاب من صياصيهم وقذف في قلوبهم الرعب فريقا تقتلون وتاسرون فريقا
translation_en_yusufali: And He brought down those from the People of the Book who supported the enemy alliance from their own strongholds, and cast horror into their hearts. You ˹believers˺ killed some, and took others captive.

text_simple: واورثكم ارضهم وديارهم واموالهم وارضا لم تطئوها وكان الله على كل شيء قديرا
translation_en_yusufali: He has also caused you to take over their lands, homes, and wealth, as well as lands you have not yet set foot on. And Allah is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي قل لازواجك ان كنتن تردن الحياة الدنيا وزينتها فتعالين امتعكن واسرحكن سراحا جميلا
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! Say to your wives, “If you desire the life of this world and its luxury, then come, I will give you a ˹suitable˺ compensation ˹for divorce˺ and let you go graciously.

text_simple: وان كنتن تردن الله ورسوله والدار الاخرة فان الله اعد للمحسنات منكن اجرا عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: But if you desire Allah and His Messenger and the ˹everlasting˺ Home of the Hereafter, then Surely Allah has prepared a great reward for those of you who do good.”

text_simple: يا نساء النبي من يات منكن بفاحشة مبينة يضاعف لها العذاب ضعفين وكان ذلك على الله يسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: O wives of the Prophet! If any of you were to commit a blatant misconduct, the punishment would be doubled for her. And that is easy for Allah.

text_simple: ومن يقنت منكن لله ورسوله وتعمل صالحا نؤتها اجرها مرتين واعتدنا لها رزقا كريما
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever of you devoutly obeys Allah and His Messenger and does good, We will grant her double the reward, and We have prepared for her an honourable provision.

text_simple: يا نساء النبي لستن كاحد من النساء ان اتقيتن فلا تخضعن بالقول فيطمع الذي في قلبه مرض وقلن قولا معروفا
translation_en_yusufali: O wives of the Prophet! You are not like any other women: if you are mindful ˹of Allah˺, then do not be overly effeminate in speech ˹with men˺ or those with sickness in their hearts may be tempted, but speak in a moderate tone.

text_simple: وقرن في بيوتكن ولا تبرجن تبرج الجاهلية الاولى واقمن الصلاة واتين الزكاة واطعن الله ورسوله انما يريد الله ليذهب عنكم الرجس اهل البيت ويطهركم تطهيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Settle in your homes, and do not display yourselves as women did in the days of ˹pre-Islamic˺ ignorance. Establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and obey Allah and His Messenger. Allah only intends to keep ˹the causes of˺ evil away from you and purify you completely, O  members of the ˹Prophet’s˺ family!

text_simple: واذكرن ما يتلى في بيوتكن من ايات الله والحكمة ان الله كان لطيفا خبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Always˺ remember what is recited in your homes of Allah’s revelations and ˹prophetic˺ wisdom. Surely Allah is Most Subtle, All-Aware.

text_simple: ان المسلمين والمسلمات والمؤمنين والمؤمنات والقانتين والقانتات والصادقين والصادقات والصابرين والصابرات والخاشعين والخاشعات والمتصدقين والمتصدقات والصائمين والصائمات والحافظين فروجهم والحافظات والذاكرين الله كثيرا والذاكرات اعد الله لهم مغفرة واجرا عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: Surely ˹for˺ Muslim men and women, believing men and women, devout men and women, truthful men and women, patient men and women, humble men and women, charitable men and women, fasting men and women, men and women who guard their chastity, and men and women who remember Allah often—for ˹all of˺ them Allah has prepared forgiveness and a great reward.

text_simple: وما كان لمؤمن ولا مؤمنة اذا قضى الله ورسوله امرا ان يكون لهم الخيرة من امرهم ومن يعص الله ورسوله فقد ضل ضلالا مبينا
translation_en_yusufali: It is not for a believing man or woman—when Allah and His Messenger decree a matter—to have any other choice in that matter. Indeed, whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger has clearly gone ˹far˺ astray.

text_simple: واذ تقول للذي انعم الله عليه وانعمت عليه امسك عليك زوجك واتق الله وتخفي في نفسك ما الله مبديه وتخشى الناس والله احق ان تخشاه فلما قضى زيد منها وطرا زوجناكها لكي لا يكون على المؤمنين حرج في ازواج ادعيائهم اذا قضوا منهن وطرا وكان امر الله مفعولا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember, O  Prophet,˺ when you said to the one for whom Allah has done a favour and you ˹too˺ have done a favour, “Keep your wife and fear Allah,” while concealing within yourself what Allah was going to reveal. And ˹so˺ you were considering the people, whereas Allah was more worthy of your consideration. So when Zaid totally lost interest in ˹keeping˺ his wife, We gave her to you in marriage, so that there would be no blame on the believers for marrying the ex-wives of their adopted sons after their divorce. And Allah’s command is totally binding.

text_simple: ما كان على النبي من حرج فيما فرض الله له سنة الله في الذين خلوا من قبل وكان امر الله قدرا مقدورا
translation_en_yusufali: There is no blame on the Prophet for doing what Allah has ordained for him. That has been the way of Allah with those ˹prophets˺ who had gone before. And Allah’s command has been firmly decreed.

text_simple: الذين يبلغون رسالات الله ويخشونه ولا يخشون احدا الا الله وكفى بالله حسيبا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹That is His way with˺ those ˹prophets˺ who deliver the messages of Allah, and consider Him, and none but Allah. And sufficient is Allah as a ˹vigilant˺ Reckoner.

text_simple: ما كان محمد ابا احد من رجالكم ولكن رسول الله وخاتم النبيين وكان الله بكل شيء عليما
translation_en_yusufali: Muḥammad is not the father of any of your men, but is the Messenger of Allah and the seal of the prophets. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذكروا الله ذكرا كثيرا
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Always remember Allah often

text_simple: وسبحوه بكرة واصيلا
translation_en_yusufali: and glorify Him morning and evening.

text_simple: هو الذي يصلي عليكم وملائكته ليخرجكم من الظلمات الى النور وكان بالمؤمنين رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who showers His blessings upon you—and His angels pray for you—so that He may bring you out of darkness and into light. For He is ever Merciful to the believers.

text_simple: تحيتهم يوم يلقونه سلام واعد لهم اجرا كريما
translation_en_yusufali: Their greeting on the Day they meet Him will be, “Peace!” And He has prepared for them an honourable reward.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي انا ارسلناك شاهدا ومبشرا ونذيرا
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! We have sent you as a witness, and a deliverer of good news, and a warner

text_simple: وداعيا الى الله باذنه وسراجا منيرا
translation_en_yusufali: and a caller to ˹the Way of˺ Allah by His command, and a beacon of light.

text_simple: وبشر المؤمنين بان لهم من الله فضلا كبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Give good news to the believers that they will have a great bounty from Allah.

text_simple: ولا تطع الكافرين والمنافقين ودع اذاهم وتوكل على الله وكفى بالله وكيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Do not yield to the disbelievers and the hypocrites. Overlook their annoyances, and put your trust in Allah. For Allah is sufficient as a Trustee of Affairs.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذا نكحتم المؤمنات ثم طلقتموهن من قبل ان تمسوهن فما لكم عليهن من عدة تعتدونها فمتعوهن وسرحوهن سراحا جميلا
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! If you marry believing women and then divorce them before you touch them, they will have no waiting period for you to count, so give them a ˹suitable˺ compensation, and let them go graciously.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي انا احللنا لك ازواجك اللاتي اتيت اجورهن وما ملكت يمينك مما افاء الله عليك وبنات عمك وبنات عماتك وبنات خالك وبنات خالاتك اللاتي هاجرن معك وامراة مؤمنة ان وهبت نفسها للنبي ان اراد النبي ان يستنكحها خالصة لك من دون المؤمنين قد علمنا ما فرضنا عليهم في ازواجهم وما ملكت ايمانهم لكيلا يكون عليك حرج وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! We have made lawful for you your wives to whom you have paid their ˹full˺ dowries as well as those ˹bondwomen˺ in your possession, whom Allah has granted you. And ˹you are allowed to marry˺ the daughters of your paternal uncles and aunts, and the daughters of your maternal uncles and aunts, who have emigrated like you. Also ˹allowed for marriage is˺ a believing woman who offers herself to the Prophet ˹without dowry˺ if he is interested in marrying her—˹this is˺ exclusively for you, not for the rest of the believers. We know well what ˹rulings˺ We have ordained for the believers in relation to their wives and those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession. As such, there would be no blame on you. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ترجي من تشاء منهن وتؤوي اليك من تشاء ومن ابتغيت ممن عزلت فلا جناح عليك ذلك ادنى ان تقر اعينهن ولا يحزن ويرضين بما اتيتهن كلهن والله يعلم ما في قلوبكم وكان الله عليما حليما
translation_en_yusufali: It is up to you ˹O Prophet˺ to delay or receive whoever you please of your wives. There is no blame on you if you call back any of those you have set aside. That is more likely that they will be content, not grieved, and satisfied with what you offer them all. Allah ˹fully˺ knows what is in your hearts. And Allah is All-Knowing, Most Forbearing.

text_simple: لا يحل لك النساء من بعد ولا ان تبدل بهن من ازواج ولو اعجبك حسنهن الا ما ملكت يمينك وكان الله على كل شيء رقيبا
translation_en_yusufali: It is not lawful for you ˹O Prophet˺ to marry more women after this, nor can you replace any of your present wives with another, even if her beauty may attract you—except those ˹bondwomen˺ in your possession. And Allah is ever Watchful over all things.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تدخلوا بيوت النبي الا ان يؤذن لكم الى طعام غير ناظرين اناه ولكن اذا دعيتم فادخلوا فاذا طعمتم فانتشروا ولا مستانسين لحديث ان ذلكم كان يؤذي النبي فيستحيي منكم والله لا يستحيي من الحق واذا سالتموهن متاعا فاسالوهن من وراء حجاب ذلكم اطهر لقلوبكم وقلوبهن وما كان لكم ان تؤذوا رسول الله ولا ان تنكحوا ازواجه من بعده ابدا ان ذلكم كان عند الله عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not enter the homes of the Prophet without permission ˹and if invited˺ for a meal, do not ˹come too early and˺ linger until the meal is ready. But if you are invited, then enter ˹on time˺. Once you have eaten, then go on your way, and do not stay for casual talk. Such behaviour is truly annoying to the Prophet, yet he is too shy to ask you to leave. But Allah is never shy of the truth. And when you ˹believers˺ ask his wives for something, ask them from behind a barrier. This is purer for your hearts and theirs. And it is not right for you to annoy the Messenger of Allah, nor ever marry his wives after him. This would certainly be a major offence in the sight of Allah.

text_simple: ان تبدوا شيئا او تخفوه فان الله كان بكل شيء عليما
translation_en_yusufali: Whether you reveal something or conceal it, surely Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: لا جناح عليهن في ابائهن ولا ابنائهن ولا اخوانهن ولا ابناء اخوانهن ولا ابناء اخواتهن ولا نسائهن ولا ما ملكت ايمانهن واتقين الله ان الله كان على كل شيء شهيدا
translation_en_yusufali: There is no blame on the Prophet’s wives ˹if they appear unveiled˺ before their fathers, their sons, their brothers, their brothers’ sons, their sisters’ sons, their fellow ˹Muslim˺ women, and those ˹bondspeople˺ in their possession. And be mindful of Allah ˹O wives of the Prophet!˺ Surely Allah is a Witness over all things.

text_simple: ان الله وملائكته يصلون على النبي يا ايها الذين امنوا صلوا عليه وسلموا تسليما
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah showers His blessings upon the Prophet, and His angels pray for him. O  believers! Invoke Allah’s blessings upon him, and salute him with worthy greetings of peace.

text_simple: ان الذين يؤذون الله ورسوله لعنهم الله في الدنيا والاخرة واعد لهم عذابا مهينا
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who offend Allah and His Messenger are condemned by Allah in this world and the Hereafter. And He has prepared for them a humiliating punishment.

text_simple: والذين يؤذون المؤمنين والمؤمنات بغير ما اكتسبوا فقد احتملوا بهتانا واثما مبينا
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who abuse believing men and women unjustifiably, they will definitely bear the guilt of slander and blatant sin.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي قل لازواجك وبناتك ونساء المؤمنين يدنين عليهن من جلابيبهن ذلك ادنى ان يعرفن فلا يؤذين وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! Ask your wives, daughters, and believing women to draw their cloaks over their bodies. In this way it is more likely that they will be recognized ˹as virtuous˺ and not be harassed. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: لئن لم ينته المنافقون والذين في قلوبهم مرض والمرجفون في المدينة لنغرينك بهم ثم لا يجاورونك فيها الا قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: If the hypocrites, and those with sickness in their hearts, and rumour-mongers in Medina do not desist, We will certainly incite you ˹O Prophet˺ against them, and then they will not be your neighbours there any longer.

text_simple: ملعونين اينما ثقفوا اخذوا وقتلوا تقتيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They deserve to be˺ condemned. ˹If they were to persist,˺ they would get themselves seized and killed relentlessly wherever they are found!

text_simple: سنة الله في الذين خلوا من قبل ولن تجد لسنة الله تبديلا
translation_en_yusufali: That was Allah’s way with those ˹hypocrites˺ who have gone before. And you will find no change in Allah’s way.

text_simple: يسالك الناس عن الساعة قل انما علمها عند الله وما يدريك لعل الساعة تكون قريبا
translation_en_yusufali: People ask you ˹O Prophet˺ about the Hour. Say, “That knowledge is only with Allah. You never know, perhaps the Hour is near.”

text_simple: ان الله لعن الكافرين واعد لهم سعيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Allah condemns the disbelievers, and has prepared for them a blazing Fire

text_simple: خالدين فيها ابدا لا يجدون وليا ولا نصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: to stay there for ever and ever—never will they find any protector or helper.

text_simple: يوم تقلب وجوههم في النار يقولون يا ليتنا اطعنا الله واطعنا الرسولا
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day their faces are ˹constantly˺ flipped in the Fire, they will cry, “Oh! If only we had obeyed Allah and obeyed the Messenger!”

text_simple: وقالوا ربنا انا اطعنا سادتنا وكبراءنا فاضلونا السبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: And they will say, “Our Lord! We obeyed our leaders and elite, but they led us astray from the ˹Right˺ Way.

text_simple: ربنا اتهم ضعفين من العذاب والعنهم لعنا كبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! Give them double ˹our˺ punishment, and condemn them tremendously.”

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تكونوا كالذين اذوا موسى فبراه الله مما قالوا وكان عند الله وجيها
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not be like those who slandered Moses, but Allah cleared him of what they said. And he was honourable in the sight of Allah.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اتقوا الله وقولوا قولا سديدا
translation_en_yusufali: O  believers! Be mindful of Allah, and say what is right.

text_simple: يصلح لكم اعمالكم ويغفر لكم ذنوبكم ومن يطع الله ورسوله فقد فاز فوزا عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: He will bless your deeds for you, and forgive your sins. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger, has truly achieved a great triumph.

text_simple: انا عرضنا الامانة على السماوات والارض والجبال فابين ان يحملنها واشفقن منها وحملها الانسان انه كان ظلوما جهولا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We offered the trust to the heavens and the earth and the mountains, but they ˹all˺ declined to bear it, being fearful of it. But humanity assumed it, ˹for˺ they are truly wrongful ˹to themselves˺ and ignorant ˹of the consequences˺

text_simple: ليعذب الله المنافقين والمنافقات والمشركين والمشركات ويتوب الله على المؤمنين والمؤمنات وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: so that Allah will punish hypocrite men and women and polytheistic men and women, and Allah will turn in mercy to believing men and women. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: الحمد لله الذي له ما في السماوات وما في الارض وله الحمد في الاخرة وهو الحكيم الخبير
translation_en_yusufali: All praise is for Allah, to Whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And praise be to Him in the Hereafter. He is the All-Wise, All-Aware.

text_simple: يعلم ما يلج في الارض وما يخرج منها وما ينزل من السماء وما يعرج فيها وهو الرحيم الغفور
translation_en_yusufali: He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it, and whatever descends from the sky and whatever ascends into it. And He is the Most Merciful, All-Forgiving.

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا لا تاتينا الساعة قل بلى وربي لتاتينكم عالم الغيب لا يعزب عنه مثقال ذرة في السماوات ولا في الارض ولا اصغر من ذلك ولا اكبر الا في كتاب مبين
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say, “The Hour will never come to us.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Yes—by my Lord, the Knower of the unseen—it will certainly come to you!” Not ˹even˺ an atom’s weight is hidden from Him in the heavens or the earth; nor anything smaller or larger than that, but is ˹written˺ in a perfect Record.

text_simple: ليجزي الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات اولئك لهم مغفرة ورزق كريم
translation_en_yusufali: So He may reward those who believe and do good. It is they who will have forgiveness and an honourable provision.

text_simple: والذين سعوا في اياتنا معاجزين اولئك لهم عذاب من رجز اليم
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who strive to discredit Our revelations, it is they who will suffer the ˹worst˺ torment of agonizing pain.

text_simple: ويرى الذين اوتوا العلم الذي انزل اليك من ربك هو الحق ويهدي الى صراط العزيز الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: Those gifted with knowledge ˹clearly˺ see that what has been revealed to you from your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ is the truth, and that it guides to the Path of the Almighty, the Praiseworthy.

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا هل ندلكم على رجل ينبئكم اذا مزقتم كل ممزق انكم لفي خلق جديد
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say ˹mockingly to one another˺, “Shall we show you a man who claims that when you have been utterly disintegrated you will be raised as a new creation?

text_simple: افترى على الله كذبا ام به جنة بل الذين لا يؤمنون بالاخرة في العذاب والضلال البعيد
translation_en_yusufali: Has he fabricated a lie against Allah or is he insane?” In fact, those who do not believe in the Hereafter are bound for torment and have strayed farthest ˹from the truth˺.

text_simple: افلم يروا الى ما بين ايديهم وما خلفهم من السماء والارض ان نشا نخسف بهم الارض او نسقط عليهم كسفا من السماء ان في ذلك لاية لكل عبد منيب
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not then seen all that surrounds them of the heavens and the earth? If We willed, We could cause the earth to swallow them up, or cause ˹deadly˺ pieces of the sky to fall upon them. Surely in this is a sign for every servant who turns ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا داوود منا فضلا يا جبال اوبي معه والطير والنا له الحديد
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We granted David a ˹great˺ privilege from Us, ˹commanding:˺ “O mountains! Echo his hymns! And the birds as well.” We made iron mouldable for him

text_simple: ان اعمل سابغات وقدر في السرد واعملوا صالحا اني بما تعملون بصير
translation_en_yusufali: instructing: “Make full-length armour, ˹perfectly˺ balancing the links. And work righteousness ˹O family of David!˺. Indeed, I am All-Seeing of what you do.”

text_simple: ولسليمان الريح غدوها شهر ورواحها شهر واسلنا له عين القطر ومن الجن من يعمل بين يديه باذن ربه ومن يزغ منهم عن امرنا نذقه من عذاب السعير
translation_en_yusufali: And to Solomon ˹We subjected˺ the wind: its morning stride was a month’s journey and so was its evening stride. And We caused a stream of molten copper to flow for him, and ˹We subjected˺ some of the jinn to work under him by his Lord’s Will. And whoever of them deviated from Our command, We made them taste the torment of the blaze.

text_simple: يعملون له ما يشاء من محاريب وتماثيل وجفان كالجواب وقدور راسيات اعملوا ال داوود شكرا وقليل من عبادي الشكور
translation_en_yusufali: They made for him whatever he desired of sanctuaries, statues, basins as large as reservoirs, and cooking pots fixed ˹into the ground˺. ˹We ordered:˺ “Work gratefully, O  family of David!” ˹Only˺ a few of My servants are ˹truly˺ grateful.

text_simple: فلما قضينا عليه الموت ما دلهم على موته الا دابة الارض تاكل منساته فلما خر تبينت الجن ان لو كانوا يعلمون الغيب ما لبثوا في العذاب المهين
translation_en_yusufali: When We decreed Solomon’s death, nothing indicated to the ˹subjected˺ jinn that he was dead except the termites eating away his staff. So when he collapsed, the jinn realized that if they had ˹really˺ known the unseen, they would not have remained in ˹such˺ humiliating servitude.

text_simple: لقد كان لسبا في مسكنهم اية جنتان عن يمين وشمال كلوا من رزق ربكم واشكروا له بلدة طيبة ورب غفور
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, there was a sign for ˹the tribe of˺ Sheba in their homeland: two orchards—one to the right and the other to the left. ˹They were told:˺ “Eat from the provision of your Lord, and be grateful to Him. ˹Yours is˺ a good land and a forgiving Lord.”

text_simple: فاعرضوا فارسلنا عليهم سيل العرم وبدلناهم بجنتيهم جنتين ذواتي اكل خمط واثل وشيء من سدر قليل
translation_en_yusufali: But they turned away. So We sent against them a devastating flood, and replaced their orchards with two others producing bitter fruit, fruitless bushes, and a few ˹sparse˺ thorny trees.

text_simple: ذلك جزيناهم بما كفروا وهل نجازي الا الكفور
translation_en_yusufali: This is how We rewarded them for their ingratitude. Would We ever punish ˹anyone in such a way˺ except the ungrateful?

text_simple: وجعلنا بينهم وبين القرى التي باركنا فيها قرى ظاهرة وقدرنا فيها السير سيروا فيها ليالي واياما امنين
translation_en_yusufali: We had also placed between them and the cities We showered with blessings ˹many small˺ towns within sight of one another. And We set moderate travel distances in between, ˹saying,˺ “Travel between them by day and night safely.”

text_simple: فقالوا ربنا باعد بين اسفارنا وظلموا انفسهم فجعلناهم احاديث ومزقناهم كل ممزق ان في ذلك لايات لكل صبار شكور
translation_en_yusufali: But they said, “Our Lord! Make ˹the distances of˺ our journeys longer,” wronging themselves. So We reduced them to ˹cautionary˺ tales, and scattered them utterly. Surely in this are lessons for whoever is steadfast, grateful.

text_simple: ولقد صدق عليهم ابليس ظنه فاتبعوه الا فريقا من المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Iblîs’ assumption about them has come true, so they ˹all˺ follow him, except a group of ˹true˺ believers.

text_simple: وما كان له عليهم من سلطان الا لنعلم من يؤمن بالاخرة ممن هو منها في شك وربك على كل شيء حفيظ
translation_en_yusufali: He does not have any authority over them, but ˹Our Will is˺ only to distinguish those who believe in the Hereafter from those who are in doubt about it. And your Lord is a ˹vigilant˺ Keeper over all things.”

text_simple: قل ادعوا الذين زعمتم من دون الله لا يملكون مثقال ذرة في السماوات ولا في الارض وما لهم فيهما من شرك وما له منهم من ظهير
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Call upon those you claim ˹to be divine˺ besides Allah. They do not possess ˹even˺ an atom’s weight either in the heavens or the earth, nor do they have any share in ˹governing˺ them. Nor is any of them a helper to Him.”

text_simple: ولا تنفع الشفاعة عنده الا لمن اذن له حتى اذا فزع عن قلوبهم قالوا ماذا قال ربكم قالوا الحق وهو العلي الكبير
translation_en_yusufali: No intercession will be of any benefit with Him, except by those granted permission by Him. ˹At last,˺ when the dread ˹of Judgment Day˺ is relieved from their hearts ˹because they are permitted to intercede˺, they will ˹excitedly˺ ask ˹the angels˺, “What has your Lord ˹just˺ said?” The angels will reply, “The truth! And He is the Most High, All-Great.”

text_simple: قل من يرزقكم من السماوات والارض قل الله وانا او اياكم لعلى هدى او في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?” Say, “Allah! Now, certainly one of our two groups is ˹rightly˺ guided; the other is clearly astray.”

text_simple: قل لا تسالون عما اجرمنا ولا نسال عما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “You will not be accountable for our misdeeds, nor will we be accountable for your deeds.”

text_simple: قل يجمع بيننا ربنا ثم يفتح بيننا بالحق وهو الفتاح العليم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Our Lord will gather us together, then He will judge between us with the truth. For He is the All-Knowing Judge.”

text_simple: قل اروني الذين الحقتم به شركاء كلا بل هو الله العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Show me those ˹idols˺ you have joined with Him as partners. No! In fact, He ˹alone˺ is Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.”

text_simple: وما ارسلناك الا كافة للناس بشيرا ونذيرا ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: We have sent you ˹O Prophet˺ only as a deliverer of good news and a warner to all of humanity, but most people do not know.

text_simple: ويقولون متى هذا الوعد ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: And they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

text_simple: قل لكم ميعاد يوم لا تستاخرون عنه ساعة ولا تستقدمون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “A Day has ˹already˺ been appointed for you, which you can neither delay nor advance by a ˹single˺ moment.”

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا لن نؤمن بهذا القران ولا بالذي بين يديه ولو ترى اذ الظالمون موقوفون عند ربهم يرجع بعضهم الى بعض القول يقول الذين استضعفوا للذين استكبروا لولا انتم لكنا مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers vow, “We will never believe in this Quran, nor in those ˹Scriptures˺ before it.” If only you could see when the wrongdoers will be detained before their Lord, throwing blame at each other! The lowly ˹followers˺ will say to the arrogant ˹leaders˺, “Had it not been for you, we would certainly have been believers.”

text_simple: قال الذين استكبروا للذين استضعفوا انحن صددناكم عن الهدى بعد اذ جاءكم بل كنتم مجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: The arrogant will respond to the lowly, “Did we ever hinder you from guidance after it came to you? In fact, you were wicked ˹on your own˺.”

text_simple: وقال الذين استضعفوا للذين استكبروا بل مكر الليل والنهار اذ تامروننا ان نكفر بالله ونجعل له اندادا واسروا الندامة لما راوا العذاب وجعلنا الاغلال في اعناق الذين كفروا هل يجزون الا ما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: The lowly will say to the arrogant, “No! It was your plotting by day and night—when you ordered us to disbelieve in Allah and to set up equals with Him.” They will ˹all˺ hide ˹their˺ remorse when they see the torment. And We will put shackles around the necks of the disbelievers. Will they be rewarded except for what they used to do?

text_simple: وما ارسلنا في قرية من نذير الا قال مترفوها انا بما ارسلتم به كافرون
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever We sent a warner to a society, its elite would say, “We truly reject what you have been sent with.”

text_simple: وقالوا نحن اكثر اموالا واولادا وما نحن بمعذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Adding, “We are far superior ˹to the believers˺ in wealth and children, and we will never be punished.”

text_simple: قل ان ربي يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Surely ˹it is˺ my Lord ˹Who˺ gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills. But most people do not know.”

text_simple: وما اموالكم ولا اولادكم بالتي تقربكم عندنا زلفى الا من امن وعمل صالحا فاولئك لهم جزاء الضعف بما عملوا وهم في الغرفات امنون
translation_en_yusufali: It is not your wealth or children that bring you closer to Us. But those who believe and do good—it is they who will have a multiplied reward for what they did, and they will be secure in ˹elevated˺ mansions.

text_simple: والذين يسعون في اياتنا معاجزين اولئك في العذاب محضرون
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who strive to discredit Our revelations, it is they who will be confined in punishment.

text_simple: قل ان ربي يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء من عباده ويقدر له وما انفقتم من شيء فهو يخلفه وهو خير الرازقين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Surely ˹it is˺ my Lord ˹Who˺ gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills of His servants. And whatever you spend in charity, He will compensate ˹you˺ for it. For He is the Best Provider.”

text_simple: ويوم يحشرهم جميعا ثم يقول للملائكة اهؤلاء اياكم كانوا يعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹consider˺ the Day He will gather them all together, and then ask the angels, “Was it you that these ˹polytheists˺ used to worship?”

text_simple: قالوا سبحانك انت ولينا من دونهم بل كانوا يعبدون الجن اكثرهم بهم مؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: They will say, “Glory be to You! Our loyalty is to You, not them. In fact, they ˹only˺ followed the ˹temptations of evil˺ jinn, in whom most of them had faith.”

text_simple: فاليوم لا يملك بعضكم لبعض نفعا ولا ضرا ونقول للذين ظلموا ذوقوا عذاب النار التي كنتم بها تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: So Today neither of you can benefit or protect each other. And We will say to the wrongdoers, “Taste the torment of the Fire, which you used to deny.”

text_simple: واذا تتلى عليهم اياتنا بينات قالوا ما هذا الا رجل يريد ان يصدكم عما كان يعبد اباؤكم وقالوا ما هذا الا افك مفترى وقال الذين كفروا للحق لما جاءهم ان هذا الا سحر مبين
translation_en_yusufali: When Our clear revelations are recited to them, they say, “This is only a man who wishes to hinder you from what your forefathers used to worship.” They also say, “This ˹Quran˺ is no more than a fabricated lie.” And the disbelievers say of the truth when it has come to them, “This is nothing but pure magic.”

text_simple: وما اتيناهم من كتب يدرسونها وما ارسلنا اليهم قبلك من نذير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They say so even though˺ We had never given them any scriptures to study, nor did We ever send them a warner before you ˹O Prophet˺.

text_simple: وكذب الذين من قبلهم وما بلغوا معشار ما اتيناهم فكذبوا رسلي فكيف كان نكير
translation_en_yusufali: Those ˹destroyed˺ before them denied as well—and these ˹Meccans˺ have not attained even one-tenth of what We had given their predecessors. Yet ˹when˺ they denied My messengers, how severe was My response!

text_simple: قل انما اعظكم بواحدة ان تقوموا لله مثنى وفرادى ثم تتفكروا ما بصاحبكم من جنة ان هو الا نذير لكم بين يدي عذاب شديد
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I advise you to do ˹only˺ one thing: stand up for ˹the sake of˺ Allah—individually or in pairs—then reflect. Your fellow man is not insane. He is only a warner to you before ˹the coming of˺ a severe punishment.”

text_simple: قل ما سالتكم من اجر فهو لكم ان اجري الا على الله وهو على كل شيء شهيد
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “If I had ever asked you for a reward, you could keep it. My reward is only from Allah. And He is a Witness over all things.”

text_simple: قل ان ربي يقذف بالحق علام الغيوب
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Surely my Lord hurls the truth ˹against falsehood˺. ˹He is˺ the Knower of all unseen.”

text_simple: قل جاء الحق وما يبدئ الباطل وما يعيد
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “The truth has come, and falsehood will vanish, never to return.”

text_simple: قل ان ضللت فانما اضل على نفسي وان اهتديت فبما يوحي الي ربي انه سميع قريب
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “If I am astray, the loss is only mine. And if I am guided, it is ˹only˺ because of what my Lord reveals to me. He is indeed All-Hearing, Ever Near.”

text_simple: ولو ترى اذ فزعوا فلا فوت واخذوا من مكان قريب
translation_en_yusufali: If only you could see when they will be horrified with no escape ˹on Judgment Day˺! And they will be seized from a nearby place.

text_simple: وقالوا امنا به وانى لهم التناوش من مكان بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: They will ˹then˺ cry, “We do ˹now˺ believe in it ˹all˺.” But how could they ˹possibly˺ attain faith from a place so far-off ˹from the world˺

text_simple: وقد كفروا به من قبل ويقذفون بالغيب من مكان بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: while they had already rejected it before, guessing blindly from a place ˹equally˺ far-away ˹from the Hereafter˺?

text_simple: وحيل بينهم وبين ما يشتهون كما فعل باشياعهم من قبل انهم كانوا في شك مريب
translation_en_yusufali: They will be sealed off from whatever they desire, as was done to their counterparts before. Indeed, they were ˹all˺ in alarming doubt.

text_simple: الحمد لله فاطر السماوات والارض جاعل الملائكة رسلا اولي اجنحة مثنى وثلاث ورباع يزيد في الخلق ما يشاء ان الله على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: All praise is for Allah, the Originator of the heavens and the earth, Who made angels ˹as His˺ messengers with wings—two, three, or four. He increases in creation whatever He wills. Surely Allah is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: ما يفتح الله للناس من رحمة فلا ممسك لها وما يمسك فلا مرسل له من بعده وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever mercy Allah opens up for people, none can withhold it. And whatever He withholds, none but Him can release it. For He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: يا ايها الناس اذكروا نعمت الله عليكم هل من خالق غير الله يرزقكم من السماء والارض لا اله الا هو فانى تؤفكون
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! Remember Allah’s favours upon you. Is there any creator other than Allah who provides for you from the heavens and the earth? There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. How can you then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

text_simple: وان يكذبوك فقد كذبت رسل من قبلك والى الله ترجع الامور
translation_en_yusufali: If you are rejected by them, so too were messengers before you. And to Allah ˹all˺ matters will be returned ˹for judgment˺.

text_simple: يا ايها الناس ان وعد الله حق فلا تغرنكم الحياة الدنيا ولا يغرنكم بالله الغرور
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! Indeed, Allah’s promise is true. So do not let the life of this world deceive you, nor let the Chief Deceiver deceive you about Allah.

text_simple: ان الشيطان لكم عدو فاتخذوه عدوا انما يدعو حزبه ليكونوا من اصحاب السعير
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Satan is an enemy to you, so take him as an enemy. He only invites his followers to become inmates of the Blaze.

text_simple: الذين كفروا لهم عذاب شديد والذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم مغفرة واجر كبير
translation_en_yusufali: Those who disbelieve will have a severe punishment. But those who believe and do good will have forgiveness and a great reward.

text_simple: افمن زين له سوء عمله فراه حسنا فان الله يضل من يشاء ويهدي من يشاء فلا تذهب نفسك عليهم حسرات ان الله عليم بما يصنعون
translation_en_yusufali: Are those whose evil-doing is made so appealing to them that they deem it good ˹like those who are rightly guided˺? ˹It is˺ certainly Allah ˹Who˺ leaves to stray whoever He wills, and guides whoever He wills. So do not grieve yourself to death over them ˹O Prophet˺. Surely Allah is All-Knowing of what they do.

text_simple: والله الذي ارسل الرياح فتثير سحابا فسقناه الى بلد ميت فاحيينا به الارض بعد موتها كذلك النشور
translation_en_yusufali: And it is Allah Who sends the winds, which then stir up ˹vapour, forming˺ clouds, and then We drive them to a lifeless land, giving life to the earth after its death. Similar is the Resurrection.

text_simple: من كان يريد العزة فلله العزة جميعا اليه يصعد الكلم الطيب والعمل الصالح يرفعه والذين يمكرون السيئات لهم عذاب شديد ومكر اولئك هو يبور
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever seeks honour and power, then ˹let them know that˺ all honour and power belongs to Allah. To Him ˹alone˺ good words ascend, and righteous deeds are raised up by Him. As for those who plot evil, they will suffer a severe punishment. And the plotting of such ˹people˺ is doomed ˹to fail˺.

text_simple: والله خلقكم من تراب ثم من نطفة ثم جعلكم ازواجا وما تحمل من انثى ولا تضع الا بعلمه وما يعمر من معمر ولا ينقص من عمره الا في كتاب ان ذلك على الله يسير
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹it is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ created you from dust, then ˹developed you˺ from a sperm-drop, then made you into pairs. No female ever conceives or delivers without His knowledge.
