And no one’s life is made long or cut short but is ˹written˺ in a Record. That is certainly easy for Allah.

text_simple: وما يستوي البحران هذا عذب فرات سائغ شرابه وهذا ملح اجاج ومن كل تاكلون لحما طريا وتستخرجون حلية تلبسونها وترى الفلك فيه مواخر لتبتغوا من فضله ولعلكم تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: The two bodies of water are not alike: one is fresh, palatable, and pleasant to drink and the other is salty and bitter. Yet from them both you eat tender seafood and extract ornaments to wear. And you see the ships ploughing their way through both, so you may seek His bounty and give thanks ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: يولج الليل في النهار ويولج النهار في الليل وسخر الشمس والقمر كل يجري لاجل مسمى ذلكم الله ربكم له الملك والذين تدعون من دونه ما يملكون من قطمير
translation_en_yusufali: He merges the night into the day and the day into the night, and has subjected the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. That is Allah—your Lord! All authority belongs to Him. But those ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Him do not possess even the skin of a date stone.

text_simple: ان تدعوهم لا يسمعوا دعاءكم ولو سمعوا ما استجابوا لكم ويوم القيامة يكفرون بشرككم ولا ينبئك مثل خبير
translation_en_yusufali: If you call upon them, they cannot hear your calls. And if they were to hear, they could not respond to you. On the Day of Judgment they will disown your worship ˹of them˺. And no one can inform you ˹O Prophet˺ like the All-Knowledgeable.

text_simple: يا ايها الناس انتم الفقراء الى الله والله هو الغني الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! It is you who stand in need of Allah, but Allah ˹alone˺ is the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

text_simple: ان يشا يذهبكم ويات بخلق جديد
translation_en_yusufali: If He willed, He could eliminate you and produce a new creation.

text_simple: وما ذلك على الله بعزيز
translation_en_yusufali: And that is not difficult for Allah ˹at all˺.

text_simple: ولا تزر وازرة وزر اخرى وان تدع مثقلة الى حملها لا يحمل منه شيء ولو كان ذا قربى انما تنذر الذين يخشون ربهم بالغيب واقاموا الصلاة ومن تزكى فانما يتزكى لنفسه والى الله المصير
translation_en_yusufali: No soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another. And if a sin-burdened soul cries for help with its burden, none of it will be carried—even by a close relative. You ˹O Prophet˺ can only warn those who stand in awe of their Lord without seeing Him and establish prayer. Whoever purifies themselves, they only do so for their own good. And to Allah is the final return.

text_simple: وما يستوي الاعمى والبصير
translation_en_yusufali: Those blind ˹to the truth˺ and those who can see are not equal

text_simple: ولا الظلمات ولا النور
translation_en_yusufali: nor are the darkness and the light

text_simple: ولا الظل ولا الحرور
translation_en_yusufali: nor the ˹scorching˺ heat and the ˹cool˺ shade.

text_simple: وما يستوي الاحياء ولا الاموات ان الله يسمع من يشاء وما انت بمسمع من في القبور
translation_en_yusufali: Nor are the dead and the living equal. Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ makes whoever He wills hear, but you ˹O Prophet˺ can never make those in the graves hear ˹your call˺.

text_simple: ان انت الا نذير
translation_en_yusufali: You are only a warner.

text_simple: انا ارسلناك بالحق بشيرا ونذيرا وان من امة الا خلا فيها نذير
translation_en_yusufali: We have surely sent you with the truth as a deliverer of good news and a warner. There is no community that has not had a warner.

text_simple: وان يكذبوك فقد كذب الذين من قبلهم جاءتهم رسلهم بالبينات وبالزبر وبالكتاب المنير
translation_en_yusufali: If they deny you, so did those before them. Their messengers came to them with clear proofs, divine Books, and enlightening Scriptures.

text_simple: ثم اخذت الذين كفروا فكيف كان نكير
translation_en_yusufali: Then I seized those who persisted in disbelief. How severe was My response!

text_simple: الم تر ان الله انزل من السماء ماء فاخرجنا به ثمرات مختلفا الوانها ومن الجبال جدد بيض وحمر مختلف الوانها وغرابيب سود
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky with which We bring forth fruits of different colours? And in the mountains are streaks of varying shades of white, red, and raven black;

text_simple: ومن الناس والدواب والانعام مختلف الوانه كذلك انما يخشى الله من عباده العلماء ان الله عزيز غفور
translation_en_yusufali: just as people, living beings, and cattle are of various colours as well. Of all of Allah’s servants, only the knowledgeable ˹of His might˺ are ˹truly˺ in awe of Him. Allah is indeed Almighty, All-Forgiving.

text_simple: ان الذين يتلون كتاب الله واقاموا الصلاة وانفقوا مما رزقناهم سرا وعلانية يرجون تجارة لن تبور
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who recite the Book of Allah, establish prayer, and donate from what We have provided for them—secretly and openly—˹can˺ hope for an exchange that will never fail

text_simple: ليوفيهم اجورهم ويزيدهم من فضله انه غفور شكور
translation_en_yusufali: so that He will reward them in full and increase them out of His grace. He is truly All-Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

text_simple: والذي اوحينا اليك من الكتاب هو الحق مصدقا لما بين يديه ان الله بعباده لخبير بصير
translation_en_yusufali: The Book We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ is the truth, confirming what came before it. Surely Allah is All-Aware, All-Seeing of His servants.

text_simple: ثم اورثنا الكتاب الذين اصطفينا من عبادنا فمنهم ظالم لنفسه ومنهم مقتصد ومنهم سابق بالخيرات باذن الله ذلك هو الفضل الكبير
translation_en_yusufali: Then We granted the Book to those We have chosen from Our servants. Some of them wrong themselves, some follow a middle course, and some are foremost in good deeds by Allah’s Will. That is ˹truly˺ the greatest bounty.

text_simple: جنات عدن يدخلونها يحلون فيها من اساور من ذهب ولؤلؤا ولباسهم فيها حرير
translation_en_yusufali: They will enter the Gardens of Eternity, where they will be adorned with bracelets of gold and pearls, and their clothing will be silk.

text_simple: وقالوا الحمد لله الذي اذهب عنا الحزن ان ربنا لغفور شكور
translation_en_yusufali: And they will say, “Praise be to Allah, Who has kept away from us all ˹causes of˺ sorrow. Our Lord is indeed All-Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

text_simple: الذي احلنا دار المقامة من فضله لا يمسنا فيها نصب ولا يمسنا فيها لغوب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the One˺ Who—out of His grace—has settled us in the Home of Everlasting Stay, where we will be touched by neither fatigue nor weariness.”

text_simple: والذين كفروا لهم نار جهنم لا يقضى عليهم فيموتوا ولا يخفف عنهم من عذابها كذلك نجزي كل كفور
translation_en_yusufali: As for the disbelievers, they will have the Fire of Hell, where they will not be ˹allowed to be˺ finished by death, nor will its torment be lightened for them. This is how We reward every ˹stubborn˺ disbeliever.

text_simple: وهم يصطرخون فيها ربنا اخرجنا نعمل صالحا غير الذي كنا نعمل اولم نعمركم ما يتذكر فيه من تذكر وجاءكم النذير فذوقوا فما للظالمين من نصير
translation_en_yusufali: There they will be ˹fervently˺ screaming, “Our Lord! Take us out ˹and send us back˺. We will do good, unlike what we used to do.” ˹They will be told,˺ “Did We not give you lives long enough so that whoever wanted to be mindful could have done so? And the warner came to you. So taste ˹the punishment˺, for the wrongdoers have no helper.”

text_simple: ان الله عالم غيب السماوات والارض انه عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah is the Knower of the unseen of the heavens and the earth. He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: هو الذي جعلكم خلائف في الارض فمن كفر فعليه كفره ولا يزيد الكافرين كفرهم عند ربهم الا مقتا ولا يزيد الكافرين كفرهم الا خسارا
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who has placed you as successors on earth. So whoever disbelieves will bear ˹the burden of˺ their own disbelief. The disbelievers’ denial only increases them in contempt in the sight of their Lord, and it will only contribute to their loss.

text_simple: قل ارايتم شركاءكم الذين تدعون من دون الله اروني ماذا خلقوا من الارض ام لهم شرك في السماوات ام اتيناهم كتابا فهم على بينت منه بل ان يعد الظالمون بعضهم بعضا الا غرورا
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Have you considered your associate-gods which you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created on earth! Or do they have a share in ˹the creation of˺ the heavens? Or have We given the polytheists a Book, which serves as a clear proof for them? In fact, the wrongdoers promise each other nothing but delusion.”

text_simple: ان الله يمسك السماوات والارض ان تزولا ولئن زالتا ان امسكهما من احد من بعده انه كان حليما غفورا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ keeps the heavens and the earth from falling apart. If they were to fall apart, none but Him could hold them up. He is truly Most Forbearing, All-Forgiving.

text_simple: واقسموا بالله جهد ايمانهم لئن جاءهم نذير ليكونن اهدى من احدى الامم فلما جاءهم نذير ما زادهم الا نفورا
translation_en_yusufali: They swore by Allah their most solemn oaths that if a warner were to come to them, they would certainly be better guided than any other community. Yet when a warner did come to them, it only drove them farther away—

text_simple: استكبارا في الارض ومكر السيئ ولا يحيق المكر السيئ الا باهله فهل ينظرون الا سنت الاولين فلن تجد لسنت الله تبديلا ولن تجد لسنت الله تحويلا
translation_en_yusufali: behaving arrogantly in the land and plotting evil. But evil plotting only backfires on those who plot. Are they awaiting anything but the fate of those ˹destroyed˺ before? You will find no change in the way of Allah, nor will you find it diverted ˹to someone else˺.

text_simple: اولم يسيروا في الارض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبلهم وكانوا اشد منهم قوة وما كان الله ليعجزه من شيء في السماوات ولا في الارض انه كان عليما قديرا
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them? They were far superior in might. But there is nothing that can escape Allah in the heavens or the earth. He is certainly All-Knowing, Most Capable.

text_simple: ولو يؤاخذ الله الناس بما كسبوا ما ترك على ظهرها من دابة ولكن يؤخرهم الى اجل مسمى فاذا جاء اجلهم فان الله كان بعباده بصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: If Allah were to punish people ˹immediately˺ for what they have committed, He would not have left a single living being on earth. But He delays them for an appointed term. And when their time arrives, then surely Allah is All-Seeing of His servants.

text_simple: يس
translation_en_yusufali: Yâ-Sĩn.

text_simple: والقران الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: By the Quran, rich in wisdom!

text_simple: انك لمن المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: You ˹O Prophet˺ are truly one of the messengers

text_simple: على صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: upon the Straight Path.

text_simple: تنزيل العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ a revelation from the Almighty, Most Merciful

text_simple: لتنذر قوما ما انذر اباؤهم فهم غافلون
translation_en_yusufali: so that you may warn a people whose forefathers were not warned, and so are heedless.

text_simple: لقد حق القول على اكثرهم فهم لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: The decree ˹of torment˺ has already been justified against most of them, for they will never believe.

text_simple: انا جعلنا في اعناقهم اغلالا فهي الى الاذقان فهم مقمحون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is as if˺ We have put shackles around their necks up to their chins, so their heads are forced up

text_simple: وجعلنا من بين ايديهم سدا ومن خلفهم سدا فاغشيناهم فهم لا يبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: and have placed a barrier before them and a barrier behind them and covered them ˹all˺ up, so they fail to see ˹the truth˺.

text_simple: وسواء عليهم اانذرتهم ام لم تنذرهم لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: It is the same whether you warn them or not—they will never believe.

text_simple: انما تنذر من اتبع الذكر وخشي الرحمن بالغيب فبشره بمغفرة واجر كريم
translation_en_yusufali: You can only warn those who follow the Reminder and are in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing Him. So give them good news of forgiveness and an honourable reward.

text_simple: انا نحن نحيي الموتى ونكتب ما قدموا واثارهم وكل شيء احصيناه في امام مبين
translation_en_yusufali: It is certainly We Who resurrect the dead, and write what they send forth and what they leave behind. Everything is listed by Us in a perfect Record.

text_simple: واضرب لهم مثلا اصحاب القرية اذ جاءها المرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: Give them an example ˹O Prophet˺ of the residents of a town, when the messengers came to them.

text_simple: اذ ارسلنا اليهم اثنين فكذبوهما فعززنا بثالث فقالوا انا اليكم مرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: We sent them two messengers, but they rejected both. So We reinforced ˹the two˺ with a third, and they declared, “We have indeed been sent to you ˹as messengers˺.”

text_simple: قالوا ما انتم الا بشر مثلنا وما انزل الرحمن من شيء ان انتم الا تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: The people replied, “You are only humans like us, and the Most Compassionate has not revealed anything. You are simply lying!”

text_simple: قالوا ربنا يعلم انا اليكم لمرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: The messengers responded, “Our Lord knows that we have truly been sent to you.

text_simple: وما علينا الا البلاغ المبين
translation_en_yusufali: And our duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.”

text_simple: قالوا انا تطيرنا بكم لئن لم تنتهوا لنرجمنكم وليمسنكم منا عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: The people replied, “We definitely see you as a bad omen for us. If you do not desist, we will certainly stone you ˹to death˺ and you will be touched with a painful punishment from us.”

text_simple: قالوا طائركم معكم ائن ذكرتم بل انتم قوم مسرفون
translation_en_yusufali: The messengers said, “Your bad omen lies within yourselves. Are you saying this because you are reminded ˹of the truth˺? In fact, you are a transgressing people.”

text_simple: وجاء من اقصى المدينة رجل يسعى قال يا قوم اتبعوا المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: Then from the farthest end of the city a man came, rushing. He advised, “O my people! Follow the messengers.

text_simple: اتبعوا من لا يسالكم اجرا وهم مهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: Follow those who ask no reward of you, and are ˹rightly˺ guided.

text_simple: وما لي لا اعبد الذي فطرني واليه ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: And why should I not worship the One Who has originated me, and to Whom you will be returned.

text_simple: ااتخذ من دونه الهة ان يردن الرحمن بضر لا تغن عني شفاعتهم شيئا ولا ينقذون
translation_en_yusufali: How could I take besides Him other gods whose intercession would not be of any benefit to me, nor could they save me if the Most Compassionate intended to harm me?

text_simple: اني اذا لفي ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, I would then be clearly astray.

text_simple: اني امنت بربكم فاسمعون
translation_en_yusufali: I do believe in your Lord, so listen to me.”

text_simple: قيل ادخل الجنة قال يا ليت قومي يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But they killed him, then˺ he was told ˹by the angels˺, “Enter Paradise!” He said, “If only my people knew

text_simple: بما غفر لي ربي وجعلني من المكرمين
translation_en_yusufali: of how my Lord has forgiven me, and made me one of the honourable.”

text_simple: وما انزلنا على قومه من بعده من جند من السماء وما كنا منزلين
translation_en_yusufali: We did not send any soldiers from the heavens against his people after his death, nor did We need to.

text_simple: ان كانت الا صيحة واحدة فاذا هم خامدون
translation_en_yusufali: All it took was one ˹mighty˺ blast, and they were extinguished at once.

text_simple: يا حسرة على العباد ما ياتيهم من رسول الا كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: Oh pity, such beings! No messenger ever came to them without being mocked.

text_simple: الم يروا كم اهلكنا قبلهم من القرون انهم اليهم لا يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Have the deniers not considered how many peoples We destroyed before them who never came back to life again?

text_simple: وان كل لما جميع لدينا محضرون
translation_en_yusufali: Yet they will all be brought before Us.

text_simple: واية لهم الارض الميتة احييناها واخرجنا منها حبا فمنه ياكلون
translation_en_yusufali: There is a sign for them in the dead earth: We give it life, producing grain from it for them to eat.

text_simple: وجعلنا فيها جنات من نخيل واعناب وفجرنا فيها من العيون
translation_en_yusufali: And We have placed in it gardens of palm trees and grapevines, and caused springs to gush forth in it

text_simple: لياكلوا من ثمره وما عملته ايديهم افلا يشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: so that they may eat from its fruit, which they had no hand in making. Will they not then give thanks?

text_simple: سبحان الذي خلق الازواج كلها مما تنبت الارض ومن انفسهم ومما لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Glory be to the One Who created all ˹things in˺ pairs—˹be it˺ what the earth produces, their genders, or what they do not know!

text_simple: واية لهم الليل نسلخ منه النهار فاذا هم مظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: There is also a sign for them in the night: We strip from it daylight, then—behold!—they are in darkness.

text_simple: والشمس تجري لمستقر لها ذلك تقدير العزيز العليم
translation_en_yusufali: The sun travels for its fixed term. That is the design of the Almighty, All-Knowing.

text_simple: والقمر قدرناه منازل حتى عاد كالعرجون القديم
translation_en_yusufali: As for the moon, We have ordained ˹precise˺ phases for it, until it ends up like an old, curved palm stalk.

text_simple: لا الشمس ينبغي لها ان تدرك القمر ولا الليل سابق النهار وكل في فلك يسبحون
translation_en_yusufali: It is not for the sun to catch up with the moon, nor does the night outrun the day. Each is travelling in an orbit of their own.

text_simple: واية لهم انا حملنا ذريتهم في الفلك المشحون
translation_en_yusufali: Another sign for them is that We carried their ancestors ˹with Noah˺ in the fully loaded Ark

text_simple: وخلقنا لهم من مثله ما يركبون
translation_en_yusufali: and created for them similar things to ride in.

text_simple: وان نشا نغرقهم فلا صريخ لهم ولا هم ينقذون
translation_en_yusufali: If We willed, We could drown them: then no one would respond to their cries, nor would they be rescued—

text_simple: الا رحمة منا ومتاعا الى حين
translation_en_yusufali: except by mercy from Us, allowing them enjoyment for a ˹little˺ while.

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم اتقوا ما بين ايديكم وما خلفكم لعلكم ترحمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Still they turn away˺ when it is said to them, “Beware of what is ahead of you ˹in the Hereafter˺ and what is behind you ˹of destroyed nations˺ so you may be shown mercy.”

text_simple: وما تاتيهم من اية من ايات ربهم الا كانوا عنها معرضين
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever a sign comes to them from their Lord, they turn away from it.

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم انفقوا مما رزقكم الله قال الذين كفروا للذين امنوا انطعم من لو يشاء الله اطعمه ان انتم الا في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And when it is said to them, “Donate from what Allah has provided for you,” the disbelievers say to the believers, “Why should we feed those whom Allah could have fed if He wanted to? You are clearly astray!”

text_simple: ويقولون متى هذا الوعد ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: And they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

text_simple: ما ينظرون الا صيحة واحدة تاخذهم وهم يخصمون
translation_en_yusufali: They must be awaiting a single Blast, which will seize them while they are ˹entrenched˺ in ˹worldly˺ disputes.

text_simple: فلا يستطيعون توصية ولا الى اهلهم يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Then they will not be able to make a ˹last˺ will, nor can they return to their own people.

text_simple: ونفخ في الصور فاذا هم من الاجداث الى ربهم ينسلون
translation_en_yusufali: The Trumpet will be blown ˹a second time˺, then—behold!—they will rush from the graves to their Lord.

text_simple: قالوا يا ويلنا من بعثنا من مرقدنا هذا ما وعد الرحمن وصدق المرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: They will cry, “Woe to us! Who has raised us up from our place of rest? This must be what the Most Compassionate warned us of; the messengers told the truth!”

text_simple: ان كانت الا صيحة واحدة فاذا هم جميع لدينا محضرون
translation_en_yusufali: It will only take one Blast, then at once they will all be brought before Us.

text_simple: فاليوم لا تظلم نفس شيئا ولا تجزون الا ما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day no soul will be wronged in the least, nor will you be rewarded except for what you used to do.

text_simple: ان اصحاب الجنة اليوم في شغل فاكهون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, on that Day the residents of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves.

text_simple: هم وازواجهم في ظلال على الارائك متكئون
translation_en_yusufali: They and their spouses will be in ˹cool˺ shade, reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches.

text_simple: لهم فيها فاكهة ولهم ما يدعون
translation_en_yusufali: There they will have fruits and whatever they desire.

text_simple: سلام قولا من رب رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And “Peace!” will be ˹their˺ greeting from the Merciful Lord.

text_simple: وامتازوا اليوم ايها المجرمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Then the disbelievers will be told,˺ “Step away ˹from the believers˺ this Day, O  wicked ones!

text_simple: الم اعهد اليكم يا بني ادم ان لا تعبدوا الشيطان انه لكم عدو مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Did I not command you, O  Children of Adam, not to follow Satan, for he is truly your sworn enemy

text_simple: وان اعبدوني هذا صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: but to worship Me ˹alone˺? This is the Straight Path.

text_simple: ولقد اضل منكم جبلا كثيرا افلم تكونوا تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Yet he already misled great multitudes of you. Did you not have any sense?

text_simple: هذه جهنم التي كنتم توعدون
translation_en_yusufali: This is the Hell you were warned of.

text_simple: اصلوها اليوم بما كنتم تكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: Burn in it Today for your disbelief.”

text_simple: اليوم نختم على افواههم وتكلمنا ايديهم وتشهد ارجلهم بما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: On this Day We will seal their mouths, their hands will speak to Us, and their feet will testify to what they used to commit.

text_simple: ولو نشاء لطمسنا على اعينهم فاستبقوا الصراط فانى يبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Had We willed, We could have easily blinded their eyes, so they would struggle to find their way. How then could they see?

text_simple: ولو نشاء لمسخناهم على مكانتهم فما استطاعوا مضيا ولا يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: And had We willed, We could have transfigured them on the spot, so they could neither progress forward nor turn back.

text_simple: ومن نعمره ننكسه في الخلق افلا يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever We grant a long life, We reverse them in development. Will they not then understand?

text_simple: وما علمناه الشعر وما ينبغي له ان هو الا ذكر وقران مبين
translation_en_yusufali: We have not taught him poetry, nor is it fitting for him. This ˹Book˺ is only a Reminder and a clear Quran

text_simple: لينذر من كان حيا ويحق القول على الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: to warn whoever is ˹truly˺ alive and fulfil the decree ˹of torment˺ against the disbelievers.

text_simple: اولم يروا انا خلقنا لهم مما عملت ايدينا انعاما فهم لها مالكون
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not see that We singlehandedly created for them, among other things, cattle which are under their control?

text_simple: وذللناها لهم فمنها ركوبهم ومنها ياكلون
translation_en_yusufali: And We have subjected these ˹animals˺ to them, so they may ride some and eat others.

text_simple: ولهم فيها منافع ومشارب افلا يشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And they derive from them other benefits and drinks. Will they not then give thanks?

text_simple: واتخذوا من دون الله الهة لعلهم ينصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Still they have taken other gods besides Allah, hoping to be helped ˹by them˺.

text_simple: لا يستطيعون نصرهم وهم لهم جند محضرون
translation_en_yusufali: They cannot help the pagans, even though they serve the idols as dedicated guards.

text_simple: فلا يحزنك قولهم انا نعلم ما يسرون وما يعلنون
translation_en_yusufali: So do not let their words grieve you ˹O Prophet˺. Indeed, We ˹fully˺ know what they conceal and what they reveal.

text_simple: اولم ير الانسان انا خلقناه من نطفة فاذا هو خصيم مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Do people not see that We have created them from a sperm-drop, then—behold!—they openly challenge ˹Us˺?

text_simple: وضرب لنا مثلا ونسي خلقه قال من يحيي العظام وهي رميم
translation_en_yusufali: And they argue with Us—forgetting they were created—saying, “Who will give life to decayed bones?”

text_simple: قل يحييها الذي انشاها اول مرة وهو بكل خلق عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “They will be revived by the One Who produced them the first time, for He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of every created being.

text_simple: الذي جعل لكم من الشجر الاخضر نارا فاذا انتم منه توقدون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the One˺ Who gives you fire from green trees, and—behold!—you kindle ˹fire˺ from them.

text_simple: اوليس الذي خلق السماوات والارض بقادر على ان يخلق مثلهم بلى وهو الخلاق العليم
translation_en_yusufali: Can the One Who created the heavens and the earth not ˹easily˺ resurrect these ˹deniers˺?” Yes ˹He can˺! For He is the Master Creator, All-Knowing.

text_simple: انما امره اذا اراد شيئا ان يقول له كن فيكون
translation_en_yusufali: All it takes, when He wills something ˹to be˺, is simply to say to it: “Be!” And it is!

text_simple: فسبحان الذي بيده ملكوت كل شيء واليه ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: So glory be to the One in Whose Hands is the authority over all things, and to Whom ˹alone˺ you will ˹all˺ be returned.

text_simple: والصافات صفا
translation_en_yusufali: By those ˹angels˺ lined up in ranks

text_simple: فالزاجرات زجرا
translation_en_yusufali: and those who diligently drive ˹the clouds˺

text_simple: فالتاليات ذكرا
translation_en_yusufali: and those who recite the Reminder!

text_simple: ان الهكم لواحد
translation_en_yusufali: Surely your God is One!

text_simple: رب السماوات والارض وما بينهما ورب المشارق
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, and the Lord of all points of sunrise.

text_simple: انا زينا السماء الدنيا بزينة الكواكب
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have adorned the lowest heaven with the stars for decoration

text_simple: وحفظا من كل شيطان مارد
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹for˺ protection from every rebellious devil.

text_simple: لا يسمعون الى الملا الاعلى ويقذفون من كل جانب
translation_en_yusufali: They cannot listen to the highest assembly ˹of angels˺ for they are pelted from every side

text_simple: دحورا ولهم عذاب واصب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹fiercely˺ driven away. And they will suffer an everlasting torment.

text_simple: الا من خطف الخطفة فاتبعه شهاب ثاقب
translation_en_yusufali: But whoever manages to stealthily eavesdrop is ˹instantly˺ pursued by a piercing flare.

text_simple: فاستفتهم اهم اشد خلقا ام من خلقنا انا خلقناهم من طين لازب
translation_en_yusufali: So ask them ˹O Prophet˺, which is harder to create: them or other marvels of Our creation? Indeed, We created them from a sticky clay.

text_simple: بل عجبت ويسخرون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, you are astonished ˹by their denial˺, while they ridicule ˹you˺.

text_simple: واذا ذكروا لا يذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: When they are reminded, they are never mindful.

text_simple: واذا راوا اية يستسخرون
translation_en_yusufali: And whenever they see a sign, they make fun of it

text_simple: وقالوا ان هذا الا سحر مبين
translation_en_yusufali: saying, “This is nothing but pure magic.

text_simple: ااذا متنا وكنا ترابا وعظاما اانا لمبعوثون
translation_en_yusufali: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

text_simple: اواباؤنا الاولون
translation_en_yusufali: And our forefathers as well?”

text_simple: قل نعم وانتم داخرون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Yes! And you will be fully humbled.”

text_simple: فانما هي زجرة واحدة فاذا هم ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: It will only take one Blast, then at once they will see ˹it all˺.

text_simple: وقالوا يا ويلنا هذا يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: They will cry, “Oh, woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment!”

text_simple: هذا يوم الفصل الذي كنتم به تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision which you used to deny.”

text_simple: احشروا الذين ظلموا وازواجهم وما كانوا يعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Allah will say to the angels,˺ “Gather ˹all˺ the wrongdoers along with their peers, and whatever they used to worship

text_simple: من دون الله فاهدوهم الى صراط الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: instead of Allah, then lead them ˹all˺ to the path of Hell.

text_simple: وقفوهم انهم مسئولون
translation_en_yusufali: And detain them, for they must be questioned.”

text_simple: ما لكم لا تناصرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Then they will be asked,˺ “What is the matter with you that you can no longer help each other?”

text_simple: بل هم اليوم مستسلمون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, on that Day they will be ˹fully˺ submissive.

text_simple: واقبل بعضهم على بعض يتساءلون
translation_en_yusufali: They will turn on each other, throwing blame.

text_simple: قالوا انكم كنتم تاتوننا عن اليمين
translation_en_yusufali: The misled will say, “It was you who deluded us away from what is right.”

text_simple: قالوا بل لم تكونوا مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: The misleaders will reply, “No! You disbelieved on your own.

text_simple: وما كان لنا عليكم من سلطان بل كنتم قوما طاغين
translation_en_yusufali: We had no authority over you. In fact, you yourselves were a transgressing people.

text_simple: فحق علينا قول ربنا انا لذائقون
translation_en_yusufali: The decree of our Lord has come to pass against us ˹all˺: we will certainly taste ˹the punishment˺.

text_simple: فاغويناكم انا كنا غاوين
translation_en_yusufali: We caused you to deviate, for we ourselves were deviant.”

text_simple: فانهم يومئذ في العذاب مشتركون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely on that Day they will ˹all˺ share in the punishment.

text_simple: انا كذلك نفعل بالمجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: That is certainly how We deal with the wicked.

text_simple: انهم كانوا اذا قيل لهم لا اله الا الله يستكبرون
translation_en_yusufali: For whenever it was said to them ˹in the world˺, “There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah,” they acted arrogantly

text_simple: ويقولون ائنا لتاركو الهتنا لشاعر مجنون
translation_en_yusufali: and argued, “Should we really abandon our gods for a mad poet?”

text_simple: بل جاء بالحق وصدق المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, he came with the truth, confirming ˹earlier˺ messengers.

text_simple: انكم لذائقو العذاب الاليم
translation_en_yusufali: You will certainly taste the painful torment

text_simple: وما تجزون الا ما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: and will only be rewarded for what you used to do.

text_simple: الا عباد الله المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

text_simple: اولئك لهم رزق معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: They will have a known provision:

text_simple: فواكه وهم مكرمون
translation_en_yusufali: fruits ˹of every type˺. And they will be honoured

text_simple: في جنات النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: in the Gardens of Bliss

text_simple: على سرر متقابلين
translation_en_yusufali: facing each other on thrones.

text_simple: يطاف عليهم بكاس من معين
translation_en_yusufali: A drink ˹of pure wine˺ will be passed around to them from a flowing stream:

text_simple: بيضاء لذة للشاربين
translation_en_yusufali: crystal-white, delicious to drink.

text_simple: لا فيها غول ولا هم عنها ينزفون
translation_en_yusufali: It will neither harm ˹them˺, nor will they be intoxicated by it.

text_simple: وعندهم قاصرات الطرف عين
translation_en_yusufali: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and gorgeous eyes

text_simple: كانهن بيض مكنون
translation_en_yusufali: as if they were pristine pearls.

text_simple: فاقبل بعضهم على بعض يتساءلون
translation_en_yusufali: Then they will turn to one another inquisitively.

text_simple: قال قائل منهم اني كان لي قرين
translation_en_yusufali: One of them will say, “I once had a companion ˹in the world˺

text_simple: يقول اانك لمن المصدقين
translation_en_yusufali: who used to ask ˹me˺, ‘Do you actually believe ˹in resurrection˺?

text_simple: ااذا متنا وكنا ترابا وعظاما اانا لمدينون
translation_en_yusufali: When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be brought to judgment?’”

text_simple: قال هل انتم مطلعون
translation_en_yusufali: He will ˹then˺ ask, “Would you care to see ˹his fate˺?”

text_simple: فاطلع فراه في سواء الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Then he ˹and the others˺ will look and spot him in the midst of the Hellfire.

text_simple: قال تالله ان كدت لتردين
translation_en_yusufali: He will ˹then˺ say, “By Allah! You nearly ruined me.

text_simple: ولولا نعمة ربي لكنت من المحضرين
translation_en_yusufali: Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I ˹too˺ would have certainly been among those brought ˹to Hell˺.”

text_simple: افما نحن بميتين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Then he will ask his fellow believers,˺ “Can you imagine that we will never die

text_simple: الا موتتنا الاولى وما نحن بمعذبين
translation_en_yusufali: except our first death, nor be punished ˹like the others˺?”

text_simple: ان هذا لهو الفوز العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: This is truly the ultimate triumph.

text_simple: لمثل هذا فليعمل العاملون
translation_en_yusufali: For such ˹honour˺ all should strive.

text_simple: اذلك خير نزلا ام شجرة الزقوم
translation_en_yusufali: Is this ˹bliss˺ a better accommodation or the tree of Zaqqûm?

text_simple: انا جعلناها فتنة للظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: We have surely made it a test for the wrongdoers.

text_simple: انها شجرة تخرج في اصل الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, it is a tree that grows in the depths of Hell

text_simple: طلعها كانه رءوس الشياطين
translation_en_yusufali: bearing fruit like devils’ heads.

text_simple: فانهم لاكلون منها فمالئون منها البطون
translation_en_yusufali: The evildoers will certainly ˹be left to˺ eat from it, filling up their bellies with it.

text_simple: ثم ان لهم عليها لشوبا من حميم
translation_en_yusufali: Then on top of that they will be given a blend of boiling drink.

text_simple: ثم ان مرجعهم لالى الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Then they will ultimately return to ˹their place in˺ Hell.

text_simple: انهم الفوا اباءهم ضالين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, they found their forefathers astray

text_simple: فهم على اثارهم يهرعون
translation_en_yusufali: so they rushed in their footsteps!

text_simple: ولقد ضل قبلهم اكثر الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: And surely most of the earlier generations had strayed before them

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا فيهم منذرين
translation_en_yusufali: although We had certainly sent warners among them.

text_simple: فانظر كيف كان عاقبة المنذرين
translation_en_yusufali: See then what was the end of those who had been warned.

text_simple: الا عباد الله المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

text_simple: ولقد نادانا نوح فلنعم المجيبون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Noah cried out to Us, and how excellent are We in responding!

text_simple: ونجيناه واهله من الكرب العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: We delivered him and his family from the great distress

text_simple: وجعلنا ذريته هم الباقين
translation_en_yusufali: and made his descendants the sole survivors.

text_simple: وتركنا عليه في الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: And We blessed him ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

text_simple: سلام على نوح في العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: “Peace be upon Noah among all peoples.”

text_simple: انا كذلك نجزي المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

text_simple: انه من عبادنا المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ he was truly one of Our faithful servants.

text_simple: ثم اغرقنا الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then We drowned the others.

text_simple: وان من شيعته لابراهيم
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, one of those who followed his way was Abraham.

text_simple: اذ جاء ربه بقلب سليم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when he came to his Lord with a pure heart

text_simple: اذ قال لابيه وقومه ماذا تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: and said to his father and his people, “What are you worshipping?

text_simple: ائفكا الهة دون الله تريدون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it false gods that you desire instead of Allah?

text_simple: فما ظنكم برب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: What then do you expect from the Lord of all worlds?”

text_simple: فنظر نظرة في النجوم
translation_en_yusufali: He later looked up to the stars ˹in contemplation˺

text_simple: فقال اني سقيم
translation_en_yusufali: then said, “I am really sick.”

text_simple: فتولوا عنه مدبرين
translation_en_yusufali: So they turned their backs on him and went away.

text_simple: فراغ الى الهتهم فقال الا تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: Then he ˹stealthily˺ advanced towards their gods, and said ˹mockingly˺, “Will you not eat ˹your offerings˺?

text_simple: ما لكم لا تنطقون
translation_en_yusufali: What is wrong with you that you cannot speak?”

text_simple: فراغ عليهم ضربا باليمين
translation_en_yusufali: Then he swiftly turned on them, striking ˹them˺ with his right hand.

text_simple: فاقبلوا اليه يزفون
translation_en_yusufali: Later, his people came rushing towards him ˹furiously˺.

text_simple: قال اتعبدون ما تنحتون
translation_en_yusufali: He argued, “How can you worship what you carve ˹with your own hands˺

text_simple: والله خلقكم وما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: when it is Allah Who created you and whatever you do?”

text_simple: قالوا ابنوا له بنيانا فالقوه في الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: They said ˹to one another˺, “Build him a furnace and cast him into the blazing fire.”

text_simple: فارادوا به كيدا فجعلناهم الاسفلين
translation_en_yusufali: And so they sought to harm him, but We made them inferior.

text_simple: وقال اني ذاهب الى ربي سيهدين
translation_en_yusufali: He later said, “I am leaving ˹in obedience˺ to my Lord. He will guide me.

text_simple: رب هب لي من الصالحين
translation_en_yusufali: My Lord! Bless me with righteous offspring.”

text_simple: فبشرناه بغلام حليم
translation_en_yusufali: So We gave him good news of a forbearing son.

text_simple: فلما بلغ معه السعي قال يا بني اني ارى في المنام اني اذبحك فانظر ماذا ترى قال يا ابت افعل ما تؤمر ستجدني ان شاء الله من الصابرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then when the boy reached the age to work with him, Abraham said, “O my dear son! I have seen in a dream that I ˹must˺ sacrifice you. So tell me what you think.” He replied, “O my dear father! Do as you are commanded. Allah willing, you will find me steadfast.”

text_simple: فلما اسلما وتله للجبين
translation_en_yusufali: Then when they submitted ˹to Allah’s Will˺, and Abraham laid him on the side of his forehead ˹for sacrifice˺

text_simple: وناديناه ان يا ابراهيم
translation_en_yusufali: We called out to him, “O Abraham!

text_simple: قد صدقت الرؤيا انا كذلك نجزي المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: You have already fulfilled the vision.” Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

text_simple: ان هذا لهو البلاء المبين
translation_en_yusufali: That was truly a revealing test.

text_simple: وفديناه بذبح عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: And We ransomed his son with a great sacrifice

text_simple: وتركنا عليه في الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: and blessed Abraham ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

text_simple: سلام على ابراهيم
translation_en_yusufali: “Peace be upon Abraham.”

text_simple: كذلك نجزي المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: This is how We reward the good-doers.

text_simple: انه من عبادنا المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.

text_simple: وبشرناه باسحاق نبيا من الصالحين
translation_en_yusufali: We ˹later˺ gave him good news of Isaac—a prophet, and one of the righteous.

text_simple: وباركنا عليه وعلى اسحاق ومن ذريتهما محسن وظالم لنفسه مبين
translation_en_yusufali: We blessed him and Isaac as well. Some of their descendants did good, while others clearly wronged themselves.

text_simple: ولقد مننا على موسى وهارون
translation_en_yusufali: And We certainly showed favour to Moses and Aaron

text_simple: ونجيناهما وقومهما من الكرب العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: and delivered them and their people from the great distress.

text_simple: ونصرناهم فكانوا هم الغالبين
translation_en_yusufali: We helped them so it was they who prevailed.

text_simple: واتيناهما الكتاب المستبين
translation_en_yusufali: We gave them the clear Scripture

text_simple: وهديناهما الصراط المستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: and guided them to the Straight Path.

text_simple: وتركنا عليهما في الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: And We blessed them ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

text_simple: سلام على موسى وهارون
translation_en_yusufali: “Peace be upon Moses and Aaron.”

text_simple: انا كذلك نجزي المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

text_simple: انهما من عبادنا المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: They were truly ˹two˺ of Our faithful servants.

text_simple: وان الياس لمن المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: And Elias was indeed one of the messengers.

text_simple: اذ قال لقومه الا تتقون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when he said to his people, “Will you not fear ˹Allah˺?

text_simple: اتدعون بعلا وتذرون احسن الخالقين
translation_en_yusufali: Do you call upon ˹the idol of˺ Ba’l and abandon the Best of Creators—

text_simple: الله ربكم ورب ابائكم الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

text_simple: فكذبوه فانهم لمحضرون
translation_en_yusufali: But they rejected him, so they will certainly be brought ˹for punishment˺.

text_simple: الا عباد الله المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

text_simple: وتركنا عليه في الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: We blessed him ˹with honourable mention˺ among later generations:

text_simple: سلام على ال ياسين
translation_en_yusufali: “Peace be upon Elias.”

text_simple: انا كذلك نجزي المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this is how We reward the good-doers.

text_simple: انه من عبادنا المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: He was truly one of Our faithful servants.

text_simple: وان لوطا لمن المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: And Lot was indeed one of the messengers.

text_simple: اذ نجيناه واهله اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when We delivered him and all of his family

text_simple: الا عجوزا في الغابرين
translation_en_yusufali: except an old woman, who was one of the doomed.

text_simple: ثم دمرنا الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then We ˹utterly˺ destroyed the rest.

text_simple: وانكم لتمرون عليهم مصبحين
translation_en_yusufali: You ˹Meccans˺ certainly pass by their ruins day

text_simple: وبالليل افلا تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: and night. Will you not then understand?

text_simple: وان يونس لمن المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: And Jonah was indeed one of the messengers.

text_simple: اذ ابق الى الفلك المشحون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when he fled to the overloaded ship.

text_simple: فساهم فكان من المدحضين
translation_en_yusufali: Then ˹to save it from sinking,˺ he drew straws ˹with other passengers˺. He lost ˹and was thrown overboard˺.

text_simple: فالتقمه الحوت وهو مليم
translation_en_yusufali: Then the whale engulfed him while he was blameworthy.

text_simple: فلولا انه كان من المسبحين
translation_en_yusufali: Had he not ˹constantly˺ glorified ˹Allah˺

text_simple: للبث في بطنه الى يوم يبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: he would have certainly remained in its belly until the Day of Resurrection.

text_simple: فنبذناه بالعراء وهو سقيم
translation_en_yusufali: But We cast him onto the open ˹shore˺, ˹totally˺ worn out

text_simple: وانبتنا عليه شجرة من يقطين
translation_en_yusufali: and caused a squash plant to grow over him.

text_simple: وارسلناه الى مائة الف او يزيدون
translation_en_yusufali: We ˹later˺ sent him ˹back˺ to ˹his city of˺ at least one hundred thousand people

text_simple: فامنوا فمتعناهم الى حين
translation_en_yusufali: who then believed ˹in him˺, so We allowed them enjoyment for a while.

text_simple: فاستفتهم الربك البنات ولهم البنون
translation_en_yusufali: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ if your Lord has daughters, while the pagans ˹prefer to˺ have sons.

text_simple: ام خلقنا الملائكة اناثا وهم شاهدون
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹ask them˺ if We created the angels as females right before their eyes.

text_simple: الا انهم من افكهم ليقولون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, it is one of their ˹outrageous˺ fabrications to say

text_simple: ولد الله وانهم لكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: “Allah has children.” They are simply liars.

text_simple: اصطفى البنات على البنين
translation_en_yusufali: Has He chosen daughters over sons?

text_simple: ما لكم كيف تحكمون
translation_en_yusufali: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

text_simple: افلا تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Will you not then be mindful?

text_simple: ام لكم سلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Or do you have ˹any˺ compelling proof?

text_simple: فاتوا بكتابكم ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Then bring ˹us˺ your scripture, if what you say is true!

text_simple: وجعلوا بينه وبين الجنة نسبا ولقد علمت الجنة انهم لمحضرون
translation_en_yusufali: They have also established a ˹marital˺ relationship between Him and the jinn. Yet the jinn ˹themselves˺ know well that such people will certainly be brought ˹for punishment˺.

text_simple: سبحان الله عما يصفون
translation_en_yusufali: Glorified is Allah far above what they claim!

text_simple: الا عباد الله المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: But not the chosen servants of Allah.

text_simple: فانكم وما تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely you ˹pagans˺ and whatever ˹idols˺ you worship

text_simple: ما انتم عليه بفاتنين
translation_en_yusufali: can never lure ˹anyone˺ away from Him

text_simple: الا من هو صال الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: except those ˹destined˺ to burn in Hell.

text_simple: وما منا الا له مقام معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The angels respond,˺ “There is not one of us without an assigned station ˹of worship˺.

text_simple: وانا لنحن الصافون
translation_en_yusufali: We are indeed the ones lined up in ranks ˹for Allah˺.

text_simple: وانا لنحن المسبحون
translation_en_yusufali: And we are indeed the ones ˹constantly˺ glorifying ˹His praise˺.”

text_simple: وان كانوا ليقولون
translation_en_yusufali: They certainly used to say

text_simple: لو ان عندنا ذكرا من الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: “If only we had a Reminder like ˹those of˺ earlier peoples

text_simple: لكنا عباد الله المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: we would have truly been Allah’s devoted servants.”

text_simple: فكفروا به فسوف يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: But ˹now˺ they reject it, so they will soon know.

text_simple: ولقد سبقت كلمتنا لعبادنا المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: Our Word has already gone forth to Our servants, the messengers

text_simple: انهم لهم المنصورون
translation_en_yusufali: that they would surely be helped

text_simple: وان جندنا لهم الغالبون
translation_en_yusufali: and that Our forces will certainly prevail.

text_simple: فتول عنهم حتى حين
translation_en_yusufali: So turn away from the deniers for a while ˹O Prophet˺.

text_simple: وابصرهم فسوف يبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: You will see ˹what will happen to˺ them, and they too will see!

text_simple: افبعذابنا يستعجلون
translation_en_yusufali: Do they ˹really˺ wish to hasten Our punishment?

text_simple: فاذا نزل بساحتهم فساء صباح المنذرين
translation_en_yusufali: Yet when it descends upon them: how evil will that morning be for those who had been warned!

text_simple: وتول عنهم حتى حين
translation_en_yusufali: And turn away from them for a while.

text_simple: وابصر فسوف يبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: You will see, and they too will see!

text_simple: سبحان ربك رب العزة عما يصفون
translation_en_yusufali: Glorified is your Lord—the Lord of Honour and Power—above what they claim!

text_simple: وسلام على المرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: Peace be upon the messengers.

text_simple: والحمد لله رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: And praise be to Allah—Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: ص والقران ذي الذكر
translation_en_yusufali: Ṣãd. By the Quran, full of reminders!

text_simple: بل الذين كفروا في عزة وشقاق
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is the truth,˺ yet the disbelievers are ˹entrenched˺ in arrogance and opposition.

text_simple: كم اهلكنا من قبلهم من قرن فنادوا ولات حين مناص
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, and they cried out when it was too late to escape.

text_simple: وعجبوا ان جاءهم منذر منهم وقال الكافرون هذا ساحر كذاب
translation_en_yusufali: Now, the pagans are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, “This is a magician, a total liar!

text_simple: اجعل الالهة الها واحدا ان هذا لشيء عجاب
translation_en_yusufali: Has he reduced ˹all˺ the gods to One God? Indeed, this is something totally astonishing.”

text_simple: وانطلق الملا منهم ان امشوا واصبروا على الهتكم ان هذا لشيء يراد
translation_en_yusufali: The chiefs among them went forth saying, “Carry on, and stand firm in devotion to your gods. Certainly this is just a scheme ˹for power˺.

text_simple: ما سمعنا بهذا في الملة الاخرة ان هذا الا اختلاق
translation_en_yusufali: We have never heard of this in the previous faith. This is nothing but a fabrication.

text_simple: اانزل عليه الذكر من بيننا بل هم في شك من ذكري بل لما يذوقوا عذاب
translation_en_yusufali: Has the Reminder been revealed ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us?” In fact, they are ˹only˺ in doubt of My ˹revealed˺ Reminder. In fact, ˹they do so because˺ they have not yet tasted My punishment.

text_simple: ام عندهم خزائن رحمة ربك العزيز الوهاب
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹is it because˺ they possess the treasuries of the mercy of your Lord—the Almighty, the Giver ˹of all bounties˺.

text_simple: ام لهم ملك السماوات والارض وما بينهما فليرتقوا في الاسباب
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹is it because˺ the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between belongs to them? Let them then climb their way ˹to heaven, if their claim is true˺.

text_simple: جند ما هنالك مهزوم من الاحزاب
translation_en_yusufali: This is just another ˹enemy˺ force bound for defeat out there.

text_simple: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح وعاد وفرعون ذو الاوتاد
translation_en_yusufali: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺, as did ’Âd, Pharaoh of the mighty structures

text_simple: وثمود وقوم لوط واصحاب الايكة اولئك الاحزاب
translation_en_yusufali: Thamûd, the people of Lot, and the residents of the Forest. These were ˹all˺ enemy forces.

text_simple: ان كل الا كذب الرسل فحق عقاب
translation_en_yusufali: Each rejected their messenger, so My punishment was justified.

text_simple: وما ينظر هؤلاء الا صيحة واحدة ما لها من فواق
translation_en_yusufali: These ˹pagans˺ are awaiting nothing but a single Blast that cannot be stopped.

text_simple: وقالوا ربنا عجل لنا قطنا قبل يوم الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: They say ˹mockingly˺, “Our Lord! Hasten for us our share ˹of the punishment˺ before the Day of Reckoning.”

text_simple: اصبر على ما يقولون واذكر عبدنا داوود ذا الايد انه اواب
translation_en_yusufali: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And remember Our servant, David, the man of strength. Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: انا سخرنا الجبال معه يسبحن بالعشي والاشراق
translation_en_yusufali: We truly subjected the mountains to hymn ˹Our praises˺ along with him in the evening and after sunrise.

text_simple: والطير محشورة كل له اواب
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹We subjected˺ the birds, flocking together. All turned to him ˹echoing his hymns˺.

text_simple: وشددنا ملكه واتيناه الحكمة وفصل الخطاب
translation_en_yusufali: We strengthened his kingship, and gave him wisdom and sound judgment.

text_simple: وهل اتاك نبا الخصم اذ تسوروا المحراب
translation_en_yusufali: Has the story of the two plaintiffs, who scaled the ˹wall of David’s˺ sanctuary, reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

text_simple: اذ دخلوا على داوود ففزع منهم قالوا لا تخف خصمان بغى بعضنا على بعض فاحكم بيننا بالحق ولا تشطط واهدنا الى سواء الصراط
translation_en_yusufali: When they came into David’s presence, he was startled by them. They said, “Have no fear. ˹We are merely˺ two in a dispute: one of us has wronged the other. So judge between us with truth—do not go beyond ˹it˺—and guide us to the right way.

text_simple: ان هذا اخي له تسع وتسعون نعجة ولي نعجة واحدة فقال اكفلنيها وعزني في الخطاب
translation_en_yusufali: This is my brother. He has ninety-nine sheep while I have ˹only˺ one. ˹Still˺ he asked me to give it up to him, overwhelming me with ˹his˺ argument.”

text_simple: قال لقد ظلمك بسؤال نعجتك الى نعاجه وان كثيرا من الخلطاء ليبغي بعضهم على بعض الا الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات وقليل ما هم وظن داوود انما فتناه فاستغفر ربه وخر راكعا واناب
translation_en_yusufali: David ˹eventually˺ ruled, “He has definitely wronged you in demanding ˹to add˺ your sheep to his. And certainly many partners wrong each other, except those who believe and do good—but how few are they!” Then David realized that We had tested him so he asked for his Lord’s forgiveness, fell down in prostration, and turned ˹to Him in repentance˺.

text_simple: فغفرنا له ذلك وان له عندنا لزلفى وحسن ماب
translation_en_yusufali: So We forgave that for him. And he will indeed have ˹a status of˺ closeness to Us and an honourable destination!

text_simple: يا داوود انا جعلناك خليفة في الارض فاحكم بين الناس بالحق ولا تتبع الهوى فيضلك عن سبيل الله ان الذين يضلون عن سبيل الله لهم عذاب شديد بما نسوا يوم الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹We instructed him:˺ “O David! We have surely made you an authority in the land, so judge between people with truth. And do not follow ˹your˺ desires or they will lead you astray from Allah’s Way. Surely those who go astray from Allah’s Way will suffer a severe punishment for neglecting the Day of Reckoning.”

text_simple: وما خلقنا السماء والارض وما بينهما باطلا ذلك ظن الذين كفروا فويل للذين كفروا من النار
translation_en_yusufali: We have not created the heavens and earth and everything in between without purpose—as the disbelievers think. So woe to the disbelievers because of the Fire!

text_simple: ام نجعل الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات كالمفسدين في الارض ام نجعل المتقين كالفجار
translation_en_yusufali: Or should We treat those who believe and do good like those who make mischief throughout the land? Or should We treat the righteous like the wicked?

text_simple: كتاب انزلناه اليك مبارك ليدبروا اياته وليتذكر اولو الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ a blessed Book which We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ so that they may contemplate its verses, and people of reason may be mindful.

text_simple: ووهبنا لداوود سليمان نعم العبد انه اواب
translation_en_yusufali: And We blessed David with Solomon—what an excellent servant ˹he was˺! Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: اذ عرض عليه بالعشي الصافنات الجياد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when the well-trained, swift horses were paraded before him in the evening.

text_simple: فقال اني احببت حب الخير عن ذكر ربي حتى توارت بالحجاب
translation_en_yusufali: He then proclaimed, “I am truly in love with ˹these˺ fine things out of remembrance for Allah,” until they went out of sight.

text_simple: ردوها علي فطفق مسحا بالسوق والاعناق
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He ordered,˺ “Bring them back to me!” Then he began to rub down their legs and necks.

text_simple: ولقد فتنا سليمان والقينا على كرسيه جسدا ثم اناب
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We tested Solomon, placing a ˹deformed˺ body on his throne, then he turned ˹to Allah in repentance˺.

text_simple: قال رب اغفر لي وهب لي ملكا لا ينبغي لاحد من بعدي انك انت الوهاب
translation_en_yusufali: He prayed, “My Lord! Forgive me, and grant me an authority that will never be matched by anyone after me. You are indeed the Giver ˹of all bounties˺.”

text_simple: فسخرنا له الريح تجري بامره رخاء حيث اصاب
translation_en_yusufali: So We subjected to him the wind, blowing gently at his command to wherever he pleased.

text_simple: والشياطين كل بناء وغواص
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹We subjected to him˺ every builder and diver of the jinn

text_simple: واخرين مقرنين في الاصفاد
translation_en_yusufali: and others bound together in chains.

text_simple: هذا عطاؤنا فامنن او امسك بغير حساب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Allah said,˺ “This is Our gift, so give or withhold ˹as you wish˺, never to be called to account.”

text_simple: وان له عندنا لزلفى وحسن ماب
translation_en_yusufali: And he will indeed have ˹a status of˺ closeness to Us and an honourable destination!

text_simple: واذكر عبدنا ايوب اذ نادى ربه اني مسني الشيطان بنصب وعذاب
translation_en_yusufali: And remember Our servant Job, when he cried out to his Lord, “Satan has afflicted me with distress and suffering.”

text_simple: اركض برجلك هذا مغتسل بارد وشراب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹We responded,˺ “Stomp your foot: ˹now˺ here is a cool ˹and refreshing˺ spring for washing and drinking.”

text_simple: ووهبنا له اهله ومثلهم معهم رحمة منا وذكرى لاولي الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: And We gave him back his family, twice as many, as a mercy from Us and a lesson for people of reason.

text_simple: وخذ بيدك ضغثا فاضرب به ولا تحنث انا وجدناه صابرا نعم العبد انه اواب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹And We said to him,˺ “Take in your hand a bundle of grass, and strike ˹your wife˺ with it, and do not break your oath.” We truly found him patient. What an excellent servant ˹he was˺! Indeed, he ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: واذكر عبادنا ابراهيم واسحاق ويعقوب اولي الايدي والابصار
translation_en_yusufali: And remember Our servants: Abraham, Isaac, and Jacob—the men of strength and insight.

text_simple: انا اخلصناهم بخالصة ذكرى الدار
translation_en_yusufali: We truly chose them for the honour of proclaiming the Hereafter.

text_simple: وانهم عندنا لمن المصطفين الاخيار
translation_en_yusufali: And in Our sight they are truly among the chosen and the finest.

text_simple: واذكر اسماعيل واليسع وذا الكفل وكل من الاخيار
translation_en_yusufali: Also remember Ishmael, Elisha, and Ⱬul-Kifl. All are among the best.

text_simple: هذا ذكر وان للمتقين لحسن ماب
translation_en_yusufali: This is ˹all˺ a reminder. And the righteous will certainly have an honourable destination:

text_simple: جنات عدن مفتحة لهم الابواب
translation_en_yusufali: the Gardens of Eternity, whose gates will be open for them.

text_simple: متكئين فيها يدعون فيها بفاكهة كثيرة وشراب
translation_en_yusufali: There they will recline, calling for abundant fruit and drink.

text_simple: وعندهم قاصرات الطرف اتراب
translation_en_yusufali: And with them will be maidens of modest gaze and equal age.

text_simple: هذا ما توعدون ليوم الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: This is what you are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

text_simple: ان هذا لرزقنا ما له من نفاد
translation_en_yusufali: This is indeed Our provision that will never end.

text_simple: هذا وان للطاغين لشر ماب
translation_en_yusufali: That is that. And the transgressors will certainly have the worst destination:

text_simple: جهنم يصلونها فبئس المهاد
translation_en_yusufali: Hell, where they will burn. What an evil place to rest!

text_simple: هذا فليذوقوه حميم وغساق
translation_en_yusufali: Let them then taste this: boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus

text_simple: واخر من شكله ازواج
translation_en_yusufali: and other torments of the same sort!

text_simple: هذا فوج مقتحم معكم لا مرحبا بهم انهم صالو النار
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The misleaders will say to one another,˺ “Here is a crowd ˹of followers˺ being thrown in with us. They are not welcome, ˹for˺ they ˹too˺ will burn in the Fire.”

text_simple: قالوا بل انتم لا مرحبا بكم انتم قدمتموه لنا فبئس القرار
translation_en_yusufali: The followers will respond, “No! You are not welcome! You brought this upon us. What an evil place for settlement!”

text_simple: قالوا ربنا من قدم لنا هذا فزده عذابا ضعفا في النار
translation_en_yusufali: Adding, “Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, double their punishment in the Fire.”

text_simple: وقالوا ما لنا لا نرى رجالا كنا نعدهم من الاشرار
translation_en_yusufali: The tyrants will ask ˹one another˺, “But why do we not see those we considered to be lowly?

text_simple: اتخذناهم سخريا ام زاغت عنهم الابصار
translation_en_yusufali: Were we wrong in mocking them ˹in the world˺? Or do our eyes ˹just˺ fail to see them ˹in the Fire˺?”

text_simple: ان ذلك لحق تخاصم اهل النار
translation_en_yusufali: This dispute between the residents of the Fire will certainly come to pass.

text_simple: قل انما انا منذر وما من اله الا الله الواحد القهار
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a warner. And there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah—the One, the Supreme.

text_simple: رب السماوات والارض وما بينهما العزيز الغفار
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between—the Almighty, Most Forgiving.”

text_simple: قل هو نبا عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “This ˹Quran˺ is momentous news

text_simple: انتم عنه معرضون
translation_en_yusufali: from which you ˹pagans˺ are turning away.”

text_simple: ما كان لي من علم بالملا الاعلى اذ يختصمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹And say,˺ “I had no knowledge of the highest assembly ˹in heaven˺ when they differed ˹concerning Adam˺.

text_simple: ان يوحى الي الا انما انا نذير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: What is revealed to me is that I am only sent with a clear warning.”

text_simple: اذ قال ربك للملائكة اني خالق بشرا من طين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create a human being from clay.

text_simple: فاذا سويته ونفخت فيه من روحي فقعوا له ساجدين
translation_en_yusufali: So when I have fashioned him and had a spirit of My Own ˹creation˺ breathed into him, fall down in prostration to him.”

text_simple: فسجد الملائكة كلهم اجمعون
translation_en_yusufali: So the angels prostrated all together—

text_simple: الا ابليس استكبر وكان من الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: but not Iblîs, who acted arrogantly, becoming unfaithful.

text_simple: قال يا ابليس ما منعك ان تسجد لما خلقت بيدي استكبرت ام كنت من العالين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah asked, “O Iblîs! What prevented you from prostrating to what I created with My Own Hands? Did you ˹just˺ become proud? Or have you always been arrogant?”

text_simple: قال انا خير منه خلقتني من نار وخلقته من طين
translation_en_yusufali: He replied, “I am better than he is: You created me from fire and him from clay.”

text_simple: قال فاخرج منها فانك رجيم
translation_en_yusufali: Allah commanded, “Then get out of Paradise, for you are truly cursed.

text_simple: وان عليك لعنتي الى يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: And surely upon you is My condemnation until the Day of Judgment.”

text_simple: قال رب فانظرني الى يوم يبعثون
translation_en_yusufali: Satan appealed, “My Lord! Then delay my end until the Day of their resurrection.”

text_simple: قال فانك من المنظرين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah said, “You will be delayed

text_simple: الى يوم الوقت المعلوم
translation_en_yusufali: until the appointed Day.”

text_simple: قال فبعزتك لاغوينهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: Satan said, “By Your Glory! I will certainly mislead them all

text_simple: الا عبادك منهم المخلصين
translation_en_yusufali: except Your chosen servants among them.”

text_simple: قال فالحق والحق اقول
translation_en_yusufali: Allah concluded, “The truth is—and I ˹only˺ say the truth—:

text_simple: لاملان جهنم منك وممن تبعك منهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: I will surely fill up Hell with you and whoever follows you from among them, all together.”

text_simple: قل ما اسالكم عليه من اجر وما انا من المتكلفين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I do not ask you for any reward for this ˹Quran˺, nor do I pretend to be someone I am not.

text_simple: ان هو الا ذكر للعالمين
translation_en_yusufali: It is only a reminder to the whole world.

text_simple: ولتعلمن نباه بعد حين
translation_en_yusufali: And you will certainly know its truth before long.”

text_simple: تنزيل الكتاب من الله العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: انا انزلنا اليك الكتاب بالحق فاعبد الله مخلصا له الدين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have sent down the Book to you ˹O Prophet˺ in truth, so worship Allah ˹alone˺, being sincerely devoted to Him.

text_simple: الا لله الدين الخالص والذين اتخذوا من دونه اولياء ما نعبدهم الا ليقربونا الى الله زلفى ان الله يحكم بينهم في ما هم فيه يختلفون ان الله لا يهدي من هو كاذب كفار
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, sincere devotion is due ˹only˺ to Allah. As for those who take other lords besides Him, ˹saying,˺ “We worship them only so they may bring us closer to Allah,” surely Allah will judge between all regarding what they differed about. Allah certainly does not guide whoever persists in lying and disbelief.

text_simple: لو اراد الله ان يتخذ ولدا لاصطفى مما يخلق ما يشاء سبحانه هو الله الواحد القهار
translation_en_yusufali: Had it been Allah’s Will to have offspring, He could have chosen whatever He willed of His creation. Glory be to Him! He is Allah—the One, the Supreme.

text_simple: خلق السماوات والارض بالحق يكور الليل على النهار ويكور النهار على الليل وسخر الشمس والقمر كل يجري لاجل مسمى الا هو العزيز الغفار
translation_en_yusufali: He created the heavens and the earth for a purpose. He wraps the night around the day, and wraps the day around the night. And He has subjected the sun and the moon, each orbiting for an appointed term. He is truly the Almighty, Most Forgiving.

text_simple: خلقكم من نفس واحدة ثم جعل منها زوجها وانزل لكم من الانعام ثمانية ازواج يخلقكم في بطون امهاتكم خلقا من بعد خلق في ظلمات ثلاث ذلكم الله ربكم له الملك لا اله الا هو فانى تصرفون
translation_en_yusufali: He created you ˹all˺ from a single soul, then from it He made its mate. And He produced for you four pairs of cattle. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers ˹in stages˺, one development after another, in three layers of darkness. That is Allah—your Lord! All authority belongs to Him. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. How can you then be turned away?

text_simple: ان تكفروا فان الله غني عنكم ولا يرضى لعباده الكفر وان تشكروا يرضه لكم ولا تزر وازرة وزر اخرى ثم الى ربكم مرجعكم فينبئكم بما كنتم تعملون انه عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: If you disbelieve, then ˹know that˺ Allah is truly not in need of you, nor does He approve of disbelief from His servants. But if you become grateful ˹through faith˺, He will appreciate that from you. No soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you of what you used to do. He certainly knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: واذا مس الانسان ضر دعا ربه منيبا اليه ثم اذا خوله نعمة منه نسي ما كان يدعو اليه من قبل وجعل لله اندادا ليضل عن سبيله قل تمتع بكفرك قليلا انك من اصحاب النار
translation_en_yusufali: When one is touched with hardship, they cry out to their Lord, turning to Him ˹alone˺. But as soon as He showers them with blessings from Him, they ˹totally˺ forget the One they had cried to earlier, and set up equals to Allah to mislead ˹others˺ from His Way. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Enjoy your disbelief for a little while! You will certainly be one of the inmates of the Fire.”

text_simple: امن هو قانت اناء الليل ساجدا وقائما يحذر الاخرة ويرجو رحمة ربه قل هل يستوي الذين يعلمون والذين لا يعلمون انما يتذكر اولو الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Are they better˺ or those who worship ˹their Lord˺ devoutly in the hours of the night, prostrating and standing, fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of their Lord? Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Are those who know equal to those who do not know?” None will be mindful ˹of this˺ except people of reason.

text_simple: قل يا عباد الذين امنوا اتقوا ربكم للذين احسنوا في هذه الدنيا حسنة وارض الله واسعة انما يوفى الصابرون اجرهم بغير حساب
translation_en_yusufali: Say ˹O Prophet, that Allah says˺, “O My servants who believe! Be mindful of your Lord. Those who do good in this world will have a good reward. And Allah’s earth is spacious. Only those who endure patiently will be given their reward without limit.”

text_simple: قل اني امرت ان اعبد الله مخلصا له الدين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “I am commanded to worship Allah, being sincerely devoted to Him ˹alone˺.

text_simple: وامرت لان اكون اول المسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: And I am commanded to be the first of those who submit ˹to His Will˺.”

text_simple: قل اني اخاف ان عصيت ربي عذاب يوم عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “I truly fear—if I were to disobey my Lord—the torment of a tremendous Day.”

text_simple: قل الله اعبد مخلصا له ديني
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “It is ˹only˺ Allah that I worship, being sincere in my devotion to Him.

text_simple: فاعبدوا ما شئتم من دونه قل ان الخاسرين الذين خسروا انفسهم واهليهم يوم القيامة الا ذلك هو الخسران المبين
translation_en_yusufali: Worship then whatever ˹gods˺ you want instead of Him.” Say, “The ˹true˺ losers are those who will lose themselves and their families on Judgment Day. That is indeed the clearest loss.”

text_simple: لهم من فوقهم ظلل من النار ومن تحتهم ظلل ذلك يخوف الله به عباده يا عباد فاتقون
translation_en_yusufali: They will have layers of fire above and below them. That is what Allah warns His servants with. So fear Me, O  My servants!

text_simple: والذين اجتنبوا الطاغوت ان يعبدوها وانابوا الى الله لهم البشرى فبشر عباد
translation_en_yusufali: And those who shun the worship of false gods, turning to Allah ˹alone˺, will have good news. So give good news to My servants ˹O Prophet˺—

text_simple: الذين يستمعون القول فيتبعون احسنه اولئك الذين هداهم الله واولئك هم اولو الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: those who listen to what is said and follow the best of it. These are the ones ˹rightly˺ guided by Allah, and these are ˹truly˺ the people of reason.

text_simple: افمن حق عليه كلمة العذاب افانت تنقذ من في النار
translation_en_yusufali: What about those against whom the decree of torment has been justified? Is it you ˹O Prophet˺ who will then save those bound for the Fire?

text_simple: لكن الذين اتقوا ربهم لهم غرف من فوقها غرف مبنية تجري من تحتها الانهار وعد الله لا يخلف الله الميعاد
translation_en_yusufali: But those mindful of their Lord will have ˹elevated˺ mansions, built one above the other, under which rivers flow. ˹That is˺ the promise of Allah. ˹And˺ Allah never fails in ˹His˺ promise.

text_simple: الم تر ان الله انزل من السماء ماء فسلكه ينابيع في الارض ثم يخرج به زرعا مختلفا الوانه ثم يهيج فتراه مصفرا ثم يجعله حطاما ان في ذلك لذكرى لاولي الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky—channelling it through streams in the earth—then produces with it crops of various colours, then they dry up and you see them wither, and then He reduces them to chaff? Surely in this is a reminder for people of reason.

text_simple: افمن شرح الله صدره للاسلام فهو على نور من ربه فويل للقاسية قلوبهم من ذكر الله اولئك في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Can ˹the misguided be like˺ those whose hearts Allah has opened to Islam, so they are enlightened by their Lord? So woe to those whose hearts are hardened at the remembrance of Allah! It is they who are clearly astray.

text_simple: الله نزل احسن الحديث كتابا متشابها مثاني تقشعر منه جلود الذين يخشون ربهم ثم تلين جلودهم وقلوبهم الى ذكر الله ذلك هدى الله يهدي به من يشاء ومن يضلل الله فما له من هاد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ has sent down the best message—a Book of perfect consistency and repeated lessons—which causes the skin ˹and hearts˺ of those who fear their Lord to tremble, then their skin and hearts soften at the mention of ˹the mercy of˺ Allah. That is the guidance of Allah, through which He guides whoever He wills. But whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

text_simple: افمن يتقي بوجهه سوء العذاب يوم القيامة وقيل للظالمين ذوقوا ما كنتم تكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: Are those who will only have their ˹bare˺ faces to shield themselves from the awful torment on Judgment Day ˹better than those in Paradise˺? It will ˹then˺ be said to the wrongdoers: “Reap what you sowed!”

text_simple: كذب الذين من قبلهم فاتاهم العذاب من حيث لا يشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: Those before them ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺, then the torment came upon them from where they least expected.

text_simple: فاذاقهم الله الخزي في الحياة الدنيا ولعذاب الاخرة اكبر لو كانوا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: So Allah made them taste humiliation in this worldly life, but far worse is the punishment of the Hereafter, if only they knew.

text_simple: ولقد ضربنا للناس في هذا القران من كل مثل لعلهم يتذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: We have certainly set forth every ˹kind of˺ lesson for people in this Quran, so perhaps they will be mindful.

text_simple: قرانا عربيا غير ذي عوج لعلهم يتقون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ a Quran ˹revealed˺ in Arabic without any crookedness, so perhaps they will be conscious ˹of Allah˺.

text_simple: ضرب الله مثلا رجلا فيه شركاء متشاكسون ورجلا سلما لرجل هل يستويان مثلا الحمد لله بل اكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah sets forth the parable of a slave owned by several quarrelsome masters, and a slave owned by only one master. Are they equal in condition? Praise be to Allah! In fact, most of them do not know.

text_simple: انك ميت وانهم ميتون
translation_en_yusufali: You ˹O Prophet˺ will certainly die, and they will die too.

text_simple: ثم انكم يوم القيامة عند ربكم تختصمون
translation_en_yusufali: Then on the Day of Judgment you will ˹all settle your˺ dispute before your Lord.

text_simple: فمن اظلم ممن كذب على الله وكذب بالصدق اذ جاءه اليس في جهنم مثوى للكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: Who then does more wrong than those who lie about Allah and reject the truth after it has reached them? Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the disbelievers?

text_simple: والذي جاء بالصدق وصدق به اولئك هم المتقون
translation_en_yusufali: And the one who has brought the truth and those who embrace it—it is they who are the righteous.

text_simple: لهم ما يشاءون عند ربهم ذلك جزاء المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the good-doers.

text_simple: ليكفر الله عنهم اسوا الذي عملوا ويجزيهم اجرهم باحسن الذي كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: As such, Allah will absolve them of ˹even˺ the worst of what they did and reward them according to the best of what they used to do.

text_simple: اليس الله بكاف عبده ويخوفونك بالذين من دونه ومن يضلل الله فما له من هاد
translation_en_yusufali: Is Allah not sufficient for His servant? Yet they threaten you with other ˹powerless˺ gods besides Him! Whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

text_simple: ومن يهد الله فما له من مضل اليس الله بعزيز ذي انتقام
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever Allah guides, none can lead astray. Is Allah not Almighty, capable of punishment?

text_simple: ولئن سالتهم من خلق السماوات والارض ليقولن الله قل افرايتم ما تدعون من دون الله ان ارادني الله بضر هل هن كاشفات ضره او ارادني برحمة هل هن ممسكات رحمته قل حسبي الله عليه يتوكل المتوكلون
translation_en_yusufali: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth, they will certainly say, “Allah!” Ask ˹them˺, “Consider then whatever ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Allah: if it was Allah’s Will to harm me, could they undo that harm? Or if He willed ˹some˺ mercy for me, could they withhold His mercy?” Say, “Allah is sufficient for me. In Him ˹alone˺ the faithful put their trust.”

text_simple: قل يا قوم اعملوا على مكانتكم اني عامل فسوف تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O my people! Persist in your ways, for I ˹too˺ will persist in mine. You will soon come to know

text_simple: من ياتيه عذاب يخزيه ويحل عليه عذاب مقيم
translation_en_yusufali: who will be visited by a humiliating torment ˹in this life˺ and overwhelmed by an everlasting punishment ˹in the next˺.”

text_simple: انا انزلنا عليك الكتاب للناس بالحق فمن اهتدى فلنفسه ومن ضل فانما يضل عليها وما انت عليهم بوكيل
translation_en_yusufali: Surely We have revealed to you the Book ˹O Prophet˺ with the truth for humanity. So whoever chooses to be guided, it is for their own good. And whoever chooses to stray, it is only to their own loss. You are not a keeper over them.

text_simple: الله يتوفى الانفس حين موتها والتي لم تمت في منامها فيمسك التي قضى عليها الموت ويرسل الاخرى الى اجل مسمى ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ calls back the souls ˹of people˺ upon their death as well as ˹the souls˺ of the living during their sleep. Then He keeps those for whom He has ordained death, and releases the others until ˹their˺ appointed time. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

text_simple: ام اتخذوا من دون الله شفعاء قل اولو كانوا لا يملكون شيئا ولا يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Or have they taken others besides Allah as intercessors? Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹Would they do so,˺ even though those ˹idols˺ have neither authority nor intelligence?”

text_simple: قل لله الشفاعة جميعا له ملك السماوات والارض ثم اليه ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “All intercession belongs to Allah ˹alone˺. To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.”

text_simple: واذا ذكر الله وحده اشمازت قلوب الذين لا يؤمنون بالاخرة واذا ذكر الذين من دونه اذا هم يستبشرون
translation_en_yusufali: Yet when Allah alone is mentioned, the hearts of those who disbelieve in the Hereafter are filled with disgust. But as soon as those ˹gods˺ other than Him are mentioned, they are filled with joy.

text_simple: قل اللهم فاطر السماوات والارض عالم الغيب والشهادة انت تحكم بين عبادك في ما كانوا فيه يختلفون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O Allah—Originator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the seen and unseen! You will judge between Your servants regarding their differences.”

text_simple: ولو ان للذين ظلموا ما في الارض جميعا ومثله معه لافتدوا به من سوء العذاب يوم القيامة وبدا لهم من الله ما لم يكونوا يحتسبون
translation_en_yusufali: Even if the wrongdoers were to possess everything in the world twice over, they would certainly offer it to ransom themselves from the horrible punishment on Judgment Day, for they will see from Allah what they had never expected.

text_simple: وبدا لهم سيئات ما كسبوا وحاق بهم ما كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: And the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds will unfold before them, and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

text_simple: فاذا مس الانسان ضر دعانا ثم اذا خولناه نعمة منا قال انما اوتيته على علم بل هي فتنة ولكن اكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: When one is touched with hardship, they cry out to Us ˹alone˺. Then when We shower Our blessings upon them, they say, “I have been granted all this only because of ˹my˺ knowledge.” Not at all! It is ˹no more than˺ a test. But most of them do not know.

text_simple: قد قالها الذين من قبلهم فما اغنى عنهم ما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: The same had already been said by those ˹destroyed˺ before them, but their ˹worldly˺ gains were of no benefit to them.

text_simple: فاصابهم سيئات ما كسبوا والذين ظلموا من هؤلاء سيصيبهم سيئات ما كسبوا وما هم بمعجزين
translation_en_yusufali: So the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds overtook them. And the wrongdoers among these ˹pagans˺ will be overtaken by the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds. And they will have no escape.

text_simple: اولم يعلموا ان الله يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not know that Allah gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills? Surely in this are signs for people who believe.

text_simple: قل يا عبادي الذين اسرفوا على انفسهم لا تقنطوا من رحمة الله ان الله يغفر الذنوب جميعا انه هو الغفور الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet, that Allah says,˺ “O My servants who have exceeded the limits against their souls! Do not lose hope in Allah’s mercy, for Allah certainly forgives all sins. He is indeed the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.
