text_simple: وانيبوا الى ربكم واسلموا له من قبل ان ياتيكم العذاب ثم لا تنصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Turn to your Lord ˹in repentance˺, and ˹fully˺ submit to Him before the punishment reaches you, ˹for˺ then you will not be helped.

text_simple: واتبعوا احسن ما انزل اليكم من ربكم من قبل ان ياتيكم العذاب بغتة وانتم لا تشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: Follow ˹the Quran,˺ the best of what has been revealed to you from your Lord, before the punishment takes you by surprise while you are unaware

text_simple: ان تقول نفس يا حسرتا على ما فرطت في جنب الله وان كنت لمن الساخرين
translation_en_yusufali: so that no ˹sinful˺ soul will say ˹on Judgment Day˺, ‘Woe to me for neglecting ˹my duties towards˺ Allah, while ridiculing ˹the truth˺.’

text_simple: او تقول لو ان الله هداني لكنت من المتقين
translation_en_yusufali: Or ˹a soul will˺ say, ‘If only Allah had guided me, I would have certainly been one of the righteous.’

text_simple: او تقول حين ترى العذاب لو ان لي كرة فاكون من المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: Or say, upon seeing the torment, ‘If only I had a second chance, I would have been one of the good-doers.’

text_simple: بلى قد جاءتك اياتي فكذبت بها واستكبرت وكنت من الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: Not at all! My revelations had already come to you, but you rejected them, acted arrogantly, and were one of the disbelievers.”

text_simple: ويوم القيامة ترى الذين كذبوا على الله وجوههم مسودة اليس في جهنم مثوى للمتكبرين
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day of Judgment you will see those who lied about Allah with their faces gloomy. Is Hell not a ˹fitting˺ home for the arrogant?

text_simple: وينجي الله الذين اتقوا بمفازتهم لا يمسهم السوء ولا هم يحزنون
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah will deliver those who were mindful ˹of Him˺ to their place of ˹ultimate˺ triumph. No evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.

text_simple: الله خالق كل شيء وهو على كل شيء وكيل
translation_en_yusufali: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is the Maintainer of everything.

text_simple: له مقاليد السماوات والارض والذين كفروا بايات الله اولئك هم الخاسرون
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belong the keys ˹of the treasuries˺ of the heavens and the earth. As for those who rejected the signs of Allah, it is they who will be the ˹true˺ losers.

text_simple: قل افغير الله تامروني اعبد ايها الجاهلون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Are you urging me to worship ˹anyone˺ other than Allah, O  ignorant ones?”

text_simple: ولقد اوحي اليك والى الذين من قبلك لئن اشركت ليحبطن عملك ولتكونن من الخاسرين
translation_en_yusufali: It has already been revealed to you—and to those ˹prophets˺ before you—that if you associate others ˹with Allah˺, your deeds will certainly be void and you will truly be one of the losers.

text_simple: بل الله فاعبد وكن من الشاكرين
translation_en_yusufali: Rather, worship Allah ˹alone˺ and be one of the grateful.

text_simple: وما قدروا الله حق قدره والارض جميعا قبضته يوم القيامة والسماوات مطويات بيمينه سبحانه وتعالى عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: They have not shown Allah His proper reverence—when on the Day of Judgment the ˹whole˺ earth will be in His Grip, and the heavens will be rolled up in His Right Hand. Glorified and Exalted is He above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

text_simple: ونفخ في الصور فصعق من في السماوات ومن في الارض الا من شاء الله ثم نفخ فيه اخرى فاذا هم قيام ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: The Trumpet will be blown and all those in the heavens and all those on the earth will fall dead, except those Allah wills ˹to spare˺. Then it will be blown again and they will rise up at once, looking on ˹in anticipation˺.

text_simple: واشرقت الارض بنور ربها ووضع الكتاب وجيء بالنبيين والشهداء وقضي بينهم بالحق وهم لا يظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: The earth will shine with the light of its Lord, the record ˹of deeds˺ will be laid ˹open˺, the prophets and the witnesses will be brought forward—and judgment will be passed on all with fairness. None will be wronged.

text_simple: ووفيت كل نفس ما عملت وهو اعلم بما يفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: Every soul will be paid in full for its deeds, for Allah knows best what they have done.

text_simple: وسيق الذين كفروا الى جهنم زمرا حتى اذا جاءوها فتحت ابوابها وقال لهم خزنتها الم ياتكم رسل منكم يتلون عليكم ايات ربكم وينذرونكم لقاء يومكم هذا قالوا بلى ولكن حقت كلمة العذاب على الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: Those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in ˹successive˺ groups. When they arrive there, its gates will be opened and its keepers will ask them: “Did messengers not come to you from among yourselves, reciting to you the revelations of your Lord and warning you of the coming of this Day of yours?” The disbelievers will cry, “Yes ˹indeed˺! But the decree of torment has come to pass against the disbelievers.”

text_simple: قيل ادخلوا ابواب جهنم خالدين فيها فبئس مثوى المتكبرين
translation_en_yusufali: It will be said to them, “Enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever.” What an evil home for the arrogant!

text_simple: وسيق الذين اتقوا ربهم الى الجنة زمرا حتى اذا جاءوها وفتحت ابوابها وقال لهم خزنتها سلام عليكم طبتم فادخلوها خالدين
translation_en_yusufali: And those who were mindful of their Lord will be led to Paradise in ˹successive˺ groups. When they arrive at its ˹already˺ open gates, its keepers will say, “Peace be upon you! You have done well, so come in, to stay forever.”

text_simple: وقالوا الحمد لله الذي صدقنا وعده واورثنا الارض نتبوا من الجنة حيث نشاء فنعم اجر العاملين
translation_en_yusufali: The righteous will say, “Praise be to Allah Who has fulfilled His promise to us, and made us inherit the ˹everlasting˺ land to settle in Paradise wherever we please.” How excellent is the reward of those who work ˹righteousness˺!

text_simple: وترى الملائكة حافين من حول العرش يسبحون بحمد ربهم وقضي بينهم بالحق وقيل الحمد لله رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: You will see the angels all around the Throne, glorifying the praises of their Lord, for judgment will have been passed on all with fairness. And it will be said, “Praise be to Allah—Lord of all worlds!”

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: تنزيل الكتاب من الله العزيز العليم
translation_en_yusufali: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Knowing

text_simple: غافر الذنب وقابل التوب شديد العقاب ذي الطول لا اله الا هو اليه المصير
translation_en_yusufali: the Forgiver of sin and Accepter of repentance, the Severe in punishment, and Infinite in bounty. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. To Him ˹alone˺  is the final return.

text_simple: ما يجادل في ايات الله الا الذين كفروا فلا يغررك تقلبهم في البلاد
translation_en_yusufali: None disputes the signs of Allah except the disbelievers, so do not be deceived by their prosperity throughout the land.

text_simple: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح والاحزاب من بعدهم وهمت كل امة برسولهم لياخذوه وجادلوا بالباطل ليدحضوا به الحق فاخذتهم فكيف كان عقاب
translation_en_yusufali: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺, as did ˹other˺ enemy forces afterwards. Every community plotted against its prophet to seize him, and argued in falsehood, ˹hoping˺ to discredit the truth with it. So I seized them. And how ˹horrible˺ was My punishment!

text_simple: وكذلك حقت كلمت ربك على الذين كفروا انهم اصحاب النار
translation_en_yusufali: And so your Lord’s decree has been proven true against the disbelievers—that they will be the inmates of the Fire.

text_simple: الذين يحملون العرش ومن حوله يسبحون بحمد ربهم ويؤمنون به ويستغفرون للذين امنوا ربنا وسعت كل شيء رحمة وعلما فاغفر للذين تابوا واتبعوا سبيلك وقهم عذاب الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Those ˹angels˺ who carry the Throne and those around it glorify the praises of their Lord, have faith in Him, and seek forgiveness for the believers, ˹praying:˺ “Our Lord! You encompass everything in ˹Your˺ mercy and knowledge. So forgive those who repent and follow Your Way, and protect them from the torment of the Hellfire.

text_simple: ربنا وادخلهم جنات عدن التي وعدتهم ومن صلح من ابائهم وازواجهم وذرياتهم انك انت العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! Admit them into the Gardens of Eternity which You have promised them, along with the righteous among their parents, spouses, and descendants. You ˹alone˺ are truly the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: وقهم السيئات ومن تق السيئات يومئذ فقد رحمته وذلك هو الفوز العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: And protect them from ˹the consequences of their˺ evil deeds. For whoever You protect from the evil of their deeds on that Day will have been shown Your mercy. That is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph.”

text_simple: ان الذين كفروا ينادون لمقت الله اكبر من مقتكم انفسكم اذ تدعون الى الايمان فتكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, it will be announced to the disbelievers, “Allah’s contempt for you—as you disbelieved when invited to belief—was far worse than your contempt for one another ˹Today˺.”

text_simple: قالوا ربنا امتنا اثنتين واحييتنا اثنتين فاعترفنا بذنوبنا فهل الى خروج من سبيل
translation_en_yusufali: They will plead, “Our Lord! You made us lifeless twice, and gave us life twice. Now we confess our sins. So is there any way out?”

text_simple: ذلكم بانه اذا دعي الله وحده كفرتم وان يشرك به تؤمنوا فالحكم لله العلي الكبير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “˹No!˺ This is because when Allah alone was invoked, you ˹staunchly˺ disbelieved. But when others were associated with Him ˹in worship˺, you ˹readily˺ believed. So ˹Today˺ judgment belongs to Allah ˹alone˺—the Most High, All-Great.”

text_simple: هو الذي يريكم اياته وينزل لكم من السماء رزقا وما يتذكر الا من ينيب
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who shows you His signs and sends down ˹rain as˺ a provision for you from the sky. ˹But˺ none will be mindful except those who turn ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: فادعوا الله مخلصين له الدين ولو كره الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: So call upon Allah with sincere devotion, even to the dismay of the disbelievers.

text_simple: رفيع الدرجات ذو العرش يلقي الروح من امره على من يشاء من عباده لينذر يوم التلاق
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ Highly Exalted in rank, Lord of the Throne. He sends down the revelation by His command to whoever He wills of His servants to warn ˹all˺ of the Day of Meeting—

text_simple: يوم هم بارزون لا يخفى على الله منهم شيء لمن الملك اليوم لله الواحد القهار
translation_en_yusufali: the Day all will appear ˹before Allah˺. Nothing about them will be hidden from Him. ˹He will ask,˺ “Who does all authority belong to this Day? To Allah—the One, the Supreme!

text_simple: اليوم تجزى كل نفس بما كسبت لا ظلم اليوم ان الله سريع الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: Today every soul will be rewarded for what it has done. No injustice Today! Surely Allah is swift in reckoning.”

text_simple: وانذرهم يوم الازفة اذ القلوب لدى الحناجر كاظمين ما للظالمين من حميم ولا شفيع يطاع
translation_en_yusufali: Warn them ˹O Prophet˺ of the approaching Day when the hearts will jump into the throats, suppressing distress. The wrongdoers will have neither a close friend nor intercessor to be heard.

text_simple: يعلم خائنة الاعين وما تخفي الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: Allah ˹even˺ knows the sly glances of the eyes and whatever the hearts conceal.

text_simple: والله يقضي بالحق والذين يدعون من دونه لا يقضون بشيء ان الله هو السميع البصير
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah judges with the truth, while those ˹idols˺ they invoke besides Him cannot judge at all. Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

text_simple: اولم يسيروا في الارض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين كانوا من قبلهم كانوا هم اشد منهم قوة واثارا في الارض فاخذهم الله بذنوبهم وما كان لهم من الله من واق
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those ˹destroyed˺ before them? They were far superior in might and ˹richer in˺ monuments throughout the land. But Allah seized them for their sins, and they had no protector from Allah.

text_simple: ذلك بانهم كانت تاتيهم رسلهم بالبينات فكفروا فاخذهم الله انه قوي شديد العقاب
translation_en_yusufali: That was because their messengers used to come to them with clear proofs, but they persisted in disbelief. So Allah seized them. Surely He is All-Powerful, severe in punishment.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا موسى باياتنا وسلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent Moses with Our signs and compelling proof

text_simple: الى فرعون وهامان وقارون فقالوا ساحر كذاب
translation_en_yusufali: to Pharaoh, Hamân, and Korah. But they responded: “Magician! Total liar!”

text_simple: فلما جاءهم بالحق من عندنا قالوا اقتلوا ابناء الذين امنوا معه واستحيوا نساءهم وما كيد الكافرين الا في ضلال
translation_en_yusufali: Then, when he came to them with the truth from Us, they said, “Kill the sons of those who believe with him and keep their women.” But the plotting of the disbelievers was only in vain.

text_simple: وقال فرعون ذروني اقتل موسى وليدع ربه اني اخاف ان يبدل دينكم او ان يظهر في الارض الفساد
translation_en_yusufali: And Pharaoh said, “Let me kill Moses, and let him call upon his Lord! I truly fear that he may change your traditions or cause mischief in the land.”

text_simple: وقال موسى اني عذت بربي وربكم من كل متكبر لا يؤمن بيوم الحساب
translation_en_yusufali: Moses replied, “I seek refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant person who does not believe in the Day of Reckoning.”

text_simple: وقال رجل مؤمن من ال فرعون يكتم ايمانه اتقتلون رجلا ان يقول ربي الله وقد جاءكم بالبينات من ربكم وان يك كاذبا فعليه كذبه وان يك صادقا يصبكم بعض الذي يعدكم ان الله لا يهدي من هو مسرف كذاب
translation_en_yusufali: A believing man from Pharaoh’s people, who was hiding his faith, argued, “Will you kill a man ˹only˺ for saying: ‘My Lord is Allah,’ while he has in fact come to you with clear proofs from your Lord? If he is a liar, it will be to his own loss. But if he is truthful, then you will be afflicted with some of what he is threatening you with. Surely Allah does not guide whoever is a transgressor, a total liar.

text_simple: يا قوم لكم الملك اليوم ظاهرين في الارض فمن ينصرنا من باس الله ان جاءنا قال فرعون ما اريكم الا ما ارى وما اهديكم الا سبيل الرشاد
translation_en_yusufali: O  my people! Authority belongs to you today, reigning supreme in the land. But who would help us against the torment of Allah, if it were to befall us?” Pharaoh assured ˹his people˺, “I am telling you only what I believe, and I am leading you only to the way of guidance.”

text_simple: وقال الذي امن يا قوم اني اخاف عليكم مثل يوم الاحزاب
translation_en_yusufali: And the man who believed cautioned, “O my people! I truly fear for you the doom of ˹earlier˺ enemy forces—

text_simple: مثل داب قوم نوح وعاد وثمود والذين من بعدهم وما الله يريد ظلما للعباد
translation_en_yusufali: like the fate of the people of Noah, ’Ȃd, Thamûd, and those after them. For Allah would never will to wrong ˹His˺ servants.

text_simple: ويا قوم اني اخاف عليكم يوم التناد
translation_en_yusufali: O  my people! I truly fear for you the Day all will be crying out ˹to each other˺—

text_simple: يوم تولون مدبرين ما لكم من الله من عاصم ومن يضلل الله فما له من هاد
translation_en_yusufali: the Day you will ˹try in vain to˺ turn your backs and run away, with no one to protect you from Allah. And whoever Allah leaves to stray will be left with no guide.

text_simple: ولقد جاءكم يوسف من قبل بالبينات فما زلتم في شك مما جاءكم به حتى اذا هلك قلتم لن يبعث الله من بعده رسولا كذلك يضل الله من هو مسرف مرتاب
translation_en_yusufali: Joseph already came to you earlier with clear proofs, yet you never ceased to doubt what he came to you with. When he died you said, ‘Allah will never send a messenger after him.’ This is how Allah leaves every transgressor and doubter to stray—

text_simple: الذين يجادلون في ايات الله بغير سلطان اتاهم كبر مقتا عند الله وعند الذين امنوا كذلك يطبع الله على كل قلب متكبر جبار
translation_en_yusufali: those who dispute Allah’s signs with no proof given to them. How despicable is that for Allah and the believers! This is how Allah seals the heart of every arrogant tyrant.”

text_simple: وقال فرعون يا هامان ابن لي صرحا لعلي ابلغ الاسباب
translation_en_yusufali: Pharaoh ordered, “O Hamân! Build me a high tower so I may reach the pathways

text_simple: اسباب السماوات فاطلع الى اله موسى واني لاظنه كاذبا وكذلك زين لفرعون سوء عمله وصد عن السبيل وما كيد فرعون الا في تباب
translation_en_yusufali: leading up to the heavens and look for the God of Moses, although I am sure he is a liar.” And so Pharaoh’s evil deeds were made so appealing to him that he was hindered from the ˹Right˺ Way. But the plotting of Pharaoh was only in vain.

text_simple: وقال الذي امن يا قوم اتبعون اهدكم سبيل الرشاد
translation_en_yusufali: And the man who believed urged, “O my people! Follow me, ˹and˺ I will lead you to the Way of Guidance.

text_simple: يا قوم انما هذه الحياة الدنيا متاع وان الاخرة هي دار القرار
translation_en_yusufali: O  my people! This worldly life is only ˹a fleeting˺ enjoyment, whereas the Hereafter is truly the home of settlement.

text_simple: من عمل سيئة فلا يجزى الا مثلها ومن عمل صالحا من ذكر او انثى وهو مؤمن فاولئك يدخلون الجنة يرزقون فيها بغير حساب
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever does an evil deed will only be paid back with its equivalent. And whoever does good, whether male or female, and is a believer, they will enter Paradise, where they will be provided for without limit.

text_simple: ويا قوم ما لي ادعوكم الى النجاة وتدعونني الى النار
translation_en_yusufali: O  my people! How is it that I invite you to salvation, while you invite me to the Fire!

text_simple: تدعونني لاكفر بالله واشرك به ما ليس لي به علم وانا ادعوكم الى العزيز الغفار
translation_en_yusufali: You invite me to disbelieve in Allah and associate with Him what I have no knowledge of, while I invite you to the Almighty, Most Forgiving.

text_simple: لا جرم انما تدعونني اليه ليس له دعوة في الدنيا ولا في الاخرة وان مردنا الى الله وان المسرفين هم اصحاب النار
translation_en_yusufali: There is no doubt that whatever ˹idols˺ you invite me to ˹worship˺ are not worthy to be invoked either in this world or the Hereafter. ˹Undoubtedly,˺ our return is to Allah, and the transgressors will be the inmates of the Fire.

text_simple: فستذكرون ما اقول لكم وافوض امري الى الله ان الله بصير بالعباد
translation_en_yusufali: You will remember what I say to you, and I entrust my affairs to Allah. Surely Allah is All-Seeing of all ˹His˺ servants.”

text_simple: فوقاه الله سيئات ما مكروا وحاق بال فرعون سوء العذاب
translation_en_yusufali: So Allah protected him from the evil of their schemes. And Pharaoh’s people were overwhelmed by an evil punishment:

text_simple: النار يعرضون عليها غدوا وعشيا ويوم تقوم الساعة ادخلوا ال فرعون اشد العذاب
translation_en_yusufali: they are exposed to the Fire ˹in their graves˺ morning and evening. And on the Day the Hour will be established ˹it will be said˺, “Admit Pharaoh’s people into the harshest punishment ˹of Hell˺.”

text_simple: واذ يتحاجون في النار فيقول الضعفاء للذين استكبروا انا كنا لكم تبعا فهل انتم مغنون عنا نصيبا من النار
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider the Day˺ when they will dispute in the Fire, and the lowly ˹followers˺ will appeal to the arrogant ˹leaders˺, “We were your ˹dedicated˺ followers, will you then shield us from a portion of the Fire?”

text_simple: قال الذين استكبروا انا كل فيها ان الله قد حكم بين العباد
translation_en_yusufali: The arrogant will say, “We are all in it! ˹For˺ Allah has already passed judgment over ˹His˺ servants.”

text_simple: وقال الذين في النار لخزنة جهنم ادعوا ربكم يخفف عنا يوما من العذاب
translation_en_yusufali: And those in the Fire will cry out to the keepers of Hell, “Pray to your Lord to lighten the torment for us ˹even˺ for one day!”

text_simple: قالوا اولم تك تاتيكم رسلكم بالبينات قالوا بلى قالوا فادعوا وما دعاء الكافرين الا في ضلال
translation_en_yusufali: The keepers will reply, “Did your messengers not ˹constantly˺ come to you with clear proofs?” They will say, “Yes ˹they did˺.” The keepers will say, “Then pray! Though the prayer of the disbelievers is only in vain.”

text_simple: انا لننصر رسلنا والذين امنوا في الحياة الدنيا ويوم يقوم الاشهاد
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly help Our messengers and the believers, ˹both˺ in this worldly life and on the Day the witnesses will stand forth ˹for testimony˺—

text_simple: يوم لا ينفع الظالمين معذرتهم ولهم اللعنة ولهم سوء الدار
translation_en_yusufali: the Day the wrongdoers’ excuses will be of no benefit to them. They will be condemned, and will have the worst outcome.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا موسى الهدى واورثنا بني اسرائيل الكتاب
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We gave Moses ˹true˺ guidance, and made the Children of Israel inherit the Scripture—

text_simple: هدى وذكرى لاولي الالباب
translation_en_yusufali: a guide and a reminder to people of reason.

text_simple: فاصبر ان وعد الله حق واستغفر لذنبك وسبح بحمد ربك بالعشي والابكار
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺, ˹for˺ Allah’s promise is certainly true. Seek forgiveness for your shortcomings. And glorify the praises of your Lord morning and evening.

text_simple: ان الذين يجادلون في ايات الله بغير سلطان اتاهم ان في صدورهم الا كبر ما هم ببالغيه فاستعذ بالله انه هو السميع البصير
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who dispute Allah’s signs—with no proof given to them—have nothing in their hearts but greed for dominance, which they will never attain. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, He alone is the All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

text_simple: لخلق السماوات والارض اكبر من خلق الناس ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: The creation of the heavens and the earth is certainly greater than the re-creation of humankind, but most people do not know.

text_simple: وما يستوي الاعمى والبصير والذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات ولا المسيء قليلا ما تتذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Those blind ˹to the truth˺ and those who can see are not equal, nor are those who believe and do good ˹equal˺ to those who do evil. Yet you are hardly mindful.

text_simple: ان الساعة لاتية لا ريب فيها ولكن اكثر الناس لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: The Hour is certainly coming, there is no doubt about it. But most people do not believe.

text_simple: وقال ربكم ادعوني استجب لكم ان الذين يستكبرون عن عبادتي سيدخلون جهنم داخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Your Lord has proclaimed, “Call upon Me, I will respond to you. Surely those who are too proud to worship Me will enter Hell, fully humbled.”

text_simple: الله الذي جعل لكم الليل لتسكنوا فيه والنهار مبصرا ان الله لذو فضل على الناس ولكن اكثر الناس لا يشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who has made the night for you to rest in and the day bright. Surely Allah is ever Bountiful to humanity, but most people are ungrateful.

text_simple: ذلكم الله ربكم خالق كل شيء لا اله الا هو فانى تؤفكون
translation_en_yusufali: That is Allah, your Lord, the Creator of all things. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. How can you then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

text_simple: كذلك يؤفك الذين كانوا بايات الله يجحدون
translation_en_yusufali: This is how those who used to reject Allah’s signs were ˹also˺ deluded.

text_simple: الله الذي جعل لكم الارض قرارا والسماء بناء وصوركم فاحسن صوركم ورزقكم من الطيبات ذلكم الله ربكم فتبارك الله رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who made the earth a place of settlement for you and the sky a canopy. He shaped you ˹in the womb˺, perfecting your form. And He has provided you with what is good and lawful. That is Allah—your Lord. So Blessed is Allah, Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: هو الحي لا اله الا هو فادعوه مخلصين له الدين الحمد لله رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: He is the Ever-Living. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. So call upon Him with sincere devotion, ˹saying,˺ “All praise is for Allah—Lord of all worlds.”

text_simple: قل اني نهيت ان اعبد الذين تدعون من دون الله لما جاءني البينات من ربي وامرت ان اسلم لرب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I have been forbidden to worship those ˹idols˺ you worship besides Allah, since clear proofs have come to me from my Lord. And I have been commanded to ˹fully˺ submit to the Lord of all worlds.”

text_simple: هو الذي خلقكم من تراب ثم من نطفة ثم من علقة ثم يخرجكم طفلا ثم لتبلغوا اشدكم ثم لتكونوا شيوخا ومنكم من يتوفى من قبل ولتبلغوا اجلا مسمى ولعلكم تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then ˹developed you into˺ a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then He brings you forth as infants, so that you may reach your prime, and become old—though some of you ˹may˺ die sooner—reaching an appointed time, so perhaps you may understand ˹Allah’s power˺.

text_simple: هو الذي يحيي ويميت فاذا قضى امرا فانما يقول له كن فيكون
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who gives life and causes death. When He decrees a matter, He simply tells it, “Be!” And it is!

text_simple: الم تر الى الذين يجادلون في ايات الله انى يصرفون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen how those who dispute Allah’s signs are turned away?

text_simple: الذين كذبوا بالكتاب وبما ارسلنا به رسلنا فسوف يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ the ones who reject this Book and all ˹scriptures˺ We sent Our messengers with. So they will know ˹the consequences˺

text_simple: اذ الاغلال في اعناقهم والسلاسل يسحبون
translation_en_yusufali: when shackles will be around their necks and chains ˹on their legs˺. They will be dragged

text_simple: في الحميم ثم في النار يسجرون
translation_en_yusufali: through boiling water, then burned in the Fire ˹as fuel˺.

text_simple: ثم قيل لهم اين ما كنتم تشركون
translation_en_yusufali: Then they will be asked, “Where are those ˹idols˺ you used to associate

text_simple: من دون الله قالوا ضلوا عنا بل لم نكن ندعو من قبل شيئا كذلك يضل الله الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: with Allah?” They will cry, “They have ˹all˺ failed us. In fact, we did not invoke anything ˹real˺ before.” This is how Allah leaves the disbelievers to stray.

text_simple: ذلكم بما كنتم تفرحون في الارض بغير الحق وبما كنتم تمرحون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “This ˹punishment˺ is for being prideful on earth unjustly and for acting arrogantly.

text_simple: ادخلوا ابواب جهنم خالدين فيها فبئس مثوى المتكبرين
translation_en_yusufali: Enter the gates of Hell, to stay there forever. What an evil home for the arrogant!”

text_simple: فاصبر ان وعد الله حق فاما نرينك بعض الذي نعدهم او نتوفينك فالينا يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺. Surely Allah’s promise is true. Whether We show you some of what We threaten them with, or cause you to die ˹before that˺, to Us they will ˹all˺ be returned.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا رسلا من قبلك منهم من قصصنا عليك ومنهم من لم نقصص عليك وما كان لرسول ان ياتي باية الا باذن الله فاذا جاء امر الله قضي بالحق وخسر هنالك المبطلون
translation_en_yusufali: We already sent messengers before you. We have told you the stories of some of them, while others We have not. It was not for any messenger to bring a sign without Allah’s permission. But when Allah’s decree comes, judgment will be passed with fairness, and the people of falsehood will then be in ˹total˺ loss.

text_simple: الله الذي جعل لكم الانعام لتركبوا منها ومنها تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who made cattle for you so that you may ride some and eat others.

text_simple: ولكم فيها منافع ولتبلغوا عليها حاجة في صدوركم وعليها وعلى الفلك تحملون
translation_en_yusufali: Also, you find in them ˹other˺ benefits. And by means of them you may reach destinations you desire. And you are carried upon ˹some of˺ them and upon ships.

text_simple: ويريكم اياته فاي ايات الله تنكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And He shows you His signs. Now which of Allah’s signs will you deny?

text_simple: افلم يسيروا في الارض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبلهم كانوا اكثر منهم واشد قوة واثارا في الارض فما اغنى عنهم ما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those who were ˹destroyed˺ before them? They were far superior in might and ˹richer in˺ monuments throughout the land, but their ˹worldly˺ gains were of no benefit to them.

text_simple: فلما جاءتهم رسلهم بالبينات فرحوا بما عندهم من العلم وحاق بهم ما كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: When their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they were prideful in whatever ˹worldly˺ knowledge they had, and were ˹ultimately˺ overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

text_simple: فلما راوا باسنا قالوا امنا بالله وحده وكفرنا بما كنا به مشركين
translation_en_yusufali: When they saw Our punishment, they cried, “˹Now˺ we believe in Allah alone and reject what we had been associating with Him!”

text_simple: فلم يك ينفعهم ايمانهم لما راوا باسنا سنت الله التي قد خلت في عباده وخسر هنالك الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: But their faith was of no benefit to them when they saw Our torment. This has ˹always˺ been Allah’s way ˹of dealing˺ with His ˹wicked˺ servants. Then and there the disbelievers were in ˹total˺ loss.

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: تنزيل من الرحمن الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ a revelation from the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.

text_simple: كتاب فصلت اياته قرانا عربيا لقوم يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ a Book whose verses are perfectly explained—a Quran in Arabic for people who know

text_simple: بشيرا ونذيرا فاعرض اكثرهم فهم لا يسمعون
translation_en_yusufali: delivering good news and warning. Yet most of them turn away, so they do not hear.

text_simple: وقالوا قلوبنا في اكنة مما تدعونا اليه وفي اذاننا وقر ومن بيننا وبينك حجاب فاعمل اننا عاملون
translation_en_yusufali: They say, “Our hearts are veiled against what you are calling us to, there is deafness in our ears, and there is a barrier between us and you. So do ˹whatever you want˺ and so shall we!”

text_simple: قل انما انا بشر مثلكم يوحى الي انما الهكم اله واحد فاستقيموا اليه واستغفروه وويل للمشركين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I am only a man like you, ˹but˺ it has been revealed to me that your God is only One God. So take the Straight Way towards Him, and seek His forgiveness. And woe to the polytheists—

text_simple: الذين لا يؤتون الزكاة وهم بالاخرة هم كافرون
translation_en_yusufali: those who do not pay alms-tax and are in denial of the Hereafter.

text_simple: ان الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم اجر غير ممنون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ those who believe and do good will certainly have a never-ending reward.

text_simple: قل ائنكم لتكفرون بالذي خلق الارض في يومين وتجعلون له اندادا ذلك رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “How can you disbelieve in the One Who created the earth in two Days? And how can you set up equals with Him? That is the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: وجعل فيها رواسي من فوقها وبارك فيها وقدر فيها اقواتها في اربعة ايام سواء للسائلين
translation_en_yusufali: He placed on the earth firm mountains, standing high, showered His blessings upon it, and ordained ˹all˺ its means of sustenance—totaling four Days exactly—for all who ask.

text_simple: ثم استوى الى السماء وهي دخان فقال لها وللارض ائتيا طوعا او كرها قالتا اتينا طائعين
translation_en_yusufali: Then He turned towards the heaven when it was ˹still like˺ smoke, saying to it and to the earth, ‘Submit, willingly or unwillingly.’ They both responded, ‘We submit willingly.’

text_simple: فقضاهن سبع سماوات في يومين واوحى في كل سماء امرها وزينا السماء الدنيا بمصابيح وحفظا ذلك تقدير العزيز العليم
translation_en_yusufali: So He formed the heaven into seven heavens in two Days, assigning to each its mandate. And We adorned the lowest heaven with ˹stars like˺ lamps ˹for beauty˺ and for protection. That is the design of the Almighty, All-Knowing.”

text_simple: فان اعرضوا فقل انذرتكم صاعقة مثل صاعقة عاد وثمود
translation_en_yusufali: If they turn away, then say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I warn you of a ˹mighty˺ blast, like the one that befell ’Ȃd and Thamûd.”

text_simple: اذ جاءتهم الرسل من بين ايديهم ومن خلفهم الا تعبدوا الا الله قالوا لو شاء ربنا لانزل ملائكة فانا بما ارسلتم به كافرون
translation_en_yusufali: The messengers had come to them from all angles, ˹proclaiming,˺ “Worship none but Allah.” They responded, “Had our Lord willed, He could have easily sent down angels ˹instead˺. So we totally reject what you have been sent with.”

text_simple: فاما عاد فاستكبروا في الارض بغير الحق وقالوا من اشد منا قوة اولم يروا ان الله الذي خلقهم هو اشد منهم قوة وكانوا باياتنا يجحدون
translation_en_yusufali: As for ’Ȃd, they acted arrogantly throughout the land with no right, boasting, “Who is superior to us in might?” Did they not see that Allah ˹Himself˺, Who created them, was far superior to them in might? Still they persisted in denying Our signs.

text_simple: فارسلنا عليهم ريحا صرصرا في ايام نحسات لنذيقهم عذاب الخزي في الحياة الدنيا ولعذاب الاخرة اخزى وهم لا ينصرون
translation_en_yusufali: So We sent against them a furious wind, for ˹several˺ miserable days, to make them taste a humiliating punishment in this worldly life. But far more humiliating will be the punishment of the Hereafter. And they will not be helped.

text_simple: واما ثمود فهديناهم فاستحبوا العمى على الهدى فاخذتهم صاعقة العذاب الهون بما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: As for Thamûd, We showed them guidance, but they preferred blindness over guidance. So the blast of a disgracing punishment overtook them for what they used to commit.

text_simple: ونجينا الذين امنوا وكانوا يتقون
translation_en_yusufali: And We delivered those who were faithful and were mindful ˹of Allah˺.

text_simple: ويوم يحشر اعداء الله الى النار فهم يوزعون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the enemies of Allah will be gathered for the Fire, all driven in ranks.

text_simple: حتى اذا ما جاءوها شهد عليهم سمعهم وابصارهم وجلودهم بما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: When they reach it, their ears, eyes, and skin will testify against what they used to do.

text_simple: وقالوا لجلودهم لم شهدتم علينا قالوا انطقنا الله الذي انطق كل شيء وهو خلقكم اول مرة واليه ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: They will ask their skin ˹furiously˺, “Why have you testified against us?” It will say, “We have been made to speak by Allah, Who causes all things to speak. He ˹is the One Who˺ created you the first time, and to Him you were bound to return.

text_simple: وما كنتم تستترون ان يشهد عليكم سمعكم ولا ابصاركم ولا جلودكم ولكن ظننتم ان الله لا يعلم كثيرا مما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: You did not ˹bother to˺ hide yourselves from your ears, eyes, and skin to prevent them from testifying against you. Rather, you assumed that Allah did not know much of what you used to do.

text_simple: وذلكم ظنكم الذي ظننتم بربكم ارداكم فاصبحتم من الخاسرين
translation_en_yusufali: It was that ˹false˺ assumption you entertained about your Lord that has brought about your doom, so you have become losers.”

text_simple: فان يصبروا فالنار مثوى لهم وان يستعتبوا فما هم من المعتبين
translation_en_yusufali: Even if they endure patiently, the Fire will ˹always˺ be their home. And if they ˹beg to˺ appease ˹their Lord˺, they will never be allowed to.

text_simple: وقيضنا لهم قرناء فزينوا لهم ما بين ايديهم وما خلفهم وحق عليهم القول في امم قد خلت من قبلهم من الجن والانس انهم كانوا خاسرين
translation_en_yusufali: We placed at their disposal ˹evil˺ associates who made their past and future ˹misdeeds˺ appealing to them. ˹So˺ the fate of earlier communities of jinn and humans has been justified against them ˹as well˺, ˹for˺ they were truly losers.

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا لا تسمعوا لهذا القران والغوا فيه لعلكم تغلبون
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers advised ˹one another˺, “Do not listen to this Quran but drown it out so that you may prevail.”

text_simple: فلنذيقن الذين كفروا عذابا شديدا ولنجزينهم اسوا الذي كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: So We will certainly make the disbelievers taste a severe punishment, and We will surely repay them according to the worst of their deeds.

text_simple: ذلك جزاء اعداء الله النار لهم فيها دار الخلد جزاء بما كانوا باياتنا يجحدون
translation_en_yusufali: That is the reward of Allah’s enemies: the Fire, which will be their eternal home—a ˹fitting˺ reward for their denial of Our revelations.

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا ربنا ارنا اللذين اضلانا من الجن والانس نجعلهما تحت اقدامنا ليكونا من الاسفلين
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers will ˹then˺ cry, “Our Lord! Show us those jinn and humans who led us astray: we will put them under our feet so that they will be among the lowest ˹in Hell˺.”

text_simple: ان الذين قالوا ربنا الله ثم استقاموا تتنزل عليهم الملائكة الا تخافوا ولا تحزنوا وابشروا بالجنة التي كنتم توعدون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who say, “Our Lord is Allah,” and then remain steadfast, the angels descend upon them, ˹saying,˺ “Do not fear, nor grieve. Rather, rejoice in the good news of Paradise, which you have been promised.

text_simple: نحن اولياؤكم في الحياة الدنيا وفي الاخرة ولكم فيها ما تشتهي انفسكم ولكم فيها ما تدعون
translation_en_yusufali: We are your supporters in this worldly life and in the Hereafter. There you will have whatever your souls desire, and there you will have whatever you ask for:

text_simple: نزلا من غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: an accommodation from the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful ˹Lord˺.”

text_simple: ومن احسن قولا ممن دعا الى الله وعمل صالحا وقال انني من المسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: And whose words are better than someone who calls ˹others˺ to Allah, does good, and says, “I am truly one of those who submit.”?

text_simple: ولا تستوي الحسنة ولا السيئة ادفع بالتي هي احسن فاذا الذي بينك وبينه عداوة كانه ولي حميم
translation_en_yusufali: Good and evil cannot be equal. Respond ˹to evil˺ with what is best, then the one you are in a feud with will be like a close friend.

text_simple: وما يلقاها الا الذين صبروا وما يلقاها الا ذو حظ عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: But this cannot be attained except by those who are patient and who are truly fortunate.

text_simple: واما ينزغنك من الشيطان نزغ فاستعذ بالله انه هو السميع العليم
translation_en_yusufali: And if you are tempted by Satan, then seek refuge with Allah. Indeed, He ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

text_simple: ومن اياته الليل والنهار والشمس والقمر لا تسجدوا للشمس ولا للقمر واسجدوا لله الذي خلقهن ان كنتم اياه تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: Among His signs are the day and the night, the sun and the moon. Do not prostrate to the sun or the moon, but prostrate to Allah, Who created them ˹all˺, if you ˹truly˺ worship Him ˹alone˺.

text_simple: فان استكبروا فالذين عند ربك يسبحون له بالليل والنهار وهم لا يسامون
translation_en_yusufali: But if the pagans are too proud, then ˹let them know that˺ those ˹angels˺ nearest to your Lord glorify Him day and night, and never grow weary.

text_simple: ومن اياته انك ترى الارض خاشعة فاذا انزلنا عليها الماء اهتزت وربت ان الذي احياها لمحيي الموتى انه على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: And among His signs is that you see the earth devoid of life, but as soon as We send down rain upon it, it begins to stir ˹to life˺ and swell. Indeed, the One Who revives it can easily revive the dead. He is certainly Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: ان الذين يلحدون في اياتنا لا يخفون علينا افمن يلقى في النار خير ام من ياتي امنا يوم القيامة اعملوا ما شئتم انه بما تعملون بصير
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who abuse Our revelations are not hidden from Us. Who is better: the one who will be cast into the Fire or the one who will be secure on Judgment Day? Do whatever you want. He is certainly All-Seeing of what you do.

text_simple: ان الذين كفروا بالذكر لما جاءهم وانه لكتاب عزيز
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who deny the Reminder after it has come to them ˹are doomed˺, for it is truly a mighty Book.

text_simple: لا ياتيه الباطل من بين يديه ولا من خلفه تنزيل من حكيم حميد
translation_en_yusufali: It cannot be proven false from any angle. ˹It is˺ a revelation from the ˹One Who is˺ All-Wise, Praiseworthy.

text_simple: ما يقال لك الا ما قد قيل للرسل من قبلك ان ربك لذو مغفرة وذو عقاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹O Prophet!˺ Nothing is said to you ˹by the deniers˺ except what was already said to the messengers before you. Surely your Lord is ˹the Lord˺ of forgiveness and painful punishment.

text_simple: ولو جعلناه قرانا اعجميا لقالوا لولا فصلت اياته ااعجمي وعربي قل هو للذين امنوا هدى وشفاء والذين لا يؤمنون في اذانهم وقر وهو عليهم عمى اولئك ينادون من مكان بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: Had We revealed it as a non-Arabic Quran, they would have certainly argued, “If only its verses were made clear ˹in our language˺. What! A non-Arabic revelation for an Arab audience!” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “It is a guide and a healing to the believers. As for those who disbelieve, there is deafness in their ears and blindness to it ˹in their hearts˺. It is as if they are being called from a faraway place.”

text_simple: ولقد اتينا موسى الكتاب فاختلف فيه ولولا كلمة سبقت من ربك لقضي بينهم وانهم لفي شك منه مريب
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We had given Moses the Scripture, but differences arose regarding it. Had it not been for a prior decree from your Lord, their differences would have been settled ˹at once˺. They are truly in alarming doubt about it.

text_simple: من عمل صالحا فلنفسه ومن اساء فعليها وما ربك بظلام للعبيد
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever does good, it is to their own benefit. And whoever does evil, it is to their own loss. Your Lord is never unjust to ˹His˺ creation.

text_simple: اليه يرد علم الساعة وما تخرج من ثمرات من اكمامها وما تحمل من انثى ولا تضع الا بعلمه ويوم يناديهم اين شركائي قالوا اذناك ما منا من شهيد
translation_en_yusufali: With Him ˹alone˺ is the knowledge of the Hour. No fruit comes out of its husk, nor does a female conceive or deliver without His knowledge. And ˹consider˺ the Day He will call to them, “Where are My ˹so-called˺ associate-gods?” They will cry, “We declare before you that none of us testifies to that ˹any longer˺.”

text_simple: وضل عنهم ما كانوا يدعون من قبل وظنوا ما لهم من محيص
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever ˹idols˺ they used to invoke besides Allah will fail them. And they will realize that they will have no escape.

text_simple: لا يسام الانسان من دعاء الخير وان مسه الشر فيئوس قنوط
translation_en_yusufali: One never tires of praying for good. And if touched with evil, they become desperate and hopeless.

text_simple: ولئن اذقناه رحمة منا من بعد ضراء مسته ليقولن هذا لي وما اظن الساعة قائمة ولئن رجعت الى ربي ان لي عنده للحسنى فلننبئن الذين كفروا بما عملوا ولنذيقنهم من عذاب غليظ
translation_en_yusufali: And if We let them taste a mercy from Us after being touched with adversity, they will certainly say, “This is what I deserve. I do not think the Hour will ˹ever˺ come. And if in fact I am returned to my Lord, the finest reward with Him will definitely be mine.” But We will surely inform the disbelievers of what they used to do. And We will certainly make them taste a harsh torment.

text_simple: واذا انعمنا على الانسان اعرض وناى بجانبه واذا مسه الشر فذو دعاء عريض
translation_en_yusufali: When We show favour to someone, they turn away, acting arrogantly. And when touched with evil, they make endless prayers ˹for good˺.

text_simple: قل ارايتم ان كان من عند الله ثم كفرتم به من اضل ممن هو في شقاق بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Imagine if this ˹Quran˺ is ˹truly˺ from Allah and you deny it: who can be more astray than those who have gone too far in opposition ˹to the truth˺?”

text_simple: سنريهم اياتنا في الافاق وفي انفسهم حتى يتبين لهم انه الحق اولم يكف بربك انه على كل شيء شهيد
translation_en_yusufali: We will show them Our signs in the universe and within themselves until it becomes clear to them that this ˹Quran˺ is the truth. Is it not enough that your Lord is a Witness over all things?

text_simple: الا انهم في مرية من لقاء ربهم الا انه بكل شيء محيط
translation_en_yusufali: They are truly in doubt of the meeting with their Lord! ˹But˺ He is indeed Fully Aware of everything.

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: عسق
translation_en_yusufali: ’Aĩn-Sĩn-Qãf.

text_simple: كذلك يوحي اليك والى الذين من قبلك الله العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: And so you ˹O Prophet˺ are sent revelation, just like those before you, by Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: له ما في السماوات وما في الارض وهو العلي العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. And He is the Most High, the Greatest.

text_simple: تكاد السماوات يتفطرن من فوقهن والملائكة يسبحون بحمد ربهم ويستغفرون لمن في الارض الا ان الله هو الغفور الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: The heavens nearly burst, one above the other, ˹in awe of Him˺. And the angels glorify the praises of their Lord, and seek forgiveness for those on earth. Surely Allah alone is the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: والذين اتخذوا من دونه اولياء الله حفيظ عليهم وما انت عليهم بوكيل
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who take other protectors besides Him, Allah is Watchful over them. And you ˹O Prophet˺ are not a keeper over them.

text_simple: وكذلك اوحينا اليك قرانا عربيا لتنذر ام القرى ومن حولها وتنذر يوم الجمع لا ريب فيه فريق في الجنة وفريق في السعير
translation_en_yusufali: And so We have revealed to you a Quran in Arabic, so you may warn the Mother of Cities and everyone around it, and warn of the Day of Gathering—about which there is no doubt—˹when˺ a group will be in Paradise and another in the Blaze.

text_simple: ولو شاء الله لجعلهم امة واحدة ولكن يدخل من يشاء في رحمته والظالمون ما لهم من ولي ولا نصير
translation_en_yusufali: Had Allah willed, He could have easily made all ˹humanity˺ into a single community ˹of believers˺. But He admits into His mercy whoever He wills. And the wrongdoers will have no protector or helper.

text_simple: ام اتخذوا من دونه اولياء فالله هو الولي وهو يحيي الموتى وهو على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: How can they take protectors besides Him? Allah alone is the Protector. He ˹alone˺ gives life to the dead. And He ˹alone˺ is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: وما اختلفتم فيه من شيء فحكمه الى الله ذلكم الله ربي عليه توكلت واليه انيب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Say to the believers, O  Prophet,˺ “Whatever you may differ about, its judgment rests with Allah. That is Allah—my Lord. In Him I put my trust, and to Him I ˹always˺ turn.”

text_simple: فاطر السماوات والارض جعل لكم من انفسكم ازواجا ومن الانعام ازواجا يذرؤكم فيه ليس كمثله شيء وهو السميع البصير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ the Originator of the heavens and the earth. He has made for you spouses from among yourselves, and ˹made˺ mates for cattle ˹as well˺—multiplying you ˹both˺. There is nothing like Him, for He ˹alone˺ is the All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

text_simple: له مقاليد السماوات والارض يبسط الرزق لمن يشاء ويقدر انه بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belong the keys ˹of the treasuries˺ of the heavens and the earth. He gives abundant or limited provisions to whoever He wills. Indeed, He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: شرع لكم من الدين ما وصى به نوحا والذي اوحينا اليك وما وصينا به ابراهيم وموسى وعيسى ان اقيموا الدين ولا تتفرقوا فيه كبر على المشركين ما تدعوهم اليه الله يجتبي اليه من يشاء ويهدي اليه من ينيب
translation_en_yusufali: He has ordained for you ˹believers˺ the Way which He decreed for Noah, and what We have revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺ and what We decreed for Abraham, Moses, and Jesus, ˹commanding:˺ “Uphold the faith, and make no divisions in it.” What you call the polytheists to is unbearable for them. Allah chooses for Himself whoever He wills, and guides to Himself whoever turns ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: وما تفرقوا الا من بعد ما جاءهم العلم بغيا بينهم ولولا كلمة سبقت من ربك الى اجل مسمى لقضي بينهم وان الذين اورثوا الكتاب من بعدهم لفي شك منه مريب
translation_en_yusufali: They did not split ˹into sects˺ out of mutual envy until knowledge came to them. Had it not been for a prior decree from your Lord for an appointed term, the matter would have certainly been settled between them ˹at once˺. And surely those who were made to inherit the Scripture after them are truly in alarming doubt about this ˹Quran˺.

text_simple: فلذلك فادع واستقم كما امرت ولا تتبع اهواءهم وقل امنت بما انزل الله من كتاب وامرت لاعدل بينكم الله ربنا وربكم لنا اعمالنا ولكم اعمالكم لا حجة بيننا وبينكم الله يجمع بيننا واليه المصير
translation_en_yusufali: Because of that, you ˹O Prophet˺ will invite ˹all˺. Be steadfast as you are commanded, and do not follow their desires. And say, “I believe in every Scripture Allah has revealed. And I am commanded to judge fairly among you. Allah is our Lord and your Lord. We will be accountable for our deeds and you for yours. There is no ˹need for˺ contention between us. Allah will gather us together ˹for judgment˺. And to Him is the final return.”

text_simple: والذين يحاجون في الله من بعد ما استجيب له حجتهم داحضة عند ربهم وعليهم غضب ولهم عذاب شديد
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who dispute about Allah after He is ˹already˺ acknowledged ˹by many˺, their argument is futile in the sight of their Lord. Upon them is wrath, and they will suffer a severe punishment.

text_simple: الله الذي انزل الكتاب بالحق والميزان وما يدريك لعل الساعة قريب
translation_en_yusufali: It is Allah Who has revealed the Book with the truth and the balance ˹of justice˺. You never know, perhaps the Hour is near.

text_simple: يستعجل بها الذين لا يؤمنون بها والذين امنوا مشفقون منها ويعلمون انها الحق الا ان الذين يمارون في الساعة لفي ضلال بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: Those who disbelieve in it ˹ask to˺ hasten it ˹mockingly˺. But the believers are fearful of it, knowing that it is the truth. Surely those who dispute about the Hour have gone far astray.

text_simple: الله لطيف بعباده يرزق من يشاء وهو القوي العزيز
translation_en_yusufali: Allah is Ever Kind to His servants. He provides ˹abundantly˺ to whoever He wills. And He is the All-Powerful, Almighty.

text_simple: من كان يريد حرث الاخرة نزد له في حرثه ومن كان يريد حرث الدنيا نؤته منها وما له في الاخرة من نصيب
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever desires the harvest of the Hereafter, We will increase their harvest. And whoever desires ˹only˺ the harvest of this world, We will give them some of it, but they will have no share in the Hereafter.

text_simple: ام لهم شركاء شرعوا لهم من الدين ما لم ياذن به الله ولولا كلمة الفصل لقضي بينهم وان الظالمين لهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they have associate-gods who have ordained for them some ˹polytheistic˺ beliefs, which Allah has not authorized? Had it not been for ˹prior˺ decree on Judgment, the matter would have certainly been settled between them ˹at once˺. And surely the wrongdoers will suffer a painful punishment.

text_simple: ترى الظالمين مشفقين مما كسبوا وهو واقع بهم والذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات في روضات الجنات لهم ما يشاءون عند ربهم ذلك هو الفضل الكبير
translation_en_yusufali: You will see the wrongdoers fearful ˹of the punishment˺ for what they committed but it will be inevitable for them, whereas those who believe and do good will be in the lush Gardens of Paradise. They will have whatever they desire from their Lord. That is ˹truly˺ the greatest bounty.

text_simple: ذلك الذي يبشر الله عباده الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات قل لا اسالكم عليه اجرا الا المودة في القربى ومن يقترف حسنة نزد له فيها حسنا ان الله غفور شكور
translation_en_yusufali: That ˹reward˺ is the good news which Allah gives to His servants who believe and do good. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I do not ask you for a reward for this ˹message˺—only honour for ˹our˺ kinship.” Whoever earns a good deed, We will increase it in goodness for them. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Appreciative.

text_simple: ام يقولون افترى على الله كذبا فان يشا الله يختم على قلبك ويمح الله الباطل ويحق الحق بكلماته انه عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they say, “He has fabricated a lie about Allah!”? ˹If you had,˺ Allah would have sealed your heart, if He willed. And Allah wipes out falsehood and establishes the truth by His Words. He certainly knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: وهو الذي يقبل التوبة عن عباده ويعفو عن السيئات ويعلم ما تفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who accepts repentance from His servants and pardons ˹their˺ sins. And He knows whatever you do.

text_simple: ويستجيب الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات ويزيدهم من فضله والكافرون لهم عذاب شديد
translation_en_yusufali: He responds to those who believe and do good, and increases their reward out of His grace. As for the disbelievers, they will suffer a severe punishment.

text_simple: ولو بسط الله الرزق لعباده لبغوا في الارض ولكن ينزل بقدر ما يشاء انه بعباده خبير بصير
translation_en_yusufali: Had Allah given abundant provisions to ˹all˺ His servants, they would have certainly transgressed throughout the land. But He sends down whatever He wills in perfect measure. He is truly All-Aware, All-Seeing of His servants.

text_simple: وهو الذي ينزل الغيث من بعد ما قنطوا وينشر رحمته وهو الولي الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who sends down rain after people have given up hope, spreading out His mercy. He is the Guardian, the Praiseworthy.

text_simple: ومن اياته خلق السماوات والارض وما بث فيهما من دابة وهو على جمعهم اذا يشاء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: And among His signs is the creation of the heavens and the earth, and all living beings He dispersed throughout both. And He is Most Capable of bringing all together whenever He wills.

text_simple: وما اصابكم من مصيبة فبما كسبت ايديكم ويعفو عن كثير
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever affliction befalls you is because of what your own hands have committed. And He pardons much.

text_simple: وما انتم بمعجزين في الارض وما لكم من دون الله من ولي ولا نصير
translation_en_yusufali: You can never escape ˹Him˺ on earth, nor do you have any protector or helper besides Allah.

text_simple: ومن اياته الجوار في البحر كالاعلام
translation_en_yusufali: And among His signs are the ships like mountains ˹sailing˺ in the sea.

text_simple: ان يشا يسكن الريح فيظللن رواكد على ظهره ان في ذلك لايات لكل صبار شكور
translation_en_yusufali: If He wills, He can calm the wind, leaving the ships motionless on the water. Surely in this are signs for whoever is steadfast, grateful.

text_simple: او يوبقهن بما كسبوا ويعف عن كثير
translation_en_yusufali: Or He can wreck the ships for what the people have committed—though He forgives much—

text_simple: ويعلم الذين يجادلون في اياتنا ما لهم من محيص
translation_en_yusufali: so those who dispute about Our signs may know that they have no refuge.

text_simple: فما اوتيتم من شيء فمتاع الحياة الدنيا وما عند الله خير وابقى للذين امنوا وعلى ربهم يتوكلون
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever ˹pleasure˺ you have been given is ˹no more than a fleeting˺ enjoyment of this worldly life. But what is with Allah is far better and more lasting for those who believe and put their trust in their Lord;

text_simple: والذين يجتنبون كبائر الاثم والفواحش واذا ما غضبوا هم يغفرون
translation_en_yusufali: who avoid major sins and shameful deeds, and forgive when angered;

text_simple: والذين استجابوا لربهم واقاموا الصلاة وامرهم شورى بينهم ومما رزقناهم ينفقون
translation_en_yusufali: who respond to their Lord, establish prayer, conduct their affairs by mutual consultation, and donate from what We have provided for them;

text_simple: والذين اذا اصابهم البغي هم ينتصرون
translation_en_yusufali: and who enforce justice when wronged.

text_simple: وجزاء سيئة سيئة مثلها فمن عفا واصلح فاجره على الله انه لا يحب الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: The reward of an evil deed is its equivalent. But whoever pardons and seeks reconciliation, then their reward is with Allah. He certainly does not like the wrongdoers.

text_simple: ولمن انتصر بعد ظلمه فاولئك ما عليهم من سبيل
translation_en_yusufali: There is no blame on those who enforce justice after being wronged.

text_simple: انما السبيل على الذين يظلمون الناس ويبغون في الارض بغير الحق اولئك لهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Blame is only on those who wrong people and transgress in the land unjustly. It is they who will suffer a painful punishment.

text_simple: ولمن صبر وغفر ان ذلك لمن عزم الامور
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever endures patiently and forgives—surely this is a resolve to aspire to.

text_simple: ومن يضلل الله فما له من ولي من بعده وترى الظالمين لما راوا العذاب يقولون هل الى مرد من سبيل
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever Allah leaves to stray will have no guide after Him. You will see the wrongdoers, when they face the torment, pleading, “Is there any way back ˹to the world˺?”

text_simple: وتراهم يعرضون عليها خاشعين من الذل ينظرون من طرف خفي وقال الذين امنوا ان الخاسرين الذين خسروا انفسهم واهليهم يوم القيامة الا ان الظالمين في عذاب مقيم
translation_en_yusufali: And you will see them exposed to the Fire, fully humbled out of disgrace, stealing glances ˹at it˺. And the believers will say, “The ˹true˺ losers are those who have lost themselves and their families on Judgment Day.” The wrongdoers will certainly be in everlasting torment.

text_simple: وما كان لهم من اولياء ينصرونهم من دون الله ومن يضلل الله فما له من سبيل
translation_en_yusufali: They will have no protectors to help them against Allah. And whoever Allah leaves to stray, for them there is no way.

text_simple: استجيبوا لربكم من قبل ان ياتي يوم لا مرد له من الله ما لكم من ملجا يومئذ وما لكم من نكير
translation_en_yusufali: Respond to your Lord before the coming of a Day from Allah that cannot be averted. There will be no refuge for you then, nor ˹grounds for˺ denial ˹of sins˺.

text_simple: فان اعرضوا فما ارسلناك عليهم حفيظا ان عليك الا البلاغ وانا اذا اذقنا الانسان منا رحمة فرح بها وان تصبهم سيئة بما قدمت ايديهم فان الانسان كفور
translation_en_yusufali: But if they turn away, We have not sent you ˹O Prophet˺ as a keeper over them. Your duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺. And indeed, when We let someone taste a mercy from Us, they become prideful ˹because˺ of it. But when afflicted with evil because of what their hands have done, then one becomes totally ungrateful.

text_simple: لله ملك السماوات والارض يخلق ما يشاء يهب لمن يشاء اناثا ويهب لمن يشاء الذكور
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He creates whatever He wills. He blesses whoever He wills with daughters, and blesses whoever He wills with sons

text_simple: او يزوجهم ذكرانا واناثا ويجعل من يشاء عقيما انه عليم قدير
translation_en_yusufali: or grants both, sons and daughters, ˹to whoever He wills˺, and leaves whoever He wills infertile. He is indeed All-Knowing, Most Capable.

text_simple: وما كان لبشر ان يكلمه الله الا وحيا او من وراء حجاب او يرسل رسولا فيوحي باذنه ما يشاء انه علي حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: It is not ˹possible˺ for a human being to have Allah communicate with them, except through inspiration, or from behind a veil, or by sending a messenger-angel to reveal whatever He wills by His permission. He is surely Most High, All-Wise.

text_simple: وكذلك اوحينا اليك روحا من امرنا ما كنت تدري ما الكتاب ولا الايمان ولكن جعلناه نورا نهدي به من نشاء من عبادنا وانك لتهدي الى صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: And so We have sent to you ˹O Prophet˺ a revelation by Our command. You did not know of ˹this˺ Book and faith ˹before˺. But We have made it a light, by which We guide whoever We will of Our servants. And you are truly leading ˹all˺ to the Straight Path—

text_simple: صراط الله الذي له ما في السماوات وما في الارض الا الى الله تصير الامور
translation_en_yusufali: the Path of Allah, to Whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth. Surely to Allah all matters will return ˹for judgment˺.

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: والكتاب المبين
translation_en_yusufali: By the clear Book!

text_simple: انا جعلناه قرانا عربيا لعلكم تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Certainly, We have made it a Quran in Arabic so perhaps you will understand.

text_simple: وانه في ام الكتاب لدينا لعلي حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, it is—in the Master Record with Us—highly esteemed, rich in wisdom.

text_simple: افنضرب عنكم الذكر صفحا ان كنتم قوما مسرفين
translation_en_yusufali: Should We then turn the ˹Quranic˺ Reminder away from you ˹simply˺ because you have been a transgressing people?

text_simple: وكم ارسلنا من نبي في الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine˺ how many prophets We sent to those ˹destroyed˺ before!

text_simple: وما ياتيهم من نبي الا كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: But no prophet ever came to them without being mocked.

text_simple: فاهلكنا اشد منهم بطشا ومضى مثل الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: So We destroyed those who were far mightier than these ˹Meccans˺. The examples of ˹their˺ predecessors have ˹already˺ been related.

text_simple: ولئن سالتهم من خلق السماوات والارض ليقولن خلقهن العزيز العليم
translation_en_yusufali: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created the heavens and the earth, they will certainly say, “The Almighty, All-Knowing did.”

text_simple: الذي جعل لكم الارض مهدا وجعل لكم فيها سبلا لعلكم تهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the One˺ Who has laid out the earth for you, and set in it pathways for you so that you may find your way.

text_simple: والذي نزل من السماء ماء بقدر فانشرنا به بلدة ميتا كذلك تخرجون
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹He is the One˺ Who sends down rain from the sky in perfect measure, with which We give life to a lifeless land. And so will you be brought forth ˹from the grave˺.

text_simple: والذي خلق الازواج كلها وجعل لكم من الفلك والانعام ما تركبون
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹He is the One˺ Who created all ˹things in˺ pairs, and made for you ships and animals to ride

text_simple: لتستووا على ظهوره ثم تذكروا نعمة ربكم اذا استويتم عليه وتقولوا سبحان الذي سخر لنا هذا وما كنا له مقرنين
translation_en_yusufali: so that you may sit firmly on their backs, and remember your Lord’s blessings once you are settled on them, saying, “Glory be to the One Who has subjected these for us, for we could have never done so ˹on our own˺.

text_simple: وانا الى ربنا لمنقلبون
translation_en_yusufali: And surely to our Lord we will ˹all˺ return.”

text_simple: وجعلوا له من عباده جزءا ان الانسان لكفور مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Still the pagans have made some of His creation out to be a part of Him. Indeed, humankind is clearly ungrateful.

text_simple: ام اتخذ مما يخلق بنات واصفاكم بالبنين
translation_en_yusufali: Has He taken ˹angels as His˺ daughters from what He created, and favoured you ˹O pagans˺ with sons?

text_simple: واذا بشر احدهم بما ضرب للرحمن مثلا ظل وجهه مسودا وهو كظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever one of them is given the good news of what they attribute to the Most Compassionate, his face grows gloomy, as he suppresses his rage.

text_simple: اومن ينشا في الحلية وهو في الخصام غير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Do they attribute to Him˺ those who are brought up in fineries and are not commanding in disputes?

text_simple: وجعلوا الملائكة الذين هم عباد الرحمن اناثا اشهدوا خلقهم ستكتب شهادتهم ويسالون
translation_en_yusufali: Still they have labelled the angels, who are servants of the Most Compassionate, as female. Did they witness their creation? Their statement will be recorded, and they will be questioned!

text_simple: وقالوا لو شاء الرحمن ما عبدناهم ما لهم بذلك من علم ان هم الا يخرصون
translation_en_yusufali: And they argue, “Had the Most Compassionate willed, we would have never worshipped them.” They have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this ˹claim˺. They do nothing but lie.

text_simple: ام اتيناهم كتابا من قبله فهم به مستمسكون
translation_en_yusufali: Or have We given them a Book ˹for proof˺, before this ˹Quran˺, to which they are holding firm?

text_simple: بل قالوا انا وجدنا اباءنا على امة وانا على اثارهم مهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, they say, “We found our forefathers following a ˹particular˺ way, and we are following in their footsteps.”

text_simple: وكذلك ما ارسلنا من قبلك في قرية من نذير الا قال مترفوها انا وجدنا اباءنا على امة وانا على اثارهم مقتدون
translation_en_yusufali: Similarly, whenever We sent a warner to a society before you ˹O Prophet˺, its ˹spoiled˺ elite would say, “We found our forefathers following a ˹particular˺ way, and we are walking in their footsteps.”

text_simple: قال اولو جئتكم باهدى مما وجدتم عليه اباءكم قالوا انا بما ارسلتم به كافرون
translation_en_yusufali: Each ˹warner˺ asked, “Even if what I brought you is better guidance than what you found your forefathers practicing?” They replied, “We totally reject whatever you have been sent with.”

text_simple: فانتقمنا منهم فانظر كيف كان عاقبة المكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: So We inflicted punishment upon them. See then what was the fate of the deniers!

text_simple: واذ قال ابراهيم لابيه وقومه انني براء مما تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember, O  Prophet˺ when Abraham declared to his father and his people, “I am totally free of whatever ˹gods˺ you worship

text_simple: الا الذي فطرني فانه سيهدين
translation_en_yusufali: except the One Who originated me, and He will surely guide me.”

text_simple: وجعلها كلمة باقية في عقبه لعلهم يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: And he left this enduring declaration among his descendants, so they may ˹always˺ turn back ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: بل متعت هؤلاء واباءهم حتى جاءهم الحق ورسول مبين
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, I had allowed enjoyment for these ˹Meccans˺ and their forefathers, until the truth came to them along with a messenger making things clear.

text_simple: ولما جاءهم الحق قالوا هذا سحر وانا به كافرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ when the truth came to them, they said, “This is magic, and we totally reject it.”

text_simple: وقالوا لولا نزل هذا القران على رجل من القريتين عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: And they exclaimed, “If only this Quran was revealed to a great man from ˹one of˺ the two cities!”

text_simple: اهم يقسمون رحمت ربك نحن قسمنا بينهم معيشتهم في الحياة الدنيا ورفعنا بعضهم فوق بعض درجات ليتخذ بعضهم بعضا سخريا ورحمت ربك خير مما يجمعون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it they who distribute your Lord’s mercy? We ˹alone˺ have distributed their ˹very˺ livelihood among them in this worldly life and raised some of them in rank above others so that some may employ others in service. ˹But˺ your Lord’s mercy is far better than whatever ˹wealth˺ they amass.

text_simple: ولولا ان يكون الناس امة واحدة لجعلنا لمن يكفر بالرحمن لبيوتهم سقفا من فضة ومعارج عليها يظهرون
translation_en_yusufali: Were it not that people might ˹be tempted to˺ become one community ˹of disbelievers˺, We would have supplied the homes of ˹only˺ those who disbelieve in the Most Compassionate with silver roofs and ˹silver˺ stairways to ascend

text_simple: ولبيوتهم ابوابا وسررا عليها يتكئون
translation_en_yusufali: as well as ˹silver˺ gates and thrones to recline on

text_simple: وزخرفا وان كل ذلك لما متاع الحياة الدنيا والاخرة عند ربك للمتقين
translation_en_yusufali: and ornaments ˹of gold˺. Yet all this is no more than a ˹fleeting˺ enjoyment in this worldly life. ˹But˺ the Hereafter with your Lord is ˹only˺ for those mindful ˹of Him˺.

text_simple: ومن يعش عن ذكر الرحمن نقيض له شيطانا فهو له قرين
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever turns a blind eye to the Reminder of the Most Compassionate, We place at the disposal of each a devilish one as their close associate

text_simple: وانهم ليصدونهم عن السبيل ويحسبون انهم مهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: who will certainly hinder them from the ˹Right˺ Way while they think they are ˹rightly˺ guided.

text_simple: حتى اذا جاءنا قال يا ليت بيني وبينك بعد المشرقين فبئس القرين
translation_en_yusufali: But when such a person comes to Us, one will say ˹to their associate˺, “I wish you were as distant from me as the east is from the west! What an evil associate ˹you were˺!”

text_simple: ولن ينفعكم اليوم اذ ظلمتم انكم في العذاب مشتركون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said to both,˺ “Since you all did wrong, sharing in the punishment will be of no benefit to you this Day.”

text_simple: افانت تسمع الصم او تهدي العمي ومن كان في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Can you make the deaf hear, or guide the blind or those clearly astray?

text_simple: فاما نذهبن بك فانا منهم منتقمون
translation_en_yusufali: Even if We take you away ˹from this world˺, We will surely inflict punishment upon them.

text_simple: او نرينك الذي وعدناهم فانا عليهم مقتدرون
translation_en_yusufali: Or if We show you what We threaten them with, We certainly have full power over them.

text_simple: فاستمسك بالذي اوحي اليك انك على صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: So hold firmly to what has been revealed to you ˹O Prophet˺. You are truly on the Straight Path.

text_simple: وانه لذكر لك ولقومك وسوف تسالون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a glory for you and your people. And you will ˹all˺ be questioned ˹about it˺.

text_simple: واسال من ارسلنا من قبلك من رسلنا اجعلنا من دون الرحمن الهة يعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹the followers of˺ the messengers that We already sent before you if We ˹ever˺ appointed ˹other˺ gods to be worshipped besides the Most Compassionate.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا موسى باياتنا الى فرعون وملئه فقال اني رسول رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent Moses with Our signs to Pharaoh and his chiefs, and he said: “I am a messenger of the Lord of all worlds.”

text_simple: فلما جاءهم باياتنا اذا هم منها يضحكون
translation_en_yusufali: But as soon as he came to them with Our signs, they laughed at them

text_simple: وما نريهم من اية الا هي اكبر من اختها واخذناهم بالعذاب لعلهم يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: although every sign We showed them was greater than the one before. Ultimately, We seized them with torments so that they might return ˹to the Right Path˺.

text_simple: وقالوا يا ايه الساحر ادع لنا ربك بما عهد عندك اننا لمهتدون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Then˺ they pleaded, “O ˹mighty˺ magician! Pray to your Lord on our behalf, by virtue of the covenant He made with you. We will certainly accept guidance.”

text_simple: فلما كشفنا عنهم العذاب اذا هم ينكثون
translation_en_yusufali: But as soon as We removed the torments from them, they broke their promise.

text_simple: ونادى فرعون في قومه قال يا قوم اليس لي ملك مصر وهذه الانهار تجري من تحتي افلا تبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: And Pharaoh called out to his people, boasting, “O my people! Am I not sovereign over Egypt as well as ˹all˺ these streams flowing at my feet? Can you not see?

text_simple: ام انا خير من هذا الذي هو مهين ولا يكاد يبين
translation_en_yusufali: Am I not better than this nobody who can hardly express himself?

text_simple: فلولا القي عليه اسورة من ذهب او جاء معه الملائكة مقترنين
translation_en_yusufali: Why then have no golden bracelets ˹of kingship˺ been granted to him or angels come with him as escorts!”

text_simple: فاستخف قومه فاطاعوه انهم كانوا قوما فاسقين
translation_en_yusufali: And so he fooled his people, and they obeyed him. They were truly a rebellious people.

text_simple: فلما اسفونا انتقمنا منهم فاغرقناهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: So when they enraged Us, We inflicted punishment upon them, drowning them all.

text_simple: فجعلناهم سلفا ومثلا للاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: And We made them an example and a lesson for those after them.

text_simple: ولما ضرب ابن مريم مثلا اذا قومك منه يصدون
translation_en_yusufali: When the son of Mary was cited as an example ˹in argument˺, your people ˹O Prophet˺ broke into ˹joyful˺ applause.

text_simple: وقالوا االهتنا خير ام هو ما ضربوه لك الا جدلا بل هم قوم خصمون
translation_en_yusufali: They exclaimed, “Which is better: our gods or Jesus?” They cite him only to argue. In fact, they are a people prone to dispute.

text_simple: ان هو الا عبد انعمنا عليه وجعلناه مثلا لبني اسرائيل
translation_en_yusufali: He was only a servant We showed favour to, and made as an example for the Children of Israel.

text_simple: ولو نشاء لجعلنا منكم ملائكة في الارض يخلفون
translation_en_yusufali: Had We willed, We could have easily replaced you ˹all˺ with angels, succeeding one another on earth.

text_simple: وانه لعلم للساعة فلا تمترن بها واتبعون هذا صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: And his ˹second˺ coming is truly a sign for the Hour. So have no doubt about it, and follow me. This is the Straight Path.

text_simple: ولا يصدنكم الشيطان انه لكم عدو مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And do not let Satan hinder you, ˹for˺ he is certainly your sworn enemy.

text_simple: ولما جاء عيسى بالبينات قال قد جئتكم بالحكمة ولابين لكم بعض الذي تختلفون فيه فاتقوا الله واطيعون
translation_en_yusufali: When Jesus came with clear proofs, he declared, “I have come to you with wisdom, and to clarify to you some of what you differ about. So fear Allah, and obey me.

text_simple: ان الله هو ربي وربكم فاعبدوه هذا صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Allah ˹alone˺ is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him ˹alone˺. This is the Straight Path.”

text_simple: فاختلف الاحزاب من بينهم فويل للذين ظلموا من عذاب يوم اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Yet their ˹various˺ groups have differed among themselves ˹about him˺, so woe to the wrongdoers when they face the torment of a painful Day!

text_simple: هل ينظرون الا الساعة ان تاتيهم بغتة وهم لا يشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: Are they waiting for the Hour to take them by surprise when they least expect ˹it˺?

text_simple: الاخلاء يومئذ بعضهم لبعض عدو الا المتقين
translation_en_yusufali: Close friends will be enemies to one another on that Day, except the righteous

text_simple: يا عباد لا خوف عليكم اليوم ولا انتم تحزنون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹who will be told,˺ “O My servants! There is no fear for you Today, nor will you grieve—

text_simple: الذين امنوا باياتنا وكانوا مسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹those˺ who believed in Our signs and ˹fully˺ submitted ˹to Us˺.

text_simple: ادخلوا الجنة انتم وازواجكم تحبرون
translation_en_yusufali: Enter Paradise, you and your spouses, rejoicing.”

text_simple: يطاف عليهم بصحاف من ذهب واكواب وفيها ما تشتهيه الانفس وتلذ الاعين وانتم فيها خالدون
translation_en_yusufali: Golden trays and cups will be passed around to them. There will be whatever the souls desire and the eyes delight in. And you will be there forever.

text_simple: وتلك الجنة التي اورثتموها بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: That is the Paradise which you will be awarded for what you used to do.

text_simple: لكم فيها فاكهة كثيرة منها تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: There you will have abundant fruit to eat from.

text_simple: ان المجرمين في عذاب جهنم خالدون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the wicked will be in the torment of Hell forever.

text_simple: لا يفتر عنهم وهم فيه مبلسون
translation_en_yusufali: It will never be lightened for them, and there they will be overwhelmed with despair.

text_simple: وما ظلمناهم ولكن كانوا هم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: We did not wrong them, but it was they who were the wrongdoers.

text_simple: ونادوا يا مالك ليقض علينا ربك قال انكم ماكثون
translation_en_yusufali: They will cry, “O Mâlik! Let your Lord finish us off.” He will answer, “You are definitely here to stay.”

text_simple: لقد جئناكم بالحق ولكن اكثركم للحق كارهون
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly brought the truth to you, but most of you were resentful of the truth.

text_simple: ام ابرموا امرا فانا مبرمون
translation_en_yusufali: Or have they mastered some ˹evil˺ plan? Then We ˹too˺ are surely planning.

text_simple: ام يحسبون انا لا نسمع سرهم ونجواهم بلى ورسلنا لديهم يكتبون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they think that We do not hear their ˹evil˺ thoughts and secret talks? Yes ˹We do˺! And Our messenger-angels are in their presence, recording ˹it all˺.

text_simple: قل ان كان للرحمن ولد فانا اول العابدين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “If the Most Compassionate ˹really˺ had offspring, I would be the first worshipper.”

text_simple: سبحان رب السماوات والارض رب العرش عما يصفون
translation_en_yusufali: Glorified is the Lord of the heavens and the earth, the Lord of the Throne, far above what they claim.

text_simple: فذرهم يخوضوا ويلعبوا حتى يلاقوا يومهم الذي يوعدون
translation_en_yusufali: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been warned of.

text_simple: وهو الذي في السماء اله وفي الارض اله وهو الحكيم العليم
translation_en_yusufali: It is He Who is ˹the only˺ God in the heavens and ˹the only˺ God on the earth. For He is the All-Wise, All-Knowing.

text_simple: وتبارك الذي له ملك السماوات والارض وما بينهما وعنده علم الساعة واليه ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: And Blessed is the One to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and everything in between! With Him ˹alone˺ is the knowledge of the Hour. And to Him you will ˹all˺ be returned.

text_simple: ولا يملك الذين يدعون من دونه الشفاعة الا من شهد بالحق وهم يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ those ˹objects of worship˺ they invoke besides Him have no power to intercede, except those who testify to the truth knowingly.

text_simple: ولئن سالتهم من خلقهم ليقولن الله فانى يؤفكون
translation_en_yusufali: If you ask them ˹O Prophet˺ who created them, they will certainly say, “Allah!” How can they then be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

text_simple: وقيله يا رب ان هؤلاء قوم لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Allah is Aware of˺ the Prophet’s cry: “O my Lord! Indeed, these are a people who persist in disbelief.”

text_simple: فاصفح عنهم وقل سلام فسوف يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: So bear with them and respond with peace. They will soon come to know.

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: والكتاب المبين
translation_en_yusufali: By the clear Book!

text_simple: انا انزلناه في ليلة مباركة انا كنا منذرين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent it down on a blessed night, for We always warn ˹against evil˺.

text_simple: فيها يفرق كل امر حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: On that night every matter of wisdom is ordained

text_simple: امرا من عندنا انا كنا مرسلين
translation_en_yusufali: by a command from Us, for We have always sent ˹messengers˺

text_simple: رحمة من ربك انه هو السميع العليم
translation_en_yusufali: as a mercy from your Lord. He ˹alone˺ is truly the All-Hearing, All-Knowing—

text_simple: رب السماوات والارض وما بينهما ان كنتم موقنين
translation_en_yusufali: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, if only you had sure faith.

text_simple: لا اله الا هو يحيي ويميت ربكم ورب ابائكم الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. He ˹alone˺ gives life and causes death. ˹He is˺ your Lord, and the Lord of your forefathers.

text_simple: بل هم في شك يلعبون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, they are in doubt, amusing themselves.

text_simple: فارتقب يوم تاتي السماء بدخان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Wait then ˹O Prophet˺ for the day ˹when˺ the sky will be veiled in haze, clearly visible

text_simple: يغشى الناس هذا عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: overwhelming the people. ˹They will cry,˺ “This is a painful torment.

text_simple: ربنا اكشف عنا العذاب انا مؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! Remove ˹this˺ torment from us, ˹and˺ we will certainly believe.”

text_simple: انى لهم الذكرى وقد جاءهم رسول مبين
translation_en_yusufali: How can they be reminded when a messenger has already come to them, making things clear

text_simple: ثم تولوا عنه وقالوا معلم مجنون
translation_en_yusufali: then they turned away from him, saying, “A madman, taught by others!”?

text_simple: انا كاشفو العذاب قليلا انكم عائدون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We will remove ˹that˺ torment for a while, and you ˹Meccans˺ will return ˹to disbelief˺.

text_simple: يوم نبطش البطشة الكبرى انا منتقمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Then˺ on the Day We will deal ˹you˺ the fiercest blow, We will surely inflict punishment.

text_simple: ولقد فتنا قبلهم قوم فرعون وجاءهم رسول كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, before them We tested Pharaoh’s people: a noble messenger came to them

text_simple: ان ادوا الي عباد الله اني لكم رسول امين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹proclaiming,˺ “Hand over the servants of Allah to me. I am truly a trustworthy messenger to you.

text_simple: وان لا تعلوا على الله اني اتيكم بسلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And do not be arrogant with Allah. I have certainly come to you with a compelling proof.

text_simple: واني عذت بربي وربكم ان ترجمون
