translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, I seek refuge with my Lord and your Lord so you do not stone me ˹to death˺.

text_simple: وان لم تؤمنوا لي فاعتزلون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ if you do not believe me, then let me be.”

text_simple: فدعا ربه ان هؤلاء قوم مجرمون
translation_en_yusufali: Ultimately, he cried out to his Lord, “These are a wicked people!”

text_simple: فاسر بعبادي ليلا انكم متبعون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Allah responded,˺ “Leave with My servants at night, for you will surely be pursued.

text_simple: واترك البحر رهوا انهم جند مغرقون
translation_en_yusufali: And leave the sea parted, for they are certainly an army bound to drown.”

text_simple: كم تركوا من جنات وعيون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine˺ how many gardens and springs the tyrants left behind

text_simple: وزروع ومقام كريم
translation_en_yusufali: as well as ˹various˺ crops and splendid residences

text_simple: ونعمة كانوا فيها فاكهين
translation_en_yusufali: and luxuries which they fully enjoyed.

text_simple: كذلك واورثناها قوما اخرين
translation_en_yusufali: So it was. And We awarded it ˹all˺ to another people.

text_simple: فما بكت عليهم السماء والارض وما كانوا منظرين
translation_en_yusufali: Neither heaven nor earth wept over them, nor was their fate delayed.

text_simple: ولقد نجينا بني اسرائيل من العذاب المهين
translation_en_yusufali: And We certainly delivered the Children of Israel from the humiliating torment

text_simple: من فرعون انه كان عاليا من المسرفين
translation_en_yusufali: of Pharaoh. He was truly a tyrant, a transgressor.

text_simple: ولقد اخترناهم على علم على العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We chose the Israelites knowingly above the others.

text_simple: واتيناهم من الايات ما فيه بلاء مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And We showed them signs in which there was a clear test.

text_simple: ان هؤلاء ليقولون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, these ˹Meccans˺ say

text_simple: ان هي الا موتتنا الاولى وما نحن بمنشرين
translation_en_yusufali: “There is nothing beyond our first death, and we will never be resurrected.

text_simple: فاتوا بابائنا ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Bring ˹back˺ our forefathers, if what you say is true.”

text_simple: اهم خير ام قوم تبع والذين من قبلهم اهلكناهم انهم كانوا مجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: Are they superior to the people of Tubba’ and those before them? We destroyed them ˹all˺, ˹for˺ they were truly wicked.

text_simple: وما خلقنا السماوات والارض وما بينهما لاعبين
translation_en_yusufali: We did not create the heavens and the earth and everything in between for sport.

text_simple: ما خلقناهما الا بالحق ولكن اكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: We only created them for a purpose, but most of these ˹pagans˺ do not know.

text_simple: ان يوم الفصل ميقاتهم اجمعين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is the time appointed for all—

text_simple: يوم لا يغني مولى عن مولى شيئا ولا هم ينصرون
translation_en_yusufali: the Day no kith or kin will be of benefit to another whatsoever, nor will they be helped

text_simple: الا من رحم الله انه هو العزيز الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: except those shown mercy by Allah. He is truly the Almighty, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ان شجرت الزقوم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely ˹the fruit of˺ the tree of Zaqqûm

text_simple: طعام الاثيم
translation_en_yusufali: will be the food of the evildoer.

text_simple: كالمهل يغلي في البطون
translation_en_yusufali: Like molten metal, it will boil in the bellies

text_simple: كغلي الحميم
translation_en_yusufali: like the boiling of hot water.

text_simple: خذوه فاعتلوه الى سواء الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize them and drag them into the depths of the Hellfire.

text_simple: ثم صبوا فوق راسه من عذاب الحميم
translation_en_yusufali: Then pour over their heads the torment of boiling water.”

text_simple: ذق انك انت العزيز الكريم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The wicked will be told,˺ “Taste this. You mighty, noble one!

text_simple: ان هذا ما كنتم به تمترون
translation_en_yusufali: This is truly what you ˹all˺ used to doubt.”

text_simple: ان المتقين في مقام امين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will be in a secure place

text_simple: في جنات وعيون
translation_en_yusufali: amid Gardens and springs

text_simple: يلبسون من سندس واستبرق متقابلين
translation_en_yusufali: dressed in fine silk and rich brocade, facing one another.

text_simple: كذلك وزوجناهم بحور عين
translation_en_yusufali: So it will be. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

text_simple: يدعون فيها بكل فاكهة امنين
translation_en_yusufali: There they will call for every fruit in serenity.

text_simple: لا يذوقون فيها الموت الا الموتة الاولى ووقاهم عذاب الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: There they will never taste death, beyond the first death. And He will protect them from the punishment of the Hellfire—

text_simple: فضلا من ربك ذلك هو الفوز العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: as ˹an act of˺ grace from your Lord. That is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph.

text_simple: فانما يسرناه بلسانك لعلهم يتذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have made this ˹Quran˺ easy in your own language ˹O Prophet˺ so perhaps they will be mindful.

text_simple: فارتقب انهم مرتقبون
translation_en_yusufali: Wait then! They too are certainly waiting.

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: تنزيل الكتاب من الله العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ان في السماوات والارض لايات للمؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in ˹the creation of˺ the heavens and the earth are signs for the believers.

text_simple: وفي خلقكم وما يبث من دابة ايات لقوم يوقنون
translation_en_yusufali: And in your own creation, and whatever living beings He dispersed, are signs for people of sure faith.

text_simple: واختلاف الليل والنهار وما انزل الله من السماء من رزق فاحيا به الارض بعد موتها وتصريف الرياح ايات لقوم يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹in˺ the alternation of the day and the night, the provision sent down from the skies by Allah—reviving the earth after its death—and the shifting of the winds, are signs for people of understanding.

text_simple: تلك ايات الله نتلوها عليك بالحق فباي حديث بعد الله واياته يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: These are Allah’s revelations which We recite to you ˹O Prophet˺ in truth. So what message will they believe in after ˹denying˺ Allah and His revelations?

text_simple: ويل لكل افاك اثيم
translation_en_yusufali: Woe to every sinful liar.

text_simple: يسمع ايات الله تتلى عليه ثم يصر مستكبرا كان لم يسمعها فبشره بعذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: They hear Allah’s revelations recited to them, then persist ˹in denial˺ arrogantly as if they did not hear them. So give them good news of a painful punishment.

text_simple: واذا علم من اياتنا شيئا اتخذها هزوا اولئك لهم عذاب مهين
translation_en_yusufali: And whenever they learn anything of Our revelations, they make a mockery of it. It is they who will suffer a humiliating punishment.

text_simple: من ورائهم جهنم ولا يغني عنهم ما كسبوا شيئا ولا ما اتخذوا من دون الله اولياء ولهم عذاب عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Awaiting them is Hell. Their ˹worldly˺ gains will not be of any benefit to them whatsoever, nor will those protectors they have taken besides Allah. And they will suffer a tremendous punishment.

text_simple: هذا هدى والذين كفروا بايات ربهم لهم عذاب من رجز اليم
translation_en_yusufali: This ˹Quran˺ is ˹true˺ guidance. And those who deny their Lord’s revelations will suffer the ˹worst˺ torment of agonizing pain.

text_simple: الله الذي سخر لكم البحر لتجري الفلك فيه بامره ولتبتغوا من فضله ولعلكم تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah is the One Who has subjected the sea for you so that ships may sail upon it by His command, and that you may seek His bounty, and that perhaps you will be grateful.

text_simple: وسخر لكم ما في السماوات وما في الارض جميعا منه ان في ذلك لايات لقوم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: He ˹also˺ subjected for you whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth—all by His grace. Surely in this are signs for people who reflect.

text_simple: قل للذين امنوا يغفروا للذين لا يرجون ايام الله ليجزي قوما بما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹O Prophet!˺ Tell the believers to forgive those who do not fear Allah’s days ˹of torment˺, so that He will reward each group for what they used to commit.

text_simple: من عمل صالحا فلنفسه ومن اساء فعليها ثم الى ربكم ترجعون
translation_en_yusufali: Whoever does good, it is to their own benefit. And whoever does evil, it is to their own loss. Then to your Lord you will ˹all˺ be returned.

text_simple: ولقد اتينا بني اسرائيل الكتاب والحكم والنبوة ورزقناهم من الطيبات وفضلناهم على العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We gave the Children of Israel the Scripture, wisdom, and prophethood; granted them good, lawful provisions; and favoured them above the others.

text_simple: واتيناهم بينات من الامر فما اختلفوا الا من بعد ما جاءهم العلم بغيا بينهم ان ربك يقضي بينهم يوم القيامة فيما كانوا فيه يختلفون
translation_en_yusufali: We ˹also˺ gave them clear commandments regarding ˹their˺ faith. But it was not until knowledge came to them that they differed out of mutual envy. Surely your Lord will judge between them on the Day of Judgment regarding their differences.

text_simple: ثم جعلناك على شريعة من الامر فاتبعها ولا تتبع اهواء الذين لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Now We have set you ˹O Prophet˺ on the ˹clear˺ Way of faith. So follow it, and do not follow the desires of those who do not know ˹the truth˺.

text_simple: انهم لن يغنوا عنك من الله شيئا وان الظالمين بعضهم اولياء بعض والله ولي المتقين
translation_en_yusufali: They certainly can be of no benefit to you against Allah whatsoever. Surely the wrongdoers are patrons of each other, whereas Allah is the Patron of the righteous.

text_simple: هذا بصائر للناس وهدى ورحمة لقوم يوقنون
translation_en_yusufali: This ˹Quran˺ is an insight for humanity—a guide and mercy for people of sure faith.

text_simple: ام حسب الذين اجترحوا السيئات ان نجعلهم كالذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات سواء محياهم ومماتهم ساء ما يحكمون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do those who commit evil deeds ˹simply˺ think that We will make them equal—in their life and after their death—to those who believe and do good? How wrong is their judgment!

text_simple: وخلق الله السماوات والارض بالحق ولتجزى كل نفس بما كسبت وهم لا يظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: For Allah created the heavens and the earth for a purpose, so that every soul may be paid back for what it has committed. And none will be wronged.

text_simple: افرايت من اتخذ الهه هواه واضله الله على علم وختم على سمعه وقلبه وجعل على بصره غشاوة فمن يهديه من بعد الله افلا تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you seen ˹O Prophet˺ those who have taken their own desires as their god? ˹And so˺ Allah left them to stray knowingly, sealed their hearing and hearts, and placed a cover on their sight. Who then can guide them after Allah? Will you ˹all˺ not then be mindful?

text_simple: وقالوا ما هي الا حياتنا الدنيا نموت ونحيا وما يهلكنا الا الدهر وما لهم بذلك من علم ان هم الا يظنون
translation_en_yusufali: And they argue, “There is nothing beyond our worldly life. We die; others are born. And nothing destroys us but ˹the passage of˺ time.” Yet they have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this ˹claim˺. They only speculate.

text_simple: واذا تتلى عليهم اياتنا بينات ما كان حجتهم الا ان قالوا ائتوا بابائنا ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: And whenever Our clear revelations are recited to them, their only argument is to say: “Bring our forefathers back, if what you say is true!”

text_simple: قل الله يحييكم ثم يميتكم ثم يجمعكم الى يوم القيامة لا ريب فيه ولكن اكثر الناس لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “˹It is˺ Allah ˹Who˺ gives you life, then causes you to die, then will gather you ˹all˺ on the Day of Judgment, about which there is no doubt. But most people do not know.”

text_simple: ولله ملك السماوات والارض ويوم تقوم الساعة يومئذ يخسر المبطلون
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. On the Day the Hour will be established, the people of falsehood will then be in ˹total˺ loss.

text_simple: وترى كل امة جاثية كل امة تدعى الى كتابها اليوم تجزون ما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: And you will see every faith-community on its knees. Every community will be summoned to its record ˹of deeds˺. ˹They all will be told,˺ “This Day you will be rewarded for what you used to do.

text_simple: هذا كتابنا ينطق عليكم بالحق انا كنا نستنسخ ما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: This record of Ours speaks the truth about you. Indeed, We always had your deeds recorded ˹by the angels˺.”

text_simple: فاما الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات فيدخلهم ربهم في رحمته ذلك هو الفوز المبين
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who believed and did good, their Lord will admit them into His mercy. That is ˹truly˺ the absolute triumph.

text_simple: واما الذين كفروا افلم تكن اياتي تتلى عليكم فاستكبرتم وكنتم قوما مجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: And as for those who disbelieved, ˹they will be told,˺ “Were My revelations not recited to you, yet you acted arrogantly and were a wicked people?

text_simple: واذا قيل ان وعد الله حق والساعة لا ريب فيها قلتم ما ندري ما الساعة ان نظن الا ظنا وما نحن بمستيقنين
translation_en_yusufali: And whenever it was said ˹to you˺, ‘Surely Allah’s promise ˹of judgment˺ is true and there is no doubt about the Hour,’ you said ˹mockingly˺, ‘We do not know what the Hour is! We think it is no more than speculation, and we are not convinced ˹that it will ever come˺.’”

text_simple: وبدا لهم سيئات ما عملوا وحاق بهم ما كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: And the evil ˹consequences˺ of their deeds will unfold before them, and they will be overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

text_simple: وقيل اليوم ننساكم كما نسيتم لقاء يومكم هذا وماواكم النار وما لكم من ناصرين
translation_en_yusufali: It will be said, “This Day We will neglect you as you neglected the meeting of this Day of yours! Your home will be the Fire, and you will have no helpers.

text_simple: ذلكم بانكم اتخذتم ايات الله هزوا وغرتكم الحياة الدنيا فاليوم لا يخرجون منها ولا هم يستعتبون
translation_en_yusufali: This is because you made a mockery of Allah’s revelations, and were deluded by ˹your˺ worldly life.” So ˹from˺ that Day ˹on˺ they will not be taken out of the Fire, nor will they be allowed to appease ˹their Lord˺.

text_simple: فلله الحمد رب السماوات ورب الارض رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: So all praise is for Allah—Lord of the heavens and Lord of the earth, Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: وله الكبرياء في السماوات والارض وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belongs ˹all˺ Majesty in the heavens and the earth. And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: حم
translation_en_yusufali: Ḥâ-Mĩm.

text_simple: تنزيل الكتاب من الله العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: The revelation of this Book is from Allah—the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ما خلقنا السماوات والارض وما بينهما الا بالحق واجل مسمى والذين كفروا عما انذروا معرضون
translation_en_yusufali: We only created the heavens and the earth and everything in between for a purpose and an appointed term. Yet the disbelievers are turning away from what they have been warned about.

text_simple: قل ارايتم ما تدعون من دون الله اروني ماذا خلقوا من الارض ام لهم شرك في السماوات ائتوني بكتاب من قبل هذا او اثارة من علم ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Have you considered whatever ˹idols˺ you invoke besides Allah? Show me what they have created on earth! Or do they have a share in ˹the creation of˺ the heavens? Bring me a scripture ˹revealed˺ before this ˹Quran˺ or a shred of knowledge, if what you say is true.”

text_simple: ومن اضل ممن يدعو من دون الله من لا يستجيب له الى يوم القيامة وهم عن دعائهم غافلون
translation_en_yusufali: And who could be more astray than those who call upon others besides Allah—˹others˺ that cannot respond to them until the Day of Judgment, and are ˹even˺ unaware of their calls?

text_simple: واذا حشر الناس كانوا لهم اعداء وكانوا بعبادتهم كافرين
translation_en_yusufali: And when ˹such˺ people will be gathered together, those ˹gods˺ will be their enemies and will disown their worship.

text_simple: واذا تتلى عليهم اياتنا بينات قال الذين كفروا للحق لما جاءهم هذا سحر مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever Our clear revelations are recited to them, the disbelievers say of the truth when it has come to them, “This is pure magic.”

text_simple: ام يقولون افتراه قل ان افتريته فلا تملكون لي من الله شيئا هو اعلم بما تفيضون فيه كفى به شهيدا بيني وبينكم وهو الغفور الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they say, “He has fabricated this ˹Quran˺!”? Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “If I have done so, then there is nothing whatsoever you can do to save me from Allah. He knows best what ˹slurs˺ you indulge about it. Sufficient is He as a Witness between you and me. And He is the All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”

text_simple: قل ما كنت بدعا من الرسل وما ادري ما يفعل بي ولا بكم ان اتبع الا ما يوحى الي وما انا الا نذير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “I am not the first messenger ever sent, nor do I know what will happen to me or you. I only follow what is revealed to me. And I am only sent with a clear warning.”

text_simple: قل ارايتم ان كان من عند الله وكفرتم به وشهد شاهد من بني اسرائيل على مثله فامن واستكبرتم ان الله لا يهدي القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Ask ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Consider if this ˹Quran˺ is ˹truly˺ from Allah and you deny it, and a witness from the Children of Israel attests to it and then believes, whereas you act arrogantly. Surely Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.”

text_simple: وقال الذين كفروا للذين امنوا لو كان خيرا ما سبقونا اليه واذ لم يهتدوا به فسيقولون هذا افك قديم
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers say of the believers, “Had it been ˹something˺ good, they would not have beaten us to it.” Now since they reject its guidance, they will say, “˹This is˺ an ancient fabrication!”

text_simple: ومن قبله كتاب موسى اماما ورحمة وهذا كتاب مصدق لسانا عربيا لينذر الذين ظلموا وبشرى للمحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: And before this ˹Quran˺ the Book of Moses was ˹revealed as˺ a guide and mercy. And this Book is a confirmation, in the Arabic tongue, to warn those who do wrong, and as good news to those who do good.

text_simple: ان الذين قالوا ربنا الله ثم استقاموا فلا خوف عليهم ولا هم يحزنون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who say, “Our Lord is Allah,” and then remain steadfast—there will be no fear for them, nor will they grieve.

text_simple: اولئك اصحاب الجنة خالدين فيها جزاء بما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: It is they who will be the residents of Paradise, staying there forever, as a reward for what they used to do.

text_simple: ووصينا الانسان بوالديه احسانا حملته امه كرها ووضعته كرها وحمله وفصاله ثلاثون شهرا حتى اذا بلغ اشده وبلغ اربعين سنة قال رب اوزعني ان اشكر نعمتك التي انعمت علي وعلى والدي وان اعمل صالحا ترضاه واصلح لي في ذريتي اني تبت اليك واني من المسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: We have commanded people to honour their parents. Their mothers bore them in hardship and delivered them in hardship. Their ˹period of˺ bearing and weaning is thirty months. In time, when the child reaches their prime at the age of forty, they pray, “My Lord! Inspire me to ˹always˺ be thankful for Your favours which You blessed me and my parents with, and to do good deeds that please You. And instil righteousness in my offspring. I truly repent to You, and I truly submit ˹to Your Will˺.”

text_simple: اولئك الذين نتقبل عنهم احسن ما عملوا ونتجاوز عن سيئاتهم في اصحاب الجنة وعد الصدق الذي كانوا يوعدون
translation_en_yusufali: It is from these ˹people˺ that We will accept the good they did, and overlook their misdeeds—along with the residents of Paradise, ˹in fulfilment of˺ the true promise they have been given.

text_simple: والذي قال لوالديه اف لكما اتعدانني ان اخرج وقد خلت القرون من قبلي وهما يستغيثان الله ويلك امن ان وعد الله حق فيقول ما هذا الا اساطير الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: But some scold their parents, “Enough with you! Are you warning me that I will be brought forth ˹from the grave˺, while many generations had already perished before me ˹for good˺?” The parents cry to Allah for help, ˹and warn their child,˺ “Pity you. Have faith! Surely Allah’s promise is true.” But the deniers insist, “This is nothing but ancient fables.”

text_simple: اولئك الذين حق عليهم القول في امم قد خلت من قبلهم من الجن والانس انهم كانوا خاسرين
translation_en_yusufali: These are the ones against whom the fate of earlier communities of jinn and humans has been justified, ˹for˺ they were truly losers.

text_simple: ولكل درجات مما عملوا وليوفيهم اعمالهم وهم لا يظلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Each ˹of the two groups˺ will be ranked according to what they have done so He may fully reward all. And none will be wronged.

text_simple: ويوم يعرض الذين كفروا على النار اذهبتم طيباتكم في حياتكم الدنيا واستمتعتم بها فاليوم تجزون عذاب الهون بما كنتم تستكبرون في الارض بغير الحق وبما كنتم تفسقون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Watch for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the disbelievers will be exposed to the Fire. ˹They will be told,˺ “You ˹already˺ exhausted your ˹share of˺ pleasures during your worldly life, and ˹fully˺ enjoyed them. So Today you will be rewarded with the torment of disgrace for your arrogance throughout the land with no right, and for your rebelliousness.”

text_simple: واذكر اخا عاد اذ انذر قومه بالاحقاف وقد خلت النذر من بين يديه ومن خلفه الا تعبدوا الا الله اني اخاف عليكم عذاب يوم عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: And remember the brother of ’Ȃd, when he warned his people, who inhabited the sand-hills—there were certainly warners before and after him—˹saying,˺ “Worship none but Allah. I truly fear for you the torment of a tremendous day.”

text_simple: قالوا اجئتنا لتافكنا عن الهتنا فاتنا بما تعدنا ان كنت من الصادقين
translation_en_yusufali: They argued, “Have you come to turn us away from our gods? Bring us then whatever you threaten us with, if what you say is true.”

text_simple: قال انما العلم عند الله وابلغكم ما ارسلت به ولكني اراكم قوما تجهلون
translation_en_yusufali: He responded, “The knowledge ˹of its time˺ is only with Allah. I only convey to you what I have been sent with. But I can see that you are a people acting ignorantly.”

text_simple: فلما راوه عارضا مستقبل اوديتهم قالوا هذا عارض ممطرنا بل هو ما استعجلتم به ريح فيها عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Then when they saw the torment as a ˹dense˺ cloud approaching their valleys, they said ˹happily˺, “This is a cloud bringing us rain.” ˹But Hûd replied,˺ “No, it is what you sought to hasten: a ˹fierce˺ wind carrying a painful punishment!”

text_simple: تدمر كل شيء بامر ربها فاصبحوا لا يرى الا مساكنهم كذلك نجزي القوم المجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: It destroyed everything by the command of its Lord, leaving nothing visible except their ruins. This is how We reward the wicked people.

text_simple: ولقد مكناهم فيما ان مكناكم فيه وجعلنا لهم سمعا وابصارا وافئدة فما اغنى عنهم سمعهم ولا ابصارهم ولا افئدتهم من شيء اذ كانوا يجحدون بايات الله وحاق بهم ما كانوا به يستهزئون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We had established them in a way We have not established you ˹Meccans˺. And We gave them hearing, sight, and intellect. But neither their hearing, sight, nor intellect were of any benefit to them whatsoever, since they persisted in denying Allah’s signs. And ˹so˺ they were overwhelmed by what they used to ridicule.

text_simple: ولقد اهلكنا ما حولكم من القرى وصرفنا الايات لعلهم يرجعون
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly destroyed the societies around you after having varied the signs so perhaps they would return ˹to the Right Path˺.

text_simple: فلولا نصرهم الذين اتخذوا من دون الله قربانا الهة بل ضلوا عنهم وذلك افكهم وما كانوا يفترون
translation_en_yusufali: Why then did those ˹idols˺ they took as gods—hoping to get closer ˹to Him˺—not come to their aid? Instead, they failed them. That is ˹the result of˺ their lies and their fabrications.

text_simple: واذ صرفنا اليك نفرا من الجن يستمعون القران فلما حضروه قالوا انصتوا فلما قضي ولوا الى قومهم منذرين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember, O  Prophet,˺ when We sent a group of jinn your way to listen to the Quran. Then, upon hearing it, they said ˹to one another˺, “Listen quietly!” Then when it was over, they returned to their fellow jinn as warners.

text_simple: قالوا يا قومنا انا سمعنا كتابا انزل من بعد موسى مصدقا لما بين يديه يهدي الى الحق والى طريق مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: They declared, “O our fellow jinn! We have truly heard a scripture revealed after Moses, confirming what came before it. It guides to the truth and the Straight Way.

text_simple: يا قومنا اجيبوا داعي الله وامنوا به يغفر لكم من ذنوبكم ويجركم من عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: O  our fellow jinn! Respond to the caller of Allah and believe in him, He will forgive your sins and protect you from a painful punishment.

text_simple: ومن لا يجب داعي الله فليس بمعجز في الارض وليس له من دونه اولياء اولئك في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever does not respond to the caller of Allah will have no escape on earth, nor will they have any protectors against Him. It is they who are clearly astray.”

text_simple: اولم يروا ان الله الذي خلق السماوات والارض ولم يعي بخلقهن بقادر على ان يحيي الموتى بلى انه على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not realize that Allah, Who created the heavens and the earth and did not tire in creating them, is able to give life to the dead? Yes ˹indeed˺! He is certainly Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: ويوم يعرض الذين كفروا على النار اليس هذا بالحق قالوا بلى وربنا قال فذوقوا العذاب بما كنتم تكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: And on the Day the disbelievers will be exposed to the Fire, ˹they will be asked,˺ “Is this ˹Hereafter˺ not the truth?” They will cry, “Absolutely, by our Lord!” It will be said, “Then taste the punishment for your disbelief.”

text_simple: فاصبر كما صبر اولو العزم من الرسل ولا تستعجل لهم كانهم يوم يرون ما يوعدون لم يلبثوا الا ساعة من نهار بلاغ فهل يهلك الا القوم الفاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: So endure patiently, as did the Messengers of Firm Resolve. And do not ˹seek to˺ hasten ˹the torment˺ for the deniers. On the Day they see what they have been threatened with, it will be as if they had only stayed ˹in this world˺ for an hour of a day. ˹This is˺ a ˹sufficient˺ warning! Then, will anyone be destroyed except the rebellious people?

text_simple: الذين كفروا وصدوا عن سبيل الله اضل اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: Those who disbelieve and hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, He will render their deeds void.

text_simple: والذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات وامنوا بما نزل على محمد وهو الحق من ربهم كفر عنهم سيئاتهم واصلح بالهم
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who believe, do good, and have faith in what has been revealed to Muḥammad—which is the truth from their Lord—He will absolve them of their sins and improve their condition.

text_simple: ذلك بان الذين كفروا اتبعوا الباطل وان الذين امنوا اتبعوا الحق من ربهم كذلك يضرب الله للناس امثالهم
translation_en_yusufali: This is because the disbelievers follow falsehood, while the believers follow the truth from their Lord. This is how Allah shows people their true state ˹of faith˺.

text_simple: فاذا لقيتم الذين كفروا فضرب الرقاب حتى اذا اثخنتموهم فشدوا الوثاق فاما منا بعد واما فداء حتى تضع الحرب اوزارها ذلك ولو يشاء الله لانتصر منهم ولكن ليبلو بعضكم ببعض والذين قتلوا في سبيل الله فلن يضل اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: So when you meet the disbelievers ˹in battle˺, strike ˹their˺ necks until you have thoroughly subdued them, then bind them firmly. Later ˹free them either as˺ an act of grace or by ransom until the war comes to an end. So will it be. Had Allah willed, He ˹Himself˺ could have inflicted punishment on them. But He does ˹this only to˺ test some of you by means of others. And those who are martyred in the cause of Allah, He will never render their deeds void.

text_simple: سيهديهم ويصلح بالهم
translation_en_yusufali: He will guide them ˹to their reward˺, improve their condition

text_simple: ويدخلهم الجنة عرفها لهم
translation_en_yusufali: and admit them into Paradise, having made it known to them.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا ان تنصروا الله ينصركم ويثبت اقدامكم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! If you stand up for Allah, He will help you and make your steps firm.

text_simple: والذين كفروا فتعسا لهم واضل اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: As for the disbelievers, may they be doomed and may He render their deeds void.

text_simple: ذلك بانهم كرهوا ما انزل الله فاحبط اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: That is because they detest what Allah has revealed, so He has rendered their deeds void.

text_simple: افلم يسيروا في الارض فينظروا كيف كان عاقبة الذين من قبلهم دمر الله عليهم وللكافرين امثالها
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not travelled throughout the land to see what was the end of those before them? Allah annihilated them, and a similar fate awaits the disbelievers.

text_simple: ذلك بان الله مولى الذين امنوا وان الكافرين لا مولى لهم
translation_en_yusufali: This is because Allah is the Patron of the believers while the disbelievers have no patron.

text_simple: ان الله يدخل الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار والذين كفروا يتمتعون وياكلون كما تاكل الانعام والنار مثوى لهم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Allah will admit those who believe and do good into Gardens under which rivers flow. As for the disbelievers, they enjoy themselves and feed like cattle. But the Fire will be their home.

text_simple: وكاين من قرية هي اشد قوة من قريتك التي اخرجتك اهلكناهم فلا ناصر لهم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine, O  Prophet,˺ how many societies We destroyed that were far superior in might than your society—which drove you out—and there was none to help them!

text_simple: افمن كان على بينة من ربه كمن زين له سوء عمله واتبعوا اهواءهم
translation_en_yusufali: Can those ˹believers˺ who stand on clear proof from their Lord be like those whose evil deeds are made appealing to them and ˹only˺ follow their desires?

text_simple: مثل الجنة التي وعد المتقون فيها انهار من ماء غير اسن وانهار من لبن لم يتغير طعمه وانهار من خمر لذة للشاربين وانهار من عسل مصفى ولهم فيها من كل الثمرات ومغفرة من ربهم كمن هو خالد في النار وسقوا ماء حميما فقطع امعاءهم
translation_en_yusufali: The description of the Paradise promised to the righteous is that in it are rivers of fresh water, rivers of milk that never changes in taste, rivers of wine delicious to drink, and rivers of pure honey. There they will ˹also˺ have all kinds of fruit, and forgiveness from their Lord. ˹Can they be˺ like those who will stay in the Fire forever, left to drink boiling water that will tear apart their insides?

text_simple: ومنهم من يستمع اليك حتى اذا خرجوا من عندك قالوا للذين اوتوا العلم ماذا قال انفا اولئك الذين طبع الله على قلوبهم واتبعوا اهواءهم
translation_en_yusufali: There are some of them who listen to you ˹O Prophet˺, but when they depart from you, they say ˹mockingly˺ to those ˹believers˺ gifted with knowledge, “What did he just say?” These are the ones whose hearts Allah has sealed and who ˹only˺ follow their desires.

text_simple: والذين اهتدوا زادهم هدى واتاهم تقواهم
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who are ˹rightly˺ guided, He increases them in guidance and blesses them with righteousness.

text_simple: فهل ينظرون الا الساعة ان تاتيهم بغتة فقد جاء اشراطها فانى لهم اذا جاءتهم ذكراهم
translation_en_yusufali: Are they only waiting for the Hour to take them by surprise? Yet ˹some of˺ its signs have already come. Once it actually befalls them, will it not be too late to be mindful?

text_simple: فاعلم انه لا اله الا الله واستغفر لذنبك وللمؤمنين والمؤمنات والله يعلم متقلبكم ومثواكم
translation_en_yusufali: So, know ˹well, O  Prophet,˺ that there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Allah. And seek forgiveness for your shortcomings and for ˹the sins of˺ the believing men and women. For Allah ˹fully˺ knows your movements and places of rest ˹O people˺.

text_simple: ويقول الذين امنوا لولا نزلت سورة فاذا انزلت سورة محكمة وذكر فيها القتال رايت الذين في قلوبهم مرض ينظرون اليك نظر المغشي عليه من الموت فاولى لهم
translation_en_yusufali: And the believers say, “If only a sûrah was revealed ˹allowing self-defence˺!” Yet when a precise sûrah is revealed, in which fighting is ˹explicitly˺ mentioned, you see those with sickness in their hearts staring at you like someone in the throes of death. It would have been better for them

text_simple: طاعة وقول معروف فاذا عزم الامر فلو صدقوا الله لكان خيرا لهم
translation_en_yusufali: to obey and speak rightly. Then when fighting was ordained, it surely would have been better for them if they were true to Allah.

text_simple: فهل عسيتم ان توليتم ان تفسدوا في الارض وتقطعوا ارحامكم
translation_en_yusufali: Now if you ˹hypocrites˺ turn away, perhaps you would then spread corruption throughout the land and sever your ˹ties of˺ kinship!

text_simple: اولئك الذين لعنهم الله فاصمهم واعمى ابصارهم
translation_en_yusufali: These are the ones who Allah has condemned, deafening them and blinding their eyes.

text_simple: افلا يتدبرون القران ام على قلوب اقفالها
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not then reflect on the Quran? Or are there locks upon their hearts?

text_simple: ان الذين ارتدوا على ادبارهم من بعد ما تبين لهم الهدى الشيطان سول لهم واملى لهم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who relapse ˹into disbelief˺ after ˹true˺ guidance has become clear to them, ˹it is˺ Satan ˹that˺ has tempted them, luring them with false hopes.

text_simple: ذلك بانهم قالوا للذين كرهوا ما نزل الله سنطيعكم في بعض الامر والله يعلم اسرارهم
translation_en_yusufali: That is because they said ˹privately˺ to those who ˹also˺ detest what Allah has revealed, “We will obey you in some matters.” But Allah ˹fully˺ knows what they are hiding.

text_simple: فكيف اذا توفتهم الملائكة يضربون وجوههم وادبارهم
translation_en_yusufali: Then how ˹horrible˺ will it be when the angels take their souls, beating their faces and backs!

text_simple: ذلك بانهم اتبعوا ما اسخط الله وكرهوا رضوانه فاحبط اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: This is because they follow whatever displeases Allah and hate whatever pleases Him, so He has rendered their deeds void.

text_simple: ام حسب الذين في قلوبهم مرض ان لن يخرج الله اضغانهم
translation_en_yusufali: Or do those with sickness in their hearts think that Allah will not ˹be able to˺ expose their malice?

text_simple: ولو نشاء لاريناكهم فلعرفتهم بسيماهم ولتعرفنهم في لحن القول والله يعلم اعمالكم
translation_en_yusufali: Had We willed, We could have truly shown them to you ˹O Prophet˺, and you would have certainly recognized them by their appearance. But you will surely recognize them by their tone of speech. And Allah ˹fully˺ knows your doings ˹O people˺.

text_simple: ولنبلونكم حتى نعلم المجاهدين منكم والصابرين ونبلو اخباركم
translation_en_yusufali: We will certainly test you ˹believers˺ until We prove those of you who ˹truly˺ struggle ˹in Allah’s cause˺ and remain steadfast, and reveal how you conduct yourselves.

text_simple: ان الذين كفروا وصدوا عن سبيل الله وشاقوا الرسول من بعد ما تبين لهم الهدى لن يضروا الله شيئا وسيحبط اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who disbelieve, hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, and defy the Messenger after ˹true˺ guidance has become clear to them; they will not harm Allah in the least, but He will render their deeds void.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اطيعوا الله واطيعوا الرسول ولا تبطلوا اعمالكم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Obey Allah and obey the Messenger, and do not let your deeds be in vain.

text_simple: ان الذين كفروا وصدوا عن سبيل الله ثم ماتوا وهم كفار فلن يغفر الله لهم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who disbelieve, hinder ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah, and then die as disbelievers; Allah will never forgive them.

text_simple: فلا تهنوا وتدعوا الى السلم وانتم الاعلون والله معكم ولن يتركم اعمالكم
translation_en_yusufali: So do not falter or cry for peace, for you will have the upper hand and Allah is with you. And He will never let your deeds go to waste.

text_simple: انما الحياة الدنيا لعب ولهو وان تؤمنوا وتتقوا يؤتكم اجوركم ولا يسالكم اموالكم
translation_en_yusufali: This worldly life is no more than play and amusement. But if you are faithful and mindful ˹of Allah˺, He will grant you your ˹full˺ reward, and will not ask you ˹to donate all˺ your wealth.

text_simple: ان يسالكموها فيحفكم تبخلوا ويخرج اضغانكم
translation_en_yusufali: If He were to do so and pressure you, you would withhold and He would bring out your resentment.

text_simple: ها انتم هؤلاء تدعون لتنفقوا في سبيل الله فمنكم من يبخل ومن يبخل فانما يبخل عن نفسه والله الغني وانتم الفقراء وان تتولوا يستبدل قوما غيركم ثم لا يكونوا امثالكم
translation_en_yusufali: Here you are, being invited to donate ˹a little˺ in the cause of Allah. Still some of you withhold. And whoever does so, it is only to their own loss. For Allah is the Self-Sufficient, whereas you stand in need ˹of Him˺. If you ˹still˺ turn away, He will replace you with another people. And they will not be like you.

text_simple: انا فتحنا لك فتحا مبينا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have granted you a clear triumph ˹O Prophet˺

text_simple: ليغفر لك الله ما تقدم من ذنبك وما تاخر ويتم نعمته عليك ويهديك صراطا مستقيما
translation_en_yusufali: so that Allah may forgive you for your past and future shortcomings, perfect His favour upon you, guide you along the Straight Path

text_simple: وينصرك الله نصرا عزيزا
translation_en_yusufali: and so that Allah will help you tremendously.

text_simple: هو الذي انزل السكينة في قلوب المؤمنين ليزدادوا ايمانا مع ايمانهم ولله جنود السماوات والارض وكان الله عليما حكيما
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who sent down serenity upon the hearts of the believers so that they may increase even more in their faith. To Allah ˹alone˺ belong the forces of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: ليدخل المؤمنين والمؤمنات جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها ويكفر عنهم سيئاتهم وكان ذلك عند الله فوزا عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: So He may admit believing men and women into Gardens under which rivers flow—to stay there forever—and absolve them of their sins. And that is a supreme achievement in the sight of Allah.

text_simple: ويعذب المنافقين والمنافقات والمشركين والمشركات الظانين بالله ظن السوء عليهم دائرة السوء وغضب الله عليهم ولعنهم واعد لهم جهنم وساءت مصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Also ˹so that˺ He may punish hypocrite men and women and polytheistic men and women, who harbour evil thoughts of Allah. May ill-fate befall them! Allah is displeased with them. He has condemned them and prepared for them Hell. What an evil destination!

text_simple: ولله جنود السماوات والارض وكان الله عزيزا حكيما
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belong the forces of the heavens and the earth. And Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: انا ارسلناك شاهدا ومبشرا ونذيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, ˹O Prophet,˺ We have sent you as a witness, a deliverer of good news, and a warner

text_simple: لتؤمنوا بالله ورسوله وتعزروه وتوقروه وتسبحوه بكرة واصيلا
translation_en_yusufali: so that you ˹believers˺ may have faith in Allah and His Messenger, support and honour him, and glorify Allah morning and evening.

text_simple: ان الذين يبايعونك انما يبايعون الله يد الله فوق ايديهم فمن نكث فانما ينكث على نفسه ومن اوفى بما عاهد عليه الله فسيؤتيه اجرا عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who pledge allegiance to you ˹O Prophet˺ are actually pledging allegiance to Allah. Allah’s Hand is over theirs. Whoever breaks their pledge, it will only be to their own loss. And whoever fulfils their pledge to Allah, He will grant them a great reward.

text_simple: سيقول لك المخلفون من الاعراب شغلتنا اموالنا واهلونا فاستغفر لنا يقولون بالسنتهم ما ليس في قلوبهم قل فمن يملك لكم من الله شيئا ان اراد بكم ضرا او اراد بكم نفعا بل كان الله بما تعملون خبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: The nomadic Arabs, who stayed behind, will say to you ˹O Prophet˺, “We were preoccupied with our wealth and families, so ask for forgiveness for us.” They say with their tongues what is not in their hearts. Say, “Who then can stand between you and Allah in any way, if He intends harm or benefit for you? In fact, Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: بل ظننتم ان لن ينقلب الرسول والمؤمنون الى اهليهم ابدا وزين ذلك في قلوبكم وظننتم ظن السوء وكنتم قوما بورا
translation_en_yusufali: The truth is: you thought that the Messenger and the believers would never return to their families again. And that was made appealing in your hearts. You harboured evil thoughts ˹about Allah˺, and ˹so˺ became a doomed people.”

text_simple: ومن لم يؤمن بالله ورسوله فانا اعتدنا للكافرين سعيرا
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever does not believe in Allah and His Messenger, then We surely have prepared for the disbelievers a blazing Fire.

text_simple: ولله ملك السماوات والارض يغفر لمن يشاء ويعذب من يشاء وكان الله غفورا رحيما
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He forgives whoever He wills, and punishes whoever He wills. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: سيقول المخلفون اذا انطلقتم الى مغانم لتاخذوها ذرونا نتبعكم يريدون ان يبدلوا كلام الله قل لن تتبعونا كذلكم قال الله من قبل فسيقولون بل تحسدوننا بل كانوا لا يفقهون الا قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: Those who stayed behind will say, when you ˹believers˺ set out to take the spoils of war, “Let us accompany you.” They wish to change Allah’s promise. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You will not accompany us. This is what Allah has said before.” They will then say, “In fact, you are driven by jealousy against us!” The truth is: they can hardly comprehend.

text_simple: قل للمخلفين من الاعراب ستدعون الى قوم اولي باس شديد تقاتلونهم او يسلمون فان تطيعوا يؤتكم الله اجرا حسنا وان تتولوا كما توليتم من قبل يعذبكم عذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: Say to nomadic Arabs, who stayed behind, “You will be called ˹to fight˺ against a people of great might, who you will fight unless they submit. If you then obey, Allah will grant you a fine reward. But if you turn away as you did before, He will inflict upon you a painful punishment.”

text_simple: ليس على الاعمى حرج ولا على الاعرج حرج ولا على المريض حرج ومن يطع الله ورسوله يدخله جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار ومن يتول يعذبه عذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: There is no blame on the blind, or the disabled, or the sick ˹for staying behind˺. And whoever obeys Allah and His Messenger will be admitted by Him into Gardens under which rivers flow. But whoever turns away will be subjected by Him to a painful punishment.

text_simple: لقد رضي الله عن المؤمنين اذ يبايعونك تحت الشجرة فعلم ما في قلوبهم فانزل السكينة عليهم واثابهم فتحا قريبا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah was pleased with the believers when they pledged allegiance to you ˹O Prophet˺ under the tree. He knew what was in their hearts, so He sent down serenity upon them and rewarded them with a victory at hand

text_simple: ومغانم كثيرة ياخذونها وكان الله عزيزا حكيما
translation_en_yusufali: and many spoils of war they will gain. For Allah is Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: وعدكم الله مغانم كثيرة تاخذونها فعجل لكم هذه وكف ايدي الناس عنكم ولتكون اية للمؤمنين ويهديكم صراطا مستقيما
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has promised you ˹believers˺ abundant spoils, which you will gain, so He hastened this ˹truce˺ for you. And He has held people’s hands back from ˹harming˺ you, so it may be a sign for the believers, and so He may guide you along the Straight Path.

text_simple: واخرى لم تقدروا عليها قد احاط الله بها وكان الله على كل شيء قديرا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹there are˺ other gains which are beyond your reach that Allah is keeping in store ˹for you˺. For Allah is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: ولو قاتلكم الذين كفروا لولوا الادبار ثم لا يجدون وليا ولا نصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: If the disbelievers were to fight you, they would certainly flee. Then they would never find any protector or helper.

text_simple: سنة الله التي قد خلت من قبل ولن تجد لسنة الله تبديلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ Allah’s way, already long established ˹in the past˺. And you will find no change in Allah’s way.

text_simple: وهو الذي كف ايديهم عنكم وايديكم عنهم ببطن مكة من بعد ان اظفركم عليهم وكان الله بما تعملون بصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who held back their hands from you and your hands from them in the valley of ˹Ḥudaibiyah, near˺ Mecca, after giving you the upper hand over ˹a group of˺ them. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

text_simple: هم الذين كفروا وصدوكم عن المسجد الحرام والهدي معكوفا ان يبلغ محله ولولا رجال مؤمنون ونساء مؤمنات لم تعلموهم ان تطئوهم فتصيبكم منهم معرة بغير علم ليدخل الله في رحمته من يشاء لو تزيلوا لعذبنا الذين كفروا منهم عذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: They are the ones who persisted in disbelief and hindered you from the Sacred Mosque, preventing the sacrificial animals from reaching their destination. ˹We would have let you march through Mecca,˺ had there not been believing men and women, unknown to you. You might have trampled them underfoot, incurring guilt for ˹what you did to˺ them unknowingly. That was so Allah may admit into His mercy whoever He wills. Had those ˹unknown˺ believers stood apart, We would have certainly inflicted a painful punishment on the disbelievers.

text_simple: اذ جعل الذين كفروا في قلوبهم الحمية حمية الجاهلية فانزل الله سكينته على رسوله وعلى المؤمنين والزمهم كلمة التقوى وكانوا احق بها واهلها وكان الله بكل شيء عليما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when the disbelievers had filled their hearts with pride—the pride of ˹pre-Islamic˺ ignorance—then Allah sent down His serenity upon His Messenger and the believers, inspiring them to uphold the declaration of faith, for they were better entitled and more worthy of it. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: لقد صدق الله رسوله الرؤيا بالحق لتدخلن المسجد الحرام ان شاء الله امنين محلقين رءوسكم ومقصرين لا تخافون فعلم ما لم تعلموا فجعل من دون ذلك فتحا قريبا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah will fulfil His Messenger’s vision in all truth: Allah willing, you will surely enter the Sacred Mosque, in security—˹some with˺ heads shaved and ˹others with˺ hair shortened—without fear. He knew what you did not know, so He first granted you the triumph at hand.

text_simple: هو الذي ارسل رسوله بالهدى ودين الحق ليظهره على الدين كله وكفى بالله شهيدا
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who has sent His Messenger with ˹right˺ guidance and the religion of truth, making it prevail over all others. And sufficient is Allah as a Witness.

text_simple: محمد رسول الله والذين معه اشداء على الكفار رحماء بينهم تراهم ركعا سجدا يبتغون فضلا من الله ورضوانا سيماهم في وجوههم من اثر السجود ذلك مثلهم في التوراة ومثلهم في الانجيل كزرع اخرج شطاه فازره فاستغلظ فاستوى على سوقه يعجب الزراع ليغيظ بهم الكفار وعد الله الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات منهم مغفرة واجرا عظيما
translation_en_yusufali: Muḥammad is the Messenger of Allah. And those with him are firm with the disbelievers and compassionate with one another. You see them bowing and prostrating ˹in prayer˺, seeking Allah’s bounty and pleasure. The sign ˹of brightness can be seen˺ on their faces from the trace of prostrating ˹in prayer˺. This is their description in the Torah. And their parable in the Gospel is that of a seed that sprouts its ˹tiny˺ branches, making it strong. Then it becomes thick, standing firmly on its stem, to the delight of the planters—in this way Allah makes the believers a source of dismay for the disbelievers. To those of them who believe and do good, Allah has promised forgiveness and a great reward.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تقدموا بين يدي الله ورسوله واتقوا الله ان الله سميع عليم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not proceed ˹in any matter˺ before ˹a decree from˺ Allah and His Messenger. And fear Allah. Surely Allah is All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا ترفعوا اصواتكم فوق صوت النبي ولا تجهروا له بالقول كجهر بعضكم لبعض ان تحبط اعمالكم وانتم لا تشعرون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not raise your voices above the voice of the Prophet, nor speak loudly to him as you do to one another, or your deeds will become void while you are unaware.

text_simple: ان الذين يغضون اصواتهم عند رسول الله اولئك الذين امتحن الله قلوبهم للتقوى لهم مغفرة واجر عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who lower their voices in the presence of Allah’s Messenger are the ones whose hearts Allah has refined for righteousness. They will have forgiveness and a great reward.

text_simple: ان الذين ينادونك من وراء الحجرات اكثرهم لا يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, most of those who call out to you ˹O Prophet˺ from outside ˹your˺ private quarters have no understanding ˹of manners˺.

text_simple: ولو انهم صبروا حتى تخرج اليهم لكان خيرا لهم والله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Had they been patient until you could come out to them, it would have certainly been better for them. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا ان جاءكم فاسق بنبا فتبينوا ان تصيبوا قوما بجهالة فتصبحوا على ما فعلتم نادمين
translation_en_yusufali: O believers, if an evildoer brings you any news, verify ˹it˺ so you do not harm people unknowingly, becoming regretful for what you have done.

text_simple: واعلموا ان فيكم رسول الله لو يطيعكم في كثير من الامر لعنتم ولكن الله حبب اليكم الايمان وزينه في قلوبكم وكره اليكم الكفر والفسوق والعصيان اولئك هم الراشدون
translation_en_yusufali: And keep in mind that Allah’s Messenger is ˹still˺ in your midst. If he were to yield to you in many matters, you would surely suffer ˹the consequences˺. But Allah has endeared faith to you, making it appealing in your hearts. And He has made disbelief, rebelliousness, and disobedience detestable to you. Those are the ones rightly guided.

text_simple: فضلا من الله ونعمة والله عليم حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is˺ a bounty and a blessing from Allah. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: وان طائفتان من المؤمنين اقتتلوا فاصلحوا بينهما فان بغت احداهما على الاخرى فقاتلوا التي تبغي حتى تفيء الى امر الله فان فاءت فاصلحوا بينهما بالعدل واقسطوا ان الله يحب المقسطين
translation_en_yusufali: And if two groups of believers fight each other, then make peace between them. But if one of them transgresses against the other, then fight against the transgressing group until they ˹are willing to˺ submit to the rule of Allah. If they do so, then make peace between both ˹groups˺ in all fairness and act justly. Surely Allah loves those who uphold justice.

text_simple: انما المؤمنون اخوة فاصلحوا بين اخويكم واتقوا الله لعلكم ترحمون
translation_en_yusufali: The believers are but one brotherhood, so make peace between your brothers. And be mindful of Allah so you may be shown mercy.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا يسخر قوم من قوم عسى ان يكونوا خيرا منهم ولا نساء من نساء عسى ان يكن خيرا منهن ولا تلمزوا انفسكم ولا تنابزوا بالالقاب بئس الاسم الفسوق بعد الايمان ومن لم يتب فاولئك هم الظالمون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not let some ˹men˺ ridicule others, they may be better than them, nor let ˹some˺ women ridicule other women, they may be better than them. Do not defame one another, nor call each other by offensive nicknames. How evil it is to act rebelliously after having faith! And whoever does not repent, it is they who are the ˹true˺ wrongdoers.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اجتنبوا كثيرا من الظن ان بعض الظن اثم ولا تجسسوا ولا يغتب بعضكم بعضا ايحب احدكم ان ياكل لحم اخيه ميتا فكرهتموه واتقوا الله ان الله تواب رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: O  believers! Avoid many suspicions, ˹for˺ indeed, some suspicions are sinful. And do not spy, nor backbite one another. Would any of you like to eat the flesh of their dead brother? You would despise that! And fear Allah. Surely Allah is ˹the˺ Accepter of Repentance, Most Merciful.

text_simple: يا ايها الناس انا خلقناكم من ذكر وانثى وجعلناكم شعوبا وقبائل لتعارفوا ان اكرمكم عند الله اتقاكم ان الله عليم خبير
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! Indeed, We created you from a male and a female, and made you into peoples and tribes so that you may ˹get to˺ know one another. Surely the most noble of you in the sight of Allah is the most righteous among you. Allah is truly All-Knowing, All-Aware.

text_simple: قالت الاعراب امنا قل لم تؤمنوا ولكن قولوا اسلمنا ولما يدخل الايمان في قلوبكم وان تطيعوا الله ورسوله لا يلتكم من اعمالكم شيئا ان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Some of˺ the nomadic Arabs say, “We believe.” Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “You have not believed. But say, ‘We have submitted,’ for faith has not yet entered your hearts. But if you obey Allah and His Messenger ˹wholeheartedly˺, He will not discount anything from ˹the reward of˺ your deeds. Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.”

text_simple: انما المؤمنون الذين امنوا بالله ورسوله ثم لم يرتابوا وجاهدوا باموالهم وانفسهم في سبيل الله اولئك هم الصادقون
translation_en_yusufali: The ˹true˺ believers are only those who believe in Allah and His Messenger—never doubting—and strive with their wealth and their lives in the cause of Allah. They are the ones true in faith.

text_simple: قل اتعلمون الله بدينكم والله يعلم ما في السماوات وما في الارض والله بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Do you inform Allah of your faith, when Allah ˹already˺ knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth? And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.”

text_simple: يمنون عليك ان اسلموا قل لا تمنوا علي اسلامكم بل الله يمن عليكم ان هداكم للايمان ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: They regard their acceptance of Islam as a favour to you. Tell ˹them, O  Prophet˺, “Do not regard your Islam as a favour to me. Rather, it is Allah Who has done you a favour by guiding you to the faith, if ˹indeed˺ you are faithful.

text_simple: ان الله يعلم غيب السماوات والارض والله بصير بما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Allah knows the unseen of the heavens and earth. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.”

text_simple: ق والقران المجيد
translation_en_yusufali: Qãf. By the glorious Quran!

text_simple: بل عجبوا ان جاءهم منذر منهم فقال الكافرون هذا شيء عجيب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹All will be resurrected,˺ yet the deniers are astonished that a warner has come to them from among themselves ˹warning of resurrection˺. So the disbelievers say, “This is an astonishing thing!

text_simple: ااذا متنا وكنا ترابا ذلك رجع بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Will we be returned to life,˺ when we are dead and reduced to dust? Such a return is impossible.”

text_simple: قد علمنا ما تنقص الارض منهم وعندنا كتاب حفيظ
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly know what the earth consumes of them ˹after their death˺, and with us is a well-preserved Record.

text_simple: بل كذبوا بالحق لما جاءهم فهم في امر مريج
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, they reject the truth when it has come to them, so they are in a confused state.

text_simple: افلم ينظروا الى السماء فوقهم كيف بنيناها وزيناها وما لها من فروج
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not then looked at the sky above them: how We built it and adorned it ˹with stars˺, leaving it flawless?

text_simple: والارض مددناها والقينا فيها رواسي وانبتنا فيها من كل زوج بهيج
translation_en_yusufali: As for the earth, We spread it out and placed upon it firm mountains, and produced in it every type of pleasant plant—

text_simple: تبصرة وذكرى لكل عبد منيب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹all as˺ an insight and a reminder to every servant who turns ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: ونزلنا من السماء ماء مباركا فانبتنا به جنات وحب الحصيد
translation_en_yusufali: And We send down blessed rain from the sky, bringing forth gardens and grains for harvest

text_simple: والنخل باسقات لها طلع نضيد
translation_en_yusufali: and towering palm trees ˹loaded˺ with clustered fruit

text_simple: رزقا للعباد واحيينا به بلدة ميتا كذلك الخروج
translation_en_yusufali: ˹as˺ a provision for ˹Our˺ servants. And with this ˹rain˺ We revive a lifeless land. Similar is the emergence ˹from the graves˺.

text_simple: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح واصحاب الرس وثمود
translation_en_yusufali: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth,˺ as did the people of the Water-pit, Thamûd

text_simple: وعاد وفرعون واخوان لوط
translation_en_yusufali: ’Ȃd, Pharaoh, the kinfolk of Lot

text_simple: واصحاب الايكة وقوم تبع كل كذب الرسل فحق وعيد
translation_en_yusufali: the residents of the Forest, and the people of Tubba’. Each rejected ˹their˺ messenger, so My warning was fulfilled.

text_simple: افعيينا بالخلق الاول بل هم في لبس من خلق جديد
translation_en_yusufali: Were We incapable of creating ˹them˺ the first time? In fact, they are in doubt about ˹their˺ re-creation.

text_simple: ولقد خلقنا الانسان ونعلم ما توسوس به نفسه ونحن اقرب اليه من حبل الوريد
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ created humankind and ˹fully˺ know what their souls whisper to them, and We are closer to them than ˹their˺ jugular vein.

text_simple: اذ يتلقى المتلقيان عن اليمين وعن الشمال قعيد
translation_en_yusufali: As the two recording-angels—˹one˺ sitting to the right, and ˹the other to˺ the left—note ˹everything˺

text_simple: ما يلفظ من قول الا لديه رقيب عتيد
translation_en_yusufali: not a word does a person utter without having a ˹vigilant˺ observer ready ˹to write it down˺.

text_simple: وجاءت سكرة الموت بالحق ذلك ما كنت منه تحيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Ultimately,˺ with the throes of death will come the truth. This is what you were trying to escape!

text_simple: ونفخ في الصور ذلك يوم الوعيد
translation_en_yusufali: And the Trumpet will be blown. This is the Day ˹you were˺ warned of.

text_simple: وجاءت كل نفس معها سائق وشهيد
translation_en_yusufali: Each soul will come forth with an angel to drive it and another to testify.

text_simple: لقد كنت في غفلة من هذا فكشفنا عنك غطاءك فبصرك اليوم حديد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said to the denier,˺ “You were totally heedless of this. Now We have lifted this veil of yours, so Today your sight is sharp!”

text_simple: وقال قرينه هذا ما لدي عتيد
translation_en_yusufali: And one’s accompanying-angel will say, “Here is the record ready with me.”

text_simple: القيا في جهنم كل كفار عنيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said to both angels,˺ “Throw into Hell every stubborn disbeliever

text_simple: مناع للخير معتد مريب
translation_en_yusufali: withholder of good, transgressor, and doubter

text_simple: الذي جعل مع الله الها اخر فالقياه في العذاب الشديد
translation_en_yusufali: who set up another god with Allah. So cast them into the severe punishment.”

text_simple: قال قرينه ربنا ما اطغيته ولكن كان في ضلال بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: One’s ˹devilish˺ associate will say, “Our Lord! I did not make them transgress. Rather, they were far astray ˹on their own˺.”

text_simple: قال لا تختصموا لدي وقد قدمت اليكم بالوعيد
translation_en_yusufali: Allah will respond, “Do not dispute in My presence, since I had already given you a warning.

text_simple: ما يبدل القول لدي وما انا بظلام للعبيد
translation_en_yusufali: My Word cannot be changed, nor am I unjust to ˹My˺ creation.”

text_simple: يوم نقول لجهنم هل امتلات وتقول هل من مزيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Beware of˺ the Day We will ask Hell, “Are you full ˹yet˺?” And it will respond, “Are there any more?”

text_simple: وازلفت الجنة للمتقين غير بعيد
translation_en_yusufali: And Paradise will be brought near to the righteous, not far off.

text_simple: هذا ما توعدون لكل اواب حفيظ
translation_en_yusufali: ˹And it will be said to them,˺ “This is what you were promised, for whoever ˹constantly˺ turned ˹to Allah˺ and kept up ˹His commandments˺—

text_simple: من خشي الرحمن بالغيب وجاء بقلب منيب
translation_en_yusufali: who were in awe of the Most Compassionate without seeing ˹Him˺, and have come with a heart turning ˹only to Him˺.

text_simple: ادخلوها بسلام ذلك يوم الخلود
translation_en_yusufali: Enter it in peace. This is the Day of eternal life!”

text_simple: لهم ما يشاءون فيها ولدينا مزيد
translation_en_yusufali: There they will have whatever they desire, and with Us is ˹even˺ more.

text_simple: وكم اهلكنا قبلهم من قرن هم اشد منهم بطشا فنقبوا في البلاد هل من محيص
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine˺ how many peoples We destroyed before them, who were far mightier than them. Then ˹when the torment came,˺ they ˹desperately˺ sought refuge in the land. ˹But˺ was there any escape?

text_simple: ان في ذلك لذكرى لمن كان له قلب او القى السمع وهو شهيد
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this is a reminder for whoever has a ˹mindful˺ heart and lends an attentive ear.

text_simple: ولقد خلقنا السماوات والارض وما بينهما في ستة ايام وما مسنا من لغوب
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We created the heavens and the earth and everything in between in six Days, and We were not ˹even˺ touched with fatigue.

text_simple: فاصبر على ما يقولون وسبح بحمد ربك قبل طلوع الشمس وقبل الغروب
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say. And glorify the praises of your Lord before sunrise and before sunset.

text_simple: ومن الليل فسبحه وادبار السجود
translation_en_yusufali: And glorify Him during part of the night and after the prayers.

text_simple: واستمع يوم يناد المناد من مكان قريب
translation_en_yusufali: And listen! On the Day the caller will call out from a near place

text_simple: يوم يسمعون الصيحة بالحق ذلك يوم الخروج
translation_en_yusufali: the Day all will hear the ˹mighty˺ Blast in ˹all˺ truth, that will be the Day of emergence ˹from the graves˺.

text_simple: انا نحن نحيي ونميت والينا المصير
translation_en_yusufali: It is certainly We Who give life and cause death. And to Us is the final return.

text_simple: يوم تشقق الارض عنهم سراعا ذلك حشر علينا يسير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the earth will split open, letting them rush forth. That will be an easy gathering for Us.

text_simple: نحن اعلم بما يقولون وما انت عليهم بجبار فذكر بالقران من يخاف وعيد
translation_en_yusufali: We know best what they say. And you ˹O Prophet˺ are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺. So remind with the Quran ˹only˺ those who fear My warning.

text_simple: والذاريات ذروا
translation_en_yusufali: By the winds scattering ˹dust˺

text_simple: فالحاملات وقرا
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹the clouds˺ loaded with rain

text_simple: فالجاريات يسرا
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹the ships˺ gliding with ease

text_simple: فالمقسمات امرا
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹the angels˺ administering affairs by ˹Allah’s˺ command!

text_simple: انما توعدون لصادق
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, what you are promised is true.

text_simple: وان الدين لواقع
translation_en_yusufali: And the Judgment will certainly come to pass.

text_simple: والسماء ذات الحبك
translation_en_yusufali: ˹And˺ by the heavens in their marvellous design!

text_simple: انكم لفي قول مختلف
translation_en_yusufali: Surely you are ˹lost˺ in conflicting views ˹regarding the truth˺.

text_simple: يؤفك عنه من افك
translation_en_yusufali: Only those ˹destined to be˺ deluded are turned away from it.

text_simple: قتل الخراصون
translation_en_yusufali: Condemned are the liars—

text_simple: الذين هم في غمرة ساهون
translation_en_yusufali: those who are ˹steeped˺ in ignorance, totally heedless.

text_simple: يسالون ايان يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: They ask ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”

text_simple: يوم هم على النار يفتنون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be tormented over the Fire.

text_simple: ذوقوا فتنتكم هذا الذي كنتم به تستعجلون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “Taste your torment! This is what you sought to hasten.”

text_simple: ان المتقين في جنات وعيون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and springs

text_simple: اخذين ما اتاهم ربهم انهم كانوا قبل ذلك محسنين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹joyfully˺ receiving what their Lord will grant them. Before this ˹reward˺ they were truly good-doers ˹in the world˺:

text_simple: كانوا قليلا من الليل ما يهجعون
translation_en_yusufali: they used to sleep only little in the night

text_simple: وبالاسحار هم يستغفرون
translation_en_yusufali: and pray for forgiveness before dawn.

text_simple: وفي اموالهم حق للسائل والمحروم
translation_en_yusufali: And in their wealth there was a rightful share ˹fulfilled˺ for the beggar and the poor.

text_simple: وفي الارض ايات للموقنين
translation_en_yusufali: There are ˹countless˺ signs on earth for those with sure faith

text_simple: وفي انفسكم افلا تبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: as there are within yourselves. Can you not see?

text_simple: وفي السماء رزقكم وما توعدون
translation_en_yusufali: In heaven is your sustenance and whatever you are promised.

text_simple: فورب السماء والارض انه لحق مثل ما انكم تنطقون
translation_en_yusufali: Then by the Lord of heaven and earth! ˹All˺ this is certainly as true as ˹the fact that˺ you can speak!

text_simple: هل اتاك حديث ضيف ابراهيم المكرمين
translation_en_yusufali: Has the story of Abraham’s honoured guests reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

text_simple: اذ دخلوا عليه فقالوا سلاما قال سلام قوم منكرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when they entered his presence and greeted ˹him with˺, “Peace!” He replied, “Peace ˹be upon you˺!” ˹Then he said to himself,˺ “˹These are˺ an unfamiliar people.”

text_simple: فراغ الى اهله فجاء بعجل سمين
translation_en_yusufali: Then he slipped off to his family and brought a fat ˹roasted˺ calf

text_simple: فقربه اليهم قال الا تاكلون
translation_en_yusufali: and placed it before them, asking, “Will you not eat?”

text_simple: فاوجس منهم خيفة قالوا لا تخف وبشروه بغلام عليم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They did not eat,˺ so he grew fearful of them. They reassured ˹him˺, “Do not be afraid,” and gave him good news of a knowledgeable son.

text_simple: فاقبلت امراته في صرة فصكت وجهها وقالت عجوز عقيم
translation_en_yusufali: Then his wife came forward with a cry, clasping her forehead ˹in astonishment˺, exclaiming, “˹A baby from˺ a barren, old woman!”

text_simple: قالوا كذلك قال ربك انه هو الحكيم العليم
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “Such has your Lord decreed. He is truly the All-Wise, All-Knowing.”

text_simple: قال فما خطبكم ايها المرسلون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Later,˺ Abraham asked, “What is your mission, O  messengers?”

text_simple: قالوا انا ارسلنا الى قوم مجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “We have actually been sent to a wicked people

text_simple: لنرسل عليهم حجارة من طين
translation_en_yusufali: to send upon them stones of ˹baked˺ clay

text_simple: مسومة عند ربك للمسرفين
translation_en_yusufali: marked by your Lord for the transgressors.”

text_simple: فاخرجنا من كان فيها من المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Then ˹before the torment˺ We evacuated the believers from the city.

text_simple: فما وجدنا فيها غير بيت من المسلمين
translation_en_yusufali: But We only found one family that had submitted ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: وتركنا فيها اية للذين يخافون العذاب الاليم
translation_en_yusufali: And We have left a sign there ˹as a lesson˺ for those who fear the painful punishment.

text_simple: وفي موسى اذ ارسلناه الى فرعون بسلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And in ˹the story of˺ Moses ˹was another lesson,˺ when We sent him to Pharaoh with compelling proof

text_simple: فتولى بركنه وقال ساحر او مجنون
translation_en_yusufali: but Pharaoh was carried away by his power, saying ˹of Moses˺, “A magician or a madman!”

text_simple: فاخذناه وجنوده فنبذناهم في اليم وهو مليم
translation_en_yusufali: So We seized him and his soldiers, casting them into the sea while he was blameworthy.

text_simple: وفي عاد اذ ارسلنا عليهم الريح العقيم
translation_en_yusufali: And in ˹the story of˺ ’Âd ˹was another lesson,˺ when We sent against them the devastating wind.

text_simple: ما تذر من شيء اتت عليه الا جعلته كالرميم
translation_en_yusufali: There was nothing it came upon that it did not reduce to ashes.

text_simple: وفي ثمود اذ قيل لهم تمتعوا حتى حين
translation_en_yusufali: And in ˹the story of˺ Thamûd ˹was another lesson,˺ when they were told, “Enjoy yourselves ˹only˺ for a ˹short˺ while.”

text_simple: فعتوا عن امر ربهم فاخذتهم الصاعقة وهم ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: Still they persisted in defying the commands of their Lord, so they were overtaken by a ˹mighty˺ blast while they were looking on.

text_simple: فما استطاعوا من قيام وما كانوا منتصرين
translation_en_yusufali: Then they were not able to rise up, nor were they helped.

text_simple: وقوم نوح من قبل انهم كانوا قوما فاسقين
translation_en_yusufali: And the people of Noah ˹had also been destroyed˺ earlier. They were truly a rebellious people.

text_simple: والسماء بنيناها بايد وانا لموسعون
translation_en_yusufali: We built the universe with ˹great˺ might, and We are certainly expanding ˹it˺.

text_simple: والارض فرشناها فنعم الماهدون
translation_en_yusufali: As for the earth, We spread it out. How superbly did We smooth it out!

text_simple: ومن كل شيء خلقنا زوجين لعلكم تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: And We created pairs of all things so perhaps you would be mindful.

text_simple: ففروا الى الله اني لكم منه نذير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: So ˹proclaim, O  Prophet˺: “Flee to Allah! I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.

text_simple: ولا تجعلوا مع الله الها اخر اني لكم منه نذير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And do not set up another god with Allah. I am truly sent by Him with a clear warning to you.”

text_simple: كذلك ما اتى الذين من قبلهم من رسول الا قالوا ساحر او مجنون
translation_en_yusufali: Similarly, no messenger came to those before them without being told: “A magician or a madman!”

text_simple: اتواصوا به بل هم قوم طاغون
translation_en_yusufali: Have they passed this ˹cliché˺ down to one another? In fact, they have ˹all˺ been a transgressing people.

text_simple: فتول عنهم فما انت بملوم
translation_en_yusufali: So ˹now˺ turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺, for you will not be blamed.

text_simple: وذكر فان الذكرى تنفع المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: But ˹continue to˺ remind. For certainly reminders benefit the believers.

text_simple: وما خلقت الجن والانس الا ليعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: I did not create jinn and humans except to worship Me.

text_simple: ما اريد منهم من رزق وما اريد ان يطعمون
translation_en_yusufali: I seek no provision from them, nor do I need them to feed Me.

text_simple: ان الله هو الرزاق ذو القوة المتين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah ˹alone˺ is the Supreme Provider—Lord of all Power, Ever Mighty.

text_simple: فان للذين ظلموا ذنوبا مثل ذنوب اصحابهم فلا يستعجلون
translation_en_yusufali: The wrongdoers will certainly have a share ˹of the torment˺ like that of their predecessors. So do not let them ask Me to hasten ˹it˺.

text_simple: فويل للذين كفروا من يومهم الذي يوعدون
translation_en_yusufali: Woe then to the disbelievers when they face their Day which they are warned of!

text_simple: والطور
translation_en_yusufali: By Mount Ṭûr!

text_simple: وكتاب مسطور
translation_en_yusufali: And by the Book written

text_simple: في رق منشور
translation_en_yusufali: on open pages ˹for all to read˺!

text_simple: والبيت المعمور
translation_en_yusufali: And by the ˹Sacred˺ House frequently visited!

text_simple: والسقف المرفوع
translation_en_yusufali: And by the canopy raised ˹high˺!

text_simple: والبحر المسجور
translation_en_yusufali: And by the seas set on fire!

text_simple: ان عذاب ربك لواقع
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will come to pass—

text_simple: ما له من دافع
translation_en_yusufali: none will avert it—

text_simple: يوم تمور السماء مورا
translation_en_yusufali: on the Day the heavens will be shaken violently

text_simple: وتسير الجبال سيرا
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains will be blown away entirely.

text_simple: فويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Then woe on that Day to the deniers—

text_simple: الذين هم في خوض يلعبون
translation_en_yusufali: those who amuse themselves with falsehood!

text_simple: يوم يدعون الى نار جهنم دعا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ the Day they will be fiercely shoved into the Fire of Hell.

text_simple: هذه النار التي كنتم بها تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Fire which you used to deny.

text_simple: افسحر هذا ام انتم لا تبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Is this magic, or do you not see?

text_simple: اصلوها فاصبروا او لا تصبروا سواء عليكم انما تجزون ما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Burn in it! It is the same whether you endure ˹it˺ patiently or not. You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”

text_simple: ان المتقين في جنات ونعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will be in Gardens and bliss

text_simple: فاكهين بما اتاهم ربهم ووقاهم ربهم عذاب الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: enjoying whatever their Lord will have granted them. And their Lord will have protected them from the torment of the Hellfire.

text_simple: كلوا واشربوا هنيئا بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

text_simple: متكئين على سرر مصفوفة وزوجناهم بحور عين
translation_en_yusufali: They will be reclining on thrones, ˹neatly˺ lined up ˹facing each other˺. And We will pair them to maidens with gorgeous eyes.

text_simple: والذين امنوا واتبعتهم ذريتهم بايمان الحقنا بهم ذريتهم وما التناهم من عملهم من شيء كل امرئ بما كسب رهين
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who believe and whose descendants follow them in faith, We will elevate their descendants to their rank, never discounting anything ˹of the reward˺ of their deeds. Every person will reap only what they sowed.

text_simple: وامددناهم بفاكهة ولحم مما يشتهون
translation_en_yusufali: And We will ˹continually˺ provide them with whatever fruit or meat they desire.

text_simple: يتنازعون فيها كاسا لا لغو فيها ولا تاثيم
translation_en_yusufali: They will pass around to each other a drink ˹of pure wine,˺ which leads to no idle talk or sinfulness.

text_simple: ويطوف عليهم غلمان لهم كانهم لؤلؤ مكنون
translation_en_yusufali: And they will be waited on by their youthful servants like spotless pearls.

text_simple: واقبل بعضهم على بعض يتساءلون
translation_en_yusufali: They will turn to one another inquisitively.

text_simple: قالوا انا كنا قبل في اهلنا مشفقين
translation_en_yusufali: They will say, “Before ˹this reward˺ we used to be in awe ˹of Allah˺ in the midst of our people.

text_simple: فمن الله علينا ووقانا عذاب السموم
translation_en_yusufali: So Allah has graced us and protected us from the torment of ˹Hell’s˺ scorching heat.

text_simple: انا كنا من قبل ندعوه انه هو البر الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, we used to call upon Him ˹alone˺ before. He is truly the Most Kind, Most Merciful.”

text_simple: فذكر فما انت بنعمت ربك بكاهن ولا مجنون
translation_en_yusufali: So ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺. For you, by the grace of your Lord, are not a fortune-teller or a madman.

text_simple: ام يقولون شاعر نتربص به ريب المنون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they say, “˹He is˺ a poet, for whom we ˹eagerly˺ await an ill-fate!”?

text_simple: قل تربصوا فاني معكم من المتربصين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Keep waiting! I too am waiting with you.”

text_simple: ام تامرهم احلامهم بهذا ام هم قوم طاغون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do their ˹intelligent˺ minds prompt them to this ˹paradox˺? Or are they ˹just˺ a transgressing people?

text_simple: ام يقولون تقوله بل لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they say, “He made this ˹Quran˺ up!”? In fact, they have no faith.

text_simple: فلياتوا بحديث مثله ان كانوا صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Let them then produce something like it, if what they say is true!

text_simple: ام خلقوا من غير شيء ام هم الخالقون
translation_en_yusufali: Or were they created by nothing, or are they ˹their own˺ creators?

text_simple: ام خلقوا السماوات والارض بل لا يوقنون
translation_en_yusufali: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? In fact, they have no firm belief ˹in Allah˺.

text_simple: ام عندهم خزائن ربك ام هم المصيطرون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they possess the treasuries of your Lord, or are they in control ˹of everything˺?

text_simple: ام لهم سلم يستمعون فيه فليات مستمعهم بسلطان مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they have a stairway, by which they eavesdrop ˹on the heavens˺? Then let those who do so bring a compelling proof.

text_simple: ام له البنات ولكم البنون
translation_en_yusufali: Or does He have daughters ˹as you claim˺, while you ˹prefer to˺ have sons?

text_simple: ام تسالهم اجرا فهم من مغرم مثقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Or are you ˹O Prophet˺ asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?

text_simple: ام عندهم الغيب فهم يكتبون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?

text_simple: ام يريدون كيدا فالذين كفروا هم المكيدون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they intend to scheme ˹against the Prophet˺? Then it is the disbelievers who will fall victim to ˹their˺ schemes.

text_simple: ام لهم اله غير الله سبحان الله عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they have a god other than Allah? Glorified is Allah far above what they associate ˹with Him˺!

text_simple: وان يروا كسفا من السماء ساقطا يقولوا سحاب مركوم
translation_en_yusufali: If they were to see a ˹deadly˺ piece of the sky fall down ˹upon them˺, still they would say, “˹This is just˺ a pile of clouds.”

text_simple: فذرهم حتى يلاقوا يومهم الذي فيه يصعقون
translation_en_yusufali: So leave them until they face their Day in which they will be struck dead—

text_simple: يوم لا يغني عنهم كيدهم شيئا ولا هم ينصرون
translation_en_yusufali: the Day their scheming will be of no benefit to them whatsoever, nor will they be helped.

text_simple: وان للذين ظلموا عذابا دون ذلك ولكن اكثرهم لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Also, the wrongdoers will certainly have another torment before that ˹Day˺, but most of them do not know.

text_simple: واصبر لحكم ربك فانك باعيننا وسبح بحمد ربك حين تقوم
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, for you are truly under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes. And glorify the praises of your Lord when you rise.

text_simple: ومن الليل فسبحه وادبار النجوم
translation_en_yusufali: And glorify Him during part of the night and at the fading of the stars.

text_simple: والنجم اذا هوى
translation_en_yusufali: By the stars when they fade away!

text_simple: ما ضل صاحبكم وما غوى
translation_en_yusufali: Your fellow man is neither misguided nor astray.

text_simple: وما ينطق عن الهوى
translation_en_yusufali: Nor does he speak of his own whims.

text_simple: ان هو الا وحي يوحى
translation_en_yusufali: It is only a revelation sent down ˹to him˺.

text_simple: علمه شديد القوى
translation_en_yusufali: He has been taught by one ˹angel˺ of mighty power

text_simple: ذو مرة فاستوى
translation_en_yusufali: and great perfection, who once rose to ˹his˺ true form

text_simple: وهو بالافق الاعلى
translation_en_yusufali: while on the highest point above the horizon

text_simple: ثم دنا فتدلى
translation_en_yusufali: then he approached ˹the Prophet˺, coming so close

text_simple: فكان قاب قوسين او ادنى
translation_en_yusufali: that he was only two arms-lengths away or even less.

text_simple: فاوحى الى عبده ما اوحى
translation_en_yusufali: Then Allah revealed to His servant what He revealed ˹through Gabriel˺.

text_simple: ما كذب الفؤاد ما راى
translation_en_yusufali: The ˹Prophet’s˺ heart did not doubt what he saw.

text_simple: افتمارونه على ما يرى
translation_en_yusufali: How can you ˹O pagans˺ then dispute with him regarding what he saw?

text_simple: ولقد راه نزلة اخرى
translation_en_yusufali: And he certainly saw that ˹angel descend˺ a second time

text_simple: عند سدرة المنتهى
translation_en_yusufali: at the Lote Tree of the most extreme limit ˹in the seventh heaven˺—

text_simple: عندها جنة الماوى
translation_en_yusufali: near which is the Garden of ˹Eternal˺ Residence—

text_simple: اذ يغشى السدرة ما يغشى
translation_en_yusufali: while the Lote Tree was overwhelmed with ˹heavenly˺ splendours!

text_simple: ما زاغ البصر وما طغى
translation_en_yusufali: The ˹Prophet’s˺ sight never wandered, nor did it overreach.
