text_simple: لقد راى من ايات ربه الكبرى
translation_en_yusufali: He certainly saw some of his Lord’s greatest signs.

text_simple: افرايتم اللات والعزى
translation_en_yusufali: Now, have you considered ˹the idols of˺ Lât and ’Uzza

text_simple: ومناة الثالثة الاخرى
translation_en_yusufali: and the third one, Manât, as well?

text_simple: الكم الذكر وله الانثى
translation_en_yusufali: Do you ˹prefer to˺ have sons while ˹you attribute˺ to Him daughters?

text_simple: تلك اذا قسمة ضيزى
translation_en_yusufali: Then this is ˹truly˺ a biased distribution!

text_simple: ان هي الا اسماء سميتموها انتم واباؤكم ما انزل الله بها من سلطان ان يتبعون الا الظن وما تهوى الانفس ولقد جاءهم من ربهم الهدى
translation_en_yusufali: These ˹idols˺ are mere names that you and your forefathers have made up—a practice Allah has never authorized. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions and whatever ˹their˺ souls desire, although ˹true˺ guidance has already come to them from their Lord.

text_simple: ام للانسان ما تمنى
translation_en_yusufali: Or should every person ˹simply˺ have whatever ˹intercessors˺ they desire?

text_simple: فلله الاخرة والاولى
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, to Allah ˹alone˺ belongs this world and the next.

text_simple: وكم من ملك في السماوات لا تغني شفاعتهم شيئا الا من بعد ان ياذن الله لمن يشاء ويرضى
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine˺ how many ˹noble˺ angels are in the heavens! ˹Even˺ their intercession would be of no benefit whatsoever, until Allah gives permission to whoever He wills and ˹only for the people He˺ approves.

text_simple: ان الذين لا يؤمنون بالاخرة ليسمون الملائكة تسمية الانثى
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who do not believe in the Hereafter label angels as female

text_simple: وما لهم به من علم ان يتبعون الا الظن وان الظن لا يغني من الحق شيئا
translation_en_yusufali: although they have no knowledge ˹in support˺ of this. They follow nothing but ˹inherited˺ assumptions. And surely assumptions can in no way replace the truth.

text_simple: فاعرض عن من تولى عن ذكرنا ولم يرد الا الحياة الدنيا
translation_en_yusufali: So turn away ˹O Prophet˺ from whoever has shunned Our Reminder, only seeking the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world.

text_simple: ذلك مبلغهم من العلم ان ربك هو اعلم بمن ضل عن سبيله وهو اعلم بمن اهتدى
translation_en_yusufali: This is the extent of their knowledge. Surely your Lord knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.

text_simple: ولله ما في السماوات وما في الارض ليجزي الذين اساءوا بما عملوا ويجزي الذين احسنوا بالحسنى
translation_en_yusufali: To Allah ˹alone˺ belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth so that He may reward the evildoers according to what they did, and reward the good-doers with the finest reward—

text_simple: الذين يجتنبون كبائر الاثم والفواحش الا اللمم ان ربك واسع المغفرة هو اعلم بكم اذ انشاكم من الارض واذ انتم اجنة في بطون امهاتكم فلا تزكوا انفسكم هو اعلم بمن اتقى
translation_en_yusufali: those who avoid major sins and shameful deeds, despite ˹stumbling on˺ minor sins. Surely your Lord is infinite in forgiveness. He knew well what would become of you as He created you from the earth and while you were ˹still˺ fetuses in the wombs of your mothers. So do not ˹falsely˺ elevate yourselves. He knows best who is ˹truly˺ righteous.

text_simple: افرايت الذي تولى
translation_en_yusufali: Have you seen the one who turned away ˹from Islam,˺

text_simple: واعطى قليلا واكدى
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹initially˺ paid a little ˹for his salvation˺, and then stopped?

text_simple: اعنده علم الغيب فهو يرى
translation_en_yusufali: Does he have the knowledge of the unseen so that he sees ˹the Hereafter˺?

text_simple: ام لم ينبا بما في صحف موسى
translation_en_yusufali: Or has he not been informed of what is in the Scripture of Moses

text_simple: وابراهيم الذي وفى
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹that of˺ Abraham, who ˹perfectly˺ fulfilled ˹his covenant˺?

text_simple: الا تزر وازرة وزر اخرى
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They state˺ that no soul burdened with sin will bear the burden of another

text_simple: وان ليس للانسان الا ما سعى
translation_en_yusufali: and that each person will only have what they endeavoured towards

text_simple: وان سعيه سوف يرى
translation_en_yusufali: and that ˹the outcome of˺ their endeavours will be seen ˹in their record˺

text_simple: ثم يجزاه الجزاء الاوفى
translation_en_yusufali: then they will be fully rewarded

text_simple: وان الى ربك المنتهى
translation_en_yusufali: and that to your Lord ˹alone˺ is the ultimate return ˹of all things˺.

text_simple: وانه هو اضحك وابكى
translation_en_yusufali: Moreover, He is the One Who brings about joy and sadness.

text_simple: وانه هو امات واحيا
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who gives life and causes death.

text_simple: وانه خلق الزوجين الذكر والانثى
translation_en_yusufali: And He created the pairs—males and females—

text_simple: من نطفة اذا تمنى
translation_en_yusufali: from a sperm-drop when it is emitted.

text_simple: وان عليه النشاة الاخرى
translation_en_yusufali: And it is upon Him to bring about re-creation.

text_simple: وانه هو اغنى واقنى
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the One Who enriches and impoverishes.

text_simple: وانه هو رب الشعرى
translation_en_yusufali: And He alone is the Lord of Sirius.

text_simple: وانه اهلك عادا الاولى
translation_en_yusufali: And He destroyed the first ˹people of˺ ’Ȃd

text_simple: وثمود فما ابقى
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹then˺ Thamûd, sparing no one.

text_simple: وقوم نوح من قبل انهم كانوا هم اظلم واطغى
translation_en_yusufali: And before ˹that He destroyed˺ the people of Noah, who were truly far worse in wrongdoing and transgression.

text_simple: والمؤتفكة اهوى
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹it was˺ He ˹Who˺ turned the cities ˹of Sodom and Gomorrah˺ upside down.

text_simple: فغشاها ما غشى
translation_en_yusufali: How overwhelming was what covered ˹them˺!

text_simple: فباي الاء ربك تتمارى
translation_en_yusufali: Now, which of your Lord’s favours will you dispute?

text_simple: هذا نذير من النذر الاولى
translation_en_yusufali: This ˹Prophet˺ is a warner like earlier ones.

text_simple: ازفت الازفة
translation_en_yusufali: The approaching ˹Hour˺ has drawn near.

text_simple: ليس لها من دون الله كاشفة
translation_en_yusufali: None but Allah can disclose it.

text_simple: افمن هذا الحديث تعجبون
translation_en_yusufali: Do you find this revelation astonishing

text_simple: وتضحكون ولا تبكون
translation_en_yusufali: laughing ˹at it˺ and not weeping ˹in awe˺

text_simple: وانتم سامدون
translation_en_yusufali: while persisting in heedlessness?

text_simple: فاسجدوا لله واعبدوا
translation_en_yusufali: Instead, prostrate to Allah and worship ˹Him alone˺!

text_simple: اقتربت الساعة وانشق القمر
translation_en_yusufali: The Hour has drawn near and the moon was split ˹in two˺.

text_simple: وان يروا اية يعرضوا ويقولوا سحر مستمر
translation_en_yusufali: Yet, whenever they see a sign, they turn away, saying, “Same old magic!”

text_simple: وكذبوا واتبعوا اهواءهم وكل امر مستقر
translation_en_yusufali: They rejected ˹the truth˺ and followed their own desires—and every matter will be settled—

text_simple: ولقد جاءهم من الانباء ما فيه مزدجر
translation_en_yusufali: even though the stories ˹of destroyed nations˺ that have already come to them are a sufficient deterrent.

text_simple: حكمة بالغة فما تغن النذر
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This Quran is˺ profound ˹in˺ wisdom, but warnings are of no benefit ˹to them˺.

text_simple: فتول عنهم يوم يدع الداع الى شيء نكر
translation_en_yusufali: So turn away from them ˹O Prophet˺. ˹And wait for˺ the Day ˹when˺ the caller will summon ˹them˺ for something horrifying.

text_simple: خشعا ابصارهم يخرجون من الاجداث كانهم جراد منتشر
translation_en_yusufali: With eyes downcast, they will come forth from the graves as if they were swarming locusts

text_simple: مهطعين الى الداع يقول الكافرون هذا يوم عسر
translation_en_yusufali: rushing towards the caller. The disbelievers will cry, “This is a difficult Day!”

text_simple: كذبت قبلهم قوم نوح فكذبوا عبدنا وقالوا مجنون وازدجر
translation_en_yusufali: Before them, the people of Noah denied ˹the truth˺ and rejected Our servant, calling ˹him˺ insane. And he was intimidated.

text_simple: فدعا ربه اني مغلوب فانتصر
translation_en_yusufali: So he cried out to his Lord, “I am helpless, so help ˹me˺!”

text_simple: ففتحنا ابواب السماء بماء منهمر
translation_en_yusufali: So We opened the gates of the sky with pouring rain

text_simple: وفجرنا الارض عيونا فالتقى الماء على امر قد قدر
translation_en_yusufali: and caused the earth to burst with springs, so the waters met for a fate already set.

text_simple: وحملناه على ذات الواح ودسر
translation_en_yusufali: We carried him on that ˹Ark made˺ of planks and nails

text_simple: تجري باعيننا جزاء لمن كان كفر
translation_en_yusufali: sailing under Our ˹watchful˺ Eyes—a ˹fair˺ punishment on behalf of the one ˹they˺ denied.

text_simple: ولقد تركناها اية فهل من مدكر
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly left this as a sign. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

text_simple: فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation_en_yusufali: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

text_simple: ولقد يسرنا القران للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation_en_yusufali: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

text_simple: كذبت عاد فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation_en_yusufali: ’Ȃd ˹also˺ rejected ˹the truth˺. Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

text_simple: انا ارسلنا عليهم ريحا صرصرا في يوم نحس مستمر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent against them a furious wind, on a day of unrelenting misery

text_simple: تنزع الناس كانهم اعجاز نخل منقعر
translation_en_yusufali: that snatched people up, leaving them like trunks of uprooted palm trees.

text_simple: فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation_en_yusufali: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

text_simple: ولقد يسرنا القران للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation_en_yusufali: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

text_simple: كذبت ثمود بالنذر
translation_en_yusufali: Thamûd rejected the warnings ˹as well˺

text_simple: فقالوا ابشرا منا واحدا نتبعه انا اذا لفي ضلال وسعر
translation_en_yusufali: arguing, “How can we follow one ˹average˺ human being from among us? We would then truly be misguided and insane.

text_simple: االقي الذكر عليه من بيننا بل هو كذاب اشر
translation_en_yusufali: Has the revelation been sent down ˹only˺ to him out of ˹all of˺ us? In fact, he is a boastful liar.”

text_simple: سيعلمون غدا من الكذاب الاشر
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It was revealed to Ṣâliḥ,˺ “They will soon know who the boastful liar is.

text_simple: انا مرسلو الناقة فتنة لهم فارتقبهم واصطبر
translation_en_yusufali: We are sending the she-camel as a test for them. So watch them ˹closely˺, and have patience.

text_simple: ونبئهم ان الماء قسمة بينهم كل شرب محتضر
translation_en_yusufali: And tell them that the ˹drinking˺ water must be divided between them ˹and her˺, each taking a turn to drink ˹every other day˺.”

text_simple: فنادوا صاحبهم فتعاطى فعقر
translation_en_yusufali: But they roused a companion of theirs, so he dared to kill ˹her˺.

text_simple: فكيف كان عذابي ونذر
translation_en_yusufali: Then how ˹dreadful˺ were My punishment and warnings!

text_simple: انا ارسلنا عليهم صيحة واحدة فكانوا كهشيم المحتظر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent against them ˹only˺ one ˹mighty˺ blast, leaving them like the twigs of fence-builders.

text_simple: ولقد يسرنا القران للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation_en_yusufali: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

text_simple: كذبت قوم لوط بالنذر
translation_en_yusufali: The people of Lot ˹also˺ rejected the warnings.

text_simple: انا ارسلنا عليهم حاصبا الا ال لوط نجيناهم بسحر
translation_en_yusufali: We unleashed upon them a storm of stones. As for ˹the believers of˺ Lot’s family, We delivered them before dawn

text_simple: نعمة من عندنا كذلك نجزي من شكر
translation_en_yusufali: as a blessing from Us. This is how We reward whoever gives thanks.

text_simple: ولقد انذرهم بطشتنا فتماروا بالنذر
translation_en_yusufali: He had already warned them of Our ˹crushing˺ blow but they disputed the warnings.

text_simple: ولقد راودوه عن ضيفه فطمسنا اعينهم فذوقوا عذابي ونذر
translation_en_yusufali: And they even demanded his angel-guests from him, so We blinded their eyes. ˹And they were told,˺ “Taste then My punishment and warnings!”

text_simple: ولقد صبحهم بكرة عذاب مستقر
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, by the early morning they were overwhelmed by an unrelenting torment.

text_simple: فذوقوا عذابي ونذر
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Again they were told,˺ “Taste now My punishment and warnings!”

text_simple: ولقد يسرنا القران للذكر فهل من مدكر
translation_en_yusufali: And We have certainly made the Quran easy to remember. So is there anyone who will be mindful?

text_simple: ولقد جاء ال فرعون النذر
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, the warnings ˹also˺ came to the people of Pharaoh.

text_simple: كذبوا باياتنا كلها فاخذناهم اخذ عزيز مقتدر
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ they rejected all of Our signs, so We seized them with the ˹crushing˺ grip of the Almighty, Most Powerful.

text_simple: اكفاركم خير من اولئكم ام لكم براءة في الزبر
translation_en_yusufali: Now, are you ˹Meccan˺ disbelievers superior to those ˹destroyed peoples˺? Or have you ˹been granted˺ immunity ˹from punishment˺ in divine Books?

text_simple: ام يقولون نحن جميع منتصر
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they say, “We are all ˹a˺ united ˹front˺, bound to prevail.”?

text_simple: سيهزم الجمع ويولون الدبر
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Soon˺ their united front will be defeated and ˹forced to˺ flee.

text_simple: بل الساعة موعدهم والساعة ادهى وامر
translation_en_yusufali: Better yet, the Hour is their appointed time—and the Hour will be most catastrophic and most bitter.

text_simple: ان المجرمين في ضلال وسعر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the wicked are ˹entrenched˺ in misguidance, and ˹are bound for˺ blazes.

text_simple: يوم يسحبون في النار على وجوههم ذوقوا مس سقر
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day they will be dragged into the Fire on their faces, ˹they will be told,˺ “Taste the touch of Hell!”

text_simple: انا كل شيء خلقناه بقدر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have created everything, perfectly preordained.

text_simple: وما امرنا الا واحدة كلمح بالبصر
translation_en_yusufali: Our command is but a single word, done in the blink of an eye.

text_simple: ولقد اهلكنا اشياعكم فهل من مدكر
translation_en_yusufali: We have already destroyed the likes of you. So will any ˹of you˺ be mindful?

text_simple: وكل شيء فعلوه في الزبر
translation_en_yusufali: Everything they have done is ˹listed˺ in ˹their˺ records.

text_simple: وكل صغير وكبير مستطر
translation_en_yusufali: Every matter, small and large, is written ˹precisely˺.

text_simple: ان المتقين في جنات ونهر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will be amid Gardens and rivers

text_simple: في مقعد صدق عند مليك مقتدر
translation_en_yusufali: at the Seat of Honour in the presence of the Most Powerful Sovereign.

text_simple: الرحمن
translation_en_yusufali: The Most Compassionate

text_simple: علم القران
translation_en_yusufali: taught the Quran

text_simple: خلق الانسان
translation_en_yusufali: created humanity

text_simple: علمه البيان
translation_en_yusufali: ˹and˺ taught them speech.

text_simple: الشمس والقمر بحسبان
translation_en_yusufali: The sun and the moon ˹travel˺ with precision.

text_simple: والنجم والشجر يسجدان
translation_en_yusufali: The stars and the trees bow down ˹in submission˺.

text_simple: والسماء رفعها ووضع الميزان
translation_en_yusufali: As for the sky, He raised it ˹high˺, and set the balance ˹of justice˺

text_simple: الا تطغوا في الميزان
translation_en_yusufali: so that you do not defraud the scales.

text_simple: واقيموا الوزن بالقسط ولا تخسروا الميزان
translation_en_yusufali: Weigh with justice, and do not give short measure.

text_simple: والارض وضعها للانام
translation_en_yusufali: He laid out the earth for all beings.

text_simple: فيها فاكهة والنخل ذات الاكمام
translation_en_yusufali: In it are fruit, palm trees with date stalks

text_simple: والحب ذو العصف والريحان
translation_en_yusufali: and grain with husks, and aromatic plants.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you ˹humans and jinn˺ both deny?

text_simple: خلق الانسان من صلصال كالفخار
translation_en_yusufali: He created humankind from ˹sounding˺ clay like pottery

text_simple: وخلق الجان من مارج من نار
translation_en_yusufali: and created jinn from a ˹smokeless˺ flame of fire.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: رب المشرقين ورب المغربين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is˺ Lord of the two easts and the two wests.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: مرج البحرين يلتقيان
translation_en_yusufali: He merges the two bodies of ˹fresh and salt˺ water

text_simple: بينهما برزخ لا يبغيان
translation_en_yusufali: yet between them is a barrier they never cross.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: يخرج منهما اللؤلؤ والمرجان
translation_en_yusufali: Out of both ˹waters˺ come forth pearls and coral.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: وله الجوار المنشات في البحر كالاعلام
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belong the ships with raised sails, sailing through the seas like mountains.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: كل من عليها فان
translation_en_yusufali: Every being on earth is bound to perish.

text_simple: ويبقى وجه ربك ذو الجلال والاكرام
translation_en_yusufali: Only your Lord Himself, full of Majesty and Honour, will remain ˹forever˺.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: يساله من في السماوات والارض كل يوم هو في شان
translation_en_yusufali: All those in the heavens and the earth are dependent on Him. Day in and day out He has something to bring about.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: سنفرغ لكم ايه الثقلان
translation_en_yusufali: We will soon attend to you ˹for judgment˺, O  two multitudes ˹of jinn and humans˺!

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: يا معشر الجن والانس ان استطعتم ان تنفذوا من اقطار السماوات والارض فانفذوا لا تنفذون الا بسلطان
translation_en_yusufali: O  assembly of jinn and humans! If you can penetrate beyond the realms of the heavens and the earth, then do so. ˹But˺ you cannot do that without ˹Our˺ authority.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: يرسل عليكما شواظ من نار ونحاس فلا تنتصران
translation_en_yusufali: Flames of fire and ˹molten˺ copper will be sent against you, and you will not be able to defend one another.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فاذا انشقت السماء فكانت وردة كالدهان
translation_en_yusufali: ˹How horrible will it be˺ when the heavens will split apart, becoming rose-red like ˹burnt˺ oil!

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيومئذ لا يسال عن ذنبه انس ولا جان
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day there will be no need for any human or jinn to be asked about their sins.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: يعرف المجرمون بسيماهم فيؤخذ بالنواصي والاقدام
translation_en_yusufali: The wicked will be recognized by their appearance, then will be seized by ˹their˺ forelocks and feet.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: هذه جهنم التي يكذب بها المجرمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “This is the Hell which the wicked denied.”

text_simple: يطوفون بينها وبين حميم ان
translation_en_yusufali: They will alternate between its flames and scalding water.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: ولمن خاف مقام ربه جنتان
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever is in awe of standing before their Lord will have two Gardens.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: ذواتا افنان
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Both will be˺ with lush branches.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيهما عينان تجريان
translation_en_yusufali: In each ˹Garden˺ will be two flowing springs.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيهما من كل فاكهة زوجان
translation_en_yusufali: In each will be two types of every fruit.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: متكئين على فرش بطائنها من استبرق وجنى الجنتين دان
translation_en_yusufali: Those ˹believers˺ will recline on furnishings lined with rich brocade. And the fruit of both Gardens will hang within reach.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيهن قاصرات الطرف لم يطمثهن انس قبلهم ولا جان
translation_en_yusufali: In both ˹Gardens˺ will be maidens of modest gaze, who no human or jinn has ever touched before.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: كانهن الياقوت والمرجان
translation_en_yusufali: Those ˹maidens˺ will be ˹as elegant˺ as rubies and coral.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: هل جزاء الاحسان الا الاحسان
translation_en_yusufali: Is there any reward for goodness except goodness?

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: ومن دونهما جنتان
translation_en_yusufali: And below these two ˹Gardens˺ will be two others.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: مدهامتان
translation_en_yusufali: Both will be dark green.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيهما عينان نضاختان
translation_en_yusufali: In each will be two gushing springs.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيهما فاكهة ونخل ورمان
translation_en_yusufali: In both will be fruit, palm trees, and pomegranates.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: فيهن خيرات حسان
translation_en_yusufali: In all Gardens will be noble, pleasant mates.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: حور مقصورات في الخيام
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes, reserved in pavilions.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: لم يطمثهن انس قبلهم ولا جان
translation_en_yusufali: No human or jinn has ever touched these ˹maidens˺ before.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: متكئين على رفرف خضر وعبقري حسان
translation_en_yusufali: All ˹believers˺ will be reclining on green cushions and splendid carpets.

text_simple: فباي الاء ربكما تكذبان
translation_en_yusufali: Then which of your Lord’s favours will you both deny?

text_simple: تبارك اسم ربك ذي الجلال والاكرام
translation_en_yusufali: Blessed is the Name of your Lord, full of Majesty and Honour.

text_simple: اذا وقعت الواقعة
translation_en_yusufali: When the Inevitable Event takes place

text_simple: ليس لوقعتها كاذبة
translation_en_yusufali: then no one can deny it has come.

text_simple: خافضة رافعة
translation_en_yusufali: It will debase ˹some˺ and elevate ˹others˺.

text_simple: اذا رجت الارض رجا
translation_en_yusufali: When the earth will be violently shaken

text_simple: وبست الجبال بسا
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains will be crushed to pieces

text_simple: فكانت هباء منبثا
translation_en_yusufali: becoming scattered ˹particles of˺ dust

text_simple: وكنتم ازواجا ثلاثة
translation_en_yusufali: you will ˹all˺ be ˹divided into˺ three groups:

text_simple: فاصحاب الميمنة ما اصحاب الميمنة
translation_en_yusufali: the people of the right, how ˹blessed˺ will they be;

text_simple: واصحاب المشامة ما اصحاب المشامة
translation_en_yusufali: the people of the left, how ˹miserable˺ will they be;

text_simple: والسابقون السابقون
translation_en_yusufali: and the foremost ˹in faith˺ will be the foremost ˹in Paradise˺.

text_simple: اولئك المقربون
translation_en_yusufali: They are the ones nearest ˹to Allah˺

text_simple: في جنات النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: in the Gardens of Bliss.

text_simple: ثلة من الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be˺ a multitude from earlier generations

text_simple: وقليل من الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: and a few from later generations.

text_simple: على سرر موضونة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹All will be˺ on jewelled thrones

text_simple: متكئين عليها متقابلين
translation_en_yusufali: reclining face to face.

text_simple: يطوف عليهم ولدان مخلدون
translation_en_yusufali: They will be waited on by eternal youths

text_simple: باكواب واباريق وكاس من معين
translation_en_yusufali: with cups, pitchers, and a drink ˹of pure wine˺ from a flowing stream

text_simple: لا يصدعون عنها ولا ينزفون
translation_en_yusufali: that will cause them neither headache nor intoxication.

text_simple: وفاكهة مما يتخيرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will also be served˺ any fruit they choose

text_simple: ولحم طير مما يشتهون
translation_en_yusufali: and meat from any bird they desire.

text_simple: وحور عين
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹they will have˺ maidens with gorgeous eyes

text_simple: كامثال اللؤلؤ المكنون
translation_en_yusufali: like pristine pearls

text_simple: جزاء بما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹all˺ as a reward for what they used to do.

text_simple: لا يسمعون فيها لغوا ولا تاثيما
translation_en_yusufali: There they will never hear any idle or sinful talk—

text_simple: الا قيلا سلاما سلاما
translation_en_yusufali: only good and virtuous speech.

text_simple: واصحاب اليمين ما اصحاب اليمين
translation_en_yusufali: And the people of the right—how ˹blessed˺ will they be!

text_simple: في سدر مخضود
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be˺ amid thornless lote trees

text_simple: وطلح منضود
translation_en_yusufali: clusters of bananas

text_simple: وظل ممدود
translation_en_yusufali: extended shade

text_simple: وماء مسكوب
translation_en_yusufali: flowing water

text_simple: وفاكهة كثيرة
translation_en_yusufali: abundant fruit—

text_simple: لا مقطوعة ولا ممنوعة
translation_en_yusufali: never out of season nor forbidden—

text_simple: وفرش مرفوعة
translation_en_yusufali: and elevated furnishings.

text_simple: انا انشاناهن انشاء
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We will have perfectly created their mates

text_simple: فجعلناهن ابكارا
translation_en_yusufali: making them virgins

text_simple: عربا اترابا
translation_en_yusufali: loving and of equal age

text_simple: لاصحاب اليمين
translation_en_yusufali: for the people of the right

text_simple: ثلة من الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹who will be˺ a multitude from earlier generations

text_simple: وثلة من الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: and a multitude from later generations.

text_simple: واصحاب الشمال ما اصحاب الشمال
translation_en_yusufali: And the people of the left—how ˹miserable˺ will they be!

text_simple: في سموم وحميم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be˺ in scorching heat and boiling water

text_simple: وظل من يحموم
translation_en_yusufali: in the shade of black smoke

text_simple: لا بارد ولا كريم
translation_en_yusufali: neither cool nor refreshing.

text_simple: انهم كانوا قبل ذلك مترفين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, before this ˹torment˺ they were spoiled by luxury

text_simple: وكانوا يصرون على الحنث العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: and persisted in the worst of sin.

text_simple: وكانوا يقولون ائذا متنا وكنا ترابا وعظاما اانا لمبعوثون
translation_en_yusufali: They used to ask ˹mockingly˺, “When we are dead and reduced to dust and bones, will we really be resurrected?

text_simple: اواباؤنا الاولون
translation_en_yusufali: And our forefathers as well?”

text_simple: قل ان الاولين والاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Most certainly, earlier and later generations

text_simple: لمجموعون الى ميقات يوم معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: will surely be gathered ˹together˺ for the appointed Day.

text_simple: ثم انكم ايها الضالون المكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: Then you, O  misguided deniers

text_simple: لاكلون من شجر من زقوم
translation_en_yusufali: will certainly eat from ˹the fruit of˺ the trees of Zaqqûm

text_simple: فمالئون منها البطون
translation_en_yusufali: filling up ˹your˺ bellies with it.

text_simple: فشاربون عليه من الحميم
translation_en_yusufali: Then on top of that you will drink boiling water—

text_simple: فشاربون شرب الهيم
translation_en_yusufali: and you will drink ˹it˺ like thirsty camels do.”

text_simple: هذا نزلهم يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: This will be their accommodation on the Day of Judgment.

text_simple: نحن خلقناكم فلولا تصدقون
translation_en_yusufali: It is We Who created you. Will you not then believe ˹in resurrection˺?

text_simple: افرايتم ما تمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you considered what you ejaculate?

text_simple: اانتم تخلقونه ام نحن الخالقون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it you who create ˹a child out of˺ it, or is it We Who do so?

text_simple: نحن قدرنا بينكم الموت وما نحن بمسبوقين
translation_en_yusufali: We have ordained death for ˹all of˺ you, and We cannot be prevented

text_simple: على ان نبدل امثالكم وننشئكم في ما لا تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: from transforming and recreating you in forms unknown to you.

text_simple: ولقد علمتم النشاة الاولى فلولا تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: You already know how you were first created. Will you not then be mindful?

text_simple: افرايتم ما تحرثون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you considered what you sow?

text_simple: اانتم تزرعونه ام نحن الزارعون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it you who cause it to grow, or is it We Who do so?

text_simple: لو نشاء لجعلناه حطاما فظلتم تفكهون
translation_en_yusufali: If We willed, We could simply reduce this ˹harvest˺ to chaff, leaving you to lament

text_simple: انا لمغرمون
translation_en_yusufali: “We have truly suffered a ˹great˺ loss.

text_simple: بل نحن محرومون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”

text_simple: افرايتم الماء الذي تشربون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you considered the water you drink?

text_simple: اانتم انزلتموه من المزن ام نحن المنزلون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it you who bring it down from the clouds, or is it We Who do so?

text_simple: لو نشاء جعلناه اجاجا فلولا تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: If We willed, We could make it salty. Will you not then give thanks?

text_simple: افرايتم النار التي تورون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you considered the fire you kindle?

text_simple: اانتم انشاتم شجرتها ام نحن المنشئون
translation_en_yusufali: Is it you who produce its trees, or is it We Who do so?

text_simple: نحن جعلناها تذكرة ومتاعا للمقوين
translation_en_yusufali: We have made it ˹as˺ a reminder ˹of the Hellfire˺ and a provision for the travellers.

text_simple: فسبح باسم ربك العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.

text_simple: فلا اقسم بمواقع النجوم
translation_en_yusufali: So I do swear by the positions of the stars—

text_simple: وانه لقسم لو تعلمون عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: and this, if only you knew, is indeed a great oath—

text_simple: انه لقران كريم
translation_en_yusufali: that this is truly a noble Quran

text_simple: في كتاب مكنون
translation_en_yusufali: in a well-preserved Record

text_simple: لا يمسه الا المطهرون
translation_en_yusufali: touched by none except the purified ˹angels˺.

text_simple: تنزيل من رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: افبهذا الحديث انتم مدهنون
translation_en_yusufali: How can you then take this message lightly

text_simple: وتجعلون رزقكم انكم تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: and repay ˹Allah for˺ your provisions with denial?

text_simple: فلولا اذا بلغت الحلقوم
translation_en_yusufali: Why then ˹are you helpless˺ when the soul ˹of a dying person˺ reaches ˹their˺ throat

text_simple: وانتم حينئذ تنظرون
translation_en_yusufali: while you are looking on?

text_simple: ونحن اقرب اليه منكم ولكن لا تبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: And We are nearer to such a person than you, but you cannot see.

text_simple: فلولا ان كنتم غير مدينين
translation_en_yusufali: Now, if you are not subject to Our Will ˹as you claim˺

text_simple: ترجعونها ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: bring that soul back, if what you say is true.

text_simple: فاما ان كان من المقربين
translation_en_yusufali: So, if the deceased is one of those brought near ˹to Us˺

text_simple: فروح وريحان وجنت نعيم
translation_en_yusufali: then ˹such a person will have˺ serenity, fragrance, and a Garden of Bliss.

text_simple: واما ان كان من اصحاب اليمين
translation_en_yusufali: And if the deceased is one of the people of the right

text_simple: فسلام لك من اصحاب اليمين
translation_en_yusufali: then ˹they will be told,˺ “Greetings to you from the people of the right.”

text_simple: واما ان كان من المكذبين الضالين
translation_en_yusufali: But if such person is one of the misguided deniers

text_simple: فنزل من حميم
translation_en_yusufali: then their accommodation will be boiling water ˹to drink˺

text_simple: وتصلية جحيم
translation_en_yusufali: and burning in Hellfire.

text_simple: ان هذا لهو حق اليقين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this is the absolute truth.

text_simple: فسبح باسم ربك العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.

text_simple: سبح لله ما في السماوات والارض وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever is in the heavens and the earth glorifies Allah, for He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: له ملك السماوات والارض يحيي ويميت وهو على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. He gives life and causes death. And He is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: هو الاول والاخر والظاهر والباطن وهو بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: He is the First and the Last, the Most High and Most Near, and He has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: هو الذي خلق السماوات والارض في ستة ايام ثم استوى على العرش يعلم ما يلج في الارض وما يخرج منها وما ينزل من السماء وما يعرج فيها وهو معكم اين ما كنتم والله بما تعملون بصير
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who created the heavens and the earth in six Days, then established Himself on the Throne. He knows whatever goes into the earth and whatever comes out of it, and whatever descends from the sky and whatever ascends into it. And He is with you wherever you are. For Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

text_simple: له ملك السماوات والارض والى الله ترجع الامور
translation_en_yusufali: To Him belongs the kingdom of the heavens and the earth. And to Allah all matters are returned.

text_simple: يولج الليل في النهار ويولج النهار في الليل وهو عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: He merges the night into day and the day into night. And He knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: امنوا بالله ورسوله وانفقوا مما جعلكم مستخلفين فيه فالذين امنوا منكم وانفقوا لهم اجر كبير
translation_en_yusufali: Believe in Allah and His Messenger, and donate from what He has entrusted you with. So those of you who believe and donate will have a mighty reward.

text_simple: وما لكم لا تؤمنون بالله والرسول يدعوكم لتؤمنوا بربكم وقد اخذ ميثاقكم ان كنتم مؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: Why do you not believe in Allah while the Messenger is inviting you to have faith in your Lord, although He has already taken your covenant, if you will ever believe.

text_simple: هو الذي ينزل على عبده ايات بينات ليخرجكم من الظلمات الى النور وان الله بكم لرءوف رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who sends down clear revelations to His servant to bring you out of darkness and into light. For indeed Allah is Ever Gracious and Most Merciful to you.

text_simple: وما لكم الا تنفقوا في سبيل الله ولله ميراث السماوات والارض لا يستوي منكم من انفق من قبل الفتح وقاتل اولئك اعظم درجة من الذين انفقوا من بعد وقاتلوا وكلا وعد الله الحسنى والله بما تعملون خبير
translation_en_yusufali: And why should you not spend in the cause of Allah, while Allah is the ˹sole˺ inheritor of the heavens and the earth? Those of you who donated and fought before the victory ˹over Mecca˺ are unparalleled. They are far greater in rank than those who donated and fought afterwards. Yet Allah has promised each a fine reward. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: من ذا الذي يقرض الله قرضا حسنا فيضاعفه له وله اجر كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Who is it that will lend to Allah a good loan which Allah will multiply ˹many times over˺ for them, and they will have an honourable reward?

text_simple: يوم ترى المؤمنين والمؤمنات يسعى نورهم بين ايديهم وبايمانهم بشراكم اليوم جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها ذلك هو الفوز العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day you will see believing men and women with their light shining ahead of them and on their right. ˹They will be told,˺ “Today you have good news of Gardens, under which rivers flow, ˹for you˺ to stay in forever. This is ˹truly˺ the ultimate triumph.”

text_simple: يوم يقول المنافقون والمنافقات للذين امنوا انظرونا نقتبس من نوركم قيل ارجعوا وراءكم فالتمسوا نورا فضرب بينهم بسور له باب باطنه فيه الرحمة وظاهره من قبله العذاب
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day hypocrite men and women will beg the believers, “Wait for us so that we may have some of your light.” It will be said ˹mockingly˺, “Go back ˹to the world˺ and seek a light ˹there˺!” Then a ˹separating˺ wall with a gate will be erected between them. On the near side will be grace and on the far side will be torment.

text_simple: ينادونهم الم نكن معكم قالوا بلى ولكنكم فتنتم انفسكم وتربصتم وارتبتم وغرتكم الاماني حتى جاء امر الله وغركم بالله الغرور
translation_en_yusufali: The tormented will cry out to those graced, “Were we not with you?” They will reply, “Yes ˹you were˺. But you chose to be tempted ˹by hypocrisy˺, ˹eagerly˺ awaited ˹our demise˺, doubted ˹the truth˺, and were deluded by false hopes until Allah’s decree ˹of your death˺ came to pass. And ˹so˺ the Chief Deceiver deceived you about Allah.

text_simple: فاليوم لا يؤخذ منكم فدية ولا من الذين كفروا ماواكم النار هي مولاكم وبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: So Today no ransom will be accepted from you ˹hypocrites˺, nor from the disbelievers. Your home is the Fire—it is the ˹only˺ fitting place for you. What an evil destination!”

text_simple: الم يان للذين امنوا ان تخشع قلوبهم لذكر الله وما نزل من الحق ولا يكونوا كالذين اوتوا الكتاب من قبل فطال عليهم الامد فقست قلوبهم وكثير منهم فاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: Has the time not yet come for believers’ hearts to be humbled at the remembrance of Allah and what has been revealed of the truth, and not be like those given the Scripture before—˹those˺ who were spoiled for so long that their hearts became hardened. And many of them are ˹still˺ rebellious.

text_simple: اعلموا ان الله يحيي الارض بعد موتها قد بينا لكم الايات لعلكم تعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Know that Allah revives the earth after its death. We have certainly made the signs clear for you so perhaps you will understand.

text_simple: ان المصدقين والمصدقات واقرضوا الله قرضا حسنا يضاعف لهم ولهم اجر كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those men and women who give in charity and lend to Allah a good loan will have it multiplied for them, and they will have an honourable reward.

text_simple: والذين امنوا بالله ورسله اولئك هم الصديقون والشهداء عند ربهم لهم اجرهم ونورهم والذين كفروا وكذبوا باياتنا اولئك اصحاب الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹As for˺ those who believe in Allah and His messengers, it is they who are ˹truly˺ the people of truth. And the martyrs, with their Lord, will have their reward and their light. But ˹as for˺ those who disbelieve and reject Our signs, it is they who will be the residents of the Hellfire.

text_simple: اعلموا انما الحياة الدنيا لعب ولهو وزينة وتفاخر بينكم وتكاثر في الاموال والاولاد كمثل غيث اعجب الكفار نباته ثم يهيج فتراه مصفرا ثم يكون حطاما وفي الاخرة عذاب شديد ومغفرة من الله ورضوان وما الحياة الدنيا الا متاع الغرور
translation_en_yusufali: Know that this worldly life is no more than play, amusement, luxury, mutual boasting, and competition in wealth and children. This is like rain that causes plants to grow, to the delight of the planters. But later the plants dry up and you see them wither, then they are reduced to chaff. And in the Hereafter there will be either severe punishment or forgiveness and pleasure of Allah, whereas the life of this world is no more than the delusion of enjoyment.

text_simple: سابقوا الى مغفرة من ربكم وجنة عرضها كعرض السماء والارض اعدت للذين امنوا بالله ورسله ذلك فضل الله يؤتيه من يشاء والله ذو الفضل العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹So˺ compete with one another for forgiveness from your Lord and a Paradise as vast as the heavens and the earth, prepared for those who believe in Allah and His messengers. This is the favour of Allah. He grants it to whoever He wills. And Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

text_simple: ما اصاب من مصيبة في الارض ولا في انفسكم الا في كتاب من قبل ان نبراها ان ذلك على الله يسير
translation_en_yusufali: No calamity ˹or blessing˺ occurs on earth or in yourselves without being ˹written˺ in a Record before We bring it into being. This is certainly easy for Allah.

text_simple: لكيلا تاسوا على ما فاتكم ولا تفرحوا بما اتاكم والله لا يحب كل مختال فخور
translation_en_yusufali: ˹We let you know this˺ so that you neither grieve over what you have missed nor boast over what He has granted you. For Allah does not like whoever is arrogant, boastful—

text_simple: الذين يبخلون ويامرون الناس بالبخل ومن يتول فان الله هو الغني الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: those who are stingy and promote stinginess among people. And whoever turns away ˹should know that˺ Allah ˹alone˺ is truly the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

text_simple: لقد ارسلنا رسلنا بالبينات وانزلنا معهم الكتاب والميزان ليقوم الناس بالقسط وانزلنا الحديد فيه باس شديد ومنافع للناس وليعلم الله من ينصره ورسله بالغيب ان الله قوي عزيز
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent Our messengers with clear proofs, and with them We sent down the Scripture and the balance ˹of justice˺ so that people may administer justice. And We sent down iron with its great might, benefits for humanity, and means for Allah to prove who ˹is willing to˺ stand up for Him and His messengers without seeing Him. Surely Allah is All-Powerful, Almighty.

text_simple: ولقد ارسلنا نوحا وابراهيم وجعلنا في ذريتهما النبوة والكتاب فمنهم مهتد وكثير منهم فاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We sent Noah and Abraham and reserved prophethood and revelation for their descendants. Some of them are ˹rightly˺ guided, while most are rebellious.

text_simple: ثم قفينا على اثارهم برسلنا وقفينا بعيسى ابن مريم واتيناه الانجيل وجعلنا في قلوب الذين اتبعوه رافة ورحمة ورهبانية ابتدعوها ما كتبناها عليهم الا ابتغاء رضوان الله فما رعوها حق رعايتها فاتينا الذين امنوا منهم اجرهم وكثير منهم فاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: Then in the footsteps of these ˹prophets˺, We sent Our messengers, and ˹after them˺ We sent Jesus, son of Mary, and granted him the Gospel, and instilled compassion and mercy into the hearts of his followers. As for monasticism, they made it up—We never ordained it for them—only seeking to please Allah, yet they did not ˹even˺ observe it strictly. So We rewarded those of them who were faithful. But most of them are rebellious.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اتقوا الله وامنوا برسوله يؤتكم كفلين من رحمته ويجعل لكم نورا تمشون به ويغفر لكم والله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: O people of faith! Fear Allah and believe in His Messenger. ˹And˺ He will grant you a double share of His mercy, provide you with a light to walk in ˹on Judgment Day˺, and forgive you. For Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: لئلا يعلم اهل الكتاب الا يقدرون على شيء من فضل الله وان الفضل بيد الله يؤتيه من يشاء والله ذو الفضل العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹This is so˺ that the People of the Book ˹who deny the Prophet˺ may know that they do not have any control over Allah’s grace, and that all grace is in Allah’s Hands. He grants it to whoever He wills. For Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

text_simple: قد سمع الله قول التي تجادلك في زوجها وتشتكي الى الله والله يسمع تحاوركما ان الله سميع بصير
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Allah has heard the argument of the woman who pleaded with you ˹O Prophet˺ concerning her husband, and appealed to Allah. Allah has heard your exchange. Surely Allah is All-Hearing, All-Seeing.

text_simple: الذين يظاهرون منكم من نسائهم ما هن امهاتهم ان امهاتهم الا اللائي ولدنهم وانهم ليقولون منكرا من القول وزورا وان الله لعفو غفور
translation_en_yusufali: Those of you who ˹sinfully˺ divorce their wives by comparing them to their mothers ˹should know that˺ their wives are in no way their mothers. None can be their mothers except those who gave birth to them. What they say is certainly detestable and false. Yet Allah is truly Ever-Pardoning, All-Forgiving.

text_simple: والذين يظاهرون من نسائهم ثم يعودون لما قالوا فتحرير رقبة من قبل ان يتماسا ذلكم توعظون به والله بما تعملون خبير
translation_en_yusufali: Those who divorce their wives in this manner, then ˹wish to˺ retract what they said, must free a slave before they touch each other. This ˹penalty˺ is meant to deter you. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: فمن لم يجد فصيام شهرين متتابعين من قبل ان يتماسا فمن لم يستطع فاطعام ستين مسكينا ذلك لتؤمنوا بالله ورسوله وتلك حدود الله وللكافرين عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: But if the husband cannot afford this, let him then fast two consecutive months before the couple touch each other. But if he is unable ˹to fast˺, then let him feed sixty poor people. This is to re-affirm your faith in Allah and His Messenger. These are the limits set by Allah. And the disbelievers will suffer a painful punishment.

text_simple: ان الذين يحادون الله ورسوله كبتوا كما كبت الذين من قبلهم وقد انزلنا ايات بينات وللكافرين عذاب مهين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who defy Allah and His Messenger will be debased, just like those before them. We have certainly sent down clear revelations. And the disbelievers will suffer a humiliating punishment.

text_simple: يوم يبعثهم الله جميعا فينبئهم بما عملوا احصاه الله ونسوه والله على كل شيء شهيد
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day Allah resurrects them all together, He will then inform them of what they have done. Allah has kept account of it all, while they have forgotten it. For Allah is a Witness over all things.

text_simple: الم تر ان الله يعلم ما في السماوات وما في الارض ما يكون من نجوى ثلاثة الا هو رابعهم ولا خمسة الا هو سادسهم ولا ادنى من ذلك ولا اكثر الا هو معهم اين ما كانوا ثم ينبئهم بما عملوا يوم القيامة ان الله بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see that Allah knows whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth? If three converse privately, He is their fourth. If five, He is their sixth. Whether fewer or more, He is with them wherever they may be. Then, on the Day of Judgment, He will inform them of what they have done. Surely Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: الم تر الى الذين نهوا عن النجوى ثم يعودون لما نهوا عنه ويتناجون بالاثم والعدوان ومعصيت الرسول واذا جاءوك حيوك بما لم يحيك به الله ويقولون في انفسهم لولا يعذبنا الله بما نقول حسبهم جهنم يصلونها فبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen those who were forbidden from secret talks, yet they ˹always˺ return to what they were forbidden from, conspiring in sin, aggression, and disobedience to the Messenger? And when they come to you ˹O Prophet˺, they greet you not as Allah greets you, and say to one another, “Why does Allah not punish us for what we say?” Hell is enough for them—they will burn in it. And what an evil destination!

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذا تناجيتم فلا تتناجوا بالاثم والعدوان ومعصيت الرسول وتناجوا بالبر والتقوى واتقوا الله الذي اليه تحشرون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! When you converse privately, let it not be for sin, aggression, or disobedience to the Messenger, but let it be for goodness and righteousness. And fear Allah, to Whom you will ˹all˺ be gathered.

text_simple: انما النجوى من الشيطان ليحزن الذين امنوا وليس بضارهم شيئا الا باذن الله وعلى الله فليتوكل المؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Secret talks are only inspired by Satan to grieve the believers. Yet he cannot harm them whatsoever except by Allah’s Will. So in Allah let the believers put their trust.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذا قيل لكم تفسحوا في المجالس فافسحوا يفسح الله لكم واذا قيل انشزوا فانشزوا يرفع الله الذين امنوا منكم والذين اوتوا العلم درجات والله بما تعملون خبير
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! When you are told to make room in gatherings, then do so. Allah will make room for you ˹in His grace˺. And if you are told to rise, then do so. Allah will elevate those of you who are faithful, and ˹raise˺ those gifted with knowledge in rank. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذا ناجيتم الرسول فقدموا بين يدي نجواكم صدقة ذلك خير لكم واطهر فان لم تجدوا فان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! When you consult the Messenger privately, give something in charity before your consultation. That is better and purer for you. But if you lack the means, then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: ااشفقتم ان تقدموا بين يدي نجواكم صدقات فاذ لم تفعلوا وتاب الله عليكم فاقيموا الصلاة واتوا الزكاة واطيعوا الله ورسوله والله خبير بما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Are you afraid of spending in charity before your private consultations ˹with him˺? Since you are unable to do so, and Allah has turned to you in mercy, then ˹continue to˺ establish prayer, pay alms-tax, and obey Allah and His Messenger. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: الم تر الى الذين تولوا قوما غضب الله عليهم ما هم منكم ولا منهم ويحلفون على الكذب وهم يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen those ˹hypocrites˺ who ally themselves with a people with whom Allah is displeased? They are neither with you nor with them. And they swear to lies knowingly.

text_simple: اعد الله لهم عذابا شديدا انهم ساء ما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has prepared for them a severe punishment. Evil indeed is what they do.

text_simple: اتخذوا ايمانهم جنة فصدوا عن سبيل الله فلهم عذاب مهين
translation_en_yusufali: They have made their ˹false˺ oaths as a shield, hindering ˹others˺ from the cause of Allah. So they will suffer a humiliating punishment.

text_simple: لن تغني عنهم اموالهم ولا اولادهم من الله شيئا اولئك اصحاب النار هم فيها خالدون
translation_en_yusufali: Neither their wealth nor children will be of any help to them against Allah whatsoever. It is they who will be the residents of the Fire. They will be there forever.

text_simple: يوم يبعثهم الله جميعا فيحلفون له كما يحلفون لكم ويحسبون انهم على شيء الا انهم هم الكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day Allah resurrects them all, they will ˹falsely˺ swear to Him as they swear to you, thinking they have something to stand on. Indeed, it is they who are the ˹total˺ liars.

text_simple: استحوذ عليهم الشيطان فانساهم ذكر الله اولئك حزب الشيطان الا ان حزب الشيطان هم الخاسرون
translation_en_yusufali: Satan has taken hold of them, causing them to forget the remembrance of Allah. They are the party of Satan. Surely Satan’s party is bound to lose.

text_simple: ان الذين يحادون الله ورسوله اولئك في الاذلين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹As for˺ those who defy Allah and His Messenger, they will definitely be among the most debased.

text_simple: كتب الله لاغلبن انا ورسلي ان الله قوي عزيز
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has decreed, “I and My messengers will certainly prevail.” Surely Allah is All-Powerful, Almighty.

text_simple: لا تجد قوما يؤمنون بالله واليوم الاخر يوادون من حاد الله ورسوله ولو كانوا اباءهم او ابناءهم او اخوانهم او عشيرتهم اولئك كتب في قلوبهم الايمان وايدهم بروح منه ويدخلهم جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها رضي الله عنهم ورضوا عنه اولئك حزب الله الا ان حزب الله هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: You will never find a people who ˹truly˺ believe in Allah and the Last Day loyal to those who defy Allah and His Messenger, even if they were their parents, children, siblings, or extended family. For those ˹believers˺, Allah has instilled faith in their hearts and strengthened them with a spirit from Him. He will admit them into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there forever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. They are the party of Allah. Indeed, Allah’s party is bound to succeed.

text_simple: سبح لله ما في السماوات وما في الارض وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth glorifies Allah. For He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: هو الذي اخرج الذين كفروا من اهل الكتاب من ديارهم لاول الحشر ما ظننتم ان يخرجوا وظنوا انهم مانعتهم حصونهم من الله فاتاهم الله من حيث لم يحتسبوا وقذف في قلوبهم الرعب يخربون بيوتهم بايديهم وايدي المؤمنين فاعتبروا يا اولي الابصار
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who expelled the disbelievers of the People of the Book from their homes for ˹their˺ first banishment ˹ever˺. You never thought they would go. And they thought their strongholds would put them out of Allah’s reach. But ˹the decree of˺ Allah came upon them from where they never expected. And He cast horror into their hearts so they destroyed their houses with their own hands and the hands of the believers. So take a lesson ˹from this˺, O  people of insight!

text_simple: ولولا ان كتب الله عليهم الجلاء لعذبهم في الدنيا ولهم في الاخرة عذاب النار
translation_en_yusufali: Had Allah not decreed exile for them, He would have certainly punished them in this world. And in the Hereafter they will suffer the punishment of the Fire.

text_simple: ذلك بانهم شاقوا الله ورسوله ومن يشاق الله فان الله شديد العقاب
translation_en_yusufali: This is because they defied Allah and His Messenger. And whoever defies Allah, then Allah is truly severe in punishment.

text_simple: ما قطعتم من لينة او تركتموها قائمة على اصولها فباذن الله وليخزي الفاسقين
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever palm trees you ˹believers˺ cut down or left standing intact, it was ˹all˺ by Allah’s Will, so that He might disgrace the rebellious.

text_simple: وما افاء الله على رسوله منهم فما اوجفتم عليه من خيل ولا ركاب ولكن الله يسلط رسله على من يشاء والله على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: As for the gains Allah has turned over to His Messenger from them—you did not ˹even˺ spur on any horse or camel for such gains. But Allah gives authority to His messengers over whoever He wills. For Allah is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: ما افاء الله على رسوله من اهل القرى فلله وللرسول ولذي القربى واليتامى والمساكين وابن السبيل كي لا يكون دولة بين الاغنياء منكم وما اتاكم الرسول فخذوه وما نهاكم عنه فانتهوا واتقوا الله ان الله شديد العقاب
translation_en_yusufali: As for gains granted by Allah to His Messenger from the people of ˹other˺ lands, they are for Allah and the Messenger, his close relatives, orphans, the poor, and ˹needy˺ travellers so that wealth may not merely circulate among your rich. Whatever the Messenger gives you, take it. And whatever he forbids you from, leave it. And fear Allah. Surely Allah is severe in punishment.

text_simple: للفقراء المهاجرين الذين اخرجوا من ديارهم واموالهم يبتغون فضلا من الله ورضوانا وينصرون الله ورسوله اولئك هم الصادقون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Some of the gains will be˺ for poor emigrants who were driven out of their homes and wealth, seeking Allah’s bounty and pleasure, and standing up for Allah and His Messenger. They are the ones true in faith.

text_simple: والذين تبوءوا الدار والايمان من قبلهم يحبون من هاجر اليهم ولا يجدون في صدورهم حاجة مما اوتوا ويؤثرون على انفسهم ولو كان بهم خصاصة ومن يوق شح نفسه فاولئك هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who had settled in the city and ˹embraced˺ the faith before ˹the arrival of˺ the emigrants, they love whoever immigrates to them, never having a desire in their hearts for whatever ˹of the gains˺ is given to the emigrants. They give ˹the emigrants˺ preference over themselves even though they may be in need. And whoever is saved from the selfishness of their own souls, it is they who are ˹truly˺ successful.

text_simple: والذين جاءوا من بعدهم يقولون ربنا اغفر لنا ولاخواننا الذين سبقونا بالايمان ولا تجعل في قلوبنا غلا للذين امنوا ربنا انك رءوف رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: And those who come after them will pray, “Our Lord! Forgive us and our fellow believers who preceded us in faith, and do not allow bitterness into our hearts towards those who believe. Our Lord! Indeed, You are Ever Gracious, Most Merciful.”

text_simple: الم تر الى الذين نافقوا يقولون لاخوانهم الذين كفروا من اهل الكتاب لئن اخرجتم لنخرجن معكم ولا نطيع فيكم احدا ابدا وان قوتلتم لننصرنكم والله يشهد انهم لكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: Have you ˹O Prophet˺ not seen the hypocrites who say to their fellow disbelievers from the People of the Book, “If you are expelled, we will certainly leave with you, and We will never obey anyone against you. And if you are fought against, we will surely help you.”? But Allah bears witness that they are truly liars.

text_simple: لئن اخرجوا لا يخرجون معهم ولئن قوتلوا لا ينصرونهم ولئن نصروهم ليولن الادبار ثم لا ينصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, if they are expelled, the hypocrites will never leave with them. And if they are fought against, the hypocrites will never help them. And even if the hypocrites did so, they would certainly flee, then the disbelievers would be left with no help.

text_simple: لانتم اشد رهبة في صدورهم من الله ذلك بانهم قوم لا يفقهون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, there is more fear in their hearts for you ˹believers˺ than for Allah. That is because they are a people who do not comprehend.

text_simple: لا يقاتلونكم جميعا الا في قرى محصنة او من وراء جدر باسهم بينهم شديد تحسبهم جميعا وقلوبهم شتى ذلك بانهم قوم لا يعقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Even united, they would not ˹dare˺ fight against you except ˹from˺ within fortified strongholds or from behind walls. Their malice for each other is intense: you think they are united, yet their hearts are divided. That is because they are a people with no ˹real˺ understanding.

text_simple: كمثل الذين من قبلهم قريبا ذاقوا وبال امرهم ولهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: They are ˹both just˺ like those who recently went down before them: they tasted the evil consequences of their doings. And they will suffer a painful punishment.

text_simple: كمثل الشيطان اذ قال للانسان اكفر فلما كفر قال اني بريء منك اني اخاف الله رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They are˺ like Satan when he lures someone to disbelieve. Then after they have done so, he will say ˹on Judgment Day˺, “I have absolutely nothing to do with you. I truly fear Allah—the Lord of all worlds.”

text_simple: فكان عاقبتهما انهما في النار خالدين فيها وذلك جزاء الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: So they will both end up in the Fire, staying there forever. That is the reward of the wrongdoers.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اتقوا الله ولتنظر نفس ما قدمت لغد واتقوا الله ان الله خبير بما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Be mindful of Allah and let every soul look to what ˹deeds˺ it has sent forth for tomorrow. And fear Allah, ˹for˺ certainly Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: ولا تكونوا كالذين نسوا الله فانساهم انفسهم اولئك هم الفاسقون
translation_en_yusufali: And do not be like those who forgot Allah, so He made them forget themselves. It is they who are ˹truly˺ rebellious.

text_simple: لا يستوي اصحاب النار واصحاب الجنة اصحاب الجنة هم الفائزون
translation_en_yusufali: The residents of the Fire cannot be equal to the residents of Paradise. ˹Only˺ the residents of Paradise will be successful.

text_simple: لو انزلنا هذا القران على جبل لرايته خاشعا متصدعا من خشية الله وتلك الامثال نضربها للناس لعلهم يتفكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Had We sent down this Quran upon a mountain, you would have certainly seen it humbled and torn apart in awe of Allah. We set forth such comparisons for people, ˹so˺ perhaps they may reflect.

text_simple: هو الله الذي لا اله الا هو عالم الغيب والشهادة هو الرحمن الرحيم
translation_en_yusufali: He is Allah—there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him: Knower of the seen and unseen. He is the Most Compassionate, Most Merciful.

text_simple: هو الله الذي لا اله الا هو الملك القدوس السلام المؤمن المهيمن العزيز الجبار المتكبر سبحان الله عما يشركون
translation_en_yusufali: He is Allah—there is no god except Him: the King, the Most Holy, the All-Perfect, the Source of Serenity, the Watcher ˹of all˺, the Almighty, the Supreme in Might, the Majestic. Glorified is Allah far above what they associate with Him ˹in worship˺!

text_simple: هو الله الخالق البارئ المصور له الاسماء الحسنى يسبح له ما في السماوات والارض وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: He is Allah: the Creator, the Inventor, the Shaper. He ˹alone˺ has the Most Beautiful Names. Whatever is in the heavens and the earth ˹constantly˺ glorifies Him. And He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تتخذوا عدوي وعدوكم اولياء تلقون اليهم بالمودة وقد كفروا بما جاءكم من الحق يخرجون الرسول واياكم ان تؤمنوا بالله ربكم ان كنتم خرجتم جهادا في سبيلي وابتغاء مرضاتي تسرون اليهم بالمودة وانا اعلم بما اخفيتم وما اعلنتم ومن يفعله منكم فقد ضل سواء السبيل
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not take My enemies and yours as trusted allies, showing them affection even though they deny what has come to you of the truth. They drove the Messenger and yourselves out ˹of Mecca˺, simply for your belief in Allah, your Lord. If you ˹truly˺ emigrated to struggle in My cause and seek My pleasure, ˹then do not take them as allies,˺ disclosing secrets ˹of the believers˺ to the pagans out of affection for them, when I know best whatever you conceal and whatever you reveal. And whoever of you does this has truly strayed from the Right Way.

text_simple: ان يثقفوكم يكونوا لكم اعداء ويبسطوا اليكم ايديهم والسنتهم بالسوء وودوا لو تكفرون
translation_en_yusufali: If they gain the upper hand over you, they would be your ˹open˺ enemies, unleashing their hands and tongues to harm you, and wishing that you would abandon faith.

text_simple: لن تنفعكم ارحامكم ولا اولادكم يوم القيامة يفصل بينكم والله بما تعملون بصير
translation_en_yusufali: Neither your relatives nor children will benefit you on Judgment Day—He will decide between you ˹all˺. For Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

text_simple: قد كانت لكم اسوة حسنة في ابراهيم والذين معه اذ قالوا لقومهم انا براء منكم ومما تعبدون من دون الله كفرنا بكم وبدا بيننا وبينكم العداوة والبغضاء ابدا حتى تؤمنوا بالله وحده الا قول ابراهيم لابيه لاستغفرن لك وما املك لك من الله من شيء ربنا عليك توكلنا واليك انبنا واليك المصير
translation_en_yusufali: You already have an excellent example in Abraham and those with him, when they said to their people, “We totally dissociate ourselves from you and ˹shun˺ whatever ˹idols˺ you worship besides Allah. We reject you. The enmity and hatred that has arisen between us and you will last until you believe in Allah alone.” The only exception is when Abraham said to his father, “I will seek forgiveness for you,˹” adding, “but˺ I cannot protect you from Allah at all.” ˹The believers prayed,˺ “Our Lord! In You we trust. And to You we ˹always˺ turn. And to You is the final return.

text_simple: ربنا لا تجعلنا فتنة للذين كفروا واغفر لنا ربنا انك انت العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Our Lord! Do not subject us to the persecution of the disbelievers. Forgive us, our Lord! You ˹alone˺ are truly the Almighty, All-Wise.”

text_simple: لقد كان لكم فيهم اسوة حسنة لمن كان يرجو الله واليوم الاخر ومن يتول فان الله هو الغني الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: You certainly have an excellent example in them for whoever has hope in Allah and the Last Day. But whoever turns away, then surely Allah ˹alone˺ is the Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

text_simple: عسى الله ان يجعل بينكم وبين الذين عاديتم منهم مودة والله قدير والله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹In time,˺ Allah may bring about goodwill between you and those of them you ˹now˺ hold as enemies. For Allah is Most Capable. And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: لا ينهاكم الله عن الذين لم يقاتلوكم في الدين ولم يخرجوكم من دياركم ان تبروهم وتقسطوا اليهم ان الله يحب المقسطين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah does not forbid you from dealing kindly and fairly with those who have neither fought nor driven you out of your homes. Surely Allah loves those who are fair.

text_simple: انما ينهاكم الله عن الذين قاتلوكم في الدين واخرجوكم من دياركم وظاهروا على اخراجكم ان تولوهم ومن يتولهم فاولئك هم الظالمون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah only forbids you from befriending those who have fought you for ˹your˺ faith, driven you out of your homes, or supported ˹others˺ in doing so. And whoever takes them as friends, then it is they who are the ˹true˺ wrongdoers.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذا جاءكم المؤمنات مهاجرات فامتحنوهن الله اعلم بايمانهن فان علمتموهن مؤمنات فلا ترجعوهن الى الكفار لا هن حل لهم ولا هم يحلون لهن واتوهم ما انفقوا ولا جناح عليكم ان تنكحوهن اذا اتيتموهن اجورهن ولا تمسكوا بعصم الكوافر واسالوا ما انفقتم وليسالوا ما انفقوا ذلكم حكم الله يحكم بينكم والله عليم حكيم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! When the believing women come to you as emigrants, test their intentions—their faith is best known to Allah—and if you find them to be believers, then do not send them back to the disbelievers. These ˹women˺ are not lawful ˹wives˺ for the disbelievers, nor are the disbelievers lawful ˹husbands˺ for them. ˹But˺ repay the disbelievers whatever ˹dowries˺ they had paid. And there is no blame on you if you marry these ˹women˺ as long as you pay them their dowries. And do not hold on to marriage with polytheistic women. ˹But˺ demand ˹repayment of˺ whatever ˹dowries˺ you had paid, and let the disbelievers do the same. That is the judgment of Allah—He judges between you. And Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: وان فاتكم شيء من ازواجكم الى الكفار فعاقبتم فاتوا الذين ذهبت ازواجهم مثل ما انفقوا واتقوا الله الذي انتم به مؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: And if any of your wives desert you to the disbelievers, and later you take spoils from them, then pay those whose wives have gone, the equivalent of whatever ˹dowry˺ they had paid. And be mindful of Allah, in Whom you believe.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي اذا جاءك المؤمنات يبايعنك على ان لا يشركن بالله شيئا ولا يسرقن ولا يزنين ولا يقتلن اولادهن ولا ياتين ببهتان يفترينه بين ايديهن وارجلهن ولا يعصينك في معروف فبايعهن واستغفر لهن الله ان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! When the believing women come to you, pledging to you that they will neither associate anything with Allah ˹in worship˺, nor steal, nor fornicate, nor kill their children, nor falsely attribute ˹illegitimate˺ children to their husbands, nor disobey you in what is right, then accept their pledge, and ask Allah to forgive them. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تتولوا قوما غضب الله عليهم قد يئسوا من الاخرة كما يئس الكفار من اصحاب القبور
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not ally yourselves with a people Allah is displeased with. They already have no hope for the Hereafter, just like the disbelievers lying in ˹their˺ graves.

text_simple: سبح لله ما في السماوات وما في الارض وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth glorifies Allah. For He ˹alone˺ is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لم تقولون ما لا تفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Why do you say what you do not do?

text_simple: كبر مقتا عند الله ان تقولوا ما لا تفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: How despicable it is in the sight of Allah that you say what you do not do!

text_simple: ان الله يحب الذين يقاتلون في سبيله صفا كانهم بنيان مرصوص
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Allah loves those who fight in His cause in ˹solid˺ ranks as if they were one concrete structure.

text_simple: واذ قال موسى لقومه يا قوم لم تؤذونني وقد تعلمون اني رسول الله اليكم فلما زاغوا ازاغ الله قلوبهم والله لا يهدي القوم الفاسقين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember, O  Prophet,˺ when Moses said to his people, “O my people! Why do you hurt me when you already know I am Allah’s messenger to you?” So when they ˹persistently˺ deviated, Allah caused their hearts to deviate. For Allah does not guide the rebellious people.

text_simple: واذ قال عيسى ابن مريم يا بني اسرائيل اني رسول الله اليكم مصدقا لما بين يدي من التوراة ومبشرا برسول ياتي من بعدي اسمه احمد فلما جاءهم بالبينات قالوا هذا سحر مبين
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹remember˺ when Jesus, son of Mary, said, “O children of Israel! I am truly Allah’s messenger to you, confirming the Torah which came before me, and giving good news of a messenger after me whose name will be Aḥmad.” Yet when the Prophet came to them with clear proofs, they said, “This is pure magic.”

text_simple: ومن اظلم ممن افترى على الله الكذب وهو يدعى الى الاسلام والله لا يهدي القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Who does more wrong than the one who fabricates lies about Allah when invited to submit ˹to Him˺? For Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

text_simple: يريدون ليطفئوا نور الله بافواههم والله متم نوره ولو كره الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: They wish to extinguish Allah’s light with their mouths, but Allah will ˹certainly˺ perfect His light, even to the dismay of the disbelievers.

text_simple: هو الذي ارسل رسوله بالهدى ودين الحق ليظهره على الدين كله ولو كره المشركون
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who has sent His Messenger with ˹true˺ guidance and the religion of truth, making it prevail over all others, even to the dismay of the polytheists.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا هل ادلكم على تجارة تنجيكم من عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Shall I guide you to an exchange that will save you from a painful punishment?

text_simple: تؤمنون بالله ورسوله وتجاهدون في سبيل الله باموالكم وانفسكم ذلكم خير لكم ان كنتم تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is to˺ have faith in Allah and His Messenger, and strive in the cause of Allah with your wealth and your lives. That is best for you, if only you knew.

text_simple: يغفر لكم ذنوبكم ويدخلكم جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار ومساكن طيبة في جنات عدن ذلك الفوز العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: He will forgive your sins, and admit you into Gardens under which rivers flow, and ˹house you in˺ splendid homes in the Gardens of Eternity. That is the ultimate triumph.

text_simple: واخرى تحبونها نصر من الله وفتح قريب وبشر المؤمنين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He will also give you˺ another favour that you long for: help from Allah and an imminent victory. ˹So˺ give good news ˹O Prophet˺ to the believers.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا كونوا انصار الله كما قال عيسى ابن مريم للحواريين من انصاري الى الله قال الحواريون نحن انصار الله فامنت طائفة من بني اسرائيل وكفرت طائفة فايدنا الذين امنوا على عدوهم فاصبحوا ظاهرين
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Stand up for Allah, as Jesus, son of Mary, asked the disciples, “Who will stand up with me for Allah?” The disciples replied, “We will stand up for Allah.” Then a group from the Children of Israel believed while another disbelieved. We then supported the believers against their enemies, so they prevailed.

text_simple: يسبح لله ما في السماوات وما في الارض الملك القدوس العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth ˹constantly˺ glorifies Allah—the King, the Most Holy, the Almighty, the All-Wise.

text_simple: هو الذي بعث في الاميين رسولا منهم يتلو عليهم اياته ويزكيهم ويعلمهم الكتاب والحكمة وان كانوا من قبل لفي ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who raised for the illiterate ˹people˺ a messenger from among themselves—reciting to them His revelations, purifying them, and teaching them the Book and wisdom, for indeed they had previously been clearly astray—

text_simple: واخرين منهم لما يلحقوا بهم وهو العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: along with others of them who have not yet joined them ˹in faith˺. For He is the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: ذلك فضل الله يؤتيه من يشاء والله ذو الفضل العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: This is the favour of Allah. He grants it to whoever He wills. And Allah is the Lord of infinite bounty.

text_simple: مثل الذين حملوا التوراة ثم لم يحملوها كمثل الحمار يحمل اسفارا بئس مثل القوم الذين كذبوا بايات الله والله لا يهدي القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: The example of those who were entrusted with ˹observing˺ the Torah but failed to do so, is that of a donkey carrying books. How evil is the example of those who reject Allah’s signs! For Allah does not guide the wrongdoing people.

text_simple: قل يا ايها الذين هادوا ان زعمتم انكم اولياء لله من دون الناس فتمنوا الموت ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O Jews! If you claim to be Allah’s chosen ˹people˺ out of all humanity, then wish for death, if what you say is true.”

text_simple: ولا يتمنونه ابدا بما قدمت ايديهم والله عليم بالظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: But they will never wish for that because of what their hands have done. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of the wrongdoers.

text_simple: قل ان الموت الذي تفرون منه فانه ملاقيكم ثم تردون الى عالم الغيب والشهادة فينبئكم بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “The death you are running away from will inevitably come to you. Then you will be returned to the Knower of the seen and unseen, and He will inform you of what you used to do.”

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا اذا نودي للصلاة من يوم الجمعة فاسعوا الى ذكر الله وذروا البيع ذلكم خير لكم ان كنتم تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! When the call to prayer is made on Friday, then proceed ˹diligently˺ to the remembrance of Allah and leave off ˹your˺ business. That is best for you, if only you knew.

text_simple: فاذا قضيت الصلاة فانتشروا في الارض وابتغوا من فضل الله واذكروا الله كثيرا لعلكم تفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: Once the prayer is over, disperse throughout the land and seek the bounty of Allah. And remember Allah often so you may be successful.

text_simple: واذا راوا تجارة او لهوا انفضوا اليها وتركوك قائما قل ما عند الله خير من اللهو ومن التجارة والله خير الرازقين
translation_en_yusufali: When they saw the fanfare along with the caravan, they ˹almost all˺ flocked to it, leaving you ˹O Prophet˺ standing ˹on the pulpit˺. Say, “What is with Allah is far better than amusement and merchandise. And Allah is the Best Provider.”

text_simple: اذا جاءك المنافقون قالوا نشهد انك لرسول الله والله يعلم انك لرسوله والله يشهد ان المنافقين لكاذبون
translation_en_yusufali: When the hypocrites come to you ˹O Prophet˺, they say, “We bear witness that you are certainly the Messenger of Allah”—and surely Allah knows that you are His Messenger—but Allah bears witness that the hypocrites are truly liars.

text_simple: اتخذوا ايمانهم جنة فصدوا عن سبيل الله انهم ساء ما كانوا يعملون
translation_en_yusufali: They have made their ˹false˺ oaths as a shield, hindering ˹others˺ from the Way of Allah. Evil indeed is what they do!

text_simple: ذلك بانهم امنوا ثم كفروا فطبع على قلوبهم فهم لا يفقهون
translation_en_yusufali: This is because they believed and then abandoned faith. Therefore, their hearts have been sealed, so they do not comprehend.

text_simple: واذا رايتهم تعجبك اجسامهم وان يقولوا تسمع لقولهم كانهم خشب مسندة يحسبون كل صيحة عليهم هم العدو فاحذرهم قاتلهم الله انى يؤفكون
translation_en_yusufali: When you see them, their appearance impresses you. And when they speak, you listen to their ˹impressive˺ speech. But they are ˹just˺ like ˹worthless˺ planks of wood leaned ˹against a wall˺. They think every cry is against them. They are the enemy, so beware of them. May Allah condemn them! How can they be deluded ˹from the truth˺?

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم تعالوا يستغفر لكم رسول الله لووا رءوسهم ورايتهم يصدون وهم مستكبرون
translation_en_yusufali: When it is said to them, “Come! The Messenger of Allah will pray for you to be forgiven,” they turn their heads ˹in disgust˺, and you see them ˹O Prophet˺ turn away in arrogance.

text_simple: سواء عليهم استغفرت لهم ام لم تستغفر لهم لن يغفر الله لهم ان الله لا يهدي القوم الفاسقين
translation_en_yusufali: It is the same whether you pray for their forgiveness or not, Allah will not forgive them. Surely Allah does not guide the rebellious people.

text_simple: هم الذين يقولون لا تنفقوا على من عند رسول الله حتى ينفضوا ولله خزائن السماوات والارض ولكن المنافقين لا يفقهون
translation_en_yusufali: They are the ones who say ˹to one another˺, “Do not spend ˹anything˺ on those ˹emigrants˺ with the Messenger of Allah so that they will break away ˹from him˺.” But to Allah ˹alone˺ belong the treasuries of the heavens and the earth, yet the hypocrites do not comprehend.

text_simple: يقولون لئن رجعنا الى المدينة ليخرجن الاعز منها الاذل ولله العزة ولرسوله وللمؤمنين ولكن المنافقين لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: They say, “If we return to Medina, the honourable will definitely expel the inferior.” But all honour and power belongs to Allah, His Messenger, and the believers, yet the hypocrites do not know.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا لا تلهكم اموالكم ولا اولادكم عن ذكر الله ومن يفعل ذلك فاولئك هم الخاسرون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Do not let your wealth or your children divert you from the remembrance of Allah. For whoever does so, it is they who are the ˹true˺ losers.

text_simple: وانفقوا من ما رزقناكم من قبل ان ياتي احدكم الموت فيقول رب لولا اخرتني الى اجل قريب فاصدق واكن من الصالحين
translation_en_yusufali: And donate from what We have provided for you before death comes to one of you, and you cry, “My Lord! If only You delayed me for a short while, I would give in charity and be one of the righteous.”

text_simple: ولن يؤخر الله نفسا اذا جاء اجلها والله خبير بما تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: But Allah never delays a soul when its appointed time comes. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: يسبح لله ما في السماوات وما في الارض له الملك وله الحمد وهو على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: Whatever is in the heavens and whatever is on the earth ˹constantly˺ glorifies Allah. The kingdom is His, and all praise is for Him. For He is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: هو الذي خلقكم فمنكم كافر ومنكم مؤمن والله بما تعملون بصير
