translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who created you, yet some of you are disbelievers while some are believers. And Allah is All-Seeing of what you do.

text_simple: خلق السماوات والارض بالحق وصوركم فاحسن صوركم واليه المصير
translation_en_yusufali: He created the heavens and the earth for a purpose. He shaped you ˹in the womb˺, perfecting your form. And to Him is the final return.

text_simple: يعلم ما في السماوات والارض ويعلم ما تسرون وما تعلنون والله عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: He knows whatever is in the heavens and the earth. And He knows whatever you conceal and whatever you reveal. For Allah knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: الم ياتكم نبا الذين كفروا من قبل فذاقوا وبال امرهم ولهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Have the stories of those who disbelieved before not reached you ˹pagans˺? They tasted the evil consequences of their doings, and they will suffer a painful punishment.

text_simple: ذلك بانه كانت تاتيهم رسلهم بالبينات فقالوا ابشر يهدوننا فكفروا وتولوا واستغنى الله والله غني حميد
translation_en_yusufali: That was because their messengers used to come to them with clear proofs, but they said ˹mockingly˺, “How can humans be our guides?” So they persisted in disbelief and turned away. And Allah was not in need ˹of their faith˺. For Allah is Self-Sufficient, Praiseworthy.

text_simple: زعم الذين كفروا ان لن يبعثوا قل بلى وربي لتبعثن ثم لتنبؤن بما عملتم وذلك على الله يسير
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers claim they will not be resurrected. Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Yes, by my Lord, you will surely be resurrected, then you will certainly be informed of what you have done. And that is easy for Allah.”

text_simple: فامنوا بالله ورسوله والنور الذي انزلنا والله بما تعملون خبير
translation_en_yusufali: So believe in Allah and His Messenger and in the Light We have revealed. And Allah is All-Aware of what you do.

text_simple: يوم يجمعكم ليوم الجمع ذلك يوم التغابن ومن يؤمن بالله ويعمل صالحا يكفر عنه سيئاته ويدخله جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها ابدا ذلك الفوز العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider˺ the Day He will gather you ˹all˺ for the Day of Gathering—that will be the Day of mutual loss and gain. So whoever believes in Allah and does good, He will absolve them of their sins and admit them into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. That is the ultimate triumph.

text_simple: والذين كفروا وكذبوا باياتنا اولئك اصحاب النار خالدين فيها وبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who disbelieve and reject Our revelations, they will be the residents of the Fire, staying there forever. What an evil destination!

text_simple: ما اصاب من مصيبة الا باذن الله ومن يؤمن بالله يهد قلبه والله بكل شيء عليم
translation_en_yusufali: No calamity befalls ˹anyone˺ except by Allah’s Will. And whoever has faith in Allah, He will ˹rightly˺ guide their hearts ˹through adversity˺. And Allah has ˹perfect˺ knowledge of all things.

text_simple: واطيعوا الله واطيعوا الرسول فان توليتم فانما على رسولنا البلاغ المبين
translation_en_yusufali: Obey Allah and obey the Messenger! But if you turn away, then Our Messenger’s duty is only to deliver ˹the message˺ clearly.

text_simple: الله لا اله الا هو وعلى الله فليتوكل المؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: Allah—there is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him. So in Allah let the believers put their trust.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا ان من ازواجكم واولادكم عدوا لكم فاحذروهم وان تعفوا وتصفحوا وتغفروا فان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Indeed, some of your spouses and children are enemies to you, so beware of them. But if you pardon, overlook, and forgive ˹their faults˺, then Allah is truly All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: انما اموالكم واولادكم فتنة والله عنده اجر عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: Your wealth and children are only a test, but Allah ˹alone˺ has a great reward.

text_simple: فاتقوا الله ما استطعتم واسمعوا واطيعوا وانفقوا خيرا لانفسكم ومن يوق شح نفسه فاولئك هم المفلحون
translation_en_yusufali: So be mindful of Allah to the best of your ability, hear and obey, and spend in charity—that will be best for you. And whoever is saved from the selfishness of their own souls, it is they who are ˹truly˺ successful.

text_simple: ان تقرضوا الله قرضا حسنا يضاعفه لكم ويغفر لكم والله شكور حليم
translation_en_yusufali: If you lend to Allah a good loan, He will multiply it for you and forgive you. For Allah is Most Appreciative, Most Forbearing.

text_simple: عالم الغيب والشهادة العزيز الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the seen and unseen—the Almighty, All-Wise.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي اذا طلقتم النساء فطلقوهن لعدتهن واحصوا العدة واتقوا الله ربكم لا تخرجوهن من بيوتهن ولا يخرجن الا ان ياتين بفاحشة مبينة وتلك حدود الله ومن يتعد حدود الله فقد ظلم نفسه لا تدري لعل الله يحدث بعد ذلك امرا
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! ˹Instruct the believers:˺ When you ˹intend to˺ divorce women, then divorce them with concern for their waiting period, and count it accurately. And fear Allah, your Lord. Do not force them out of their homes, nor should they leave—unless they commit a blatant misconduct. These are the limits set by Allah. And whoever transgresses Allah’s limits has truly wronged his own soul. You never know, perhaps Allah will bring about a change ˹of heart˺ later.

text_simple: فاذا بلغن اجلهن فامسكوهن بمعروف او فارقوهن بمعروف واشهدوا ذوي عدل منكم واقيموا الشهادة لله ذلكم يوعظ به من كان يؤمن بالله واليوم الاخر ومن يتق الله يجعل له مخرجا
translation_en_yusufali: Then when they have ˹almost˺ reached the end of their waiting period, either retain them honourably or separate from them honourably. And call two of your reliable men to witness ˹either way˺—and ˹let the witnesses˺ bear true testimony for ˹the sake of˺ Allah. This is enjoined on whoever has faith in Allah and the Last Day. And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make a way out for them

text_simple: ويرزقه من حيث لا يحتسب ومن يتوكل على الله فهو حسبه ان الله بالغ امره قد جعل الله لكل شيء قدرا
translation_en_yusufali: and provide for them from sources they could never imagine. And whoever puts their trust in Allah, then He ˹alone˺ is sufficient for them. Certainly Allah achieves His Will. Allah has already set a destiny for everything.

text_simple: واللائي يئسن من المحيض من نسائكم ان ارتبتم فعدتهن ثلاثة اشهر واللائي لم يحضن واولات الاحمال اجلهن ان يضعن حملهن ومن يتق الله يجعل له من امره يسرا
translation_en_yusufali: As for your women past the age of menstruation, in case you do not know, their waiting period is three months, and those who have not menstruated as well. As for those who are pregnant, their waiting period ends with delivery. And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will make their matters easy for them.

text_simple: ذلك امر الله انزله اليكم ومن يتق الله يكفر عنه سيئاته ويعظم له اجرا
translation_en_yusufali: This is the commandment of Allah, which He has revealed to you. And whoever is mindful of Allah, He will absolve them of their sins and reward them immensely.

text_simple: اسكنوهن من حيث سكنتم من وجدكم ولا تضاروهن لتضيقوا عليهن وان كن اولات حمل فانفقوا عليهن حتى يضعن حملهن فان ارضعن لكم فاتوهن اجورهن واتمروا بينكم بمعروف وان تعاسرتم فسترضع له اخرى
translation_en_yusufali: Let them live where you live ˹during their waiting period˺, according to your means. And do not harass them to make their stay unbearable. If they are pregnant, then maintain them until they deliver. And if they nurse your child, compensate them, and consult together courteously. But if you fail to reach an agreement, then another woman will nurse ˹the child˺ for the father.

text_simple: لينفق ذو سعة من سعته ومن قدر عليه رزقه فلينفق مما اتاه الله لا يكلف الله نفسا الا ما اتاها سيجعل الله بعد عسر يسرا
translation_en_yusufali: Let the man of wealth provide according to his means. As for the one with limited resources, let him provide according to whatever Allah has given him. Allah does not require of any soul beyond what He has given it. After hardship, Allah will bring about ease.

text_simple: وكاين من قرية عتت عن امر ربها ورسله فحاسبناها حسابا شديدا وعذبناها عذابا نكرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Imagine˺ how many societies rebelled against the commandments of their Lord and His messengers, so We called each ˹society˺ to a severe account and subjected them to a horrible punishment.

text_simple: فذاقت وبال امرها وكان عاقبة امرها خسرا
translation_en_yusufali: So they tasted the evil consequences of their doings, and the outcome of their doings was ˹total˺ loss.

text_simple: اعد الله لهم عذابا شديدا فاتقوا الله يا اولي الالباب الذين امنوا قد انزل الله اليكم ذكرا
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has ˹also˺ prepared for them a severe punishment. So fear Allah, O  people of reason and faith. Allah has indeed revealed to you a Reminder

text_simple: رسولا يتلو عليكم ايات الله مبينات ليخرج الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات من الظلمات الى النور ومن يؤمن بالله ويعمل صالحا يدخله جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها ابدا قد احسن الله له رزقا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹and sent˺ a messenger reciting to you Allah’s revelations, making things clear so that He may bring those who believe and do good out of darkness and into light. And whoever believes in Allah and does good will be admitted by Him into Gardens under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah will have indeed granted them an excellent provision.

text_simple: الله الذي خلق سبع سماوات ومن الارض مثلهن يتنزل الامر بينهن لتعلموا ان الله على كل شيء قدير وان الله قد احاط بكل شيء علما
translation_en_yusufali: Allah is the One Who created seven heavens ˹in layers˺, and likewise for the earth. The ˹divine˺ command descends between them so you may know that Allah is Most Capable of everything and that Allah certainly encompasses all things in ˹His˺ knowledge.

text_simple: يا ايها النبي لم تحرم ما احل الله لك تبتغي مرضات ازواجك والله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! Why do you prohibit ˹yourself˺ from what Allah has made lawful to you, seeking to please your wives? And Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: قد فرض الله لكم تحلة ايمانكم والله مولاكم وهو العليم الحكيم
translation_en_yusufali: Allah has already ordained for you ˹believers˺ the way to absolve yourselves from your oaths. For Allah is your Guardian. And He is the All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: واذ اسر النبي الى بعض ازواجه حديثا فلما نبات به واظهره الله عليه عرف بعضه واعرض عن بعض فلما نباها به قالت من انباك هذا قال نباني العليم الخبير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Remember˺ when the Prophet had ˹once˺ confided something to one of his wives, then when she disclosed it ˹to another wife˺ and Allah made it known to him, he presented ˹to her˺ part of what was disclosed and overlooked a part. So when he informed her of it, she exclaimed, “Who told you this?” He replied, “I was informed by the All-Knowing, All-Aware.”

text_simple: ان تتوبا الى الله فقد صغت قلوبكما وان تظاهرا عليه فان الله هو مولاه وجبريل وصالح المؤمنين والملائكة بعد ذلك ظهير
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be better˺ if you ˹wives˺ both turn to Allah in repentance, for your hearts have certainly faltered. But if you ˹continue to˺ collaborate against him, then ˹know that˺ Allah Himself is his Guardian. And Gabriel, the righteous believers, and the angels are ˹all˺ his supporters as well.

text_simple: عسى ربه ان طلقكن ان يبدله ازواجا خيرا منكن مسلمات مؤمنات قانتات تائبات عابدات سائحات ثيبات وابكارا
translation_en_yusufali: Perhaps, if he were to divorce you ˹all˺, his Lord would replace you with better wives who are submissive ˹to Allah˺, faithful ˹to Him˺, devout, repentant, dedicated to worship and fasting—previously married or virgins.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا قوا انفسكم واهليكم نارا وقودها الناس والحجارة عليها ملائكة غلاظ شداد لا يعصون الله ما امرهم ويفعلون ما يؤمرون
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Protect yourselves and your families from a Fire whose fuel is people and stones, overseen by formidable and severe angels, who never disobey whatever Allah orders—always doing as commanded.

text_simple: يا ايها الذين كفروا لا تعتذروا اليوم انما تجزون ما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The deniers will then be told,˺ “O disbelievers! Make no excuses this Day! You are only rewarded for what you used to do.”

text_simple: يا ايها الذين امنوا توبوا الى الله توبة نصوحا عسى ربكم ان يكفر عنكم سيئاتكم ويدخلكم جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار يوم لا يخزي الله النبي والذين امنوا معه نورهم يسعى بين ايديهم وبايمانهم يقولون ربنا اتمم لنا نورنا واغفر لنا انك على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: O believers! Turn to Allah in sincere repentance, so your Lord may absolve you of your sins and admit you into Gardens, under which rivers flow, on the Day Allah will not disgrace the Prophet or the believers with him. Their light will shine ahead of them and on their right. They will say, “Our Lord! Perfect our light for us, and forgive us. ˹For˺ You are truly Most Capable of everything.”

text_simple: يا ايها النبي جاهد الكفار والمنافقين واغلظ عليهم وماواهم جهنم وبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: O Prophet! Struggle against the disbelievers and the hypocrites, and be firm with them. Hell will be their home. What an evil destination!

text_simple: ضرب الله مثلا للذين كفروا امرات نوح وامرات لوط كانتا تحت عبدين من عبادنا صالحين فخانتاهما فلم يغنيا عنهما من الله شيئا وقيل ادخلا النار مع الداخلين
translation_en_yusufali: Allah sets forth an example for the disbelievers: the wife of Noah and the wife of Lot. Each was married to one of Our righteous servants, yet betrayed them. So their husbands were of no benefit to them against Allah whatsoever. Both were told, “Enter the Fire, along with the others!”

text_simple: وضرب الله مثلا للذين امنوا امرات فرعون اذ قالت رب ابن لي عندك بيتا في الجنة ونجني من فرعون وعمله ونجني من القوم الظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah sets forth an example for the believers: the wife of Pharaoh, who prayed, “My Lord! Build me a house in Paradise near You, deliver me from Pharaoh and his ˹evil˺ doing, and save me from the wrongdoing people.”

text_simple: ومريم ابنت عمران التي احصنت فرجها فنفخنا فيه من روحنا وصدقت بكلمات ربها وكتبه وكانت من القانتين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹There is˺ also ˹the example of˺ Mary, the daughter of ’Imrân, who guarded her chastity, so We breathed into her ˹womb˺ through Our angel ˹Gabriel˺. She testified to the words of her Lord and His Scriptures, and was one of the ˹sincerely˺ devout.

text_simple: تبارك الذي بيده الملك وهو على كل شيء قدير
translation_en_yusufali: Blessed is the One in Whose Hands rests all authority. And He is Most Capable of everything.

text_simple: الذي خلق الموت والحياة ليبلوكم ايكم احسن عملا وهو العزيز الغفور
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the One˺ Who created death and life in order to test which of you is best in deeds. And He is the Almighty, All-Forgiving.

text_simple: الذي خلق سبع سماوات طباقا ما ترى في خلق الرحمن من تفاوت فارجع البصر هل ترى من فطور
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the One˺ Who created seven heavens, one above the other. You will never see any imperfection in the creation of the Most Compassionate. So look again: do you see any flaws?

text_simple: ثم ارجع البصر كرتين ينقلب اليك البصر خاسئا وهو حسير
translation_en_yusufali: Then look again and again—your sight will return frustrated and weary.

text_simple: ولقد زينا السماء الدنيا بمصابيح وجعلناها رجوما للشياطين واعتدنا لهم عذاب السعير
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, We adorned the lowest heaven with ˹stars like˺ lamps, and made them ˹as missiles˺ for stoning ˹eavesdropping˺ devils, for whom We have also prepared the torment of the Blaze.

text_simple: وللذين كفروا بربهم عذاب جهنم وبئس المصير
translation_en_yusufali: Those who disbelieve in their Lord will suffer the punishment of Hell. What an evil destination!

text_simple: اذا القوا فيها سمعوا لها شهيقا وهي تفور
translation_en_yusufali: When they are tossed into it, they will hear its roaring as it boils over

text_simple: تكاد تميز من الغيظ كلما القي فيها فوج سالهم خزنتها الم ياتكم نذير
translation_en_yusufali: almost bursting in fury. Every time a group is cast into it, its keepers will ask them, “Did a warner not come to you?”

text_simple: قالوا بلى قد جاءنا نذير فكذبنا وقلنا ما نزل الله من شيء ان انتم الا في ضلال كبير
translation_en_yusufali: They will reply, “Yes, a warner did come to us, but we denied and said, ‘Allah has revealed nothing. You are extremely astray.’”

text_simple: وقالوا لو كنا نسمع او نعقل ما كنا في اصحاب السعير
translation_en_yusufali: And they will lament, “If only we had listened and reasoned, we would not be among the residents of the Blaze!”

text_simple: فاعترفوا بذنبهم فسحقا لاصحاب السعير
translation_en_yusufali: And so they will confess their sins. So away with the residents of the Blaze!

text_simple: ان الذين يخشون ربهم بالغيب لهم مغفرة واجر كبير
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those in awe of their Lord without seeing Him will have forgiveness and a mighty reward.

text_simple: واسروا قولكم او اجهروا به انه عليم بذات الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: Whether you speak secretly or openly—He surely knows best what is ˹hidden˺ in the heart.

text_simple: الا يعلم من خلق وهو اللطيف الخبير
translation_en_yusufali: How could He not know His Own creation? For He ˹alone˺ is the Most Subtle, All-Aware.

text_simple: هو الذي جعل لكم الارض ذلولا فامشوا في مناكبها وكلوا من رزقه واليه النشور
translation_en_yusufali: He is the One Who smoothed out the earth for you, so move about in its regions and eat from His provisions. And to Him is the resurrection ˹of all˺.

text_simple: اامنتم من في السماء ان يخسف بكم الارض فاذا هي تمور
translation_en_yusufali: Do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not cause the earth to swallow you up as it quakes violently?

text_simple: ام امنتم من في السماء ان يرسل عليكم حاصبا فستعلمون كيف نذير
translation_en_yusufali: Or do you feel secure that the One Who is in heaven will not unleash upon you a storm of stones. Only then would you know how ˹serious˺ My warning was!

text_simple: ولقد كذب الذين من قبلهم فكيف كان نكير
translation_en_yusufali: And certainly those before them denied ˹as well˺, then how severe was My response!

text_simple: اولم يروا الى الطير فوقهم صافات ويقبضن ما يمسكهن الا الرحمن انه بكل شيء بصير
translation_en_yusufali: Have they not seen the birds above them, spreading and folding their wings? None holds them up except the Most Compassionate. Indeed, He is All-Seeing of everything.

text_simple: امن هذا الذي هو جند لكم ينصركم من دون الرحمن ان الكافرون الا في غرور
translation_en_yusufali: Also, which ˹powerless˺ force will come to your help instead of the Most Compassionate? Indeed, the disbelievers are only ˹lost˺ in delusion.

text_simple: امن هذا الذي يرزقكم ان امسك رزقه بل لجوا في عتو ونفور
translation_en_yusufali: Or who is it that will provide for you if He withholds His provision? In fact, they persist in arrogance and aversion ˹to the truth˺.

text_simple: افمن يمشي مكبا على وجهه اهدى امن يمشي سويا على صراط مستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: Who is ˹rightly˺ guided: the one who crawls facedown or the one who walks upright on the Straight Path?

text_simple: قل هو الذي انشاكم وجعل لكم السمع والابصار والافئدة قليلا ما تشكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is the One Who brought you into being and gave you hearing, sight, and intellect. ˹Yet˺ you hardly give any thanks.”

text_simple: قل هو الذي ذراكم في الارض واليه تحشرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Also˺ say, “He is the One Who has dispersed you ˹all˺ over the earth, and to Him you will ˹all˺ be gathered.”

text_simple: ويقولون متى هذا الوعد ان كنتم صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Still˺ they ask ˹the believers˺, “When will this threat come to pass, if what you say is true?”

text_simple: قل انما العلم عند الله وانما انا نذير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “That knowledge is with Allah alone, and I am only sent with a clear warning.”

text_simple: فلما راوه زلفة سيئت وجوه الذين كفروا وقيل هذا الذي كنتم به تدعون
translation_en_yusufali: Then when they see the torment drawing near, the faces of the disbelievers will become gloomy, and it will be said ˹to them˺, “This is what you claimed would never come.”

text_simple: قل ارايتم ان اهلكني الله ومن معي او رحمنا فمن يجير الكافرين من عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “Consider this: whether Allah causes me and those with me to die or shows us mercy, who will save the disbelievers from a painful punishment?”

text_simple: قل هو الرحمن امنا به وعليه توكلنا فستعلمون من هو في ضلال مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “He is the Most Compassionate—in Him ˹alone˺ we believe, and in Him ˹alone˺ we trust. You will soon know who is clearly astray.”

text_simple: قل ارايتم ان اصبح ماؤكم غورا فمن ياتيكم بماء معين
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “Consider this: if your water were to sink ˹into the earth˺, then who ˹else˺ could bring you flowing water?”

text_simple: ن والقلم وما يسطرون
translation_en_yusufali: Nũn. By the pen and what everyone writes!

text_simple: ما انت بنعمة ربك بمجنون
translation_en_yusufali: By the grace of your Lord, you ˹O Prophet˺ are not insane.

text_simple: وان لك لاجرا غير ممنون
translation_en_yusufali: You will certainly have a never-ending reward.

text_simple: وانك لعلى خلق عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: And you are truly ˹a man˺ of outstanding character.

text_simple: فستبصر ويبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Soon you and the pagans will see

text_simple: باييكم المفتون
translation_en_yusufali: which of you is mad.

text_simple: ان ربك هو اعلم بمن ضل عن سبيله وهو اعلم بالمهتدين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely your Lord ˹alone˺ knows best who has strayed from His Way and who is ˹rightly˺ guided.

text_simple: فلا تطع المكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: So do not give in to the deniers.

text_simple: ودوا لو تدهن فيدهنون
translation_en_yusufali: They wish you would compromise so they would yield ˹to you˺.

text_simple: ولا تطع كل حلاف مهين
translation_en_yusufali: And do not obey the despicable, vain oath-taker

text_simple: هماز مشاء بنميم
translation_en_yusufali: slanderer, gossip-monger

text_simple: مناع للخير معتد اثيم
translation_en_yusufali: withholder of good, transgressor, evildoer

text_simple: عتل بعد ذلك زنيم
translation_en_yusufali: brute, and—on top of all that—an illegitimate child.

text_simple: ان كان ذا مال وبنين
translation_en_yusufali: Now, ˹simply˺ because he has been blessed with ˹abundant˺ wealth and children

text_simple: اذا تتلى عليه اياتنا قال اساطير الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: whenever Our revelations are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables!”

text_simple: سنسمه على الخرطوم
translation_en_yusufali: We will soon mark his snout.

text_simple: انا بلوناهم كما بلونا اصحاب الجنة اذ اقسموا ليصرمنها مصبحين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have tested those ˹Meccans˺ as We tested the owners of the garden—when they swore they would surely harvest ˹all˺ its fruit in the early morning

text_simple: ولا يستثنون
translation_en_yusufali: leaving no thought for Allah’s Will.

text_simple: فطاف عليها طائف من ربك وهم نائمون
translation_en_yusufali: Then it was struck by a torment from your Lord while they slept

text_simple: فاصبحت كالصريم
translation_en_yusufali: so it was reduced to ashes.

text_simple: فتنادوا مصبحين
translation_en_yusufali: Then by daybreak they called out to each other

text_simple: ان اغدوا على حرثكم ان كنتم صارمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹saying,˺ “Go early to your harvest, if you want to pick ˹all˺ the fruit.”

text_simple: فانطلقوا وهم يتخافتون
translation_en_yusufali: So they went off, whispering to one another

text_simple: ان لا يدخلنها اليوم عليكم مسكين
translation_en_yusufali: “Do not let any poor person enter your garden today.”

text_simple: وغدوا على حرد قادرين
translation_en_yusufali: And they proceeded early, totally fixated on their purpose.

text_simple: فلما راوها قالوا انا لضالون
translation_en_yusufali: But when they saw it ˹devastated˺, they cried, “We must have lost ˹our˺ way!

text_simple: بل نحن محرومون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, we have been deprived ˹of our livelihood˺.”

text_simple: قال اوسطهم الم اقل لكم لولا تسبحون
translation_en_yusufali: The most sensible of them said, “Did I not urge you to say, ‘Allah willing.’?”

text_simple: قالوا سبحان ربنا انا كنا ظالمين
translation_en_yusufali: They replied, “Glory be to our Lord! We have truly been wrongdoers.”

text_simple: فاقبل بعضهم على بعض يتلاومون
translation_en_yusufali: Then they turned on each other, throwing blame.

text_simple: قالوا يا ويلنا انا كنا طاغين
translation_en_yusufali: They said, “Woe to us! We have certainly been transgressors.

text_simple: عسى ربنا ان يبدلنا خيرا منها انا الى ربنا راغبون
translation_en_yusufali: We trust our Lord will give us a better garden than this, ˹for˺ we are indeed turning to our Lord with hope.”

text_simple: كذلك العذاب ولعذاب الاخرة اكبر لو كانوا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: That is the ˹way of Our˺ punishment ˹in this world˺. But the punishment of the Hereafter is certainly far worse, if only they knew.

text_simple: ان للمتقين عند ربهم جنات النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will have the Gardens of Bliss with their Lord.

text_simple: افنجعل المسلمين كالمجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: Should We then treat those who have submitted like the wicked?

text_simple: ما لكم كيف تحكمون
translation_en_yusufali: What is the matter with you? How do you judge?

text_simple: ام لكم كتاب فيه تدرسون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do you have a scripture, in which you read

text_simple: ان لكم فيه لما تخيرون
translation_en_yusufali: that you will have whatever you choose?

text_simple: ام لكم ايمان علينا بالغة الى يوم القيامة ان لكم لما تحكمون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do you have oaths binding on Us until the Day of Judgment that you will have whatever you decide?

text_simple: سلهم ايهم بذلك زعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Ask them ˹O Prophet˺ which of them can guarantee all that.

text_simple: ام لهم شركاء فلياتوا بشركائهم ان كانوا صادقين
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they have associate-gods ˹supporting this claim˺? Then let them bring forth their associate-gods, if what they say is true.

text_simple: يوم يكشف عن ساق ويدعون الى السجود فلا يستطيعون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Beware of˺ the Day the Shin ˹of Allah˺ will be bared, and the wicked will be asked to prostrate, but they will not be able to do so

text_simple: خاشعة ابصارهم ترهقهم ذلة وقد كانوا يدعون الى السجود وهم سالمون
translation_en_yusufali: with eyes downcast, totally covered with disgrace. For they were ˹always˺ called to prostrate ˹in the world˺ when they were fully capable ˹but they chose not to˺.

text_simple: فذرني ومن يكذب بهذا الحديث سنستدرجهم من حيث لا يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: So leave to Me ˹O Prophet˺ those who reject this message. We will gradually draw them to destruction in ways they cannot comprehend.

text_simple: واملي لهم ان كيدي متين
translation_en_yusufali: I ˹only˺ delay their end for a while, but My planning is flawless.

text_simple: ام تسالهم اجرا فهم من مغرم مثقلون
translation_en_yusufali: Or are you asking them for a reward ˹for the message˺ so that they are overburdened by debt?

text_simple: ام عندهم الغيب فهم يكتبون
translation_en_yusufali: Or do they have access to ˹the Record in˺ the unseen, so they copy it ˹for all to see˺?

text_simple: فاصبر لحكم ربك ولا تكن كصاحب الحوت اذ نادى وهو مكظوم
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not be like ˹Jonah,˺ the Man of the Whale, who cried out ˹to Allah˺, in total distress.

text_simple: لولا ان تداركه نعمة من ربه لنبذ بالعراء وهو مذموم
translation_en_yusufali: Had he not been shown grace by his Lord, he would have certainly been cast onto the open ˹shore˺, still blameworthy.

text_simple: فاجتباه ربه فجعله من الصالحين
translation_en_yusufali: Then his Lord chose him, making him one of the righteous.

text_simple: وان يكاد الذين كفروا ليزلقونك بابصارهم لما سمعوا الذكر ويقولون انه لمجنون
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers would almost cut you down with their eyes when they hear ˹you recite˺ the Reminder, and say, “He is certainly a madman.”

text_simple: وما هو الا ذكر للعالمين
translation_en_yusufali: But it is simply a reminder to the whole world.

text_simple: الحاقة
translation_en_yusufali: The Inevitable Hour!

text_simple: ما الحاقة
translation_en_yusufali: What is the Inevitable Hour?

text_simple: وما ادراك ما الحاقة
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what the Inevitable Hour is?

text_simple: كذبت ثمود وعاد بالقارعة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Both˺ Thamûd and ’Ȃd denied the Striking Disaster.

text_simple: فاما ثمود فاهلكوا بالطاغية
translation_en_yusufali: As for Thamûd, they were destroyed by an overwhelming blast.

text_simple: واما عاد فاهلكوا بريح صرصر عاتية
translation_en_yusufali: And as for ’Ȃd, they were destroyed by a furious, bitter wind

text_simple: سخرها عليهم سبع ليال وثمانية ايام حسوما فترى القوم فيها صرعى كانهم اعجاز نخل خاوية
translation_en_yusufali: which Allah unleashed on them non-stop for seven nights and eight days, so that you would have seen its people lying dead like trunks of uprooted palm trees.

text_simple: فهل ترى لهم من باقية
translation_en_yusufali: Do you see any of them left alive?

text_simple: وجاء فرعون ومن قبله والمؤتفكات بالخاطئة
translation_en_yusufali: Also, Pharaoh and those before him, and ˹the people of˺ the overturned cities ˹of Lot˺ indulged in sin

text_simple: فعصوا رسول ربهم فاخذهم اخذة رابية
translation_en_yusufali: each disobeying their Lord’s messenger, so He seized them with a crushing grip.

text_simple: انا لما طغى الماء حملناكم في الجارية
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, when the floodwater had overflowed, We carried you in the floating Ark ˹with Noah˺

text_simple: لنجعلها لكم تذكرة وتعيها اذن واعية
translation_en_yusufali: so that We may make this a reminder to you, and that attentive ears may grasp it.

text_simple: فاذا نفخ في الصور نفخة واحدة
translation_en_yusufali: At last, when the Trumpet will be blown with one blast

text_simple: وحملت الارض والجبال فدكتا دكة واحدة
translation_en_yusufali: and the earth and mountains will be lifted up and crushed with one blow

text_simple: فيومئذ وقعت الواقعة
translation_en_yusufali: on that Day the Inevitable Event will have come to pass.

text_simple: وانشقت السماء فهي يومئذ واهية
translation_en_yusufali: The sky will then be so torn that it will be frail

text_simple: والملك على ارجائها ويحمل عرش ربك فوقهم يومئذ ثمانية
translation_en_yusufali: with the angels on its sides. On that Day eight ˹mighty angels˺ will bear the Throne of your Lord above them.

text_simple: يومئذ تعرضون لا تخفى منكم خافية
translation_en_yusufali: You will then be presented ˹before Him for judgment˺, and none of your secrets will stay hidden.

text_simple: فاما من اوتي كتابه بيمينه فيقول هاؤم اقرءوا كتابيه
translation_en_yusufali: As for those given their records in their right hand, they will cry ˹happily˺, “Here ˹everyone˺! Read my record!

text_simple: اني ظننت اني ملاق حسابيه
translation_en_yusufali: I surely knew I would face my reckoning.”

text_simple: فهو في عيشة راضية
translation_en_yusufali: They will be in a life of bliss

text_simple: في جنة عالية
translation_en_yusufali: in an elevated Garden

text_simple: قطوفها دانية
translation_en_yusufali: whose fruit will hang within reach.

text_simple: كلوا واشربوا هنيئا بما اسلفتم في الايام الخالية
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink joyfully for what you did in the days gone by.”

text_simple: واما من اوتي كتابه بشماله فيقول يا ليتني لم اوت كتابيه
translation_en_yusufali: And as for those given their record in their left hand, they will cry ˹bitterly˺, “I wish I had not been given my record

text_simple: ولم ادر ما حسابيه
translation_en_yusufali: nor known anything of my reckoning!

text_simple: يا ليتها كانت القاضية
translation_en_yusufali: I wish death was the end!

text_simple: ما اغنى عني ماليه
translation_en_yusufali: My wealth has not benefited me!

text_simple: هلك عني سلطانيه
translation_en_yusufali: My authority has been stripped from me.”

text_simple: خذوه فغلوه
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It will be said,˺ “Seize and shackle them

text_simple: ثم الجحيم صلوه
translation_en_yusufali: then burn them in Hell

text_simple: ثم في سلسلة ذرعها سبعون ذراعا فاسلكوه
translation_en_yusufali: then tie them up with chains seventy arms long.

text_simple: انه كان لا يؤمن بالله العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: For they never had faith in Allah, the Greatest

text_simple: ولا يحض على طعام المسكين
translation_en_yusufali: nor encouraged the feeding of the poor.

text_simple: فليس له اليوم هاهنا حميم
translation_en_yusufali: So this Day they will have no close friend here

text_simple: ولا طعام الا من غسلين
translation_en_yusufali: nor any food except ˹oozing˺ pus

text_simple: لا ياكله الا الخاطئون
translation_en_yusufali: which none will eat except the evildoers.”

text_simple: فلا اقسم بما تبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: Now, I do swear by whatever you see

text_simple: وما لا تبصرون
translation_en_yusufali: and whatever you cannot see!

text_simple: انه لقول رسول كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the recitation of a noble Messenger.

text_simple: وما هو بقول شاعر قليلا ما تؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: It is not the prose of a poet ˹as you claim˺, ˹yet˺ you hardly have any faith.

text_simple: ولا بقول كاهن قليلا ما تذكرون
translation_en_yusufali: Nor is it the mumbling of a fortune-teller, ˹yet˺ you are hardly mindful.

text_simple: تنزيل من رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ a revelation from the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: ولو تقول علينا بعض الاقاويل
translation_en_yusufali: Had the Messenger made up something in Our Name

text_simple: لاخذنا منه باليمين
translation_en_yusufali: We would have certainly seized him by his right hand

text_simple: ثم لقطعنا منه الوتين
translation_en_yusufali: then severed his aorta

text_simple: فما منكم من احد عنه حاجزين
translation_en_yusufali: and none of you could have shielded him ˹from Us˺!

text_simple: وانه لتذكرة للمتقين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder to those mindful ˹of Allah˺.

text_simple: وانا لنعلم ان منكم مكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: And We certainly know that some of you will persist in denial

text_simple: وانه لحسرة على الكافرين
translation_en_yusufali: and it will surely be a source of regret for the disbelievers.

text_simple: وانه لحق اليقين
translation_en_yusufali: And indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the absolute truth.

text_simple: فسبح باسم ربك العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: So glorify the Name of your Lord, the Greatest.

text_simple: سال سائل بعذاب واقع
translation_en_yusufali: A challenger has demanded a punishment bound to come

text_simple: للكافرين ليس له دافع
translation_en_yusufali: for the disbelievers—to be averted by none—

text_simple: من الله ذي المعارج
translation_en_yusufali: from Allah, Lord of pathways of ˹heavenly˺ ascent

text_simple: تعرج الملائكة والروح اليه في يوم كان مقداره خمسين الف سنة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹through which˺ the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit will ascend to Him on a Day fifty thousand years in length.

text_simple: فاصبر صبرا جميلا
translation_en_yusufali: So endure ˹this denial, O  Prophet,˺ with beautiful patience.

text_simple: انهم يرونه بعيدا
translation_en_yusufali: They truly see this ˹Day˺ as impossible

text_simple: ونراه قريبا
translation_en_yusufali: but We see it as inevitable.

text_simple: يوم تكون السماء كالمهل
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day the sky will be like molten brass

text_simple: وتكون الجبال كالعهن
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains like ˹tufts of˺ wool.

text_simple: ولا يسال حميم حميما
translation_en_yusufali: And no close friend will ask ˹about˺ their friends

text_simple: يبصرونهم يود المجرم لو يفتدي من عذاب يومئذ ببنيه
translation_en_yusufali: ˹although˺ they will be made to see each other. The wicked will wish to ransom themselves from the punishment of that Day by their children

text_simple: وصاحبته واخيه
translation_en_yusufali: their spouses, their siblings

text_simple: وفصيلته التي تؤويه
translation_en_yusufali: their clan that sheltered them

text_simple: ومن في الارض جميعا ثم ينجيه
translation_en_yusufali: and everyone on earth altogether, just to save themselves.

text_simple: كلا انها لظى
translation_en_yusufali: But no! There will certainly be a raging Flame

text_simple: نزاعة للشوى
translation_en_yusufali: ripping off scalps.

text_simple: تدعو من ادبر وتولى
translation_en_yusufali: It will summon whoever turned their backs ˹on Allah˺ and turned away ˹from the truth˺

text_simple: وجمع فاوعى
translation_en_yusufali: and gathered and hoarded ˹wealth˺.

text_simple: ان الانسان خلق هلوعا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, humankind was created impatient:

text_simple: اذا مسه الشر جزوعا
translation_en_yusufali: distressed when touched with evil

text_simple: واذا مسه الخير منوعا
translation_en_yusufali: and withholding when touched with good—

text_simple: الا المصلين
translation_en_yusufali: except those who pray

text_simple: الذين هم على صلاتهم دائمون
translation_en_yusufali: consistently performing their prayers;

text_simple: والذين في اموالهم حق معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: and who give the rightful share of their wealth

text_simple: للسائل والمحروم
translation_en_yusufali: to the beggar and the poor;

text_simple: والذين يصدقون بيوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: and who ˹firmly˺ believe in the Day of Judgment;

text_simple: والذين هم من عذاب ربهم مشفقون
translation_en_yusufali: and those who fear the punishment of their Lord—

text_simple: ان عذاب ربهم غير مامون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹knowing that˺ none should feel secure from their Lord’s punishment—

text_simple: والذين هم لفروجهم حافظون
translation_en_yusufali: and those who guard their chastity

text_simple: الا على ازواجهم او ما ملكت ايمانهم فانهم غير ملومين
translation_en_yusufali: except with their wives or those ˹bondwomen˺ in their possession, for then they are free from blame

text_simple: فمن ابتغى وراء ذلك فاولئك هم العادون
translation_en_yusufali: but whoever seeks beyond that are the transgressors.

text_simple: والذين هم لاماناتهم وعهدهم راعون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The faithful are˺ also those who are true to their trusts and covenants;

text_simple: والذين هم بشهاداتهم قائمون
translation_en_yusufali: and who are honest in their testimony;

text_simple: والذين هم على صلاتهم يحافظون
translation_en_yusufali: and who are ˹properly˺ observant of their prayers.

text_simple: اولئك في جنات مكرمون
translation_en_yusufali: These will be in Gardens, held in honour.

text_simple: فمال الذين كفروا قبلك مهطعين
translation_en_yusufali: So what is the matter with the disbelievers that they rush ˹head-long˺ towards you ˹O Prophet˺

text_simple: عن اليمين وعن الشمال عزين
translation_en_yusufali: from the right and the left, in groups ˹to mock you˺?

text_simple: ايطمع كل امرئ منهم ان يدخل جنة نعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Does every one of them expect to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?

text_simple: كلا انا خلقناهم مما يعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: But no! Indeed, they ˹already˺ know what We created them from.

text_simple: فلا اقسم برب المشارق والمغارب انا لقادرون
translation_en_yusufali: So, I do swear by the Lord of ˹all˺ the points of sunrise and sunset that We are truly capable

text_simple: على ان نبدل خيرا منهم وما نحن بمسبوقين
translation_en_yusufali: of replacing them with ˹others˺ better than them, and We cannot be prevented ˹from doing so˺.

text_simple: فذرهم يخوضوا ويلعبوا حتى يلاقوا يومهم الذي يوعدون
translation_en_yusufali: So let them indulge ˹in falsehood˺ and amuse ˹themselves˺ until they face their Day, which they have been threatened with—

text_simple: يوم يخرجون من الاجداث سراعا كانهم الى نصب يوفضون
translation_en_yusufali: the Day they will come forth from the graves swiftly, as if racing to an idol ˹for a blessing˺

text_simple: خاشعة ابصارهم ترهقهم ذلة ذلك اليوم الذي كانوا يوعدون
translation_en_yusufali: with eyes downcast, utterly covered with disgrace. That is the Day they have ˹always˺ been warned of.

text_simple: انا ارسلنا نوحا الى قومه ان انذر قومك من قبل ان ياتيهم عذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people ˹saying to him˺, “Warn your people before a painful punishment comes to them.”

text_simple: قال يا قوم اني لكم نذير مبين
translation_en_yusufali: Noah proclaimed, “O my people! I am truly sent to you with a clear warning:

text_simple: ان اعبدوا الله واتقوه واطيعون
translation_en_yusufali: worship Allah ˹alone˺, fear Him, and obey me.

text_simple: يغفر لكم من ذنوبكم ويؤخركم الى اجل مسمى ان اجل الله اذا جاء لا يؤخر لو كنتم تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: He will forgive your sins, and delay your end until the appointed time. Indeed, when the time set by Allah comes, it cannot be delayed, if only you knew!”

text_simple: قال رب اني دعوت قومي ليلا ونهارا
translation_en_yusufali: He cried, “My Lord! I have surely called my people day and night

text_simple: فلم يزدهم دعائي الا فرارا
translation_en_yusufali: but my calls only made them run farther away.

text_simple: واني كلما دعوتهم لتغفر لهم جعلوا اصابعهم في اذانهم واستغشوا ثيابهم واصروا واستكبروا استكبارا
translation_en_yusufali: And whenever I invite them to be forgiven by You, they press their fingers into their ears, cover themselves with their clothes, persist ˹in denial˺, and act very arrogantly.

text_simple: ثم اني دعوتهم جهارا
translation_en_yusufali: Then I certainly called them openly

text_simple: ثم اني اعلنت لهم واسررت لهم اسرارا
translation_en_yusufali: then I surely preached to them publicly and privately

text_simple: فقلت استغفروا ربكم انه كان غفارا
translation_en_yusufali: saying, ‘Seek your Lord’s forgiveness, ˹for˺ He is truly Most Forgiving.

text_simple: يرسل السماء عليكم مدرارا
translation_en_yusufali: He will shower you with abundant rain

text_simple: ويمددكم باموال وبنين ويجعل لكم جنات ويجعل لكم انهارا
translation_en_yusufali: supply you with wealth and children, and give you gardens as well as rivers.

text_simple: ما لكم لا ترجون لله وقارا
translation_en_yusufali: What is the matter with you that you are not in awe of the Majesty of Allah

text_simple: وقد خلقكم اطوارا
translation_en_yusufali: when He truly created you in stages ˹of development˺?

text_simple: الم تروا كيف خلق الله سبع سماوات طباقا
translation_en_yusufali: Do you not see how Allah created seven heavens, one above the other

text_simple: وجعل القمر فيهن نورا وجعل الشمس سراجا
translation_en_yusufali: placing the moon within them as a ˹reflected˺ light, and the sun as a ˹radiant˺ lamp?

text_simple: والله انبتكم من الارض نباتا
translation_en_yusufali: Allah ˹alone˺ caused you to grow from the earth like a plant.

text_simple: ثم يعيدكم فيها ويخرجكم اخراجا
translation_en_yusufali: Then He will return you to it, and then simply bring you forth ˹again˺.

text_simple: والله جعل لكم الارض بساطا
translation_en_yusufali: And Allah ˹alone˺ spread out the earth for you

text_simple: لتسلكوا منها سبلا فجاجا
translation_en_yusufali: to walk along its spacious pathways.’”

text_simple: قال نوح رب انهم عصوني واتبعوا من لم يزده ماله وولده الا خسارا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Eventually,˺ Noah cried, “My Lord! They have certainly persisted in disobeying me, and followed ˹instead˺ those ˹elite˺ whose ˹abundant˺ wealth and children only increase them in loss

text_simple: ومكروا مكرا كبارا
translation_en_yusufali: and who have devised a tremendous plot

text_simple: وقالوا لا تذرن الهتكم ولا تذرن ودا ولا سواعا ولا يغوث ويعوق ونسرا
translation_en_yusufali: urging ˹their followers˺, ‘Do not abandon your idols—especially Wadd, Suwâ’, Yaghûth, Ya’ûq, and Nasr.’

text_simple: وقد اضلوا كثيرا ولا تزد الظالمين الا ضلالا
translation_en_yusufali: Those ˹elite˺ have already led many astray. So ˹O Lord˺, only allow the wrongdoers to stray farther away.”

text_simple: مما خطيئاتهم اغرقوا فادخلوا نارا فلم يجدوا لهم من دون الله انصارا
translation_en_yusufali: So because of their sins, they were drowned, then admitted into the Fire. And they found none to help them against Allah.

text_simple: وقال نوح رب لا تذر على الارض من الكافرين ديارا
translation_en_yusufali: Noah had prayed, “My Lord! Do not leave a single disbeliever on earth.

text_simple: انك ان تذرهم يضلوا عبادك ولا يلدوا الا فاجرا كفارا
translation_en_yusufali: For if You spare ˹any of˺ them, they will certainly mislead Your servants, and give birth only to ˹wicked˺ sinners, staunch disbelievers.

text_simple: رب اغفر لي ولوالدي ولمن دخل بيتي مؤمنا وللمؤمنين والمؤمنات ولا تزد الظالمين الا تبارا
translation_en_yusufali: My Lord! Forgive me, my parents, and whoever enters my house in faith, and ˹all˺ believing men and women. And increase the wrongdoers only in destruction.”

text_simple: قل اوحي الي انه استمع نفر من الجن فقالوا انا سمعنا قرانا عجبا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “It has been revealed to me that a group of jinn listened ˹to the Quran,˺ and said ˹to their fellow jinn˺: ‘Indeed, we have heard a wondrous recitation.

text_simple: يهدي الى الرشد فامنا به ولن نشرك بربنا احدا
translation_en_yusufali: It leads to Right Guidance so we believed in it, and we will never associate anyone with our Lord ˹in worship˺.

text_simple: وانه تعالى جد ربنا ما اتخذ صاحبة ولا ولدا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Now, we believe that˺ our Lord—Exalted is His Majesty—has neither taken a mate nor offspring

text_simple: وانه كان يقول سفيهنا على الله شططا
translation_en_yusufali: and that the foolish of us used to utter ˹outrageous˺ falsehoods about Allah.

text_simple: وانا ظننا ان لن تقول الانس والجن على الله كذبا
translation_en_yusufali: We certainly thought that humans and jinn would never speak lies about Allah.

text_simple: وانه كان رجال من الانس يعوذون برجال من الجن فزادوهم رهقا
translation_en_yusufali: And some men used to seek refuge with some jinn—so they increased each other in wickedness.

text_simple: وانهم ظنوا كما ظننتم ان لن يبعث الله احدا
translation_en_yusufali: And those ˹humans˺ thought, just like you ˹jinn˺, that Allah would not resurrect anyone ˹for judgment˺.

text_simple: وانا لمسنا السماء فوجدناها ملئت حرسا شديدا وشهبا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Earlier˺ we tried to reach heaven ˹for news˺, only to find it filled with stern guards and shooting stars.

text_simple: وانا كنا نقعد منها مقاعد للسمع فمن يستمع الان يجد له شهابا رصدا
translation_en_yusufali: We used to take up positions there for eavesdropping, but whoever dares eavesdrop now will find a flare lying in wait for them.

text_simple: وانا لا ندري اشر اريد بمن في الارض ام اراد بهم ربهم رشدا
translation_en_yusufali: Now, we have no clue whether evil is intended for those on earth, or their Lord intends for them what is right.

text_simple: وانا منا الصالحون ومنا دون ذلك كنا طرائق قددا
translation_en_yusufali: Among us are those who are righteous and those who are less so. We have been of different factions.

text_simple: وانا ظننا ان لن نعجز الله في الارض ولن نعجزه هربا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Now,˺ we truly know that we cannot frustrate Allah on earth, nor can we escape from Him ˹into heaven˺.

text_simple: وانا لما سمعنا الهدى امنا به فمن يؤمن بربه فلا يخاف بخسا ولا رهقا
translation_en_yusufali: When we heard the guidance ˹of the Quran˺, we ˹readily˺ believed in it. For whoever believes in their Lord will have no fear of being denied ˹a reward˺ or wronged.

text_simple: وانا منا المسلمون ومنا القاسطون فمن اسلم فاولئك تحروا رشدا
translation_en_yusufali: And among us are those who have submitted ˹to Allah˺ and those who are deviant. So ˹as for˺ those who submitted, it is they who have attained Right Guidance.

text_simple: واما القاسطون فكانوا لجهنم حطبا
translation_en_yusufali: And as for the deviant, they will be fuel for Hell.’”

text_simple: وان لو استقاموا على الطريقة لاسقيناهم ماء غدقا
translation_en_yusufali: Had the deniers followed the Right Way, We would have certainly granted them abundant rain to drink—

text_simple: لنفتنهم فيه ومن يعرض عن ذكر ربه يسلكه عذابا صعدا
translation_en_yusufali: as a test for them. And whoever turns away from the remembrance of their Lord will be admitted by Him into an overwhelming punishment.

text_simple: وان المساجد لله فلا تدعوا مع الله احدا
translation_en_yusufali: The places of worship are ˹only˺ for Allah, so do not invoke anyone besides Him.

text_simple: وانه لما قام عبد الله يدعوه كادوا يكونون عليه لبدا
translation_en_yusufali: Yet when the servant of Allah stood up calling upon Him ˹alone˺, the pagans almost swarmed over him.

text_simple: قل انما ادعو ربي ولا اشرك به احدا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I call only upon my Lord, associating none with Him ˹in worship˺.”

text_simple: قل اني لا املك لكم ضرا ولا رشدا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “It is not in my power to harm or benefit you.”

text_simple: قل اني لن يجيرني من الله احد ولن اجد من دونه ملتحدا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “No one can protect me from Allah ˹if I were to disobey Him˺, nor can I find any refuge other than Him.

text_simple: الا بلاغا من الله ورسالاته ومن يعص الله ورسوله فان له نار جهنم خالدين فيها ابدا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹My duty is˺ only to convey ˹the truth˺ from Allah and ˹deliver˺ His messages.” And whoever disobeys Allah and His Messenger will certainly be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there for ever and ever.

text_simple: حتى اذا راوا ما يوعدون فسيعلمون من اضعف ناصرا واقل عددا
translation_en_yusufali: Only when they see what they have been threatened with will they know who is weaker in helpers and inferior in manpower.

text_simple: قل ان ادري اقريب ما توعدون ام يجعل له ربي امدا
translation_en_yusufali: Say, “I do not know if what you are promised is near or my Lord has set a distant time for it.

text_simple: عالم الغيب فلا يظهر على غيبه احدا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the˺ Knower of the unseen, disclosing none of it to anyone

text_simple: الا من ارتضى من رسول فانه يسلك من بين يديه ومن خلفه رصدا
translation_en_yusufali: except messengers of His choice. Then He appoints angel-guards before and behind them

text_simple: ليعلم ان قد ابلغوا رسالات ربهم واحاط بما لديهم واحصى كل شيء عددا
translation_en_yusufali: to ensure that the messengers fully deliver the messages of their Lord—though He ˹already˺ knows all about them, and keeps account of everything.”

text_simple: يا ايها المزمل
translation_en_yusufali: O you wrapped ˹in your clothes˺!

text_simple: قم الليل الا قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: Stand all night ˹in prayer˺ except a little—

text_simple: نصفه او انقص منه قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹pray˺ half the night, or a little less

text_simple: او زد عليه ورتل القران ترتيلا
translation_en_yusufali: or a little more—and recite the Quran ˹properly˺ in a measured way.

text_simple: انا سنلقي عليك قولا ثقيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ We will soon send upon you a weighty revelation.

text_simple: ان ناشئة الليل هي اشد وطئا واقوم قيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, worship in the night is more impactful and suitable for recitation.

text_simple: ان لك في النهار سبحا طويلا
translation_en_yusufali: For during the day you are over-occupied ˹with worldly duties˺.

text_simple: واذكر اسم ربك وتبتل اليه تبتيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord, and devote yourself to Him wholeheartedly.

text_simple: رب المشرق والمغرب لا اله الا هو فاتخذه وكيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹He is the˺ Lord of the east and the west. There is no god ˹worthy of worship˺ except Him, so take Him ˹alone˺ as a Trustee of Affairs.

text_simple: واصبر على ما يقولون واهجرهم هجرا جميلا
translation_en_yusufali: Be patient ˹O Prophet˺ with what they say, and depart from them courteously.

text_simple: وذرني والمكذبين اولي النعمة ومهلهم قليلا
translation_en_yusufali: And leave to Me the deniers—the people of luxury—and bear with them for a little while.

text_simple: ان لدينا انكالا وجحيما
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ We certainly have shackles, a ˹raging˺ Fire

text_simple: وطعاما ذا غصة وعذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: choking food, and a painful punishment ˹in store for them˺

text_simple: يوم ترجف الارض والجبال وكانت الجبال كثيبا مهيلا
translation_en_yusufali: on the Day the earth and mountains will shake ˹violently˺, and mountains will be ˹reduced to˺ dunes of shifting sand.

text_simple: انا ارسلنا اليكم رسولا شاهدا عليكم كما ارسلنا الى فرعون رسولا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have sent to you a messenger as a witness over you, just as We sent a messenger to Pharaoh.

text_simple: فعصى فرعون الرسول فاخذناه اخذا وبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: But Pharaoh disobeyed the messenger, so We seized him with a stern grip.

text_simple: فكيف تتقون ان كفرتم يوما يجعل الولدان شيبا
translation_en_yusufali: If you ˹pagans˺ persist in disbelief, then how will you guard yourselves against ˹the horrors of˺ a Day which will turn children’s hair grey?

text_simple: السماء منفطر به كان وعده مفعولا
translation_en_yusufali: It will ˹even˺ cause the sky to split apart. His promise ˹of judgment˺ must be fulfilled.

text_simple: ان هذه تذكرة فمن شاء اتخذ الى ربه سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.

text_simple: ان ربك يعلم انك تقوم ادنى من ثلثي الليل ونصفه وثلثه وطائفة من الذين معك والله يقدر الليل والنهار علم ان لن تحصوه فتاب عليكم فاقرءوا ما تيسر من القران علم ان سيكون منكم مرضى واخرون يضربون في الارض يبتغون من فضل الله واخرون يقاتلون في سبيل الله فاقرءوا ما تيسر منه واقيموا الصلاة واتوا الزكاة واقرضوا الله قرضا حسنا وما تقدموا لانفسكم من خير تجدوه عند الله هو خيرا واعظم اجرا واستغفروا الله ان الله غفور رحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely your Lord knows that you ˹O Prophet˺ stand ˹in prayer˺ for nearly two-thirds of the night, or ˹sometimes˺ half of it, or a third, as do some of those with you. Allah ˹alone˺ keeps a ˹precise˺ measure of the day and night. He knows that you ˹believers˺ are unable to endure this, and has turned to you in mercy. So recite ˹in prayer˺ whatever you can from the Quran. He knows that some of you will be sick, some will be travelling throughout the land seeking Allah’s bounty, and some fighting in the cause of Allah. So recite whatever you can from it. And ˹continue to˺ perform ˹regular˺ prayers, pay alms-tax, and lend to Allah a good loan. Whatever good you send forth for yourselves, you will find it with Allah far better and more rewarding. And seek Allah’s forgiveness. Surely Allah is All-Forgiving, Most Merciful.

text_simple: يا ايها المدثر
translation_en_yusufali: O you covered up ˹in your clothes˺!

text_simple: قم فانذر
translation_en_yusufali: Arise and warn ˹all˺.

text_simple: وربك فكبر
translation_en_yusufali: Revere your Lord ˹alone˺.

text_simple: وثيابك فطهر
translation_en_yusufali: Purify your garments.

text_simple: والرجز فاهجر
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Continue to˺ shun idols.

text_simple: ولا تمنن تستكثر
translation_en_yusufali: Do not do a favour expecting more ˹in return˺.

text_simple: ولربك فاصبر
translation_en_yusufali: And persevere for ˹the sake of˺ your Lord.

text_simple: فاذا نقر في الناقور
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ when the Trumpet will be sounded

text_simple: فذلك يومئذ يوم عسير
translation_en_yusufali: that will ˹truly˺ be a difficult Day—

text_simple: على الكافرين غير يسير
translation_en_yusufali: far from easy for the disbelievers.

text_simple: ذرني ومن خلقت وحيدا
translation_en_yusufali: And leave to me ˹O Prophet˺ the one I created all by Myself

text_simple: وجعلت له مالا ممدودا
translation_en_yusufali: and granted him abundant wealth

text_simple: وبنين شهودا
translation_en_yusufali: and children always by his side

text_simple: ومهدت له تمهيدا
translation_en_yusufali: and made life very easy for him.

text_simple: ثم يطمع ان ازيد
translation_en_yusufali: Yet he is hungry for more.

text_simple: كلا انه كان لاياتنا عنيدا
translation_en_yusufali: But no! ˹For˺ he has been truly stubborn with Our revelations.

text_simple: سارهقه صعودا
translation_en_yusufali: I will make his fate unbearable

text_simple: انه فكر وقدر
translation_en_yusufali: for he contemplated and determined ˹a degrading label for the Quran˺.

text_simple: فقتل كيف قدر
translation_en_yusufali: May he be condemned! How evil was what he determined!

text_simple: ثم قتل كيف قدر
translation_en_yusufali: May he be condemned even more! How evil was what he determined!

text_simple: ثم نظر
translation_en_yusufali: Then he re-contemplated ˹in frustration˺

text_simple: ثم عبس وبسر
translation_en_yusufali: then frowned and scowled

text_simple: ثم ادبر واستكبر
translation_en_yusufali: then turned his back ˹on the truth˺ and acted arrogantly

text_simple: فقال ان هذا الا سحر يؤثر
translation_en_yusufali: saying, “This ˹Quran˺ is nothing but magic from the ancients.

text_simple: ان هذا الا قول البشر
translation_en_yusufali: This is no more than the word of a man.”

text_simple: ساصليه سقر
translation_en_yusufali: Soon I will burn him in Hell!

text_simple: وما ادراك ما سقر
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what Hell is?

text_simple: لا تبقي ولا تذر
translation_en_yusufali: It does not let anyone live or die

text_simple: لواحة للبشر
translation_en_yusufali: scorching the skin.

text_simple: عليها تسعة عشر
translation_en_yusufali: It is overseen by nineteen ˹keepers˺.

text_simple: وما جعلنا اصحاب النار الا ملائكة وما جعلنا عدتهم الا فتنة للذين كفروا ليستيقن الذين اوتوا الكتاب ويزداد الذين امنوا ايمانا ولا يرتاب الذين اوتوا الكتاب والمؤمنون وليقول الذين في قلوبهم مرض والكافرون ماذا اراد الله بهذا مثلا كذلك يضل الله من يشاء ويهدي من يشاء وما يعلم جنود ربك الا هو وما هي الا ذكرى للبشر
translation_en_yusufali: We have appointed only ˹stern˺ angels as wardens of the Fire. And We have made their number only as a test for the disbelievers, so that the People of the Book will be certain, and the believers will increase in faith, and neither the People of the Book nor the believers will have any doubts, and so that those ˹hypocrites˺ with sickness in their hearts and the disbelievers will argue, “What does Allah mean by such a number?” In this way Allah leaves whoever He wills to stray and guides whoever He wills. And none knows the forces of your Lord except He. And this ˹description of Hell˺ is only a reminder to humanity.

text_simple: كلا والقمر
translation_en_yusufali: But no! By the moon

text_simple: والليل اذ ادبر
translation_en_yusufali: and the night as it retreats

text_simple: والصبح اذا اسفر
translation_en_yusufali: and the day as it breaks!

text_simple: انها لاحدى الكبر
translation_en_yusufali: Surely Hell is one of the mightiest catastrophes—

text_simple: نذيرا للبشر
translation_en_yusufali: a warning to humankind

text_simple: لمن شاء منكم ان يتقدم او يتاخر
translation_en_yusufali: to whichever of you chooses to take the lead or lag behind.

text_simple: كل نفس بما كسبت رهينة
translation_en_yusufali: Every soul will be detained for what it has done

text_simple: الا اصحاب اليمين
translation_en_yusufali: except the people of the right

text_simple: في جنات يتساءلون
translation_en_yusufali: who will be in Gardens, asking one another

text_simple: عن المجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: about the wicked ˹who will then be asked˺:

text_simple: ما سلككم في سقر
translation_en_yusufali: “What has landed you in Hell?”

text_simple: قالوا لم نك من المصلين
translation_en_yusufali: They will reply, “We were not of those who prayed

text_simple: ولم نك نطعم المسكين
translation_en_yusufali: nor did we feed the poor.

text_simple: وكنا نخوض مع الخائضين
translation_en_yusufali: We used to indulge ˹in falsehood˺ along with others

text_simple: وكنا نكذب بيوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: and deny the Day of Judgment

text_simple: حتى اتانا اليقين
translation_en_yusufali: until the inevitable came to us.”

text_simple: فما تنفعهم شفاعة الشافعين
translation_en_yusufali: So the pleas of intercessors will be of no benefit to them.

text_simple: فما لهم عن التذكرة معرضين
translation_en_yusufali: Now, what is the matter with them that they are turning away from the reminder

text_simple: كانهم حمر مستنفرة
translation_en_yusufali: as if they were spooked zebras

text_simple: فرت من قسورة
translation_en_yusufali: fleeing from a lion?

text_simple: بل يريد كل امرئ منهم ان يؤتى صحفا منشرة
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, each one of them wishes to be given a ˹personal˺ letter ˹from Allah˺ for all ˹to read˺.

text_simple: كلا بل لا يخافون الاخرة
translation_en_yusufali: But no! In fact, they do not fear the Hereafter.

text_simple: كلا انه تذكرة
translation_en_yusufali: Enough! Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a reminder.

text_simple: فمن شاء ذكره
translation_en_yusufali: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

text_simple: وما يذكرون الا ان يشاء الله هو اهل التقوى واهل المغفرة
translation_en_yusufali: But they cannot do so unless Allah wills. He ˹alone˺ is worthy to be feared and entitled to forgive.

text_simple: لا اقسم بيوم القيامة
translation_en_yusufali: I do swear by the Day of Judgment!

text_simple: ولا اقسم بالنفس اللوامة
translation_en_yusufali: And I do swear by the self-reproaching soul!

text_simple: ايحسب الانسان الن نجمع عظامه
translation_en_yusufali: Do people think We cannot reassemble their bones?

text_simple: بلى قادرين على ان نسوي بنانه
translation_en_yusufali: Yes ˹indeed˺! We are ˹most˺ capable of restoring ˹even˺ their very fingertips.

text_simple: بل يريد الانسان ليفجر امامه
translation_en_yusufali: Still people want to deny what is yet to come

text_simple: يسال ايان يوم القيامة
translation_en_yusufali: asking ˹mockingly˺, “When is this Day of Judgment?”

text_simple: فاذا برق البصر
translation_en_yusufali: But when the sight is stunned

text_simple: وخسف القمر
translation_en_yusufali: and the moon is dimmed

text_simple: وجمع الشمس والقمر
translation_en_yusufali: and the sun and the moon are brought together

text_simple: يقول الانسان يومئذ اين المفر
translation_en_yusufali: on that Day one will cry, “Where is the escape?”

text_simple: كلا لا وزر
translation_en_yusufali: But no! There will be no refuge.

text_simple: الى ربك يومئذ المستقر
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day all will end up before your Lord.

text_simple: ينبا الانسان يومئذ بما قدم واخر
translation_en_yusufali: All will then be informed of what they have sent forth and left behind.

text_simple: بل الانسان على نفسه بصيرة
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, people will testify against their own souls

text_simple: ولو القى معاذيره
translation_en_yusufali: despite the excuses they come up with.

text_simple: لا تحرك به لسانك لتعجل به
translation_en_yusufali: Do not rush your tongue trying to memorize ˹a revelation of˺ the Quran.

text_simple: ان علينا جمعه وقرانه
translation_en_yusufali: It is certainly upon Us to ˹make you˺ memorize and recite it.

text_simple: فاذا قراناه فاتبع قرانه
translation_en_yusufali: So once We have recited a revelation ˹through Gabriel˺, follow its recitation ˹closely˺.

text_simple: ثم ان علينا بيانه
translation_en_yusufali: Then it is surely upon Us to make it clear ˹to you˺.

text_simple: كلا بل تحبون العاجلة
translation_en_yusufali: But no! In fact, you love this fleeting world

text_simple: وتذرون الاخرة
translation_en_yusufali: and neglect the Hereafter.

text_simple: وجوه يومئذ ناضرة
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright

text_simple: الى ربها ناظرة
translation_en_yusufali: looking at their Lord.

text_simple: ووجوه يومئذ باسرة
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹other˺ faces will be gloomy

text_simple: تظن ان يفعل بها فاقرة
translation_en_yusufali: anticipating something devastating to befall them.

text_simple: كلا اذا بلغت التراقي
translation_en_yusufali: But no! ˹Beware of the day˺ when the soul reaches the collar bone ˹as it leaves˺

text_simple: وقيل من راق
translation_en_yusufali: and it will be said, “Is there any healer ˹who can save this life˺?”

text_simple: وظن انه الفراق
translation_en_yusufali: And the dying person realizes it is ˹their˺ time to depart

text_simple: والتفت الساق بالساق
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹then˺ their feet are tied together ˹in a shroud˺.

text_simple: الى ربك يومئذ المساق
translation_en_yusufali: On that day they will be driven to your Lord ˹alone˺.

text_simple: فلا صدق ولا صلى
translation_en_yusufali: This denier neither believed nor prayed

text_simple: ولكن كذب وتولى
translation_en_yusufali: but persisted in denial and turned away

text_simple: ثم ذهب الى اهله يتمطى
translation_en_yusufali: then went to their own people, walking boastfully.

text_simple: اولى لك فاولى
translation_en_yusufali: Woe to you, and more woe!

text_simple: ثم اولى لك فاولى
translation_en_yusufali: Again, woe to you, and even more woe!

text_simple: ايحسب الانسان ان يترك سدى
translation_en_yusufali: Do people think they will be left without purpose?

text_simple: الم يك نطفة من مني يمنى
translation_en_yusufali: Were they not ˹once˺ a sperm-drop emitted?

text_simple: ثم كان علقة فخلق فسوى
translation_en_yusufali: Then they became a clinging clot ˹of blood˺, then He developed and perfected their form

text_simple: فجعل منه الزوجين الذكر والانثى
translation_en_yusufali: producing from it both sexes, male and female.

text_simple: اليس ذلك بقادر على ان يحيي الموتى
translation_en_yusufali: Is such ˹a Creator˺ unable to bring the dead back to life?

text_simple: هل اتى على الانسان حين من الدهر لم يكن شيئا مذكورا
translation_en_yusufali: Is there not a period of time when each human is nothing yet worth mentioning?

text_simple: انا خلقنا الانسان من نطفة امشاج نبتليه فجعلناه سميعا بصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ indeed, We ˹alone˺ created humans from a drop of mixed fluids, ˹in order˺ to test them, so We made them hear and see.

text_simple: انا هديناه السبيل اما شاكرا واما كفورا
translation_en_yusufali: We already showed them the Way, whether they ˹choose to˺ be grateful or ungrateful.

text_simple: انا اعتدنا للكافرين سلاسل واغلالا وسعيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have prepared for the disbelievers chains, shackles, and a blazing Fire.

text_simple: ان الابرار يشربون من كاس كان مزاجها كافورا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the virtuous will have a drink ˹of pure wine˺—flavoured with camphor—

text_simple: عينا يشرب بها عباد الله يفجرونها تفجيرا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹from˺ a spring where Allah’s servants will drink, flowing at their will.

text_simple: يوفون بالنذر ويخافون يوما كان شره مستطيرا
translation_en_yusufali: They ˹are those who˺ fulfil ˹their˺ vows and fear a Day of sweeping horror

text_simple: ويطعمون الطعام على حبه مسكينا ويتيما واسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: and give food—despite their desire for it—to the poor, the orphan, and the captive

text_simple: انما نطعمكم لوجه الله لا نريد منكم جزاء ولا شكورا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹saying to themselves,˺ “We feed you only for the sake of Allah, seeking neither reward nor thanks from you.

text_simple: انا نخاف من ربنا يوما عبوسا قمطريرا
translation_en_yusufali: We fear from our Lord a horribly distressful Day.”

text_simple: فوقاهم الله شر ذلك اليوم ولقاهم نضرة وسرورا
translation_en_yusufali: So Allah will deliver them from the horror of that Day, and grant them radiance and joy

text_simple: وجزاهم بما صبروا جنة وحريرا
translation_en_yusufali: and reward them for their perseverance with a Garden ˹in Paradise˺ and ˹garments of˺ silk.

text_simple: متكئين فيها على الارائك لا يرون فيها شمسا ولا زمهريرا
translation_en_yusufali: There they will be reclining on ˹canopied˺ couches, never seeing scorching heat or bitter cold.

text_simple: ودانية عليهم ظلالها وذللت قطوفها تذليلا
translation_en_yusufali: The Garden’s shade will be right above them, and its fruit will be made very easy to reach.

text_simple: ويطاف عليهم بانية من فضة واكواب كانت قواريرا
translation_en_yusufali: They will be waited on with silver vessels and cups of crystal—

text_simple: قوارير من فضة قدروها تقديرا
translation_en_yusufali: crystalline silver, filled precisely as desired.

text_simple: ويسقون فيها كاسا كان مزاجها زنجبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: And they will be given a drink ˹of pure wine˺ flavoured with ginger

text_simple: عينا فيها تسمى سلسبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: from a spring there, called Salsabîl.

text_simple: ويطوف عليهم ولدان مخلدون اذا رايتهم حسبتهم لؤلؤا منثورا
translation_en_yusufali: They will be waited on by eternal youths. If you saw them, you would think they were scattered pearls.

text_simple: واذا رايت ثم رايت نعيما وملكا كبيرا
translation_en_yusufali: And if you looked around, you would see ˹indescribable˺ bliss and a vast kingdom.

text_simple: عاليهم ثياب سندس خضر واستبرق وحلوا اساور من فضة وسقاهم ربهم شرابا طهورا
translation_en_yusufali: The virtuous will be ˹dressed˺ in garments of fine green silk and rich brocade, and adorned with bracelets of silver, and their Lord will give them a purifying drink.

text_simple: ان هذا كان لكم جزاء وكان سعيكم مشكورا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹And they will be told,˺ “All this is surely a reward for you. Your striving has been appreciated.”

text_simple: انا نحن نزلنا عليك القران تنزيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, it is We Who have revealed the Quran to you ˹O Prophet˺ in stages.

text_simple: فاصبر لحكم ربك ولا تطع منهم اثما او كفورا
translation_en_yusufali: So be patient with your Lord’s decree, and do not yield to any evildoer or ˹staunch˺ disbeliever from among them.

text_simple: واذكر اسم ربك بكرة واصيلا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Always˺ remember the Name of your Lord morning and evening

text_simple: ومن الليل فاسجد له وسبحه ليلا طويلا
translation_en_yusufali: and prostrate before Him during part of the night, and glorify Him long at night.

text_simple: ان هؤلاء يحبون العاجلة ويذرون وراءهم يوما ثقيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those ˹pagans˺ love this fleeting world, ˹totally˺ neglecting a weighty Day ahead of them.

text_simple: نحن خلقناهم وشددنا اسرهم واذا شئنا بدلنا امثالهم تبديلا
translation_en_yusufali: It is We Who created them and perfected their ˹physical˺ form. But if We will, We can easily replace them with others.

text_simple: ان هذه تذكرة فمن شاء اتخذ الى ربه سبيلا
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this is a reminder. So let whoever wills take the ˹Right˺ Way to their Lord.

text_simple: وما تشاءون الا ان يشاء الله ان الله كان عليما حكيما
translation_en_yusufali: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺ unless Allah wills. Indeed, Allah is All-Knowing, All-Wise.

text_simple: يدخل من يشاء في رحمته والظالمين اعد لهم عذابا اليما
translation_en_yusufali: He admits whoever He wills into His mercy. As for the wrongdoers, He has prepared for them a painful punishment

text_simple: والمرسلات عرفا
translation_en_yusufali: By those ˹winds˺ sent forth successively

text_simple: فالعاصفات عصفا
translation_en_yusufali: and those blowing violently

text_simple: والناشرات نشرا
translation_en_yusufali: and those scattering ˹rainclouds˺ widely!

text_simple: فالفارقات فرقا
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹by˺ those ˹angels˺ fully distinguishing ˹truth from falsehood˺

text_simple: فالملقيات ذكرا
translation_en_yusufali: and those delivering revelation

text_simple: عذرا او نذرا
translation_en_yusufali: ending excuses and giving warnings.

text_simple: انما توعدون لواقع
translation_en_yusufali: Surely, what you are promised will come to pass.

text_simple: فاذا النجوم طمست
translation_en_yusufali: So when the stars are put out

text_simple: واذا السماء فرجت
translation_en_yusufali: and the sky is torn apart

text_simple: واذا الجبال نسفت
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains are blown away

text_simple: واذا الرسل اقتت
translation_en_yusufali: and the messengers’ time ˹to testify˺ comes up—

text_simple: لاي يوم اجلت
translation_en_yusufali: for which Day has all this been set?

text_simple: ليوم الفصل
translation_en_yusufali: For the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision!

text_simple: وما ادراك ما يوم الفصل
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what the Day of Decision is?

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: الم نهلك الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: Did We not destroy earlier disbelievers?

text_simple: ثم نتبعهم الاخرين
translation_en_yusufali: And We will make the later disbelievers follow them.

text_simple: كذلك نفعل بالمجرمين
translation_en_yusufali: This is how We deal with the wicked.

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: الم نخلقكم من ماء مهين
translation_en_yusufali: Did We not create you from a humble fluid

text_simple: فجعلناه في قرار مكين
translation_en_yusufali: placing it in a secure place

text_simple: الى قدر معلوم
translation_en_yusufali: until an appointed time?

text_simple: فقدرنا فنعم القادرون
translation_en_yusufali: We ˹perfectly˺ ordained ˹its development˺. How excellent are We in doing so!

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: الم نجعل الارض كفاتا
translation_en_yusufali: Have We not made the earth a lodging

text_simple: احياء وامواتا
translation_en_yusufali: for the living and the dead

text_simple: وجعلنا فيها رواسي شامخات واسقيناكم ماء فراتا
translation_en_yusufali: and placed upon it towering, firm mountains, and given you fresh water to drink?

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: انطلقوا الى ما كنتم به تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The disbelievers will be told,˺ “Proceed into that ˹Fire˺ which you used to deny!

text_simple: انطلقوا الى ظل ذي ثلاث شعب
translation_en_yusufali: Proceed into the shade ˹of smoke˺ which rises in three columns

text_simple: لا ظليل ولا يغني من اللهب
translation_en_yusufali: providing neither coolness nor shelter from the flames.

text_simple: انها ترمي بشرر كالقصر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, it hurls sparks ˹as big˺ as huge castles

text_simple: كانه جمالت صفر
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹as dark˺ as black camels.”

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: هذا يوم لا ينطقون
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day they will not ˹be in a position to˺ speak

text_simple: ولا يؤذن لهم فيعتذرون
translation_en_yusufali: nor will they be permitted to offer excuses.

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: هذا يوم الفصل جمعناكم والاولين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told by Allah,˺ “This is the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision: We have gathered you along with earlier disbelievers ˹for punishment˺.

text_simple: فان كان لكم كيد فكيدون
translation_en_yusufali: So if you have a scheme ˹to save yourselves˺, then use it against Me.”

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: ان المتقين في ظلال وعيون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will be amid ˹cool˺ shade and springs

text_simple: وفواكه مما يشتهون
translation_en_yusufali: and any fruit they desire.

text_simple: كلوا واشربوا هنيئا بما كنتم تعملون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They will be told,˺ “Eat and drink happily for what you used to do.”

text_simple: انا كذلك نجزي المحسنين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this is how We reward the good-doers.

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: كلوا وتمتعوا قليلا انكم مجرمون
translation_en_yusufali: “Eat and enjoy yourselves for a little while, ˹for˺ you are truly wicked.”

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: واذا قيل لهم اركعوا لا يركعون
translation_en_yusufali: When it is said to them, “Bow down ˹before Allah,” they do not bow.

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers!

text_simple: فباي حديث بعده يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: So what message after this ˹Quran˺ would they believe in?

text_simple: عم يتساءلون
translation_en_yusufali: What are they asking one another about?

text_simple: عن النبا العظيم
translation_en_yusufali: About the momentous news

text_simple: الذي هم فيه مختلفون
translation_en_yusufali: over which they disagree.

text_simple: كلا سيعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: But no! They will come to know.

text_simple: ثم كلا سيعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Again, no! They will come to know.

text_simple: الم نجعل الارض مهادا
translation_en_yusufali: Have We not smoothed out the earth ˹like a bed˺

text_simple: والجبال اوتادا
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹made˺ the mountains as ˹its˺ pegs

text_simple: وخلقناكم ازواجا
translation_en_yusufali: and created you in pairs

text_simple: وجعلنا نومكم سباتا
translation_en_yusufali: and made your sleep for rest

text_simple: وجعلنا الليل لباسا
translation_en_yusufali: and made the night as a cover

text_simple: وجعلنا النهار معاشا
translation_en_yusufali: and made the day for livelihood

text_simple: وبنينا فوقكم سبعا شدادا
translation_en_yusufali: and built above you seven mighty ˹heavens˺

text_simple: وجعلنا سراجا وهاجا
translation_en_yusufali: and placed ˹in them˺ a shining lamp

text_simple: وانزلنا من المعصرات ماء ثجاجا
translation_en_yusufali: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water

text_simple: لنخرج به حبا ونباتا
translation_en_yusufali: producing by it grain and ˹various˺ plants

text_simple: وجنات الفافا
translation_en_yusufali: and dense orchards?

text_simple: ان يوم الفصل كان ميقاتا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is an appointed time—

text_simple: يوم ينفخ في الصور فتاتون افواجا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹it is˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will ˹all˺ come forth in crowds.

text_simple: وفتحت السماء فكانت ابوابا
translation_en_yusufali: The sky will be ˹split˺ open, becoming ˹many˺ gates

text_simple: وسيرت الجبال فكانت سرابا
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming ˹like˺ a mirage.

text_simple: ان جهنم كانت مرصادا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush

text_simple: للطاغين مابا
translation_en_yusufali: as a home for the transgressors

text_simple: لابثين فيها احقابا
translation_en_yusufali: where they will remain for ˹endless˺ ages.

text_simple: لا يذوقون فيها بردا ولا شرابا
translation_en_yusufali: There they will not taste any coolness or drink

text_simple: الا حميما وغساقا
translation_en_yusufali: except boiling water and ˹oozing˺ pus—

text_simple: جزاء وفاقا
translation_en_yusufali: a fitting reward.

text_simple: انهم كانوا لا يرجون حسابا
translation_en_yusufali: For they never expected any reckoning

text_simple: وكذبوا باياتنا كذابا
translation_en_yusufali: and totally rejected Our signs.

text_simple: وكل شيء احصيناه كتابا
translation_en_yusufali: And We have everything recorded precisely.

text_simple: فذوقوا فلن نزيدكم الا عذابا
translation_en_yusufali: ˹So the deniers will be told,˺ “Taste ˹the punishment˺, for all you will get from Us is more torment.”

text_simple: ان للمتقين مفازا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—

text_simple: حدائق واعنابا
translation_en_yusufali: Gardens, vineyards

text_simple: وكواعب اترابا
translation_en_yusufali: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age

text_simple: وكاسا دهاقا
translation_en_yusufali: and full cups ˹of pure wine˺

text_simple: لا يسمعون فيها لغوا ولا كذابا
translation_en_yusufali: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—

text_simple: جزاء من ربك عطاء حسابا
translation_en_yusufali: a ˹fitting˺ reward as a generous gift from your Lord

text_simple: رب السماوات والارض وما بينهما الرحمن لا يملكون منه خطابا
translation_en_yusufali: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him

text_simple: يوم يقوم الروح والملائكة صفا لا يتكلمون الا من اذن له الرحمن وقال صوابا
translation_en_yusufali: on the Day the ˹holy˺ spirit and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true.

text_simple: ذلك اليوم الحق فمن شاء اتخذ الى ربه مابا
