translation_en_yusufali: That Day is the ˹ultimate˺ truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord.

text_simple: انا انذرناكم عذابا قريبا يوم ينظر المرء ما قدمت يداه ويقول الكافر يا ليتني كنت ترابا
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see ˹the consequences of˺ what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”

text_simple: والنازعات غرقا
translation_en_yusufali: By those ˹angels˺ stripping out ˹evil souls˺ harshly

text_simple: والناشطات نشطا
translation_en_yusufali: and those pulling out ˹good souls˺ gently

text_simple: والسابحات سبحا
translation_en_yusufali: and those gliding ˹through heavens˺ swiftly

text_simple: فالسابقات سبقا
translation_en_yusufali: and those taking the lead vigorously

text_simple: فالمدبرات امرا
translation_en_yusufali: and those conducting affairs ˹obediently˺!

text_simple: يوم ترجف الراجفة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Consider˺ the Day ˹when˺ the quaking Blast will come to pass

text_simple: تتبعها الرادفة
translation_en_yusufali: followed by a second Blast.

text_simple: قلوب يومئذ واجفة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The deniers’˺ hearts on that Day will be trembling ˹in horror˺

text_simple: ابصارها خاشعة
translation_en_yusufali: with their eyes downcast.

text_simple: يقولون اانا لمردودون في الحافرة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But now˺ they ask ˹mockingly˺, “Will we really be restored to our former state

text_simple: ااذا كنا عظاما نخرة
translation_en_yusufali: even after we have been reduced to decayed bones?”

text_simple: قالوا تلك اذا كرة خاسرة
translation_en_yusufali: Adding, “Then such a return would be a ˹total˺ loss ˹for us˺!”

text_simple: فانما هي زجرة واحدة
translation_en_yusufali: But indeed, it will take only one ˹mighty˺ Blast

text_simple: فاذا هم بالساهرة
translation_en_yusufali: and at once they will be above ground.

text_simple: هل اتاك حديث موسى
translation_en_yusufali: Has the story of Moses reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

text_simple: اذ ناداه ربه بالواد المقدس طوى
translation_en_yusufali: His Lord called him in the sacred valley of Ṭuwa

text_simple: اذهب الى فرعون انه طغى
translation_en_yusufali: ˹commanding,˺ “Go to Pharaoh, for he has truly transgressed ˹all bounds˺.

text_simple: فقل هل لك الى ان تزكى
translation_en_yusufali: And say, ‘Would you ˹be willing to˺ purify yourself

text_simple: واهديك الى ربك فتخشى
translation_en_yusufali: and let me guide you to your Lord so that you will be in awe ˹of Him˺?’”

text_simple: فاراه الاية الكبرى
translation_en_yusufali: Then Moses showed him the great sign

text_simple: فكذب وعصى
translation_en_yusufali: but he denied and disobeyed ˹Allah˺

text_simple: ثم ادبر يسعى
translation_en_yusufali: then turned his back, striving ˹against the truth˺.

text_simple: فحشر فنادى
translation_en_yusufali: Then he summoned ˹his people˺ and called out

text_simple: فقال انا ربكم الاعلى
translation_en_yusufali: saying, “I am your lord, the most high!”

text_simple: فاخذه الله نكال الاخرة والاولى
translation_en_yusufali: So Allah overtook him, making him an example in this life and the next.

text_simple: ان في ذلك لعبرة لمن يخشى
translation_en_yusufali: Surely in this is a lesson for whoever stands in awe of ˹Allah˺.

text_simple: اانتم اشد خلقا ام السماء بناها
translation_en_yusufali: Which is harder to create: you or the sky? He built it

text_simple: رفع سمكها فسواها
translation_en_yusufali: raising it high and forming it flawlessly.

text_simple: واغطش ليلها واخرج ضحاها
translation_en_yusufali: He dimmed its night, and brought forth its daylight.

text_simple: والارض بعد ذلك دحاها
translation_en_yusufali: As for the earth, He spread it out as well

text_simple: اخرج منها ماءها ومرعاها
translation_en_yusufali: bringing forth its water and pastures

text_simple: والجبال ارساها
translation_en_yusufali: and setting the mountains firmly ˹upon it˺—

text_simple: متاعا لكم ولانعامكم
translation_en_yusufali: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.

text_simple: فاذا جاءت الطامة الكبرى
translation_en_yusufali: But, when the Supreme Disaster comes to pass—

text_simple: يوم يتذكر الانسان ما سعى
translation_en_yusufali: the Day every person will remember all ˹their˺ striving

text_simple: وبرزت الجحيم لمن يرى
translation_en_yusufali: and the Hellfire will be displayed for all to see—

text_simple: فاما من طغى
translation_en_yusufali: then as for those who transgressed

text_simple: واثر الحياة الدنيا
translation_en_yusufali: and preferred the ˹fleeting˺ life of this world

text_simple: فان الجحيم هي الماوى
translation_en_yusufali: the Hellfire will certainly be ˹their˺ home.

text_simple: واما من خاف مقام ربه ونهى النفس عن الهوى
translation_en_yusufali: And as for those who were in awe of standing before their Lord and restrained themselves from ˹evil˺ desires

text_simple: فان الجنة هي الماوى
translation_en_yusufali: Paradise will certainly be ˹their˺ home.

text_simple: يسالونك عن الساعة ايان مرساها
translation_en_yusufali: They ask you ˹O Prophet˺ regarding the Hour, “When will it be?”

text_simple: فيم انت من ذكراها
translation_en_yusufali: But it is not for you to tell its time.

text_simple: الى ربك منتهاها
translation_en_yusufali: That knowledge rests with your Lord ˹alone˺.

text_simple: انما انت منذر من يخشاها
translation_en_yusufali: Your duty is only to warn whoever is in awe of it.

text_simple: كانهم يوم يرونها لم يلبثوا الا عشية او ضحاها
translation_en_yusufali: On the Day they see it, it will be as if they had stayed ˹in the world˺ no more than one evening or its morning.

text_simple: عبس وتولى
translation_en_yusufali: He frowned and turned ˹his attention˺ away

text_simple: ان جاءه الاعمى
translation_en_yusufali: ˹simply˺ because the blind man came to him ˹interrupting˺.

text_simple: وما يدريك لعله يزكى
translation_en_yusufali: You never know ˹O Prophet˺, perhaps he may be purified

text_simple: او يذكر فتنفعه الذكرى
translation_en_yusufali: or he may be mindful, benefitting from the reminder.

text_simple: اما من استغنى
translation_en_yusufali: As for the one who was indifferent

text_simple: فانت له تصدى
translation_en_yusufali: you gave him your ˹undivided˺ attention

text_simple: وما عليك الا يزكى
translation_en_yusufali: even though you are not to blame if he would not be purified.

text_simple: واما من جاءك يسعى
translation_en_yusufali: But as for the one who came to you, eager ˹to learn˺

text_simple: وهو يخشى
translation_en_yusufali: being in awe ˹of Allah˺

text_simple: فانت عنه تلهى
translation_en_yusufali: you were inattentive to him.

text_simple: كلا انها تذكرة
translation_en_yusufali: But no! This ˹revelation˺ is truly a reminder.

text_simple: فمن شاء ذكره
translation_en_yusufali: So let whoever wills be mindful of it.

text_simple: في صحف مكرمة
translation_en_yusufali: It is ˹written˺ on pages held in honour—

text_simple: مرفوعة مطهرة
translation_en_yusufali: highly esteemed, purified—

text_simple: بايدي سفرة
translation_en_yusufali: by the hands of angel-scribes

text_simple: كرام بررة
translation_en_yusufali: honourable and virtuous.

text_simple: قتل الانسان ما اكفره
translation_en_yusufali: Condemned are ˹disbelieving˺ humans! How ungrateful they are ˹to Allah˺!

text_simple: من اي شيء خلقه
translation_en_yusufali: From what substance did He create them?

text_simple: من نطفة خلقه فقدره
translation_en_yusufali: He created them from a sperm-drop, and ordained their development.

text_simple: ثم السبيل يسره
translation_en_yusufali: Then He makes the way easy for them

text_simple: ثم اماته فاقبره
translation_en_yusufali: then causes them to die and be buried.

text_simple: ثم اذا شاء انشره
translation_en_yusufali: Then when He wills, He will resurrect them.

text_simple: كلا لما يقض ما امره
translation_en_yusufali: But no! They have failed to comply with what He ordered.

text_simple: فلينظر الانسان الى طعامه
translation_en_yusufali: Let people then consider their food:

text_simple: انا صببنا الماء صبا
translation_en_yusufali: how We pour down rain in abundance

text_simple: ثم شققنا الارض شقا
translation_en_yusufali: and meticulously split the earth open ˹for sprouts˺

text_simple: فانبتنا فيها حبا
translation_en_yusufali: causing grain to grow in it

text_simple: وعنبا وقضبا
translation_en_yusufali: as well as grapes and greens

text_simple: وزيتونا ونخلا
translation_en_yusufali: and olives and palm trees

text_simple: وحدائق غلبا
translation_en_yusufali: and dense orchards

text_simple: وفاكهة وابا
translation_en_yusufali: and fruit and fodder—

text_simple: متاعا لكم ولانعامكم
translation_en_yusufali: all as ˹a means of˺ sustenance for you and your animals.

text_simple: فاذا جاءت الصاخة
translation_en_yusufali: Then, when the Deafening Blast comes to pass—

text_simple: يوم يفر المرء من اخيه
translation_en_yusufali: on that Day every person will flee from their own siblings

text_simple: وامه وابيه
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹even˺ their mother and father

text_simple: وصاحبته وبنيه
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹even˺ their spouse and children.

text_simple: لكل امرئ منهم يومئذ شان يغنيه
translation_en_yusufali: For then everyone will have enough concern of their own.

text_simple: وجوه يومئذ مسفرة
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be bright

text_simple: ضاحكة مستبشرة
translation_en_yusufali: laughing and rejoicing

text_simple: ووجوه يومئذ عليها غبرة
translation_en_yusufali: while ˹other˺ faces will be dusty

text_simple: ترهقها قترة
translation_en_yusufali: cast in gloom—

text_simple: اولئك هم الكفرة الفجرة
translation_en_yusufali: those are the disbelievers, the ˹wicked˺ sinners.

text_simple: اذا الشمس كورت
translation_en_yusufali: When the sun is put out

text_simple: واذا النجوم انكدرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the stars fall down

text_simple: واذا الجبال سيرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the mountains are blown away

text_simple: واذا العشار عطلت
translation_en_yusufali: and when pregnant camels are left untended

text_simple: واذا الوحوش حشرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when wild beasts are gathered together

text_simple: واذا البحار سجرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the seas are set on fire

text_simple: واذا النفوس زوجت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the souls ˹and their bodies˺ are paired ˹once more˺

text_simple: واذا الموءودة سئلت
translation_en_yusufali: and when baby girls, buried alive, are asked

text_simple: باي ذنب قتلت
translation_en_yusufali: for what crime they were put to death

text_simple: واذا الصحف نشرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the records ˹of deeds˺ are laid open

text_simple: واذا السماء كشطت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the sky is stripped away

text_simple: واذا الجحيم سعرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the Hellfire is fiercely flared up

text_simple: واذا الجنة ازلفت
translation_en_yusufali: and when Paradise is brought near—

text_simple: علمت نفس ما احضرت
translation_en_yusufali: ˹on that Day˺ each soul will know what ˹deeds˺ it has brought along.

text_simple: فلا اقسم بالخنس
translation_en_yusufali: I do swear by the receding stars

text_simple: الجوار الكنس
translation_en_yusufali: which travel and hide

text_simple: والليل اذا عسعس
translation_en_yusufali: and the night as it falls

text_simple: والصبح اذا تنفس
translation_en_yusufali: and the day as it breaks!

text_simple: انه لقول رسول كريم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, this ˹Quran˺ is the Word of ˹Allah delivered by Gabriel,˺ a noble messenger-angel

text_simple: ذي قوة عند ذي العرش مكين
translation_en_yusufali: full of power, held in honour by the Lord of the Throne

text_simple: مطاع ثم امين
translation_en_yusufali: obeyed there ˹in heaven˺, and trustworthy.

text_simple: وما صاحبكم بمجنون
translation_en_yusufali: And your fellow man is not insane.

text_simple: ولقد راه بالافق المبين
translation_en_yusufali: And he did see that ˹angel˺ on the clear horizon

text_simple: وما هو على الغيب بضنين
translation_en_yusufali: and he does not withhold ˹what is revealed to him of˺ the unseen.

text_simple: وما هو بقول شيطان رجيم
translation_en_yusufali: And this ˹Quran˺ is not the word of an outcast devil.

text_simple: فاين تذهبون
translation_en_yusufali: So what ˹other˺ path would you take?

text_simple: ان هو الا ذكر للعالمين
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is only a reminder to the whole world—

text_simple: لمن شاء منكم ان يستقيم
translation_en_yusufali: to whoever of you wills to take the Straight Way.

text_simple: وما تشاءون الا ان يشاء الله رب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: But you cannot will ˹to do so˺, except by the Will of Allah, the Lord of all worlds.

text_simple: اذا السماء انفطرت
translation_en_yusufali: When the sky splits open

text_simple: واذا الكواكب انتثرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the stars fall away

text_simple: واذا البحار فجرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the seas burst forth

text_simple: واذا القبور بعثرت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the graves spill out

text_simple: علمت نفس ما قدمت واخرت
translation_en_yusufali: ˹then˺ each soul will know what it has sent forth or left behind.

text_simple: يا ايها الانسان ما غرك بربك الكريم
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! What has emboldened you against your Lord, the Most Generous

text_simple: الذي خلقك فسواك فعدلك
translation_en_yusufali: Who created you, fashioned you, and perfected your design

text_simple: في اي صورة ما شاء ركبك
translation_en_yusufali: moulding you in whatever form He willed?

text_simple: كلا بل تكذبون بالدين
translation_en_yusufali: But no! In fact, you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment

text_simple: وان عليكم لحافظين
translation_en_yusufali: while you are certainly observed by vigilant

text_simple: كراما كاتبين
translation_en_yusufali: honourable angels, recording ˹everything˺.

text_simple: يعلمون ما تفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: They know whatever you do.

text_simple: ان الابرار لفي نعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the virtuous will be in bliss

text_simple: وان الفجار لفي جحيم
translation_en_yusufali: and the wicked will be in Hell

text_simple: يصلونها يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: burning in it on Judgment Day

text_simple: وما هم عنها بغائبين
translation_en_yusufali: and they will have no escape from it.

text_simple: وما ادراك ما يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: What will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

text_simple: ثم ما ادراك ما يوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: Again, what will make you realize what Judgment Day is?

text_simple: يوم لا تملك نفس لنفس شيئا والامر يومئذ لله
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ the Day no soul will be of ˹any˺ benefit to another whatsoever, for all authority on that Day belongs to Allah ˹entirely˺.

text_simple: ويل للمطففين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe to the defrauders!

text_simple: الذين اذا اكتالوا على الناس يستوفون
translation_en_yusufali: Those who take full measure ˹when they buy˺ from people

text_simple: واذا كالوهم او وزنوهم يخسرون
translation_en_yusufali: but give less when they measure or weigh for buyers.

text_simple: الا يظن اولئك انهم مبعوثون
translation_en_yusufali: Do such people not think that they will be resurrected

text_simple: ليوم عظيم
translation_en_yusufali: for a tremendous Day—

text_simple: يوم يقوم الناس لرب العالمين
translation_en_yusufali: the Day ˹all˺ people will stand before the Lord of all worlds?

text_simple: كلا ان كتاب الفجار لفي سجين
translation_en_yusufali: But no! The wicked are certainly bound for Sijjîn ˹in the depths of Hell˺—

text_simple: وما ادراك ما سجين
translation_en_yusufali: and what will make you realize what Sijjîn is?—

text_simple: كتاب مرقوم
translation_en_yusufali: a fate ˹already˺ sealed.

text_simple: ويل يومئذ للمكذبين
translation_en_yusufali: Woe on that Day to the deniers—

text_simple: الذين يكذبون بيوم الدين
translation_en_yusufali: those who deny Judgment Day!

text_simple: وما يكذب به الا كل معتد اثيم
translation_en_yusufali: None would deny it except every evildoing transgressor.

text_simple: اذا تتلى عليه اياتنا قال اساطير الاولين
translation_en_yusufali: Whenever Our revelations are recited to them, they say, “Ancient fables!”

text_simple: كلا بل ران على قلوبهم ما كانوا يكسبون
translation_en_yusufali: But no! In fact, their hearts have been stained by all ˹the evil˺ they used to commit!

text_simple: كلا انهم عن ربهم يومئذ لمحجوبون
translation_en_yusufali: Undoubtedly, they will be sealed off from their Lord on that Day.

text_simple: ثم انهم لصالو الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: Moreover, they will surely burn in Hell

text_simple: ثم يقال هذا الذي كنتم به تكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: and then be told, “This is what you used to deny.”

text_simple: كلا ان كتاب الابرار لفي عليين
translation_en_yusufali: But no! The virtuous are certainly bound for ’Illiyûn ˹in elevated Gardens˺—

text_simple: وما ادراك ما عليون
translation_en_yusufali: and what will make you realize what ’Illiyûn is?—

text_simple: كتاب مرقوم
translation_en_yusufali: a fate ˹already˺ sealed

text_simple: يشهده المقربون
translation_en_yusufali: witnessed by those nearest ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: ان الابرار لفي نعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely the virtuous will be in bliss

text_simple: على الارائك ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹seated˺ on ˹canopied˺ couches, gazing around.

text_simple: تعرف في وجوههم نضرة النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: You will recognize on their faces the glow of delight.

text_simple: يسقون من رحيق مختوم
translation_en_yusufali: They will be given a drink of sealed, pure wine

text_simple: ختامه مسك وفي ذلك فليتنافس المتنافسون
translation_en_yusufali: whose last sip will smell like musk. So let whoever aspires to this strive ˹diligently˺.

text_simple: ومزاجه من تسنيم
translation_en_yusufali: And this drink’s flavour will come from Tasnîm—

text_simple: عينا يشرب بها المقربون
translation_en_yusufali: a spring from which those nearest ˹to Allah˺ will drink.

text_simple: ان الذين اجرموا كانوا من الذين امنوا يضحكون
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the wicked used to laugh at the believers

text_simple: واذا مروا بهم يتغامزون
translation_en_yusufali: wink to one another whenever they passed by

text_simple: واذا انقلبوا الى اهلهم انقلبوا فكهين
translation_en_yusufali: and muse ˹over these exploits˺ upon returning to their own people.

text_simple: واذا راوهم قالوا ان هؤلاء لضالون
translation_en_yusufali: And when they saw the faithful, they would say, “These ˹people˺ are truly astray,”

text_simple: وما ارسلوا عليهم حافظين
translation_en_yusufali: even though they were not sent as keepers over the believers.

text_simple: فاليوم الذين امنوا من الكفار يضحكون
translation_en_yusufali: But on that Day the believers will be laughing at the disbelievers

text_simple: على الارائك ينظرون
translation_en_yusufali: as they sit on ˹canopied˺ couches, looking on.

text_simple: هل ثوب الكفار ما كانوا يفعلون
translation_en_yusufali: ˹The believers will be asked,˺ “Have the disbelievers ˹not˺ been paid back for what they used to do?”

text_simple: اذا السماء انشقت
translation_en_yusufali: When the sky bursts open

text_simple: واذنت لربها وحقت
translation_en_yusufali: obeying its Lord as it must

text_simple: واذا الارض مدت
translation_en_yusufali: and when the earth is flattened out

text_simple: والقت ما فيها وتخلت
translation_en_yusufali: and ejects ˹all˺ its contents and becomes empty

text_simple: واذنت لربها وحقت
translation_en_yusufali: obeying its Lord as it must, ˹surely you will all be judged˺.

text_simple: يا ايها الانسان انك كادح الى ربك كدحا فملاقيه
translation_en_yusufali: O humanity! Indeed, you are labouring restlessly towards your Lord, and will ˹eventually˺ meet the consequences.

text_simple: فاما من اوتي كتابه بيمينه
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who are given their record in their right hand

text_simple: فسوف يحاسب حسابا يسيرا
translation_en_yusufali: they will have an easy reckoning

text_simple: وينقلب الى اهله مسرورا
translation_en_yusufali: and will return to their people joyfully.

text_simple: واما من اوتي كتابه وراء ظهره
translation_en_yusufali: And as for those who are given their record ˹in their left hand˺ from behind their backs

text_simple: فسوف يدعو ثبورا
translation_en_yusufali: they will cry for ˹instant˺ destruction

text_simple: ويصلى سعيرا
translation_en_yusufali: and will burn in the blazing Fire.

text_simple: انه كان في اهله مسرورا
translation_en_yusufali: For they used to be prideful among their people

text_simple: انه ظن ان لن يحور
translation_en_yusufali: thinking they would never return ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: بلى ان ربه كان به بصيرا
translation_en_yusufali: Yes ˹they would˺! Surely their Lord has always been All-Seeing of them.

text_simple: فلا اقسم بالشفق
translation_en_yusufali: So, I do swear by the twilight!

text_simple: والليل وما وسق
translation_en_yusufali: And by the night and whatever it envelops!

text_simple: والقمر اذا اتسق
translation_en_yusufali: And by the moon when it waxes full!

text_simple: لتركبن طبقا عن طبق
translation_en_yusufali: You will certainly pass from one state to another.

text_simple: فما لهم لا يؤمنون
translation_en_yusufali: So what is the matter with them that they do not believe

text_simple: واذا قرئ عليهم القران لا يسجدون
translation_en_yusufali: and when the Quran is recited to them, they do not bow down ˹in submission˺?

text_simple: بل الذين كفروا يكذبون
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, the disbelievers persist in denial.

text_simple: والله اعلم بما يوعون
translation_en_yusufali: But Allah knows best whatever they hide.

text_simple: فبشرهم بعذاب اليم
translation_en_yusufali: So give them good news of a painful punishment.

text_simple: الا الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم اجر غير ممنون
translation_en_yusufali: But those who believe and do good will have a never-ending reward.

text_simple: والسماء ذات البروج
translation_en_yusufali: By the sky full of constellations

text_simple: واليوم الموعود
translation_en_yusufali: and the promised Day ˹of Judgment˺

text_simple: وشاهد ومشهود
translation_en_yusufali: and the witness and what is witnessed!

text_simple: قتل اصحاب الاخدود
translation_en_yusufali: Condemned are the makers of the ditch—

text_simple: النار ذات الوقود
translation_en_yusufali: the fire ˹pit˺, filled with fuel—

text_simple: اذ هم عليها قعود
translation_en_yusufali: when they sat around it

text_simple: وهم على ما يفعلون بالمؤمنين شهود
translation_en_yusufali: watching what they had ˹ordered to be˺ done to the believers

text_simple: وما نقموا منهم الا ان يؤمنوا بالله العزيز الحميد
translation_en_yusufali: who they resented for no reason other than belief in Allah—the Almighty, the Praiseworthy—

text_simple: الذي له ملك السماوات والارض والله على كل شيء شهيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹the One˺ to Whom belongs the kingdom of the heavens and earth. And Allah is a Witness over all things.

text_simple: ان الذين فتنوا المؤمنين والمؤمنات ثم لم يتوبوا فلهم عذاب جهنم ولهم عذاب الحريق
translation_en_yusufali: Those who persecute the believing men and women and then do not repent will certainly suffer the punishment of Hell and the torment of burning.

text_simple: ان الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات لهم جنات تجري من تحتها الانهار ذلك الفوز الكبير
translation_en_yusufali: Surely those who believe and do good will have Gardens under which rivers flow. That is the greatest triumph.

text_simple: ان بطش ربك لشديد
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, the ˹crushing˺ grip of your Lord is severe.

text_simple: انه هو يبدئ ويعيد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ He is certainly the One Who originates and resurrects ˹all˺.

text_simple: وهو الغفور الودود
translation_en_yusufali: And He is the All-Forgiving, All-Loving—

text_simple: ذو العرش المجيد
translation_en_yusufali: Lord of the Throne, the All-Glorious

text_simple: فعال لما يريد
translation_en_yusufali: Doer of whatever He wills.

text_simple: هل اتاك حديث الجنود
translation_en_yusufali: Has the story of the ˹destroyed˺ forces reached you ˹O Prophet˺—

text_simple: فرعون وثمود
translation_en_yusufali: ˹the forces of˺ Pharaoh and Thamûd?

text_simple: بل الذين كفروا في تكذيب
translation_en_yusufali: Yet the disbelievers ˹still˺ persist in denial.

text_simple: والله من ورائهم محيط
translation_en_yusufali: But Allah encompasses them from all sides.

text_simple: بل هو قران مجيد
translation_en_yusufali: In fact, this is a glorious Quran

text_simple: في لوح محفوظ
translation_en_yusufali: ˹recorded˺ in a Preserved Tablet.

text_simple: والسماء والطارق
translation_en_yusufali: By the heaven and the nightly star!

text_simple: وما ادراك ما الطارق
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what the nightly star is?

text_simple: النجم الثاقب
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ the star of piercing brightness.

text_simple: ان كل نفس لما عليها حافظ
translation_en_yusufali: There is no soul without a vigilant angel ˹recording everything˺.

text_simple: فلينظر الانسان مم خلق
translation_en_yusufali: Let people then consider what they were created from!

text_simple: خلق من ماء دافق
translation_en_yusufali: ˹They were˺ created from a spurting fluid

text_simple: يخرج من بين الصلب والترائب
translation_en_yusufali: stemming from between the backbone and the ribcage.

text_simple: انه على رجعه لقادر
translation_en_yusufali: Surely He is fully capable of bringing them back ˹to life˺

text_simple: يوم تبلى السرائر
translation_en_yusufali: on the Day all secrets will be disclosed.

text_simple: فما له من قوة ولا ناصر
translation_en_yusufali: Then one will have neither power nor ˹any˺ helper.

text_simple: والسماء ذات الرجع
translation_en_yusufali: By the sky with its recurring cycles

text_simple: والارض ذات الصدع
translation_en_yusufali: and the earth with its sprouting plants!

text_simple: انه لقول فصل
translation_en_yusufali: Surely this ˹Quran˺ is a decisive word

text_simple: وما هو بالهزل
translation_en_yusufali: and is not to be taken lightly.

text_simple: انهم يكيدون كيدا
translation_en_yusufali: They are certainly devising ˹evil˺ plans

text_simple: واكيد كيدا
translation_en_yusufali: but I too am planning.

text_simple: فمهل الكافرين امهلهم رويدا
translation_en_yusufali: So bear with the disbelievers ˹O Prophet˺. Let them be for ˹just˺ a little while.

text_simple: سبح اسم ربك الاعلى
translation_en_yusufali: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High

text_simple: الذي خلق فسوى
translation_en_yusufali: Who created and ˹perfectly˺ fashioned ˹all˺

text_simple: والذي قدر فهدى
translation_en_yusufali: and Who ordained precisely and inspired accordingly

text_simple: والذي اخرج المرعى
translation_en_yusufali: and Who brings forth ˹green˺ pasture

text_simple: فجعله غثاء احوى
translation_en_yusufali: then reduces it to withered chaff.

text_simple: سنقرئك فلا تنسى
translation_en_yusufali: We will have you recite ˹the Quran, O  Prophet,˺ so you will not forget ˹any of it˺

text_simple: الا ما شاء الله انه يعلم الجهر وما يخفى
translation_en_yusufali: unless Allah wills otherwise. He surely knows what is open and what is hidden.

text_simple: ونيسرك لليسرى
translation_en_yusufali: We will facilitate for you the Way of Ease.

text_simple: فذكر ان نفعت الذكرى
translation_en_yusufali: So ˹always˺ remind ˹with the Quran˺—˹even˺ if the reminder is beneficial ˹only to some˺.

text_simple: سيذكر من يخشى
translation_en_yusufali: Those in awe ˹of Allah˺ will be mindful ˹of it˺.

text_simple: ويتجنبها الاشقى
translation_en_yusufali: But it will be shunned by the most wretched

text_simple: الذي يصلى النار الكبرى
translation_en_yusufali: who will burn in the greatest Fire

text_simple: ثم لا يموت فيها ولا يحيى
translation_en_yusufali: where they will not ˹be able to˺ live or die.

text_simple: قد افلح من تزكى
translation_en_yusufali: Successful indeed are those who purify themselves

text_simple: وذكر اسم ربه فصلى
translation_en_yusufali: remember the Name of their Lord, and pray.

text_simple: بل تؤثرون الحياة الدنيا
translation_en_yusufali: But you ˹deniers only˺ prefer the life of this world

text_simple: والاخرة خير وابقى
translation_en_yusufali: even though the Hereafter is far better and more lasting.

text_simple: ان هذا لفي الصحف الاولى
translation_en_yusufali: This is certainly ˹mentioned˺ in the earlier Scriptures—

text_simple: صحف ابراهيم وموسى
translation_en_yusufali: the Scriptures of Abraham and Moses.

text_simple: هل اتاك حديث الغاشية
translation_en_yusufali: Has the news of the Overwhelming Event reached you ˹O Prophet˺?

text_simple: وجوه يومئذ خاشعة
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day ˹some˺ faces will be downcast

text_simple: عاملة ناصبة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹totally˺ overburdened, exhausted

text_simple: تصلى نارا حامية
translation_en_yusufali: burning in a scorching Fire

text_simple: تسقى من عين انية
translation_en_yusufali: left to drink from a scalding spring.

text_simple: ليس لهم طعام الا من ضريع
translation_en_yusufali: They will have no food except a foul, thorny shrub

text_simple: لا يسمن ولا يغني من جوع
translation_en_yusufali: neither nourishing nor satisfying hunger.

text_simple: وجوه يومئذ ناعمة
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day ˹other˺ faces will be glowing with bliss

text_simple: لسعيها راضية
translation_en_yusufali: ˹fully˺ pleased with their striving

text_simple: في جنة عالية
translation_en_yusufali: in an elevated Garden

text_simple: لا تسمع فيها لاغية
translation_en_yusufali: where no idle talk will be heard.

text_simple: فيها عين جارية
translation_en_yusufali: In it will be a running spring

text_simple: فيها سرر مرفوعة
translation_en_yusufali: along with thrones raised high

text_simple: واكواب موضوعة
translation_en_yusufali: and cups set at hand

text_simple: ونمارق مصفوفة
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹fine˺ cushions lined up

text_simple: وزرابي مبثوثة
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹splendid˺ carpets spread out.

text_simple: افلا ينظرون الى الابل كيف خلقت
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not ever reflect on camels—how they were ˹masterfully˺ created;

text_simple: والى السماء كيف رفعت
translation_en_yusufali: and the sky—how it was raised ˹high˺;

text_simple: والى الجبال كيف نصبت
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains—how they were firmly set up;

text_simple: والى الارض كيف سطحت
translation_en_yusufali: and the earth—how it was levelled out?

text_simple: فذكر انما انت مذكر
translation_en_yusufali: So, ˹continue to˺ remind ˹all, O  Prophet˺, for your duty is only to remind.

text_simple: لست عليهم بمصيطر
translation_en_yusufali: You are not ˹there˺ to compel them ˹to believe˺.

text_simple: الا من تولى وكفر
translation_en_yusufali: But whoever turns away, persisting in disbelief

text_simple: فيعذبه الله العذاب الاكبر
translation_en_yusufali: then Allah will inflict upon them the major punishment.

text_simple: ان الينا ايابهم
translation_en_yusufali: Surely to Us is their return

text_simple: ثم ان علينا حسابهم
translation_en_yusufali: then surely with Us is their reckoning.

text_simple: والفجر
translation_en_yusufali: By the dawn

text_simple: وليال عشر
translation_en_yusufali: and the ten nights

text_simple: والشفع والوتر
translation_en_yusufali: and the even and the odd

text_simple: والليل اذا يسر
translation_en_yusufali: and the night when it passes!

text_simple: هل في ذلك قسم لذي حجر
translation_en_yusufali: Is all this ˹not˺ a sufficient oath for those who have sense?

text_simple: الم تر كيف فعل ربك بعاد
translation_en_yusufali: Did you not see how your Lord dealt with ’Ȃd—

text_simple: ارم ذات العماد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹the people˺ of Iram—with ˹their˺ great stature

text_simple: التي لم يخلق مثلها في البلاد
translation_en_yusufali: unmatched in any other land;

text_simple: وثمود الذين جابوا الصخر بالواد
translation_en_yusufali: and Thamûd who carved ˹their homes into˺ the rocks in the ˹Stone˺ Valley;

text_simple: وفرعون ذي الاوتاد
translation_en_yusufali: and the Pharaoh of mighty structures?

text_simple: الذين طغوا في البلاد
translation_en_yusufali: They all transgressed throughout the land

text_simple: فاكثروا فيها الفساد
translation_en_yusufali: spreading much corruption there.

text_simple: فصب عليهم ربك سوط عذاب
translation_en_yusufali: So your Lord unleashed on them a scourge of punishment.

text_simple: ان ربك لبالمرصاد
translation_en_yusufali: ˹For˺ your Lord is truly vigilant.

text_simple: فاما الانسان اذا ما ابتلاه ربه فاكرمه ونعمه فيقول ربي اكرمن
translation_en_yusufali: Now, whenever a human being is tested by their Lord through ˹His˺ generosity and blessings, they boast, “My Lord has ˹deservedly˺ honoured me!”

text_simple: واما اذا ما ابتلاه فقدر عليه رزقه فيقول ربي اهانن
translation_en_yusufali: But when He tests them by limiting their provision, they protest, “My Lord has ˹undeservedly˺ humiliated me!”

text_simple: كلا بل لا تكرمون اليتيم
translation_en_yusufali: Absolutely not! In fact, you are not ˹even˺ gracious to the orphan

text_simple: ولا تحاضون على طعام المسكين
translation_en_yusufali: nor do you urge one another to feed the poor.

text_simple: وتاكلون التراث اكلا لما
translation_en_yusufali: And you devour ˹others’˺ inheritance greedily

text_simple: وتحبون المال حبا جما
translation_en_yusufali: and love wealth fervently.

text_simple: كلا اذا دكت الارض دكا دكا
translation_en_yusufali: Enough! When the earth is entirely crushed over and over

text_simple: وجاء ربك والملك صفا صفا
translation_en_yusufali: and your Lord comes ˹to judge˺ with angels, rank upon rank

text_simple: وجيء يومئذ بجهنم يومئذ يتذكر الانسان وانى له الذكرى
translation_en_yusufali: and Hell is brought forth on that Day—this is when every ˹disbelieving˺ person will remember ˹their own sins˺. But what is the use of remembering then?

text_simple: يقول يا ليتني قدمت لحياتي
translation_en_yusufali: They will cry, “I wish I had sent forth ˹something good˺ for my ˹true˺ life.”

text_simple: فيومئذ لا يعذب عذابه احد
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day He will punish ˹them˺ severely, like no other

text_simple: ولا يوثق وثاقه احد
translation_en_yusufali: and bind ˹them˺ tightly, like no other.

text_simple: يا ايتها النفس المطمئنة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹Allah will say to the righteous,˺ “O tranquil soul!

text_simple: ارجعي الى ربك راضية مرضية
translation_en_yusufali: Return to your Lord, well pleased ˹with Him˺ and well pleasing ˹to Him˺.

text_simple: فادخلي في عبادي
translation_en_yusufali: So join My servants

text_simple: وادخلي جنتي
translation_en_yusufali: and enter My Paradise.”

text_simple: لا اقسم بهذا البلد
translation_en_yusufali: I do swear by this city ˹of Mecca˺—

text_simple: وانت حل بهذا البلد
translation_en_yusufali: even though you ˹O Prophet˺ are subject to abuse in this city—

text_simple: ووالد وما ولد
translation_en_yusufali: and by every parent and ˹their˺ child!

text_simple: لقد خلقنا الانسان في كبد
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have created humankind in ˹constant˺ struggle.

text_simple: ايحسب ان لن يقدر عليه احد
translation_en_yusufali: Do they think that no one has power over them

text_simple: يقول اهلكت مالا لبدا
translation_en_yusufali: boasting, “I have wasted enormous wealth!”?

text_simple: ايحسب ان لم يره احد
translation_en_yusufali: Do they think that no one sees them?

text_simple: الم نجعل له عينين
translation_en_yusufali: Have We not given them two eyes

text_simple: ولسانا وشفتين
translation_en_yusufali: a tongue, and two lips;

text_simple: وهديناه النجدين
translation_en_yusufali: and shown them the two ways ˹of right and wrong˺?

text_simple: فلا اقتحم العقبة
translation_en_yusufali: If only they had attempted the challenging path ˹of goodness instead˺!

text_simple: وما ادراك ما العقبة
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what ˹attempting˺ the challenging path is?

text_simple: فك رقبة
translation_en_yusufali: It is to free a slave

text_simple: او اطعام في يوم ذي مسغبة
translation_en_yusufali: or to give food in times of famine

text_simple: يتيما ذا مقربة
translation_en_yusufali: to an orphaned relative

text_simple: او مسكينا ذا متربة
translation_en_yusufali: or to a poor person in distress

text_simple: ثم كان من الذين امنوا وتواصوا بالصبر وتواصوا بالمرحمة
translation_en_yusufali: and—above all—to be one of those who have faith and urge each other to perseverance and urge each other to compassion.

text_simple: اولئك اصحاب الميمنة
translation_en_yusufali: These are the people of the right.

text_simple: والذين كفروا باياتنا هم اصحاب المشامة
translation_en_yusufali: As for those who deny Our signs, they are the people of the left.

text_simple: عليهم نار مؤصدة
translation_en_yusufali: The Fire will be sealed over them.

text_simple: والشمس وضحاها
translation_en_yusufali: By the sun and its brightness

text_simple: والقمر اذا تلاها
translation_en_yusufali: and the moon as it follows it

text_simple: والنهار اذا جلاها
translation_en_yusufali: and the day as it unveils it

text_simple: والليل اذا يغشاها
translation_en_yusufali: and the night as it conceals it!

text_simple: والسماء وما بناها
translation_en_yusufali: And by heaven and ˹the One˺ Who built it

text_simple: والارض وما طحاها
translation_en_yusufali: and the earth and ˹the One˺ Who spread it!

text_simple: ونفس وما سواها
translation_en_yusufali: And by the soul and ˹the One˺ Who fashioned it

text_simple: فالهمها فجورها وتقواها
translation_en_yusufali: then with ˹the knowledge of˺ right and wrong inspired it!

text_simple: قد افلح من زكاها
translation_en_yusufali: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul

text_simple: وقد خاب من دساها
translation_en_yusufali: and doomed is the one who corrupts it!

text_simple: كذبت ثمود بطغواها
translation_en_yusufali: Thamûd rejected ˹the truth˺ out of arrogance

text_simple: اذ انبعث اشقاها
translation_en_yusufali: when the most wicked of them was roused ˹to kill the she-camel˺.

text_simple: فقال لهم رسول الله ناقة الله وسقياها
translation_en_yusufali: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “˹Do not disturb˺ Allah’s camel and her ˹turn to˺ drink!”

text_simple: فكذبوه فعقروها فدمدم عليهم ربهم بذنبهم فسواها
translation_en_yusufali: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground.

text_simple: ولا يخاف عقباها
translation_en_yusufali: He has no fear of consequences.

text_simple: والليل اذا يغشى
translation_en_yusufali: By the night when it covers

text_simple: والنهار اذا تجلى
translation_en_yusufali: and the day when it shines!

text_simple: وما خلق الذكر والانثى
translation_en_yusufali: And by ˹the One˺ Who created male and female!

text_simple: ان سعيكم لشتى
translation_en_yusufali: Surely the ends you strive for are diverse.

text_simple: فاما من اعطى واتقى
translation_en_yusufali: As for the one who is charitable, mindful ˹of Allah˺

text_simple: وصدق بالحسنى
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹firmly˺ believes in the finest reward

text_simple: فسنيسره لليسرى
translation_en_yusufali: We will facilitate for them the Way of Ease.

text_simple: واما من بخل واستغنى
translation_en_yusufali: And as for the one who is stingy, indifferent ˹to Allah˺

text_simple: وكذب بالحسنى
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹staunchly˺ denies the finest reward

text_simple: فسنيسره للعسرى
translation_en_yusufali: We will facilitate for them the path of hardship.

text_simple: وما يغني عنه ماله اذا تردى
translation_en_yusufali: And their wealth will be of no benefit to them when they tumble ˹into Hell˺.

text_simple: ان علينا للهدى
translation_en_yusufali: It is certainly upon Us ˹alone˺ to show ˹the way to˺ guidance.

text_simple: وان لنا للاخرة والاولى
translation_en_yusufali: And surely to Us ˹alone˺ belong this life and the next.

text_simple: فانذرتكم نارا تلظى
translation_en_yusufali: And so I have warned you of a raging Fire

text_simple: لا يصلاها الا الاشقى
translation_en_yusufali: in which none will burn except the most wretched—

text_simple: الذي كذب وتولى
translation_en_yusufali: who deny and turn away.

text_simple: وسيجنبها الاتقى
translation_en_yusufali: But the righteous will be spared from it—

text_simple: الذي يؤتي ماله يتزكى
translation_en_yusufali: who donate ˹some of˺ their wealth only to purify themselves

text_simple: وما لاحد عنده من نعمة تجزى
translation_en_yusufali: not in return for someone’s favours

text_simple: الا ابتغاء وجه ربه الاعلى
translation_en_yusufali: but seeking the pleasure of their Lord, the Most High.

text_simple: ولسوف يرضى
translation_en_yusufali: They will certainly be pleased.

text_simple: والضحى
translation_en_yusufali: By the morning sunlight

text_simple: والليل اذا سجى
translation_en_yusufali: and the night when it falls still!

text_simple: ما ودعك ربك وما قلى
translation_en_yusufali: Your Lord ˹O Prophet˺ has not abandoned you, nor has He become hateful ˹of you˺.

text_simple: وللاخرة خير لك من الاولى
translation_en_yusufali: And the next life is certainly far better for you than this one.

text_simple: ولسوف يعطيك ربك فترضى
translation_en_yusufali: And ˹surely˺ your Lord will give so much to you that you will be pleased.

text_simple: الم يجدك يتيما فاوى
translation_en_yusufali: Did He not find you as an orphan then sheltered you?

text_simple: ووجدك ضالا فهدى
translation_en_yusufali: Did He not find you unguided then guided you?

text_simple: ووجدك عائلا فاغنى
translation_en_yusufali: And did He not find you needy then satisfied your needs?

text_simple: فاما اليتيم فلا تقهر
translation_en_yusufali: So do not oppress the orphan

text_simple: واما السائل فلا تنهر
translation_en_yusufali: nor repulse the beggar.

text_simple: واما بنعمة ربك فحدث
translation_en_yusufali: And proclaim the blessings of your Lord.

text_simple: الم نشرح لك صدرك
translation_en_yusufali: Have We not uplifted your heart for you ˹O Prophet˺

text_simple: ووضعنا عنك وزرك
translation_en_yusufali: relieved you of the burden

text_simple: الذي انقض ظهرك
translation_en_yusufali: which weighed so heavily on your back

text_simple: ورفعنا لك ذكرك
translation_en_yusufali: and elevated your renown for you?

text_simple: فان مع العسر يسرا
translation_en_yusufali: So, surely with hardship comes ease.

text_simple: ان مع العسر يسرا
translation_en_yusufali: Surely with ˹that˺ hardship comes ˹more˺ ease.

text_simple: فاذا فرغت فانصب
translation_en_yusufali: So once you have fulfilled ˹your duty˺, strive ˹in devotion˺

text_simple: والى ربك فارغب
translation_en_yusufali: turning to your Lord ˹alone˺ with hope.

text_simple: والتين والزيتون
translation_en_yusufali: By the fig and the olive ˹of Jerusalem˺

text_simple: وطور سينين
translation_en_yusufali: and Mount Sinai

text_simple: وهذا البلد الامين
translation_en_yusufali: and this secure city ˹of Mecca˺!

text_simple: لقد خلقنا الانسان في احسن تقويم
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We created humans in the best form.

text_simple: ثم رددناه اسفل سافلين
translation_en_yusufali: But We will reduce them to the lowest of the low ˹in Hell˺

text_simple: الا الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات فلهم اجر غير ممنون
translation_en_yusufali: except those who believe and do good—they will have a never-ending reward.

text_simple: فما يكذبك بعد بالدين
translation_en_yusufali: Now, what makes you deny the ˹final˺ Judgment?

text_simple: اليس الله باحكم الحاكمين
translation_en_yusufali: Is Allah not the most just of all judges?

text_simple: اقرا باسم ربك الذي خلق
translation_en_yusufali: Read, ˹O Prophet,˺ in the Name of your Lord Who created—

text_simple: خلق الانسان من علق
translation_en_yusufali: created humans from a clinging clot.

text_simple: اقرا وربك الاكرم
translation_en_yusufali: Read! And your Lord is the Most Generous

text_simple: الذي علم بالقلم
translation_en_yusufali: Who taught by the pen—

text_simple: علم الانسان ما لم يعلم
translation_en_yusufali: taught humanity what they knew not.

text_simple: كلا ان الانسان ليطغى
translation_en_yusufali: Most certainly, one exceeds all bounds

text_simple: ان راه استغنى
translation_en_yusufali: once they think they are self-sufficient.

text_simple: ان الى ربك الرجعى
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ surely to your Lord is the return ˹of all˺.

text_simple: ارايت الذي ينهى
translation_en_yusufali: Have you seen the man who prevents

text_simple: عبدا اذا صلى
translation_en_yusufali: a servant ˹of Ours˺ from praying?

text_simple: ارايت ان كان على الهدى
translation_en_yusufali: What if this ˹servant˺ is ˹rightly˺ guided

text_simple: او امر بالتقوى
translation_en_yusufali: or encourages righteousness?

text_simple: ارايت ان كذب وتولى
translation_en_yusufali: What if that ˹man˺ persists in denial and turns away?

text_simple: الم يعلم بان الله يرى
translation_en_yusufali: Does he not know that Allah sees ˹all˺?

text_simple: كلا لئن لم ينته لنسفعا بالناصية
translation_en_yusufali: But no! If he does not desist, We will certainly drag him by the forelock—

text_simple: ناصية كاذبة خاطئة
translation_en_yusufali: a lying, sinful forelock.

text_simple: فليدع ناديه
translation_en_yusufali: So let him call his associates.

text_simple: سندع الزبانية
translation_en_yusufali: We will call the wardens of Hell.

text_simple: كلا لا تطعه واسجد واقترب
translation_en_yusufali: Again, no! Never obey him ˹O Prophet˺! Rather, ˹continue to˺ prostrate and draw near ˹to Allah˺.

text_simple: انا انزلناه في ليلة القدر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, ˹it is˺ We ˹Who˺ sent this ˹Quran˺ down on the Night of Glory.

text_simple: وما ادراك ما ليلة القدر
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what the Night of Glory is?

text_simple: ليلة القدر خير من الف شهر
translation_en_yusufali: The Night of Glory is better than a thousand months.

text_simple: تنزل الملائكة والروح فيها باذن ربهم من كل امر
translation_en_yusufali: That night the angels and the ˹holy˺ spirit descend, by the permission of their Lord, for every ˹decreed˺ matter.

text_simple: سلام هي حتى مطلع الفجر
translation_en_yusufali: It is all peace until the break of dawn.

text_simple: لم يكن الذين كفروا من اهل الكتاب والمشركين منفكين حتى تاتيهم البينة
translation_en_yusufali: The disbelievers from the People of the Book and the polytheists were not going to desist ˹from disbelief˺ until the clear proof came to them:

text_simple: رسول من الله يتلو صحفا مطهرة
translation_en_yusufali: a messenger from Allah, reciting scrolls of ˹utmost˺ purity

text_simple: فيها كتب قيمة
translation_en_yusufali: containing upright commandments.

text_simple: وما تفرق الذين اوتوا الكتاب الا من بعد ما جاءتهم البينة
translation_en_yusufali: It was not until this clear proof came to the People of the Book that they became divided ˹about his prophethood˺—

text_simple: وما امروا الا ليعبدوا الله مخلصين له الدين حنفاء ويقيموا الصلاة ويؤتوا الزكاة وذلك دين القيمة
translation_en_yusufali: even though they were only commanded to worship Allah ˹alone˺ with sincere devotion to Him in all uprightness, establish prayer, and pay alms-tax. That is the upright Way.

text_simple: ان الذين كفروا من اهل الكتاب والمشركين في نار جهنم خالدين فيها اولئك هم شر البرية
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who disbelieve from the People of the Book and the polytheists will be in the Fire of Hell, to stay there forever. They are the worst of ˹all˺ beings.

text_simple: ان الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات اولئك هم خير البرية
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, those who believe and do good—they are the best of ˹all˺ beings.

text_simple: جزاؤهم عند ربهم جنات عدن تجري من تحتها الانهار خالدين فيها ابدا رضي الله عنهم ورضوا عنه ذلك لمن خشي ربه
translation_en_yusufali: Their reward with their Lord will be Gardens of Eternity, under which rivers flow, to stay there for ever and ever. Allah is pleased with them and they are pleased with Him. This is ˹only˺ for those in awe of their Lord.

text_simple: اذا زلزلت الارض زلزالها
translation_en_yusufali: When the earth is shaken ˹in˺ its ultimate quaking

text_simple: واخرجت الارض اثقالها
translation_en_yusufali: and when the earth throws out ˹all˺ its contents

text_simple: وقال الانسان ما لها
translation_en_yusufali: and humanity cries, “What is wrong with it?”—

text_simple: يومئذ تحدث اخبارها
translation_en_yusufali: on that Day the earth will recount everything

text_simple: بان ربك اوحى لها
translation_en_yusufali: having been inspired by your Lord ˹to do so˺.

text_simple: يومئذ يصدر الناس اشتاتا ليروا اعمالهم
translation_en_yusufali: On that Day people will proceed in separate groups to be shown ˹the consequences of˺ their deeds.

text_simple: فمن يعمل مثقال ذرة خيرا يره
translation_en_yusufali: So whoever does an atom’s weight of good will see it.

text_simple: ومن يعمل مثقال ذرة شرا يره
translation_en_yusufali: And whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.

text_simple: والعاديات ضبحا
translation_en_yusufali: ’ By the galloping, panting horses

text_simple: فالموريات قدحا
translation_en_yusufali: striking sparks of fire ˹with their hoofs˺

text_simple: فالمغيرات صبحا
translation_en_yusufali: launching raids at dawn

text_simple: فاثرن به نقعا
translation_en_yusufali: stirring up ˹clouds of˺ dust

text_simple: فوسطن به جمعا
translation_en_yusufali: and penetrating into the heart of enemy lines!

text_simple: ان الانسان لربه لكنود
translation_en_yusufali: Surely humankind is ungrateful to their Lord—

text_simple: وانه على ذلك لشهيد
translation_en_yusufali: and they certainly attest to this—

text_simple: وانه لحب الخير لشديد
translation_en_yusufali: and they are truly extreme in their love of ˹worldly˺ gains.

text_simple: افلا يعلم اذا بعثر ما في القبور
translation_en_yusufali: Do they not know that when the contents of the graves will be spilled out

text_simple: وحصل ما في الصدور
translation_en_yusufali: and the secrets of the hearts will be laid bare—

text_simple: ان ربهم بهم يومئذ لخبير
translation_en_yusufali: surely their Lord is All-Aware of them on that Day.

text_simple: القارعة
translation_en_yusufali: The Striking Disaster!

text_simple: ما القارعة
translation_en_yusufali: What is the Striking Disaster?

text_simple: وما ادراك ما القارعة
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what the Striking Disaster is?

text_simple: يوم يكون الناس كالفراش المبثوث
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ the Day people will be like scattered moths

text_simple: وتكون الجبال كالعهن المنفوش
translation_en_yusufali: and the mountains will be like carded wool.

text_simple: فاما من ثقلت موازينه
translation_en_yusufali: So as for those whose scale is heavy ˹with good deeds˺

text_simple: فهو في عيشة راضية
translation_en_yusufali: they will be in a life of bliss.

text_simple: واما من خفت موازينه
translation_en_yusufali: And as for those whose scale is light

text_simple: فامه هاوية
translation_en_yusufali: their home will be the abyss.

text_simple: وما ادراك ما هيه
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what that is?

text_simple: نار حامية
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ a scorching Fire.

text_simple: الهاكم التكاثر
translation_en_yusufali: Competition for more ˹gains˺ diverts you ˹from Allah˺

text_simple: حتى زرتم المقابر
translation_en_yusufali: until you end up in ˹your˺ graves.

text_simple: كلا سوف تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: But no! You will soon come to know.

text_simple: ثم كلا سوف تعلمون
translation_en_yusufali: Again, no! You will soon come to know.

text_simple: كلا لو تعلمون علم اليقين
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, if you were to know ˹your fate˺ with certainty, ˹you would have acted differently˺.

text_simple: لترون الجحيم
translation_en_yusufali: ˹But˺ you will surely see the Hellfire.

text_simple: ثم لترونها عين اليقين
translation_en_yusufali: Again, you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.

text_simple: ثم لتسالن يومئذ عن النعيم
translation_en_yusufali: Then, on that Day, you will definitely be questioned about ˹your worldly˺ pleasures.

text_simple: والعصر
translation_en_yusufali: By the ˹passage of˺ time!

text_simple: ان الانسان لفي خسر
translation_en_yusufali: Surely humanity is in ˹grave˺ loss

text_simple: الا الذين امنوا وعملوا الصالحات وتواصوا بالحق وتواصوا بالصبر
translation_en_yusufali: except those who have faith, do good, and urge each other to the truth, and urge each other to perseverance.

text_simple: ويل لكل همزة لمزة
translation_en_yusufali: Woe to every backbiter, slanderer

text_simple: الذي جمع مالا وعدده
translation_en_yusufali: who amasses wealth ˹greedily˺ and counts it ˹repeatedly˺

text_simple: يحسب ان ماله اخلده
translation_en_yusufali: thinking that their wealth will make them immortal!

text_simple: كلا لينبذن في الحطمة
translation_en_yusufali: Not at all! Such a person will certainly be tossed into the Crusher.

text_simple: وما ادراك ما الحطمة
translation_en_yusufali: And what will make you realize what the Crusher is?

text_simple: نار الله الموقدة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹It is˺ Allah’s kindled Fire

text_simple: التي تطلع على الافئدة
translation_en_yusufali: which rages over the hearts.

text_simple: انها عليهم مؤصدة
translation_en_yusufali: It will be sealed over them

text_simple: في عمد ممددة
translation_en_yusufali: ˹tightly secured˺ with long braces.

text_simple: الم تر كيف فعل ربك باصحاب الفيل
translation_en_yusufali: Have you not seen ˹O Prophet˺ how your Lord dealt with the Army of the Elephant?

text_simple: الم يجعل كيدهم في تضليل
translation_en_yusufali: Did He not frustrate their scheme?

text_simple: وارسل عليهم طيرا ابابيل
translation_en_yusufali: For He sent against them flocks of birds

text_simple: ترميهم بحجارة من سجيل
translation_en_yusufali: that pelted them with stones of baked clay

text_simple: فجعلهم كعصف ماكول
translation_en_yusufali: leaving them like chewed up straw.

text_simple: لايلاف قريش
translation_en_yusufali: ˹At least˺ for ˹the favour of˺ making Quraysh habitually secure—

text_simple: ايلافهم رحلة الشتاء والصيف
translation_en_yusufali: secure in their trading caravan ˹to Yemen˺ in the winter and ˹Syria˺ in the summer—

text_simple: فليعبدوا رب هذا البيت
translation_en_yusufali: let them worship the Lord of this ˹Sacred˺ House

text_simple: الذي اطعمهم من جوع وامنهم من خوف
translation_en_yusufali: Who has fed them against hunger and made them secure against fear.

text_simple: ارايت الذي يكذب بالدين
translation_en_yusufali: Have you seen the one who denies the ˹final˺ Judgment?

text_simple: فذلك الذي يدع اليتيم
translation_en_yusufali: That is the one who repulses the orphan

text_simple: ولا يحض على طعام المسكين
translation_en_yusufali: and does not encourage the feeding of the poor.

text_simple: فويل للمصلين
translation_en_yusufali: So woe to those ˹hypocrites˺ who pray

text_simple: الذين هم عن صلاتهم ساهون
translation_en_yusufali: yet are unmindful of their prayers;

text_simple: الذين هم يراءون
translation_en_yusufali: those who ˹only˺ show off

text_simple: ويمنعون الماعون
translation_en_yusufali: and refuse to give ˹even the simplest˺ aid.

text_simple: انا اعطيناك الكوثر
translation_en_yusufali: Indeed, We have granted you ˹O Prophet˺ abundant goodness.

text_simple: فصل لربك وانحر
translation_en_yusufali: So pray and sacrifice to your Lord ˹alone˺.

text_simple: ان شانئك هو الابتر
translation_en_yusufali: Only the one who hates you is truly cut off ˹from any goodness˺.

text_simple: قل يا ايها الكافرون
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “O you disbelievers!

text_simple: لا اعبد ما تعبدون
translation_en_yusufali: I do not worship what you worship

text_simple: ولا انتم عابدون ما اعبد
translation_en_yusufali: nor do you worship what I worship.

text_simple: ولا انا عابد ما عبدتم
translation_en_yusufali: I will never worship what you worship

text_simple: ولا انتم عابدون ما اعبد
translation_en_yusufali: nor will you ever worship what I worship.

text_simple: لكم دينكم ولي دين
translation_en_yusufali: You have your way, and I have my Way.”

text_simple: اذا جاء نصر الله والفتح
translation_en_yusufali: When Allah’s ˹ultimate˺ help comes and the victory ˹over Mecca is achieved˺

text_simple: ورايت الناس يدخلون في دين الله افواجا
translation_en_yusufali: and you ˹O Prophet˺ see the people embracing Allah’s Way in crowds

text_simple: فسبح بحمد ربك واستغفره انه كان توابا
translation_en_yusufali: then glorify the praises of your Lord and seek His forgiveness, for certainly He is ever Accepting of Repentance.

text_simple: تبت يدا ابي لهب وتب
translation_en_yusufali: May the hands of Abu Lahab perish, and he ˹himself˺ perish!

text_simple: ما اغنى عنه ماله وما كسب
translation_en_yusufali: Neither his wealth nor ˹worldly˺ gains will benefit him.

text_simple: سيصلى نارا ذات لهب
translation_en_yusufali: He will burn in a flaming Fire

text_simple: وامراته حمالة الحطب
translation_en_yusufali: and ˹so will˺ his wife, the carrier of ˹thorny˺ kindling

text_simple: في جيدها حبل من مسد
translation_en_yusufali: around her neck will be a rope of palm-fibre.

text_simple: قل هو الله احد
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “He is Allah—One ˹and Indivisible˺;

text_simple: الله الصمد
translation_en_yusufali: Allah—the Sustainer ˹needed by all˺.

text_simple: لم يلد ولم يولد
translation_en_yusufali: He has never had offspring, nor was He born.

text_simple: ولم يكن له كفوا احد
translation_en_yusufali: And there is none comparable to Him.”

text_simple: قل اعوذ برب الفلق
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of the daybreak

text_simple: من شر ما خلق
translation_en_yusufali: from the evil of whatever He has created

text_simple: ومن شر غاسق اذا وقب
translation_en_yusufali: and from the evil of the night when it grows dark

text_simple: ومن شر النفاثات في العقد
translation_en_yusufali: and from the evil of those ˹witches casting spells by˺ blowing onto knots

text_simple: ومن شر حاسد اذا حسد
translation_en_yusufali: and from the evil of an envier when they envy.”

text_simple: قل اعوذ برب الناس
translation_en_yusufali: Say, ˹O Prophet,˺ “I seek refuge in the Lord of humankind

text_simple: ملك الناس
translation_en_yusufali: the Master of humankind

text_simple: اله الناس
translation_en_yusufali: the God of humankind

text_simple: من شر الوسواس الخناس
translation_en_yusufali: from the evil of the lurking whisperer—

text_simple: الذي يوسوس في صدور الناس
translation_en_yusufali: who whispers into the hearts of humankind—

text_simple: من الجنة والناس
translation_en_yusufali: from among jinn and humankind.”
